reviews.review_text: A classic luxury hotel that offers all you can expect! Service at the best level, excellent food, wonderful pool and spa, very well organized beach area! Far away from the city center but great location if you want to enjoy the beach, the pool and the golf course!

reviews.review_title: Great moment of happiness Pierre and Pascal
reviews.review_text: Everything is perfect in this hotel in which we stayed 1 week in May 2025.Friendly staff and available at the reception at restaurants and thalasso.The restaurants in which we dined are excellent and impeccable service

reviews.review_title: beware of room's at the front of the hotel Very noisy all night The hotel was unable to close down the party. So the moved my ro
reviews.review_text: At appx 2345 hours a wedding party moved outside to the  front of the hotel facing all the rooms.  Called front desk.  they were helpful but the noise and music continued. I truly don't understand why the hotel would allow this The front desk said they will call the Police. Should you arrive and notice a wedding party  Ensure you get a room at the rear of hotel. The front of Hotel amplifys  the music and singing...

Wonderful family stay , warm welcome, all the staff is so kind, always with little care! The hotel’s Tunisian restaurant is delicious. The comfort of the rooms and the spa are top! I highly recommend!! Thank you to all the staff for their warm and smiling welcome!

Staff at this hotel is very friendly and willing to please. I do find though that they have a captive audience in that there is not much located around their property they take advantage of gouging the guest for all food and beverage items. $5.00 each for 2 local beers? Ouch.  Room is nicely appointed and clean.

It is always a pleasure to stay at the Residence. Everything is perfect, so much the kindness of the staff, the spacious and pleasant rooms, the incredible breakfast, the various restaurants, the pool..., the SPA..., in short it is perfect, whether for a professional or private stay. Thank you for your involvement in making the stay amazing.

Room 306- ocean view Nice size room with king bed.  Tub and shower separate.  Safe, mini fridge - not cold.  A/C works great.  Water pressure in shower very good.  Carrefour (grocery store) next door in a small mall.  The mall also has ATM and a bank.  Not many power outlets.   One power strip on desk with an adapter.  Nice pool and beach.  Reception staff very friendly.  At the lobby bar, Mahrez was amazing and helpful.  Also a shout out to Khaled in the breakfast dining room.  Knew my coffee order and brought it to me every morning.  The reason I gave four stars out of five, are the on site restaurants.  If you like fish/seafood, you’ll be very happy.  For those of us that are vegetarian, not many good choices.  I felt the menu in the lobby bar had more choices at better prices.  Not within walking distance to the Medina,  The hotel arrange for a taxi to drive us and wait for us.  Overall, a pleasant stay.

reviews.review_title: Very happy to spend our stay at the Residence
reviews.review_text: An exceptional welcome, a beautiful setting. Everything is perfect at the Residence.  We had a great stay with family.  We look forward to returning to Tunisia and enjoying the Tunisian-style sweetness of life at the Residence again.  Thank you to the whole team and see you soon!

The hotel was amazing. We had a beautiful view of the sea and pool. It was a wonderful experience for my husband and I. We appreciated the beautiful decorations and flowers for our anniversary. The entire staff was very friendly and welcoming. The hostess at the L’Olivier was so kind and friendly- we appreciated her hospitality and she made us feel very welcomed. Souad Harbaoui was so amazing and made sure everything was taken care of for us. We really appreciated all of her assistance throughout out our stay. We hope to come back soon!

I just returned from an unforgettable stay at The Residence hotel, and I can’t speak highly enough of this place. From the moment I arrived, I was struck by the serene and peaceful atmosphere, perfectly tucked away from the noise of the city, offering direct access to a pristine beach that felt almost private.  The hotel itself exudes luxury in every detail, from the beautifully appointed rooms to the impeccable amenities. Everything was designed for relaxation and comfort, especially the spa.    A special thank you to Sourour, whose outstanding service truly elevated my stay. She was attentive, warm, and consistently went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect throughout my visit. Her professionalism and kindness didn’t go unnoticed and made a lasting impression.

The Residence is an institution in Tunis with a high quality service. Everyone is taking care of you to please you.  Large rooms with very comfortable beds, very good Spa with sauna/hammam and small gym.  Breakfast is very complete and excellent, the Tunisian restaurant is also delicious.  For the kids the kids club leaders are adorable they had a memorable stay A big thank you to the entire Residence team!

Great course though extremely windy and difficult. But the Golf office Staff, the beautiful three Ladies Doulira, Ndia,Oumayma , excellent, professional and extremely friendly. Reason I will get back. The staff under them equally very helpful. I salute all and will be back!

reviews.review_title: Sublime!!! I will go back as soon as possible
reviews.review_text: An absolutely perfect welcome! All the staff more than helpful: attentive, kind. They all take care of you like home. Hamid managed to find him a lamb drop while the main restaurant was closed.   A sublime pool, a beautiful SPA and a beach to fall.

reviews.review_title: Hotel that has a real soul
reviews.review_text: Our stay at The Residence Tunis was absolutely wonderful, as usual since the opening of this establishment. Upon arrival, we were greeted with exceptional warmth and attention. Room flowered with roses 🌹 especially for our anniversary 🎂 thank you very much. The staff, always smiling and available, made our experience even more enjoyable. The spa treatments were divine, a real moment of relaxation and well-being. The bar offered an elegant and friendly atmosphere, and the waiters always took care of themselves, even if they were overwhelmed. Every detail has been designed to offer an unforgettable stay. A big thank you to the whole team!

It is a hotel with great facilities, in a wonderful place, but sometimes the service fails, I do not know if it is something cultural, but quite uncoordinated, in the restaurants you asked for one thing and they brought you another, the bill was never right and the table half set. It's a shame because the facilities are luxurious and very lovingly assembled, but the service does not allow to have that 5* service that you would expect. The catering could be much better matched to their prices. People in reception and those responsible, much more resolved, but the service in general, uncoordinated.

reviews.review_title: Isn't there a burkini ban at this hotel which is ridiculous we're in 2025 if a women can walk around wearing nothing she should also be able to walk around covered very dissatisfied.  I thought Tunisia was a Muslim country but I guess they don't cater Muslims sold to the Europeans
reviews.review_text: Isn't there a burkini ban at this hotel which is ridiculous we're in 2025 if a women can walk around wearing nothing she should also be able to walk around covered very dissatisfied.  I thought Tunisia was a Muslim country but I guess they don't cater Muslims sold to the Europeans

Welcome certainly drawing its effectiveness from its austerity.  The hotel is huge and refined taste, beautiful decoration. The most extremely pleasant: the spa scents from the entrance and in all the corridors. The bathroom with the old-fashioned "full red marble" decoration keeps all its charm, it is also really well supplied with cosmetics/hygiene and accessories. Room service is very attentive, fast, discreet. The bedding is a real plus. Very nice. Unfortunately, televisions are not set up in smart mode for modern use... the rest being so positive we go over it. The breakfast self is perfect with excellent waiters by profession. The Tunisian elegance we love. The variety and quality of extra products.  The outdoor pool had just been put back into service, it unfortunately took too many days to heat up for us to enjoy... The spa on the other hand, with the beautiful seawater pool, and absolutely wonderful! The hammam is great, the sauna too. Nice staff. The small fitness room is functional (still lacks enough to clean even the appliances, hygiene is a concern since the staff cannot be behind each passage). The hotel enjoys a lot of outside passage, either by subscription or dinner... this affects the attendance but less than others, and the hotel remains family and well attended. In conclusion: A nice stay.

we have been there for 3night end of April as a two couple and two kids.  + Quite calm peaceful atmosphere, suitable for chills and enjoy your vacation. The indoor pool was the particular side of the residence. the see water comes directly to the pool with a warm temperature and its very comforting. i guess the hotel managers should mention this option more . because we haven't know at the beginning and one of staff told us there. totally the pool area was absolutely welcoming with herbal drinks and several spaces for relaxing. thank you guys. The breakfast was clean fresh by enough kinds of food related the guests taste.  Thanks Ms. Olfa for managing and observing the whole situations there.  the hotel lobby is so spread with historical and beautiful decorations by fully hosting of the staff there.  You can find different kind of restaurants like Chinese and local foods inside the hotel by fine quality.  Rooms are big clean quite with a high-speed WIFI    _ I guess this kind of residence is not suitable for children and gets boring for them and  vice versa is excellent for couples having relax in a luxurious atmosphere of this hotel.    Thank you guys for our peaceful moments there.
a well-run beach hotel with very pleasant staff and good food :) We stayed the second time and already felt like family members returning home.

An exceptional dinner in a typical setting with perfect service The chief honored us with his presence  Animation at the bar with a singer who brings a warm atmosphere with a bouquet of western and eastern songs  Merci The Residence

We had an unforgettable stay thanks to an animation team that is simply exceptional! Each facilitator demonstrated energy, good humor and outstanding professionalism. Their enthusiasm is infectious, and their kindness makes every activity even more enjoyable. Whether for children, teenagers or adults, they have always created a warm, friendly and laughing atmosphere. Huge congratulations to the whole team: you are the beating heart of this hotel. Don't change anything, you're great!

A crazy atmosphere of extraordinary artists we spent an evening of madness thank you all for this moment of happiness and relaxation ❤️❤️ a warm welcome with lots of attention a wonderful atmosphere we will return with family with immense pleasure as soon as possible ❤️❤️

We had a great stay at the hotel. I wanted to thank all the animation team who made our stay exceptional and unforgettable! The activities were well conducted and fun. The whole team has  Thank you very much.

Wonderful time spent there in May 2025. Super well maintained and beautiful grounds. The whole staff as well as the animation were so friendly and full of energy. I will definitely be back!!! Thank you for the nice holiday!!! It was an unforgettable time!!!

We enjoyed the Iberostar. Especially for their entertainment team with all the sports on offer and evenings. They are really nice and friendly. We had a great time and a good stay. The hotel is well decorated in a modern way.

Very good atmosphere!!!! the facilitators give joy and good humor by  offering lots of activities from morning to night. They involve all residents without exception. Infrastructures allow various activities all day, there is something for all ages and tastes  the animators always on top and smiling. Close-knit team that cares about our well-being. We will definitely return for another stay!

Tastefully decorated hotel, beautiful rooms and incredible infrastructure whether around the pool or the private beach!  Animation team at the top!!!! Activities all day with animators always smiling and committed to making your stay enjoyable. The restaurants all delicious and what about the pancakes, donuts and ice creams of the afternoon... a real treat!!!  Perfect stay!!!  We will be back 😉 If you have to come to Djerba, look no further ... for a perfect guaranteed holiday it is here!!!

A very nice hotel, with very nice people, everything very clean. The animation is fantastic.  The food is great. The rooms are very comfortable and clean. The bar has very good drinks, and are super helpful. The beach is fabulous, with lots of loungers, with places to dump. Always staff asking if we need anything.

-hospital and friendly staff, nice welcome, -good atmosphere: the team offers various activities every day during the day -meals (fairly) good: no great variation during the week. -room well cleaned -good atmosphere for children (mini disco)

Super good atmosphere excellent time especially the animators who arrive to put a good atmosphere and super well take care of their customers. Little care  From the reception by the animations everything was nickel in the evenings for the children also at the top

We had a great stay at the Iberostar Mehari Djerba! The staff is remarkably kind, always smiling and attentive. The food was delicious, varied and of high quality with each meal. The atmosphere of the hotel is warm and relaxing. We will be back with pleasure! Special mention to an extraordinary lady who prepared bread by hand every day with great love. She was very sweet, always smiling, and even remembered the children’s names, which touched us a lot. Rare attention that makes all the difference. The food was excellent and varied, the atmosphere warm... We will return with great pleasure!

Excellent family stay, everything was perfect, super nice service! Installation at the top! (The amazing child pool) Excellent meal! Spacious and very clean room! We loved our holiday at the Iberostar Waves Mehari! We'll be back! Thank you.

reviews.review_title: Nice Hotel and pleasant stay for our 3rd and 4th time
reviews.review_text: 3rd and 4th stay at the Méhari Djerba Mid April ( 10 d ) then early May ( 7 d )  The +:  - Animations although very repetitive it passes through the good mood of everyone (Chocolate, Boomba, Yahcine ) and blasted by Max who is always at the max. Big up - Animators not insistent to enlist us and light musical animations ( from 10 to 12:30 and 3 pm / 5 pm ) at the pool, we can read and discuss - The perfect rooms (for those in Star prestige we had booked ) - The cuisine of lunches and dinners - The bars, the dining room staff and the rooms, that compliments to pay (cleanliness, kindness, availability ) - Numerous sports facilities linked to the large area of the club - Dance shows with the new Brazilian dance team that further raise the level of animators who also ensure   The - -If you want to practice a sport (tennis, ping pong, basketball,...) bring your equipment, the one available at the entertainment box is only from 10 am to 12 pm and from 2 pm to 5 pm and in small number and in average condition -. - The Star Prestige Plus price outside the rooms (equipped rooms and on the 2nd and last floor of the buildings) has no interest - The breakfast too repetitive, the same proposal for 17 days..., yet there are so many talented cooks in the team - The reception a little cold a Director "forgetful": the rooms booked with his agreement during our first stay in April for the stay of May had been assigned to other people when we arrived in May...... - The opening of a new discotheque nearby that ruined us 3 nightlife ( 1h - 5h ) about our stay - Position / Orientation of your room rooms and wind direction are obviously to be taken into account to judge this real inconvenience to be the object. This new problem is known to the Hotel Management and may one day be solved....  Overall the hotel is quite widely recommended

We spent a week in April , then a week in May; we love this place where all the staff are always friendly and smiling; the cuisine is excellent and the rooms are very nice and always clean. The animation team is simply extraordinary and adorable: what dynamism! What joy and kindness! Special mention to Max , our excellent dance and gym teacher , so pedagogue and so funny! Thanks to Bomba and Chocolate; just communication about activities could be easily improved:   the application of Internet activities is useless since it is not up to date; the schedule should be updated daily (near the facilitators' shed): example: you learn only 5 minutes before there is a spinning class (indoor cycling) , the same for the bike ride; you are aware of the Arabic class only by word of mouth, too bad because these activities are interesting. Personally I would also have liked a few short walks in the hinterland and a little more Arabic music. In any case thank you for everything!!!

We went to this hotel by obligation following the cancellation of our first reservation. This is the first time I insist on posting a review as long as the service of this hotel is horrible. Just about all the staff at this hotel are not trained for the hotel or how to talk with guests (including those in charge). I have never seen a hotel in all exclusive formula where the guest cannot have water in the room. First time in a hotel where after payment you have to go the beach towels in a bazaar shop. Towels throughout the stay will not be washed or replaced. In this hotel we refuse to take the credit card for payment but we force you to withdraw money from their ATM that takes bank fees....

We had a great stay, great staff and a great animation team very professional. Very good buffet, just a small flat the housekeeping is a little bit lacking in training and at the gym the weight machine is still not repaired for some time. I recommend this hotel +++.

I had a great time  I recommend  Animation at the top  Server at the top  Host server and all the staff very very nice and helpful has the cost  Rooms very clean .no time to get bored. Food has something for everyone. To be redone

Everyone is taking care of the guests. The animators are very invested in their role and set the mood very well. They are warm and smiling.  The room staff takes hygiene very seriously and the room is always clean. The atmosphere of the hotel is very pleasant and friendly.

The animation team at the top: smiling, motivated. Ahmed’s step classes and aqua aerobics were at a great level. Very clean rooms, top pool. The bartenders, the staff around the pool: everyone was caring for us and always with a smile.

It went well. Good welcome. Western and varied food. However, the service sometimes failed, in terms of cleaning and hygiene. I liked the animation, varied themes   You could have at the check out a spa area for change or a room of service.

Very helpful staff. Excellent choice and quality of food. Beautiful hotel. Although Sousse was not really my kind of place more for beach lovers I think, it was compensated by the wonderful hotel experience.  The staff were very helpful, for example,there was a noisy nightclub facing our room and the staff changed our room immediately.  The food was excellent and caters for everyone. If you are into beach holidays then I would recommend this hotel.

We spent a wonderful weekend at Mövenpick Sousse for my wife’s birthday. Upon arrival, we were welcomed by an impeccable, warm and very professional reception team.  But what really made a difference was the exceptional attention of Mrs Lobna, who took care of everything with great attention to detail. Thanks to her, we were able to enjoy our stay with complete serenity, without any inconvenience.  Ms. Lobna embodies the patience, kindness and professionalism of a true manager. There is no doubt that one day she will hold a senior position in the biggest hotels, in Tunisia or elsewhere.  Congratulations and thanks again to the entire Mövenpick Sousse team for an unforgettable stay.

If there was less then 1 star i would choose it.. this rating only for the two best workers in the whole hotel consierge KAIS and room service NACiRA.  We booked a 3 person room and it was so narrow so we wanted to upgrade it.. they said we dont have any suites and we had to pay an extra room.. yet there wasn’t any information spreading around the staff and when we was in the restaurant for dinner every one had to ask the same question about the room and the dinner.. we explained million times and at the end they bring the check with extra dinner to pay!  The AC was not working and we had to call for one hour till someone came to fix it They had planned an external event on the weekend in the afternoon while people where there to relax in the spa we had to head the crushing of ceramic and screaming of the attendees of the event!  The AC during normal days wasn’t working in the restaurant until this event was held so they opened it when visitors came!  We asked for a cup with ice and the waiter said the soda is already cold why do you need ice!! Everyone was hating themselves during serving dinner!  It was truly a shame .. only those two kind workers .. We definitely will not be back

I had a great stay at this hotel, I impressed by the cleanliness of the room was very very very clean and beautiful, the sheets are very clean and the mattress very comfortable, the bathroom was very very clean with a smell of fresh air. I thank the entire housekeeping team except for Madame Lamia the housekeeper.

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel. We recomende for a chort holidays, 7 days is ideal.
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel. Good location. Our room 4124 had an ideal location for my husband's limited mobility, near the elevator,  restaurants, spa and beach. The bathroom vas also very confortible especialy for my husbend' nide. Very frendly staff. I woud especoally like to commend Mr. Adel, weither in the Mozaik restaurant.

The most beautiful and surely the best spa hotel in the country, especially at the spa with Mrs Nedra and her best partner Mr Yassin, the quality of the spa is very good, the lifeguard team very dynamic, helpful. The hotel repception very well, thanks to all the hotel teams I will return with pleasure" Thank you"

reviews.review_title: Very good service M Salem!! Tt the days
reviews.review_text: Very professional night service. Thank you to Salem!! Very good restaurants, quiet hotel very well positioned , clean in rooms, suites and pes common areas, very nice beach, same very clean,👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

reviews.review_title: Relaxing holiday in a beautiful setting
reviews.review_text: Upgrade offered en suite, very polite and smiling staff.  The hotel is very nice with quality service  For spa treatments, everything was perfect thanks to Nedra and Yassin at the reception and Souhir for his kindness, his professionalism.  We'll probably come back as a family.

The hotel stands out positively from others in the area. The food was very good, the service was great. The rooms were very clean, which was taken care of by Nassira. The service is very nice and helpful. The beach is beautiful, sandy and wide but a bit dirty from rubbish. It was time well spent.

I had a great stay at this hotel in May 2025. The room was spacious, very clean and very comfortable. The room property was well maintained, with a beautiful view of the city from the balcony. The bed was comfortable, and the modern décor created a pleasant atmosphere. The staff was welcoming and available for any request. The cleanliness and organization of the mosaic restaurant was beautiful, the reception very very clean.  I will be back with pleasure on my next trip!

reviews.review_title: Coach Noor: the energy that turns your stay into a unique experience!
reviews.review_text: An unforgettable stay in a place full of charm and authenticity! Special mention to coach Noor❤️, a rare gem, of exceptional professionalism. Always attentive, caring, she truly embodies the soul of this place. Between oriental dance, walking sticks and her precious advice, she sublimated my stay.  A huge thank you to Noordine for her kindness and attention to breakfast: I felt like a princess every morning, pampered with a big smile. Samia's sfenjs? A real treat, a crisp and gourmet happiness!  Chef Brahim introduced us to the art of sushi with passion and pedagogy — a moment as informative as it is convivial. And what better way to sip a cold drink served by Ali, under the generous sun of Sousse? Finally, a big thank you to Siham, always attentive, who ensured my comfort in the room with great sweetness.  A team with little care, a warm and rejuvenating setting... I leave with a light heart and memories full of head. Thank you for everything ❤️

reviews.review_title: Great place with many possibilities to enjoy.
reviews.review_text: 5 out of 5.  Excellence.   This place is amazing. All of the staff is great, kind, friendly and mostly - professional.   I strongly recommend the massages - Houda was great - I chose relaxing massage and for sure it was one of the best in my life.   Another perfect option to entertain yourself is the Fitness and the classes. Nour - the girl who runs them, is positive, very kind and gives you the maximum for every class. I tried the Pilates, Belly dance and the Arabic lessons - all of them were funny, interesting and if I had more time I would try every possible option on daily basis.   The food at the restaurants is great, the rooms are big and clean, the lobby is classy.   I highly recommend this place.

I had a great time in movenpick sousse, I thank all the housekeeping team by exception Mrs. sihem the governess. My room 8130 was perfect very comfortable and very very clean, the sheets also very clean, the bathroom very clean, thank you again

reviews.review_title: Moven”Pick and choose” when the aircon goes on 😂
reviews.review_text: As the title suggests unfortunately we were caught out by the hotel not having aircon available until June 1st (thank you LoveHoliday for not making it clear when booking - we would have come in June instead had we known).   Ignoring the above, the hotel is absolutely incredible.   Some staff shoutouts. Kamal - Pool side, so attentive and always a smile. Made our week.  Habib - Sendai Sushi. An absolute gentleman, nothing was ever too much, his service the year prior made us a repeat customer again this year.  Selmine - Movenpick Restaurant, full of knowledgeable suggestions for places to visit/dine outside the hotel.   During the week we never once had to fight for a sunbed, the pool bar staff were attentive and kept the cocktails flowing.   As part of all inclusive we got a free meal in one of their restaurants. We cannot recommend Sendai Sushi more, it was phenomenal. We went back a second time for Tepinyaka, what a show!   With love from the Isle of Man 🇮🇲 thank you for making our stay.

Great pools so much fun, rooms were cleaned so well every day by Nassiza she’s so sweet, made us feel so welcome and made our trip better, the staff here are all so lovely and great prices. I would definitely recommend it here and me and my family will definitely be coming back.

Th luxurious hotel In sousse. Beautiful, personal kind, food very good and so tasty. i was very happy also i went back a secand time in same month! And they considere me like a fidele customer so AMAZING! Stop your reearch nd choose it you don't regret trust me!

Very good accommodation.  Special thanks for Salem and its night service.  Always perfect! Suite 7070.  I highly recommend this hotel where all the staff is very welcoming and with a very good quality of services. 😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁

Very professional and neat welcome.  Room with sea view very nice / Clean Perfect welcome at the Japanese restaurant  Very nice welcome and explanation of the SPA space Five world Superb welcome and management of the pool/beach area by Saber who responds to our requests very quickly, is attentive and retains our preferences. Perfect. Thanks to him and his team because he really made our days very pleasant. Bravo.  Only downside: it is necessary to know that smoking is allowed in the bar of the Spanish restaurant, so you risk dining in a tobacco smell + a "responsible" dined among customers and allowed himself very unpleasant comments about the employees, without any embarrassment or discretion. What a pity a lack of education for a 5-star

reviews.review_title: Salem good good good keep it up
reviews.review_text: Clean hotel, super organized, clean spacious rooms and very friendly and helpful staff at all times Requests  Very rich international buffet food at every meal, well-kept pools and excellent beach service ..  Salem person very nice and helpful. Every day impeccable room, fast on time and always Smiling,

A huge thank you to Salem for his excellent service! Available, responsive, professional and always attentive. Thanks to him, the night service is really top. Congratulations to him for his constant commitment and seriousness. Very very very good!

An excellent hotel,we stayed for a week in mid-May and found the room of a good size with a nice view and very well kept by the very friendly housekeeping staff. No complaints there. The hotel itself is clean,the staff are friendly and professional,food was excellent although the buffet restaurant gets very crowded at times. We didn't use the pool as it was too busy/noisy for us but it was well attended and the animation team must be commended for their efforts there. Loungers were good quality and looked comfortable. This is a hotel favoured mainly by French tourists,we were one of very few English/British travellers but we encountered no issues and only a minor language barrier and we had a relaxing week with no issues.  The only thing that would stop us returning (and this hotel is VERY good value for money) is the state of the beach beyond the hotel area. We recovered glass,fragments of roof tiles,building materials,clothing,footwear and endless amounts of plastic. In all of my travels I've never seen so much plastic on a beach. From an environmental point of view it is horrendous, we are not eco-warriors but we care about the sea and the environment surrounding it. This really needs addressing,we've never seen anything like it and over miles of beach it was a similar story all along (this does not at all reflect on the hotel which is well maintained). Otherwise if you like a pool-based holiday in a nice place we would highly recommend here.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel for a holiday in Djerba
reviews.review_text: Very clean hotel with comfortable beds with personal care The buffets offered are of high quality and very varied Great location on the edge of a beautiful white sandy beach and only 3 minutes from the airport Small human-sized hotel with many comfortable deckchairs with a mattress available at the psicine or beach Excellent entertainment team with many activities proposed with pétanque (with 2 beautiful pétanque courts), aqua gym, dance, Beach volleyball , Archery, Darts, Muscle wake-up call, Step ... I recommend this hotel and we will definitely come back

We had a great stay the staff is exceptionally kind. Cleanliness of the rooms is nickel. The food is of very good quality with lots of choices and amazing traditional dishes. An animation team at the top, we never get bored, show every night, dance and incredible sketch with special mentions to Blacky, Yaya, Junior and all the others. Always smiling and in a good mood. HEAT!!!!!. Let’s not forget the shop in front of the hotel, great choices and correct prices. We will return without any problem. We recommend it 1000 times. Thank you for the Mother's Day rose when we left.  Sylvie, Noémie and Remi

Great hotel, the all-inclusive is quality (generous cocktail and quality buffet) The animation team at the top thank you Junior for his energy! Activities offered in top thank you to Ahmed Azem. Only downside: no dispenser in the hotel and the shower is sometimes cold and lacks flow.

We spent a pleasant week in this hotel for the first time , the room was very nice sea view thanks to our maid I forgot her name , the food was very good and varied especially during the Tunisian evening, the staff was at the top a very good mention to mario the entertainment chef and his team. We'll be back in September.

What an unforgettable stay at Hotel Télémaque Djerba! We were absolutely delighted with our experience. The room was impeccable, impeccable cleanliness, which is always very appreciable. As for the food, it was simply excellent, varied and delicious with each meal. A big congratulations to the waiters for their professionalism and kindness, always with little care. But the highlight of our stay was undoubtedly the animation team. A huge thank you to the animators and their manager Foued for setting an incredible atmosphere and for giving us a smile from the beginning to the end of our holiday. Their energy and good humor are contagious! We leave with wonderful memories and the desire to return very quickly.

reviews.review_title: A perfect stay at the hotel
reviews.review_text: Telemachus: conviviality, flavors and atmosphere at the top! "We had an absolutely charming stay at the Hotel Télémaque. One of the aspects we enjoyed most is its human size, which creates a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. You feel comfortable right now! The food was excellent and varied, a real pleasure for the taste buds. Whether at the main restaurant or at the other food outlets, we have always found tasty dishes. A big congratulations to the animation team! Always smiling and full of energy, she has managed to punctuate our days and evenings with entertaining activities adapted to all ages. The Hotel Télémaque is really a beautiful address in Djerba for those looking for an authentic, warm and quality stay. We highly recommend it!"

Loyal guests since 2010 of the Telemaque for its family atmosphere; have always been very satisfied with the services of the hotel and all its staff; are shocked by the inappropriate comment regarding Abdelrhazak's very helpful waiter and a great correction as well as his colleague incriminated. We will be back with pleasure!

Everything is impeccable; hotel ,sea view rooms ,place of the hotel ,clean beach as well as small staff,animators ,everyone s restaurants!!! care to best meet customer requirements  This hotel almost deserves 5 stars.

Very good stay at the Telemachus, staff of incomparable kindness, thanks to Sonia, Hamida, Monem (reception), Samira (maid) for their availability and to all the staff.  However, I did not appreciate the inappropriate comments from Abdel (bar) and Abd Lzaak who has no respect for the waiters who do an admirable job.  Various and very good food. I'd be happy to come back for a fourth time.

We spent a week with friends in this hotel, we are delighted with our stay. The hotel is very clean and well eaten. The animation team is very friendly. The staff is at your disposal. I also wanted to mention the hair salon that does not appear on the site, I was lucky to get my hair done by the nice and lovely Rafida ❤️🍹 who knows her work which offers you a service panel for a beautiful beauty. I have tested the hairstyle and am absolutely delighted with the service. She is very professional in her field. Don’t wait to go there she is very good advice

A superb hotel with very nice staff and care. Activities every day with superb animators (little nod to Junior, Blacky, Yaya and choco who are at the top)  The hotel really has everything you need such as shop, exchange and beauty salon, which I advise to go there because the staff is adorable. We had a great holiday with my partner.  The only problem in my opinion is that the mattress in the room is extremely hard, it gave me back pain and it lacked the name of the dishes we eat.

Excellent stay at the Hotel Telemaque!!! A warm welcome characteristic of Tunisians! All the staff are very attentive to their clients: the receptionist is exceptional! Special mention to the very professional and friendly animation team: Fouad, Yaya, Junior, Blacky, Marcello Thank you for brightening up our stay!!!! A very nice experience! I highly recommend!!!!! Ahlem, Basma, Ines and their mom ☺️

Magnificent hotel with its private beach white sand turquoise waters mohamed the beach owner is adorable sonia the receptionist is very professional and responsive the must stay the restaurant I have never eaten so well in Tunisia fresh grilled fish every day huge choice of food a big thank you to all this team I had a great holiday go there with your eyes closed

We return from a week from May 15 to 22, 2025. We had booked for the 2nd time at the Telemaque and will return with great pleasure in September. Hotel very clean varied buffet all the staff is of great kindness always smiling and available. Welcome to the top with Sonia always smiling and professional and a big thank you to Zohra our maid who made us every day a little decoration and a nickel room. The correspondent Fram on site is attentive and tries to do his utmost to satisfy us. Thank you all and look forward to seeing you again in September

reviews.review_title: A relaxing week in all inclusive!
reviews.review_text: We spent a very good week at the Hotel Telemaque.  The kindness and good humor of the professionals is indisputable. We were able to relax while enjoying the daily entertainment (a good balance of calm time / entertainment). The hotel is very well located on the beach and well maintained. As mentioned in some comments, the areas of improvement we note would be the labelling of the different buffets and better quality of wifi in the rooms.  Very good continuation to the teams and maybe soon,  Léa, Erwan & Paola

Very good hotel on Djerba, right next to the beach, with great animation, thank you to blacky and junior! Very welcome, very good restaurant. Comfortable bedding! A very good stay, we will come back with pleasure! 😊 Thanks to momo the beach attendant Bashir at the bar ,kayes for our room always nickel in short thank you to the whole team at the top change nothing!

We had a wonderful stay at the Telemachus.  An animation team at the top, we did not have time to be bored.  The staff (cleaning lady, waiters...etc) sound impeccable kindness and do a quality job.   We will be back with great pleasure.  Thank you to the whole Telemachus team.   CHAAAALEUUUR🔥🔥🔥🔥

Excellent stay hotel restaurant pool everything is spotless  The staff nothing to say of a kindness An animation of ottoman we never get bored the animators are at the top show every night music dance  Strongly the month of October  Too eager

reviews.review_title: Swimming pools to take only from photos no information at booking savings for more profits pay attention to the
reviews.review_text: Swimming pools without heating a water at 20° no name on the dishes to self noisy animations much of the day positive point attentive staff with holidaymakers clean rooms nothing negative furniture of the SPA of rust courtesy to the hair salon to review

reviews.review_title: Lovely hotel. Few issues but overall good
reviews.review_text: First time at this hotel. Firstly there's no bell boy to take your cases in to the hotel so we struggled as had 30 kilos each. And it's large cobbles. Animation brilliant. Had lots of fun with them. Loved each and every one of them  Rooms small. Food good but often cold and fridges inadequate because you could literally pour the margerine on your rolls. No loaves of bread provided unfortunately which is a shame. Staff great. Loved bar waiter in evenings.  Never waited for a drink. Men's toilets were often flooded and out of order. You definitely need an extension lead as only 2 sockets ( one was for the lamp). Had to ask for kettle twice, then weren't given cups so had to get them from bar. No tea or coffee provided but we took our own. Beach towels ok but small. I bought one from a shop. Overall if these issues were ironed out I'd definitely return because the Animation and staff were absolutely brilliant.

Beautiful really everything wonderful room eat very good animation top holiday wonderful friendly staff waiters all were wonderful thanks tunisia hammamet medina hotel beautiful memories of greetings we will be back thank you very much

Great hotel. I thank very much the host Lamia who always smiles and exceptional kindness.  We had a wonderful stay thanks to Lamia who is always available and answers all our questions. So a big thank you we'll come back

Would really recommend staying at this hotel. All the staff are really friendly without exception! All of the animation team took the time to speak to us which we haven't experienced before. Entertainment was always fun of a night. The location is a bit out of the way but no problems in getting a taxi if you don't want to walk. There is a good choice of food available. The rooms are a bit dated but are spacious. What sets the hotel apart for us were the staff though.

reviews.review_title: Very good hotel---- in depth review
reviews.review_text: There are many reviews on trip advisor for this hotel but many are a little vague and short mainly praising the entertainment team. This a longish in depth and totally honest review, so grab a cuppa and read on.  Located in Yasmine Hammamet and if you want to walk to beach its about 2 minutes away. If you want to walk to shops maybe 20 minutes away and onto marina it about 35 minutes away but is an easy flat walk.  Hotel reception is lovely, bright and airy and staff are pleasant and helpful, spoke good English. Gave us information on hotel, where things were and mentioned the al la carte options that were available. Plenty of comfy chairs in foyer to sit and watch world go by and place was spotlessly clean  I had emailed and requested an upper floor room in quiet area. So of course I was given a ground floor room close to bar. This was quickly changed and I got a room on 2nd floor overlooking quiet adult only pool  Room was fairly large and bright perhaps a little dated and maybe in need of updating. Few floor tiles discoloured and cracked.   Room was clean and cleaned each day along with clean towels every day  We had 2 large single beds, very comfy, a 32 inch TV with just BBC News in English. Shower in bathroom was powerful always plenty of hot water, but even with shower curtain in bath water still did go over floor at times  There is a small fridge in room as well as safe deposit box which was free to use  Balcony was a little compact but overall fine for 2 people  There was air con but at this time of year we did not need to use  FOOD  My wife is a fairly fussy eater but even she found plenty of food that she could take and enjoy. There is a great deal of variety of fresh food  Breakfast was some breakfast cereals,fresh fruit, yogurts, cold meats and cheeses, croissants, pastries as well as hot choices like sausages, potatoes, eggs, scramble, boiled and freashly made fired eggs and ommlette.  Lunch and dinner consisted of soups which were delicious, Tunisian dishes, chicken, beef, lamb,fish, pasta dishes, freshly made pizza,as well as cold meats, salads, fresh fruits. Grilled dishes were also freshly prepared including hamburgers, fish, chicken and turkey. Food was always hot or at wort warm, but never cold. Trays were regually topped up so plenty to go round.  The choices of pastries, cakes fruits and ice cream was excellent  POOL AREA  Fantastic main pool area with very large pool whic you could walk into with a very gentle slope. Pool area was typically 1.2 metres deep going to maximum of 1.4 metres deep. There was a small separate kids pool.  Entertainment team would have activities on in and around pool area, water areobics, water polo was set up but not used.  Plenty of sunbeds to around at pooside as well as plenty of sunbeds in the grounds and tables and chairs in and around poolside.  There is a separate quiet adult only pool area with a 20 metre pool and around 40 sunbeds  The grounds of hotel were nice, lots of flowers, tress and grass areas, some of which were just being relaid  There was a separate kids club area and a small and new kids play area  Drinks, for us were all inclusive. water, coffee, soft drinks. Beer was served in mainly 300 ml glasses. Local spirits and bar staff were generous with their servings as well as coktails  STAFF  Overall standard of service was excellent, staff very attentive and always smiling. From Reception staff to bar staff, catering staff cleaning staff and the entertainment team.  Entertainment was OK, nothing special. A couple of shows, karaoke, bingo and quiz night. Entertainment team always encouraging people up to dance but not too in your face. During day there was archery, mini golf, darts and water aerobics.  Evening entertainment was inside at bar area. In better warmer weather there is a larger outdood stage where entrtainment would be held.  There are a lot of French hotel guests as well as Brits, a few Germans and some locals  NEGATIVE COMMENTS.  Minor issue, rooms are a wee bit dated.  BUT the big issue for myself and many other guests was one of the weekends, where I think half the population of Tunisia came to stay.  Dining room was absolute chaos with the Tunisian guests who took over the entire dining room. Very loud, agressive with terrible general manners. There were no tables to be had, but we got one eventually thanks to helpful waiter. Once seated, no cutlery, no plates and not a lot of food left. Tunisians had piled up mountains of food on their plates of which about half of it was left, therefore wasted. It was absolute carnage in dining room as if a plague of loctus has descended  We had this Saturday night as well as breakfast and lunch on Sunday, before they left.  NOTE  TO HOTEL.If you know you have a large number of guests arriving, or of hotel is going to be full, could you perhaps orgainse 2 sessions for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  Overall an excellent 10 days and I would recommend this hotel.  If you want any further information contact me.

We have a pleasant stay in a well located hotel close to the sea.Very good personal welcome to listen to and care.The service of the bar listening fast and efficient.Moreover the food very good and the room very clean.The team of animation are great who offers us a varied and very rich program with a superb woman named Vicky who is to many listening and who looks after us.Hotel recommended.

Beautiful hotel! Impeccable service - perfect staff - impeccable cleanliness restaurant very varied and very good  A very good address! We will return without hesitation  Thank you to all the staff and despite a reservation concern on our arrival forget about  l agency the management was understanding and very human Very good location  Nothing negative thank you so much and see you soon

We are an older couple who stayed for 2 weeks from 25/4. Whilst we regularly holiday in Egypt this was our first visit to Tunisia for over 20 years and we were surprised to see the continuing level of abject poverty away from the tourist areas even though we knew that Tunisia is a poor country.   As we always do, when booking the holiday we requested a quiet room and when we checked in we reiterated this request.  Our allocated room was on the ground floor in 'block 2'. There were problems with the room which included 2 of the 4 lights in the bathroom not working and a broken lock on the french windows. Not good when the room was on the ground floor. All the problems were attended to quickly although the repairs were not all successful at the first attempt.  There was the usual music from the pool area during the day but it was quiet during the evenings. That was until the evening disco moved outdoors from 1 May. The noise was horrendous. We immediately requested a change of room and moved to 'block 4' the next day.  Without going into great detail, this is not a 4 star hotel. Whilst staff, with rare exceptions, are friendly and helpful it only lasts for as long as you tip (any hard currency is preferred to Dinars). The housekeeping staff work hard but we never saw a vacuum cleaner so cleanliness of the floors and rugs is an issue. (Don't walk around your room with bare feet, particularly after a shower!). Food in the restaurant was usually beautifully presented but was too often of mediocre quality.  Contrary to previous reviews, when walking into Hammamet and on outings we were not hassled in any way.  A couple of tips:  Taxis are cheap but do haggle and agree a price (usually at least half what they originally ask, often a third) for your journey with taxi drivers before getting into the taxi and try to have the exact amount for the price agreed. A couple staying at the hotel agreed a price of 5 Dinars and gave the driver a 10 Dinar note expecting change. The driver drove off with the 10 Dinar note (the amount he had originally quoted).  The hotel reception can arrange a car and driver for your exclusive use for the day. We used this service twice for outings to Carthage and the Bardot museum and El Jem amphitheatre and museum. It's cheaper than the offers available from tour operators and you go at your own pace. The drivers do not act as guides but know what they're doing, tell you what to look out for and take you to sites that are not included in the tour operators' offerings. You will have to pay entry charges. For all the sites we visited the charge was 12 Dinar each (around £3).

Loved this  hotel . rooms v clean bit dated entertainment staff fantastic shout out to Aemon  Harry  & Vicky so nice . food very good always found somthing to eat apart from the confrence night was awful  so busy and lots rude guests. waiters realy good luved Hosin  always found us a table .bar staff realy good . short walk to beach did enjoy archery and darts games .

I’ve just got back from an amazing week everything was just top class entertainment lads and lasses were just brilliant I really cannot fault staff at all just couldn’t do enough for you food was lovely drinks and cocktails brill private beach is only five minute walk from hotel and bar and toilets all spotless

reviews.review_title: Really nice place and worth a visit!
reviews.review_text: Got back today after our second time there. Some of the best service from all of the staff we've ever had in a four star. In fact the service just might outweigh some five star hotels we've been to. Everyone's very helpful and friendly and cant do enough for you. Superb cleanliness.   Good quality rooms, if a little dated, but in reality that's not a problem. All you do is sleep there. As I think has been mentioned before there's a lack of wall sockets so take a few adaptors if you have a lot of rechargeable stuff etc. Have to say that the large bowl of fruit and the towels on the bed every day as swans with petals etc was a great touch.  Fantastic animation team (Vicky is a real bonus) and some good acts as well. Bloke on the violin was stand-out! Bar staff are brilliant too. One failure though was one night the act due in the bar was moved to another room leaving those in the bar with out anything. Some music would have been good.  Be aware its quite geared towards French Tour Operators so don't expect lots of British there. Guess what? They don't bite!  If you're a fussy eater like me you might struggle with the food but I can honestly say the quality improving and I found something most nights.  If there's something to change/improve on its the meal arrangements when there's a seminar or a locals event happening. We were there last weekend and the restaurant was complete pandemonium and a free for all. If your a paying tourist and not forceful, and I mean 'forceful', you wont get near anything.  I have to say sadly that I've never seen so many people take so much when clearly needing so little. You don't need four plates of food per person, fruit, ice cream, cake, bread etc between two of you only to leave your table looking like a rubbish tip with uneaten food everywhere for the poor staff to clear up. Might want to give some thought to using another room for those that are not paying tourists.  So my advice is definitely book this hotel as the pros definitely outweigh the cons. We'll surely be back this year or next!

Very good hotel! Staff (host, waiter, reception, )very welcoming and friendly  The restaurant is very good,  The hotel is very clean. Animation is varied  The all in exclusive formula is complete and 24h / 24h A quiet pool and a lively pool.  The sea has quick access with private beach bar and toilet.

Super nice place, the staff absolutely friendly and accommodating.  Food was mega delicious and really something for every man.  The kids had a lot of fun by the pool, were very excited about the show and the animators ❤️🍀 Gladly again

Best hotel ever in Hammamet !!! Great service, friendly staff, great food and great animation. Non-intrusive, very respectful and with a lot of humor 😀 The rooms are nice and clean and it is responded to wishes of any kind. For old and young, with or without children highly recommended !!!

In a year, we came 3 times, and the observation is the same: it’s always perfect! The staff is always welcoming, kind and caring for us.  The animation team offers various activities (archery, sports, games...). The restaurant is spotless.  Really the positive: the staff (animators, waiters, chef, bartenders,.....). We will return a 4th time without hesitation!

A great animation team at the top An incredible atmosphere. They are all very present, smiling, kind and all make us feel good. Thank you A very clean complex , a restaurant at the top. The staff is really careful. I will return without hesitation.

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend! But please keep in mind 1 thing…
reviews.review_text: Had a lovely time with my mum, the staff were really great despite having a problem with our booking, the booking manager was very accommodating. The rooms were clean, not perfect but clean enough. The hotel was also very clean and tidy including the food areas and the hotel generally smells so nice. The food was great, fabulous choice and you can tell there’s very little food waste as they put enough for everyone and only top up when a dish is empty. There’s also 3 a la carte restaurants you can visit free of charge. We visited the Tunisian restaurant which was a nice experience. The entertainment/animation team were the best, day in day out they kept the vibe of the place high and kept everyone in good spirits and also took the time to get to know each and every single guest. The hotel is 5 mins from the beach and you can see the ocean from the resort, it’s a pretty view. The staff are so so helpful and friendly and that was a huge part of us enjoying our trip. We will be recommending this resort to everyone. Just 1 hour away in and around the capital, there’s lots to do and many excursions. We felt VERY safe in and out of the resort despite what people often say like it’s unsafe for women. From our experience, we felt safe all the time.   A few things to note: - The pool was very very cold even in hot weather so not many people used the pool. it would be good if they could heat it slightly  - The spa facilities were okay, not bad but not the best I’ve ever seen. The massages however were amazing, would highly recommend booking in a massage if not anything else. - During our stay there was a seminar of some kind, and the people attending brought their entire families to stay. They were not paying guests and caused much chaos for many guests including letting their kids touch all of the food on display, taking vast amounts of food (that went to waste) and filling up Tupperware containers full of food, enough to last a week. They were rude and inconsiderate and many many guests, including ourselves didn’t get to eat and felt very uncomfortable in the hotel. The hotel need to organise better. Before you go, ask if there will be anything like this happening. We spoke to lots of guests and everyone was unhappy. The standard of the food dropped, general hotel hygiene also dropped and guests were concerned about their belongings. This is the only bad thing.

reviews.review_title: Relaxing stay. Very very good welcome
reviews.review_text: Very good hotel. The welcome is perfect and the animation team is great.  I'll be back. I strongly recommend it for families.  The entertainment is great. Bravo.  We eat very well. And it is not very expensive.  Thank you thank you

Our second visit to this great hotel and little has changed in a year. As per my last review, it was a very great stay. The welcome was warm and genuine. Being an all inclusive holiday the food and drink are crucial to a good holiday and this hotel did not disappoint, the variety and abundance of dishes meant you can find something for all. Traditional, familiar all tasty and beautifully presented.  Although I don’t indulge in alcohol much these days the few I had were very good. Mainly locally brands.  Lifeguards at pools at all times and never a need for towels at dawn to get a sunbed The entertainment team are busy, energetic but not pushy. Many activities to join should you wish Our room was great, large, with a small balcony. By far the best quality were the staff, all levels were cheerful and friendly and very hardworking. A tribute.  Not as polished as maybe Spain, Greece, France, etc. if that’s your bag, Tunisia has had a rough ride for many years, but the best value you’ll find anywhere and the people inside the hotel and out are simply lovely.  A very safe and comfortable feel to the area I highly recommend this hotel

A family hotel whose service is at the top personal listening and care 😃. Well varied and good food. Clean room a very nice atmosphere with an animation team present and dynamic. Everything and top .hotel to recommend

Great hotel with fantastic staff. Food was great and dome good choices. My son had a special calzone made for him by the pizza chef. The breakfast omlettes have to be tried and the omelette chef is great. Pancakes with the chocolate sauce are delicious. There's a brilliant desert selection including ice cream and lots of fresh fruit. The barstaff are great and once they know you they bring your drinks to you. The lobby is huge and great for sitting in. We stayed in a bungalow. But would rather have chosen staying in the hotel itself. Highly recommend this hotel.

reviews.review_title: A hotel where tourists are stolen from
reviews.review_text: We are now in Steigenberger Palace MARHABA and it's the second day in a row that our beach towels are stolen from the sun loungers. The receptionists don't care. A hotel where people steal. Be careful to avoid it because no one guarantees your integrity. I don't recommend it at all. A place where people's indolence ruins your vacation

Great hotel, entertainment staff are excellent (especially Rita in the kid’s club)! Lots going on in the evening and the food is good. We really enjoyed the Fantasia show and there were other themed nights. Would recommend coming here - we already want to book our next trip!

reviews.review_title: First Time at this hotel.... Won't be the last.....
reviews.review_text: I booked for me and my partner as neither of us had been to Tunisia before.  What a fab hotel!!!!  All the staff are happy and smiling and are so friendly, nothing is too much trouble.  The lobby is great with a cash machine and welcome drinks.  Check in was fast and stress free, they have currency exchange too as its a closed currency.  You can pay the pool towel deposit in sterling so you don't have to worry about being left with Dinar at the end of your stay.  There is a small shop that has very reasonable prices.  A really massive shout out to the guys at the pool bar and the pool guards and sunbed guys, you made our holiday 'Very Gooood Very Niiice'.  I hope the ducks are living their best lives and I hope the  get to see this.  The pool and surrounding gardens are spotlessly clean.  An absolutely fantastic bunch of guys, so much so that we didn't go to the other pool......   We had a bungalow with garden view (214), our maid was so friendly and always smiling, the beds were made every day and changed whenever we requested, fresh towels every day, the room was spotlessly clean.  Mini fridge was stocked with water and soft drinks and there is shampoo, shower gel, hand soap and body lotion provided and a pretty decent hairdryer.  There are also dressing gowns and slippers provided.  We ate all our meals in the main restaurant we were so happy with the food choices and freshness.  The dishes were not repeated over and over like in some all -inclusives, its was presented fantastically and there was something for everyone.  A huge thank you to Ben the guys up around table 84, you made us feel so welcome and made it feel more than a hotel dining room.  Even though it could be very bust at times they were all smiling and we never had to ask for drinks, they appeared as if by magic!!  The staff here really make the place fantastic.  Thank you for a truly fantastic holiday!!  My partner never likes to go to the same place twice but he has already said he would definitely return here, so you may just see us again very soon (September.....)

The best hotel in Tunisia. Lovely stuff in whole hotel and best entertainment team. We will come back for sure, because these people are amazing. They made us smile every day and we enjoyed our stay. People are very kind and professional. All recommendations for the hotel and stuff.

reviews.review_title: Great stay with amazing animation team
reviews.review_text: We had a wonderful family stay the pillows were incredibly soft, and the room was clean and quiet. The animation team truly made a difference  they were energetic, friendly, and kept both kids and adults entertained throughout the day. Staff were helpful, and breakfast was varied and tasty. We’d definitely come back

Really a great team as the hotel service to the animators.    O top really recommend this hotel 100%. Excellent food not to mention cleanliness. I don't blame you. A big bravooo. Very professional facilitators

Great family holiday in a beautiful hotel with a great environment. A big thank you especially to Rita who took care of the children with patience and love, we see that she loves what she does and is very caring. Thanks also to Hafidh who was very attentive during our stay.

We spent very good time :-) We were a big group and everyone found something very interesting for him! The animation was great! :-) The children had very good time in the kids' club and the mini disco! The adults liked very much the other activities!

This hotel is fantastic. The staff are all so welcoming and attentive. The hotel is about 50 minutes from the airport.   The room was a bungalow 204. It was large with 2 small doubles pushed together. The shower was really good and it was kept clean.   The grounds in the hotel are clean and tidy. Everyone says hello whilst they work.  The hotel has a well equipped gym. The pools are a good size and there are always plenty of sunbeds available. The pool boys were always there to lay out the lounger cushions for you. The waiters come around asking if you want a drink all day. The beach was also good and we swam in the sea several times.   Food, we were never disappointed with the food. We mainly ate in the buffet restaurant. Our waiter Walhidi was brilliant. He always had our table set and wine ready to pour. He was one of the most friendly people you could meet.   Staff, they were all great, the entertainment team were always friendly and would stop for a chat even if you didn’t take part in the activity.   Bar staff, they were exceptional, they all knew your drinks and would tell you to sit down and they would bring them to you. The attention was great as they would be bringing the next round before you finished.   Tipping was never asked for, unlike Egypt where everyone wants a tip. The staff here were never pushy or rude. Everyone had a smile and seemed genuinely happy. We did tip well overall the two weeks but it was deserved.   Overall a fantastic holiday in Tunisia. This was our first visit here and we never go back to the same place twice however we will make an exception in this case. Thanks to everyone at the hotel for making the holiday so good.

The Hotel and Service were just great so our on week vacation was so relaxing. Located directly at the beach, enjoyed the sea. Staff at beach great, animation team excellent, especially Lala and Alex.  Would definitely stay again and recommend to friends and family.

reviews.review_title: correct but little better to do
reviews.review_text: Following the reviews I was disappointed in fact l hotel is clean although some renovations are to be expected (fridge broken down, hair dryer that overheats hunt that malfunctions ) the food is correct but the reservations to the other two restaurants are very difficult we could not go there because always complete even if we wanted to book the day of our arrival.  The staff remains the big downside. They are not smiling we always have the impression that they mock us. speak poorly French and very poorly organized. Fortunately the animation team raises the level and is very nice.

Very nice hotel, very spacious and clean rooms. Great spa. Very professional and very kind staff. The animators always smile and always there to set the mood, special mention to Rita who is really a pearl. I recommend.

Such a Good experience!  Everithing was perfect: the room, the excelent food,  the animation team which organise something new every day!  Everyone really polite and very kind.  A particular thanks to Rita, so lovely with our kid!  We’ll come back fore sure!!

Fantastic hotel an animation team perfect very friendly cared for staff the bungalow is very good and very cared for anyway everything very good very satisfied we will be back  Because the Tunisian people are incredibly friendly and courteous

We stayed here for two weeks and really enjoyed our time. The rooms are lovely—spacious, clean, and very comfortable. The food is decent, though it’s quite seafood-focused, which made the options a bit limited for me as I don’t eat seafood. One of the highlights of our stay has been the kids club. Our daughter absolutely loves it, and we go every day to see Rita, who runs it. She’s fantastic with the children and truly made our stay extra special.

Holiday at Hammamet Tunisia with stay at Steigenberger was fantastic and would highly recommend. All facilities were on point from activities, meals, entertainment to staff. Entertainment Team were great with fun activities bringing everyone together. Massive shoutout to Chouchou from the Entertainment Team, thanks.

This hotel has been excellent from start to finish . Staff have all been amazing, entertainment have been excellent  big shout to chouchou was amazing though the holiday made the holiday fun . Highy recommend place 5* though out . From food n all services

Great holiday at the Steigenberger Hotel all facilities were more than expected and really enjoyable. Entertainment Team were fantastic with how they accommodate guests to make it fun and enjoyable, massive thanks to them all. Shout out to the Six Pack Challenge rep - chouchou/Rashida/

I am writing this review to say i am having a great holiday here at the Steigenberger Maharba  hotel in Hammamet. The hotel is beautiful, we always book a room in the main hotel on the 3rd floor. We paid extra for a sea view which was well worth paying for. The food and service are always really great. Amazing  choice of food. Something for everyone.  I would like to say how good your Entertainment team are. They are all extremely friendly, informative and helpful. I’ve taken part in a few of the activities and especially like the Aquaswim, Pilates, Yoga and Zumba.  LaLa is a credit to your company. She always goes the extra mile in everything she does. She keeps us all full informed about the activities during the day and in the evening.  In the evenings the entertainment has been great. The team are always attentive and encouraging.  Thank you. Keep up the good work.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Nice hotel, and nice people , we are visiting for the second time here and we will be back again .. my daughters love lolly (kids club) so much and she is our reason we came back ..she is a special lady, she also does her job from the heart ❤️ the children ask for her and make video call with her through the year. Our thanks to everyone for a memorable stay again.

Lolli, animation lady, is the stand out reason why my children wanted to come back to this hotel. She is so lovely, very friendly, always full of ideas that children love and every evening there is a disco where she makes sure all children are on their feet and involved. There really is no fault. Everyone is willing to help and welcome you. We will be returning again next year.

We are very satisfied with the hotel. We had no complaints whatsoever. Here, I finally felt like a real guest. The staff is very kind and helpful, and the waiters—whom you see at least three times a day—really go above and beyond. Special thanks to  Sabeur, our waiter, for the excellent service!  I recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to relax in a peaceful and beautiful environment.

absolutely fabulous place, staff were so friendly, if I could give more stars I would. food was good, place clean, everything was ridiculously cheap. but the staff made the holiday for us. my wife is in a wheelchair and she was really looked after. brilliant

Completely lost for words, not one for doing reviews but this hotel and staff blew me away. Been many places but this is the best place I have ever been to and will definitely be going back time and time again. On arrival felt as if straight away the staff that greeted us it felt like we had been there before, the service to our room was with ease porter took our cases and showed us where our room was, and once inside the room and bathroom where lovely. During our stay every day was made to feel like a dream, the staff there are out of this world always had a smile and so friendly, I give a big thank you to Adel from the restaurant made our every meal time unreal, Hazem from the pool never without a drink top waiter. Sahbi from the snack bar true ace, Nidhal the lifeguard was there to always have a great laugh and managed to get my wife to go down the water slide she hates her head going under water tops marks and a big thanks to all the animation team Alex, Bibo, Willy, Salah, and Malek these guys put there heart and soul in to the entertainment ever day and night top guys.  So a big thanks to the hotel and all its staff that make this place a dream come true already booked to go back next year, thanks for the best 10 days ever

How anyone can give less than 5 stars are clearly spoilt and self entitled. The hotel and facilities are excellent but one thing that makes this place exceptional are the people. The staff are nothing short of amazing, friendly and always smiling. Big shout out to Adel from the restaurant, Sahbi from the snack bar, Hazem from the pool bar, Nidhal the lifeguard and from the animation team Alex, Bido, William and new boy Malek. Fabulous 10 days and will be returning again very soon, thanks and love to you all.

reviews.review_title: Fantastic staff but disappointing on reception service
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely hotel and if my review was based solely on service received from waiters, bar staff, pool staff, the Animation Team and cleaners, this would be a five star rating. They are superb. Friendly, helpful, kind and professional.  The only department that did let us down was reception. We booked a two bedroom junior suite as we were travelling with my elderly mum. As we had a very early morning flight out, we booked a private taxi transfer to the hotel. This turned out to be unnecessary as although we were in the hotel by 11.15am, we could not check into our rooms until 2pm. This was our mistake. When we arrived, we paid the appropriate tourist tax for 3 people on a credit card. We were taken to our suite at 2pm and the first bedroom was made up accordingly for two people. However, the second bedroom had a half made bed in a room without a wardrobe, drawer, mirror or towels. I returned to reception to inform them of this but the receptionist insisted the room had these items and sent a porter up with me to confirm. Consequently we all returned to reception once he had seen the room. There was no apology. An hour later we were given another suite. The second bedroom now had a wardrobe and a drawer but no bed and no towels, just two sofas and a television. We also had 4 hangers between 3 adults for a two week stay. Eventually at 5pm I found bedding and we pushed the two sofas together in order for us all to sleep. Two days later a bed was made up in her room. We also ordered a hotel taxi from reception and had previously been advised to ensure the meter was on. The fare was 44 Dinar and the driver insisted he would wait for us to return to the hotel without a waiting charge. An hour later we returned directly to the hotel and he tried to charge us 174 Dinar. We paid him 90 and reported him to reception who confirmed it was a hotel taxi. A few days later, another guest told us they had experienced exactly the same treatment that day. The driver also continuously texted on his phone during the journeys and even held maps up in front of the windscreen while driving in an attempt to take us further. The food here is excellent but the dining room can be very busy and very noisy. However, all other staff we encountered were amazing and did everything possible to make our holiday enjoyable. Upon checkout we asked the gentleman on reception to remove our all inclusive bracelets. At this point he informed us that we had only paid tourist tax for four nights, not fourteen. This was not true. Tourist tax is also only paid for the first ten nights of your stay, per person, not fourteen. We refused to pay more and he dropped the matter. All in all, we had a good holiday but we were very disappointed by the service received from hotel reception staff.

A special thank you to our waiter at the restaurant, Mohamed Snoussi, for his enthusiastic welcome, his good mood and the flowery decorum. We greatly appreciated it.  Beautiful hotel well located, all the staff takes good care of us.  Trip to this place again.

reviews.review_title: Relaxation, sport: experience at the top under the Tunisian sun...
reviews.review_text: We had a great time at Jaz Tour Kalef.  Very spacious and well equipped room. Very smiling staff, great friendliness, very available...a big thank you to Sabeur in particular, who was to the small care on the terrace.  The buffet offered us particularly varied and tasty dishes. Impossible to taste everything!!! Theme restaurants, on the other hand, do not bring a more qualitative. Swimming pool and beach beds at the top to enjoy the sun...in short a beautiful experience, to be repeated soon for 10 days this time rather than 7..That's all. .. Jean-Marc Magis and Marie-Pierre Dejoie

I like jaz tour khlaf excellent restaurant animation top. I really loved the karaoker night top clean room and wonderful view really a 5 star hotel not to miss I will come back to this next summer with the whole family to sing and dance l9l

reviews.review_title: A great hotel with great childcare
reviews.review_text: Jaz Tour Khalef Hotel is a really great hotel with nice rooms, a great beach and great food. The staff is super friendly and goes to great lengths to offer guests an unforgettable stay. What is particularly positive to mention is the childcare, the animator "Lolli" is a real asset to the hotel, she is not only friendly, competent and reliable, the children love her and we loved the way she treats the children.  Lolli is just great!  We can absolutely recommend the hotel for families with children 👍👍 We are already looking forward to our next holiday there and our children are looking forward to Lolli🤗

reviews.review_title: This was not what we were used to from Jaz Tour Khalef.
reviews.review_text: There is nothing to say about the hotel itself, the ambiance is excellent service and friendly top. Food is versatile and excellent. for such a large mass of cooking this is not often encountered. Only it was disappointing for us, maybe the wrong time. The UK crowd was rowdy in the restaurant and lobby. Children could express themselves where I don't write an opinion now. The plates at lunch and dinner were overloaded with what then disappeared into the trash. It is a pity that this partly disadvantaged the holiday atmosphere.  Visited this hotel four times for the purpose! Back home, but this time it was not the case. It's too bad.

Amazing hotel and the staff could not do more for you, especially William from animation team. They always make sure you are having fun. Would recommend hotel to anyone who is looking to book. The hotel is stunning and well looked after by the staff

Spacious rooms and bathrooms Deckchair in sufficient quantity Various restoration The staff is very nice very smiling  We can eat and drink all the time But because there's a but... the animation team is nonexistent. Too proud not smiling at all shocking. except the 2 girls Oumima and Maissa who are adorable

reviews.review_title: This was not JAZ Tour Khalef as we used to
reviews.review_text: We booked the hotel for the fourth time. First in advance maybe it was a wrong time from May 6 to 16. Never experienced such a noisy time in this hotel as in this period. It was crowded, In the restaurant it was a clatter of plates, sliding chairs and screams of jewelery. Our compliments to the staff who provided polite and optimal service. The food is excellent and versatile. This was also evident in many people from the lavishly filled plates which were later thrown away. (Definitely nothing used to at home). After 8pm it really started. Instead of enjoying a cup of coffee with a drink in the beautiful lobby, the screaming started with excessive children's disco violence. For dessert, the loud house pounding alternated with Miss hotel pageant or Drag Queen until 23:00. Past times it has been held outside or in another location of the hotel. Fine for the lovers but not for us. JAZ Tour Khalef a pearl of Sousse but this time the glass was far from there. About the hotel nothing to criticize service, friendliness no trouble too much this is really TOP. Rooms are neat, park and pool with stand is neat and everything with a top service. Too bad a beautiful location with all possibilities both the city of Sousse and surroundings as stand. But not for us anymore.

Hotel is listed as a 5 star, but i would give only 3. Food is good, service is great, but the rooms, carpets, curtains, … really need an upgrade.  But my biggest disappointment was the beach area.
