The venue is such an awesome place that we got to love it more on a daily basis. The hotel was booked as a four star property ,  but , indeed, it was much more.                                                                                                                             I couldn't say if it was   for the great beach area, cleanliness  in general , large choice of tasty food, kindness of the stuff, great entertainment section or plenty of facilities available, but it was almost the best experience of the kind in my life.      Here I simply have to mention an outstanding group of young Tunisian people  in charge of our daily entertainment . They impress all of us by their agility, great spirit, stamina, energy, kindness, respect towards the elderly people who they treat almost as a family. They are not just doing their job,  but having a great time of life with the guests. We thank them all for everything they did to make our stay a great and unforgettable experience. The first to mention is an energetic and lovable girl named Diva, then Jordy, Nina, Casper, Rio, Fernando, Alpha, , Bobo, Kouki, Rita and Nino. This is really an awesome group of young people doing their best for the well- being of the hotel guests. I want to believe that the hotel authorities are aware of it and that they will act  and thank them for it accordingly.                                                                                                                      We are all looking forward to  staying in this particular hotel  again some day .                  Meliha, Bosnia and Hezegovina

I rate the entire stay at the hotel excellent, from the first to the last day, great hotel, comfortable rooms, swimming pools, beautiful beach and sea. Everywhere is very clean and all the staff behaves very professionally. I can wholeheartedly recommend this hotel.

The staff is attentive, impeccable service  Good atmosphere, many activities ,  Large and clean room, decent bedding, quiet The downside, the AC wasn't working.  Various buffet , theme buffet, Tunisian dish, very good fish.  Nice and clean beach

reviews.review_title: A stay that leaves us with an excellent memory
reviews.review_text: Couple stay. Hotel on a human scale. Ideally located for the departure of your excursions. Cleaning, maintenance, catering and bar staff and entertainment team always smiling and kind. Very well equipped for classic activities. Superb outdoor and indoor pool. The animations are also at the top. We do not regret the choice of this hotel that we will recommend around us. Many thanks to all of you. Thanks also to Mr Chaker Daoui our contact Mondial Tourisme without forgetting our various drivers and guides.

We had a great time. The staff is very nice, the animators very friendly.  The facilities around the pool: deckchair, table tennis, billiards, archery, boules, .... and the beach are perfect. The food is perfect, varied, well cooked.

Nice hotel , human size , clean and accessible to all including the disabled.  Very good food , varied dishes , theme evening . Animations every day for those who wish. Nice swimming pool , deckchairs pool and beach , a very well maintained beach . 3 years that I go at the same time and never disappointed! The beach infrastructure is evolving and it remains friendly and warm! Special mention for SPA , this year a crush for Mounia and the young man! Go there with your eyes closed: cure , massages is the little corner of paradise, they have fairy fingers thank you!!! Every year their services are top! I recommend!!! And for those who evoke negative reviews, it remains incomprehensible;) everything is done to have a very pleasant stay!

Very good hotel, impeccable waiters, excellent food, good beach nearby and nice room. Perfect animation. Just missing tables at the restaurant of 2 or 4 people,because many with 6 people. Other than that, there's nothing wrong.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful stay for our 45 years of marriage
reviews.review_text: We are retired and had a great 3 week stay at Seabel Rym beach. Ideal location, very nice beach, varied food and pleasant staff. A big special thank you to Mohamed our housekeeper who particularly spoiled us for our 45 years of marriage (see photo). We will return in October very surely.

Very very good stay at the beach rym , an exceptional welcome, all the staff is at the small care , of an unparalleled kindness, very good restaurant, animators at the top , mention to mohamed Amine who does a huge job always close to customers, despite the late arrival he organized us a small arrival meal, thank you to all and do not hesitate one of the best hotels on the island of djerba

The hotel is really beautiful, with a warm atmosphere and very friendly staff. The manager even joined our table for dinner. The room was clean and comfortable and the meals varied and delicious. Many activities throughout the day.  I highly recommend this hotel to all. It is also suitable for people with reduced mobility.  We will certainly come back to that

reviews.review_title: Very good hotel, excellent level of all services.
reviews.review_text: The SPA is of good quality, the staff very attentive. Nothing is missing from the restaurant. The housekeeper had an inspiration and a gift for beautifying the exceptional room. Information for animations could be more important.

reviews.review_title: Great I had a dream week
reviews.review_text: Nothing to say super clean hotel restaurant there is everything, very clean room and great staff, the excursions excellent we received great atmosphere from the animators I but 10/10 they make us vibrate with happiness and quality really reasonable price for 1 week of dream thank you to all teams for giving us plenty of happiness

Return to the beach rym after 2 years and we were pleasantly surprised at the added value and remarks made to improve the comfort of tourists.  New mattress in the rooms, swimming pool deckchair, fresh orange juice in the morning, furnishings on the beach brief as positives.  Thanks to the whole team especially to the restaurant's lasaad waiter. Lasaad from the Indoor Bar and Beach the maid who made us lots of nice things and very nice to room 314. Thanks to Raphael from the spa  And a special thank you to Mr Anis and the director for the commercial gesture when we had to leave the seabel l'alhambra earlier in October.  In short nothing to say we are at home at the beach rhythm:)  We will be back very soon.  Yes, sir.  Collin F family

Hotel that deserves a good refreshment.  Buffet a little repetitive over a period of 5 weeks, reported to the Directorate, few homemade desserts, it's a shame.  All this is compensated by a staff always ready to please. Cleaning ladies on top.

great place, very clean rooms, very varied buffet, staff listening to the customer, beach: deckchairs reserved for families and disabled, lots of activities during the day and evening. Little more: has a vegetable garden and chicken coop..

Back home! All we want is to go back.  An animation team at the top led by Samir and Nabil. Whether it's darts, archery, lunch, mini golf, many petanque games, dances, dance classes, and so on, no way to bother Very tempting buffets and many culinary experiences.  I ate his delicious tuna seines!   Impeccable service at reception. And the garden or walk is a pleasure of the eyes.  And a team does friendly and efficient cleaning.  In addition, this hotel will be renovated at the end of 2025.  What more to ask for!

It was a great experience, great staff enjoyable very helpful at all times. Tidyness and quality within the environment.  Activities and night time within the hotel was excellent very entertaining. Good price and value within the range and confortable.

Very well maintained gardens, varied food and lots of fresh produce. Very nice rooms and excellent service. Only small flat, pillows very firm and too thick but my fairy quickly understood and changed me.... Good job. Male staff (not all) a little heavy at first but ultimately very respectful.

reviews.review_title: plain old hotel in need of renovation, it certainly doesn't match the description they write themselves anymore
reviews.review_text: old worn hotel , rooms are worn to the hilt , mold on the joints of the shower , rusted stalls also restaurant old , doors to the kitchen dirty , nothing maintained as it should be , where the hot meld was served was old milk (cramming)  What was staff very friendly and helpful!

Very good hotel with very professional and friendly staff. The service at the top (bar, restaurant) and the rooms are very clean. A very good entertainment team that leaves no one behind and offers activities for everyone whether or not you are young and sporty or not. Thank you all.

reviews.review_title: Not a 5 star and definitely not for families
reviews.review_text: The rooms and facilities are good. Hotel is well maintained. The staff are helpful and friendly. A big thank you to Mabrouka who cleaned and managed our rooms perfectly and always with a smile. Evening Entertainment was good especially for the little ones. The negatives, the rooms have a separate toilet with the basin in the main room. This is very annoying especially at night when someone else is sleeping. The swimming pools are freezing even in 30 degree heat. They are not heated therefore the kids didn't enjoy it and barely jumped in.  Even the indoor pool wasn't heated although the hotel insisted that it was.  The private section of the beach is clean.  The food apart from breakfast is very poor quality.

reviews.review_title: Nice people ,nice hotel , a little bit out of the way tho
reviews.review_text: Very very clean hotel, beautiful surroundings in hotel and pool areas, wonderful chefs cooking fresh food ,including Rawia who made a lovely omelette daily with a warm smile! And  big love!! to ibtessem for a great job on our rooms daily and beautiful towel displays with roses ! Fantastic pool party and the African band and dancers were amazing!!!!!

We have just returned from a lovely 5 day stay at this resort. I was initially skeptical as the reviews I read were quite mixed bag, but we were honestly so happy with our experience. Firstly, I found the whole resort incredibly clean and our room was spotless each day after we returned from the pool. There is an extensive buffet with some live cooking stations each night. We found the staff incredibly friendly, always checking we were okay and interacting and playing with our daughter. The pool area is beautiful with the beach just behind. We can’t fault anything about our stay and would highly recommend this to anyone who is unsure based on some of the negative reviews. Our only regret is we didn’t bring any local currency with us so weren’t able to tip the helpful staff.

I had very nice holiday  the hotel was so nice all the staff are cool espacially the entertainment team  My son liked the kids club Dina and Maya were kind with him he likes the kids disco he is excited every evening to dance ❤️🥰 he also loved the cooking class and the activities . He made friends and were actually sad to leave on our last day!

I stayed at this Lovely Hotel from the 11th of May for 7 nights with my Friend & Daughter All Inclusive. The Hotel was modern & we felt safe as you had to go through the security gates to get in, also through security when you arrive with your luggage at the Hotel. Our room was nice, modern & spacious. The shower was spacious, lots of storage space, iron & ironing board in the wardrobe. There was a mini fridge with a 1L bottle of water & a large flat screen TV. We stayed in room 141 pure sunshine from 6am in the morning on the balcony and the view of the beach & the hotel next door which i don't think is in operation. The staff were so accommodating and could not do anymore for us such lovely people. We always talk to the staff as we are social people. The food lots of choice something for everyone, and everything I ate was nice no complaints. There is entertainment every evening. The cleaner came everyday a nice elderly lady who was nice. When sunbathing you can order drinks and the waiter will bring them to you or you can go to the pool bar. The beach is over the foot bridge 1 mins walk from the pool area. We done the Jet ski's with Z who is situated just as you walk onto the beach.   Special thank you to Yazziz & Yassine who looked after us so well, and accommodated us with late check out. The only thing i would say is some of the Jacuzzi's could be heated as the pools are not.

Chaima is super and was veru helpfull for us. Big thanks your. Cleaning room 110 is veru good. Thanks Katarína thank your for your kind efforts top top  reality great service amazing very top too top top top top top top top top top top top l love you chaima 🥰❤️

reviews.review_title: IT's the best plače for vecation
reviews.review_text: My stay at the hotel was truly enjoyable, thanks to the excellent service provided by (Omar ). He was always friendly, helpful, and quick to assist with anything I needed. He made me feel right at home with his professionalism and warm attitude. I highly recommend this hotel, especially because of the amazing staff like him!”

Very good hotel. Good location.  Catering and service at the height of the chain.  Very good for a family with children.  Special point for the animation team and especially the kids team.  Various programs and to all tastes.   Recommended.

I like the hotel ✅✅✅✅✅ Room it's so clean ✅✅✅✅✅ I like the vue . Great food ✅✅✅✅✅✅✅✅✅✅✅✅  feel like heaven 🌴...... Stuff they so friendly ✅✅✅✅✅ specially maya she has good vibe 😁 i will come back again of course  I really recommend ❤️❤️❤️......

We stayed at this hotel for my husband’s Birthday, the hotel looked very nice, our room was serviced by Sonia, we could not fault her in any way, our room was kept clean and every day she would arrange our towels in shapes of flowers with petals, it looks so pretty.  The bed was comfortable, the view from our balcony was at front of the hotel. The hotel ran out of straws, you would think The Hilton would never run out of straws. On my husbands birthday Sonia and her colleagues came to our room and sang Happy birthday to him, we took a group picture which I will try and upload. Lovely ladies.  I hope Sonia liked our leaving gift.   By the way Sameh does very good deep muscle massages.

reviews.review_title: The greatest holiday in the one of the best hotel in Tunisia I had really a good time there and I was so happy  ❤️❤️❤️❤️
reviews.review_text: I just arrived home from my holiday in hotel Hilton skanes it’s was good hotel all the staff are friendly and the room are very clean..the entertainment team was nice specially the kids entertainment maya was so lovely with kids .. The food was so delicious

We really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. I would like to highlight in particular: 	•	Friendliness of staff: The whole team was extremely accommodating, helpful and warm – you immediately feel welcome. 	Frau Mabrouka Femme de chambre👉•	Cleanliness: The rooms and common areas were spotless clean. 	•	Comfort: The bed was very comfortable and the room well equipped – you can tell that attention is paid to details. 	•	Location: The hotel is very central/quiet/in beautiful surroundings (depending on), ideal for excursions or relaxing. 	•	Breakfast / food: Breakfast was rich , with a wide selection of fresh produce. 	•	Value for money: For the service and comfort offered, the price was absolutely reasonable.

Everything is perfect the outfit of the room by nassira was perfect.  Our stay went very well.  😄😀🥰🥰🥰🥰😅😘😘😘😘😘😘 The decors on the bed were sub❤❤❤❤❤❤💓❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤�❤❤❤❤��❤��❤❤��❤❤���❤❤�❤���❤❤���❤���❤❤��❤���❤�❤�❤�����❤�����❤❤��� Short stay perfect  Very nice hotel and restaurant Very happy overall

Hilton  Pros - modern decor. Nice beach.   Cons - poor service and here’s why;  1. There are lots of staff rushing around but not doing much - dirty / uncleared tables - Had to repeatedly ask waiters to clear dirty tables in the canteen (worse than a school hall).  2. You’re lucky if you get offered a drink in the canteen or terrace. Again there are lots of young (mostly male) staff rushing around but not really serving guests. Although I note female, younger guests do get served fairly quickly.   3. The room was cleaned but there were hairs on the floor which were not ours! .  4. The sink blocked and we had to ask for repair (not repaired and we had to use the lever under the sink to unblock manually).  5. The towel holder glued to the shower come off (not repaired)  6. The bedding wasn’t changed at all during our week stay.   Food  - plenty of it but tasteless and limited hours:  1. Food was repetitive  2. On arrival at 10pm no food available. No room service.  Usually when I’ve stayed at other 5 star hotels options are available for guests.    Location - nice beach no amenities nearby and very dirty  1. Do not go here if you like to get out for a walk or visit a nearby coffee shop/ bar restaurant. There aren’t any. The hotel is surrounded by derelict / abandoned building projects.   2. The whole area and surrounding town / Monastir is very dirty. There is rubbish strewn everywhere.  We went to look at the nearby flamingo site. It is surrounded by rubbish and a rubbish dump.   Overall - I wouldn’t book this hotel again unless there are major changes to the service and operation.  I would go back to Tunisia as the people are lovely  just not here to this hotel. I recommend really considering this place if you want a nice vacation this is not 5 star Hilton.

reviews.review_title: Good hotel but service provided and facilities available are not in line with 5 star rating.
reviews.review_text: We recently spent 7 nights at Hilton Skanes and would like to share our feedback to assist both future guests and hotel management.  1. Location & Facilities  The hotel enjoys a beautiful beachfront setting, and the pool area is spacious and well-maintained, with a convenient bar service. However, service on the beach itself was minimal—throughout our stay, we were only approached once by a staff member, and WiFi connectivity did not extend to the beach area.  The surrounding area is rather limited in terms of amenities, with just one souvenir shop nearby and no restaurants within easy walking distance (approximately 20 minutes away).  2. Service  Service levels were inconsistent and did not reflect the standards typically associated with the Hilton brand. While some staff members were courteous and efficient, many others appeared disengaged. On several occasions, we experienced delays in being seated at clean tables and had to wait 10–20 minutes for drink orders, even as multiple staff members walked past without engagement.  There were also ongoing issues with cutlery—teaspoons were unavailable, and many forks provided were bent or damaged, which was surprising and disappointing in a 5-star setting.  3. Dining Experience  The food quality was generally good, but the variety was lacking. Menus were highly repetitive, which became noticeable over the course of the week.  4. Accommodation  We opted for an upgraded sea view room, which was spacious and featured a very comfortable bed. However, the in-room mini fridge was not replenished during our stay, except for a single bottle of water provided daily by housekeeping. This felt more in line with a 3- to 4-star offering than what one would expect from a premium hotel.  ⸻  Overall Assessment  While the hotel offers a pleasant setting and comfortable accommodations, it does not currently meet the expectations associated with a 5-star Hilton property. Compared to other luxury hotels we’ve stayed in—such as those in the Iberostar and Hyatt Regency portfolios—Hilton Skanes falls short, particularly in service consistency and attention to detail.  With some targeted improvements, particularly in staff training, dining variety, and guest service, this property has the potential to provide a more satisfying and brand-consistent experience.

Nice stay.  You can't hear the noise of planes.  Even if we're close to the airport.  Helpful staff.  Many thanks to Hamza who is on the 5th floor. And also in Abdo, the waiter by the pool.  Lots of choices for food.

Thank for all service it was perfect vacances and thanks for all hank for all service it was perfect vacances and thanks for all staffstaffhank for all service it was perfect vacances and thanks for all staffhank for all service it was perfect vacances and thanks for all ood

reviews.review_title: Beautiful clean Hotel with fun exploring for the more adventurous
reviews.review_text: Read a lot of reviews before booking which really helped as I think they sum it up well.  Overall a great experience.  The immediate surroundings of the hotel are nothing to shout about (a lot of buildings part built and then with COVID/tourist trade generally plummeting now empty), but 15-30 mins away by taxi (which you can easily jump in outside the hotel (haggle the price down!) you have some great exploring at your doorstep.    The good....super friendly and helpful staff overall   The cleaning, pool and restaurant staff were especially friendly.  Really clean and lovely rooms (we had a 2 bed suite as there with our 2 small kids).  Pools are lovely (but COLD!).  Early in the season so I can imagine later in the year they warm up.  Still got dragged in a number of times as the kids still loved it despite the cold.  Beach maintained daily (they can't help if lots of seaweed washes up) .  Lovely to explore Sousse and Monastir.  Stunning old city walls and fun to explore the Medina shops.  Bit of culture at Sousse archaeological museum.  Didn't find people too pushy.   If anything with kids they were more friendly than being in the UK.  Also did camel trip booked through the hotel which was really fun (they will try get you to tip/spend extra along the way, but as long as you expect that it's all ok).  There were horse and cart rides outside the hotel (just make sure you haggle the price down). I'm coeliac and they did cater to gluten free, which was great.  Could have offered more choice, but the main thing was I wasn't contamination!  Win.    Wasn't so impressed.....kids club.  Limited resources and didn't feel like they really tried to engage with my 4 year old.  There were set daily activities, but they said unless they have enough kids (which they didn't) they wouldn't do them.  All they suggested was putting on a film, which was not what we were after.  Not being all inclusive made food choices limited as there were restaurants we couldn't eat in!  Saying that it worked out cheaper for us as they allowed our small children to eat the buffet for free, which if wed gone all inclusive even my 18month old was going to be charged £50 a day for!  100tdn (around £25) for the buffet for an adult or pizza/pasta in la Luca restaurant around 40 tdn(£10) .  Small glass of wine 17tdn (£4.50) so not bad.    Overall lovely experience and beautiful hotel.

reviews.review_title: A must for everyone that likes to get involved
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews about Tunisia we thought about changing our destination. Well we are glad we didn’t. The Phenicia hotel was incredible from the room to the meals reception. But definitely Animation team were outstanding in their duties. Never passed without taking time to talk have a good laugh and get you involved. The restaurant was also very good lots of choices and hot. We have enjoyed it that much we have booked to go back next year. Well done to everyone that works there that made our holiday an outstanding experience. George & Pam

reviews.review_title: Clean, comfortable with such a friendly relaxed atmosphere
reviews.review_text: Everyone of the staff are so friendly and can't do enough for you. Myself and 2 friends have been here for 2 weeks, it has been so relaxing and we have been made to feel like part of the family, so to speak. There is so much choice at meal times something to suit everyone, the Chinese restaurant, on site it's absolutely amazing and I highly recommend a visit, the a la carte restaurant I would give a miss. Like I said all the staff are amazing and I wish I could name them all, some that are extra special are, Bilal, Skilla, Marmado, Aleena, Ghiza Hammed, there were so many more that made our trip so special. I will definitely come back x

Food is great, wide variety and plentiful. Chinese restaurant (additional payment) and BBQ fantastic. Drink options good too. Serving staff cannot do enough for you.  Rooms more than adequate with fridge, safe and comfortable beds.  Entertainment staff excellent and very friendly. Wide choice of activities available throughout the day and evening entertainment fun.

reviews.review_title: Overall a great experience in a great hotel
reviews.review_text: Amazing hotel, there are so many food options and all good quality, the Chinese restaurant was especially good, I highly recommend trying the food there.  The staff are staff are always there to please you with a constant flow of food and drinks, the entertainment staff are so friendly and are so good with all ages, always smiling and talkative and getting people involved, and there is always something to get involved in!   The rooms are clean and comfy and the whole hotel is kept to a high standard.

Absolutely amazing entertainment team, the waiting staff could not do anymore for us! Went above and beyond, had so much variety so everyone could join in.  Beautiful room and hotel Food was amazing also!  Location is close enough in a taxi to hammamet centre and Yasmine hammamet. Beautiful coffee shops and can walk to supermarkets.

The hotel is very nice, hotel has a very nice beach the BBQ is very nice, the entertainment team is very good makes the hotel myself and my fiancée will definitely be returning, totally recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of coming something for everyone

Loved our experience here! Everything from food, entertainment, music etc! The entertainment team has been the best i have ever seen! This is our second visit here and we are definitely coming again! Beautiful country with beautiful people!

Very friendly staff. Rooms are ok but the size of the bed (140 cm) is a bit small.  Food is quite good in the restaurant and at the barbecue grill during lunch. Very nice outdoor pool area and beach.  The entertainment team is super friendly and discreet.

Entertainment team were amazing hotel was nice and clean staff was nice very friendly people lots of different things to do entertaining and inclusive to everyone hotel was on the beach which was nice I will definitely come back pool is nice and big weather is nice

Amazing hotel, entertainment team are unbelievable! Would 100% recommend, staff are outstanding. Entertainment team are the best I’ve experienced! Rooms & public toilets are sparkling! Staff could not do enough for you, food is delicious!

Absolutely fantastic hotel entertainment team out of this world absolutely amazing could not of asked for any better always there to help and entertain for all our needs   I will definitely come back. This hotel is definitely amazing. People very nice always smiling. The food is really delicious. The breakfast a lot of choice. The pool is really big room is really clean tidy and the toilet amazing sparkle Stuff outstanding and the entertainment team the best I ever been to

One week stay in the hotel Phenicia  For 10 years I have been sailing all over Tunisia, Djerba, Mahdia, Hammamet. And this property is really in the Top 3 in terms of overall amenities. Staff: Pleasant on all floors, be it housekeepers, bartenders, receptionists, SPA people, room waiters, really perfect, smile and kindness. Meals: Interesting concept, in the morning breakfast in a place where the “Tastes” view of the main pool take place, possibility of eating out. In the main dining hall, free placement, in the evening on the other hand 2 Services, 1 from 18:30 to 19:30 and 1 from 20:00 to 21:00 fixed placement, indeed as soon as you arrive a table will be designated and you will keep it throughout the stay for evening meals, really nice which allows to have always the same server.  -Bedroom: Spacious, well appointed and always clean  Bars: There are everywhere, quality alcohols far from the other establishments that offer alcohols sometimes undrinkable, downright a Cocktail card available really TOP!!   - Buffets: really well, it is true that the quantities are much less numerous than in the other hotels, but the products are REALLY quality, in the morning the pastries are fresh, fruit pressed by hand, hot bread, with all meals dishes redone on site live, really the food is quality, maybe a little less choice than in the other establishments but we eat better.  SPA: No treatments in this SPA, only massages, I would say not bad service but could do better, massages are more of 30’ rather than 50’, on the other hand good pleasant and caring masseuses. Beach: Superb, with deckchair available, a beach attendant, a security guard who watches the few beach vendors to do some business.  - Animators / Atmosphere: Really TOP!!! Friendly and very good at animation, not insistent with people who want to stay quiet. Really TOP shows, superb atmosphere, foam evening in the pool, games the day really the Class!!!  Finally, really nice hotel whether for a trip with family, friends or in Love. I recommend

First holiday with my family since turning 18 and with several delays we finally arrived after 13 hours of travelling from Brighton, we got to the hotel after a 90 minute coach journey and was greeted with an £160 room tax, (4 people) my mum had asked tui multiple times is there any extra charges once we arrive and they said no. We were obviously frustrated by this but there’s not much you can do. There’s an optional charge for pool towels too but luckily we had bought our own. My dad has recently been marked as disabled so my mum put a note on there saying we need to be on the ground floor, however the ‘ground floor’ does have around 10 small steps up to the level of rooms  which is obviously not suitable if you are in a wheelchair as there is no lift to this floor. However this hotel has been the cleanest hotel I’ve ever been to the staff are continuously cleaning away. The room cleaning ladies were amazing mopped and changed towels every day was always leaving petals around. My holiday was from the 19th of May to the 30th (11 nights) the first two days were around 22°-25° and then unfortunately we had three days on and off rain and thunder (again staff were very on it with making sure the floor was kept dry to avoid any incidents) day 6 and 7 of our holiday was a little cloudy (16°-18°) quite nice to sit in the sun. I get very figgity when I’m too hot so it was quite easy for me to get a tan with a breeze.  I’m also a  fussy eater and I still felt catered too, this hotel freshly cooks pasta and different meat/ fish every night. By the 9th night pasta did get a little boring. There is two other restaurants but you have to pay for them. I’m not a fan of the beach however the days I did spend down there it was very hot just too many flies, lady bugs and people selling stuff. I think I’ve been bit twice on my hand but that is it, sitting by the pool you do get a lot of ants in the grass and they like to climb on bags but never entered any clothing or drinks. The pool was freezing however on a hot day with no breeze seeping your feet in definitely cooled me down.  I’m most greatful for the fact I brought a Stanley bottle with me as you only get little cups and with my cup my ice was kept cold over night.  There’s a little shop down stairs which I don’t think is too expensive there’s definitely cheaper shops outside but it’s not a total rip off. 10 dinar for a bag of crisps which is around £2.50 ( 4 dinar to 1 GBP) and to change money into cash I would advise going out of this hotel and into the next one as they have a better exchange rate 300 dinar was around £77.   Overall a really good holiday  Sun was great towards the end  Staff are amazing!  I’m not a big drinker but they had a wide range of cocktails and spirits.  Large lobby / entertainment area

All in all really very good. A very nice facility and very good food mot live cooking. Direct beach access. Beautiful soft sandy beach with sunbeds and umbrellas. Nice clean room with private balcony and air conditioning.

The plant is in good condition. Minor defects are compensated by the very good value for money and the friendly service. The range of events and gastronomy is also outstanding. Overall a very good hotel.

The entertainers, the service and the things that are offered are great. All the people here are very nice, I can recommend this place in all respects. In a few minutes you are from the complex on the hotel's own beach. The pools and the associated bars are also top.

Nice pool and good entertainment team. Food is good and Drinks everywhere. Many activities for the kids and their parents. The service is good and the hotel ist beautiful. You can visit clubs and other city’s easy. You also can exchange you’re money.

Everyone was super nice, and Friendly, especially the animation team, food was also very tasty, the rooms were very clean and the whole facility was very well maintained, you will be welcomed nicely and the shows in the evening were also very great and interesting.

A really top hotel,l welcomes, cleanliness, entertainment, eating ,animations, themed evenings every day. Very nice meetings. Very nice staff and little care for their customers. Quality price to really recommend.

reviews.review_title: Very nice hotel, with friendly staff
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel feet in the water , very comfortable , a team at the top , I recommend this place very professional , we eat super well , very nice and helpful animators , a room very clean with little care for everything, very nice location

reviews.review_title: You get what you pay for
reviews.review_text: Group of 3 friends who paid £400 each for a week here.   The hotel was clean, rooms tidied daily, fresh bath towels provided daily, beach is beautiful, pool area has plenty sunbeds and fresh foods available at every meal.   The staff absolutely make this hotel, with Ali from the shish place one of the most kindest and caring people we have ever met. He walked us to the disco and helped our friend who has poor mobility one night, and it was upsetting to see one of the animation team shouted at him, saying we were telling him to f*** off, and we weren’t. Tried to find a manager to inform this was untrue but couldn’t locate one. I would be grateful if a manager could reply to this review and advise they are aware of this now.   Often the only time we seen a manager was when they were shouting at waiting staff/bar staff. This was horrible to witness as most of these are young boys trying their best. To expect two staff to collect all the glasses and replenish guests drinks is a staffing issue, not their issue. These guys are so grateful to have jobs, it’s not nice to see them being shouted at.   The 5 bars as advertised is only available from 1st June, which is something I will take up with love holidays. The beach bar opened on 26th May, which meant we enjoyed time at the beach without having to walk 5 minutes each way to refill our glasses.   The food is alright. Breakfast is very egg dominated, with fresh omelettes made to order available. Lunch is the best meal, which was echoed by other guests. Dinner is rather disappointing, with the same number of dishes available at lunchtime but it feels like less selection.   The location is beautiful, as I said the beach is gorgeous. Taxis to sousse are readily available and we spent most nights in the Hard Rock Cafe nearby.   If you are looking for 4/5 star Europe, this is not the one, it is more like a 3 star, however I firmly believe nobody looks after their guests like the Tunisians which is what made our holiday.

2nd time here... and been met with issues.  The main complaint is the reception area and staff, are so rude and un helpful, when we first checked in we were rushed to checked in."hurry fill this in" "you need to send us the reservation through email"  We been told the indoor pool is closed due to it being summer its closed, we had friends that were ginger and fair skinned and wanted to swim in an indoor pool we were told we weren't allowed. After spending nearly 9k over 2 times.   The food is repetitive, bland and horrible,  The animation team only want you to play dart and silly games like that. And don't do much.  The large area on the website with the stage is just dirty and full of old rancid couches  The amenities like mini gold is run down and dead grass same as the tennis court [which i didn't even know they had] the restaurant you have to book even know its in the hotel.  The WiFi doesn't reach all the rooms.  Bar drinks are waters down with very cheap alcohol.  Travelling around the local shops all you get is bombarded with [hello hello very good price good price] after telling the locals no your hounded and often not allowed to leave the shops until you kick up a fuss.   Rooms aren't cleaned properly the sheets aren't changed frequently.

Do not book with this hotel absolute pile of #### walked in stayed for 1hr and walked back out and booked another hotel.  Dirty Cockroaches  Dirty rooms Horrible food  Rude staff   Don't waste your money here or your Tme no good holiday is to be found here 2* hotel at best

Unfortunately I was really disappointed, we booked 10 days with 4 children expecting kids club pool bar cocktail bar water slides and more and we got nothing, family's begged for with water slides to go on, when we booked nothing siad it was closed until 1st June. No water one day no toilets the next day the entertainment team I feel bad for but they were terrible and had no interest in the kids what so ever only the adults they wanted to annoy all day every day 😕 m we were all inclusive and you could taste the water in all the drink. You can drink the vodka straight all day and you wouldn't even have a slight be on a dunt off it 😂 realy shocking for what we paid.

reviews.review_title: Awful, unsafe, waste of money, do not use this hotel!!
reviews.review_text: Arrived after a long journey to be told to wait or go for lunch to leave cases at reception, I also left my cardigan on top which disappeared by the time I got back and they knew nothing about it but that's nothing in comparison to the awful and repetitively bland food, not once out of the 10 days/nights was I able to find anything I could eat, no entertainment, only 1 bar open which had very limited drinks and if you drink alcohol you'd need to go out as it's very watered down, could not get any water, coffee or snacks outwith the restaurant at night or early morning when I paid all inclusive, my son left early which left me to be harassed by male staff then when shown I wasn't interested I was no longer being properly served in the restaurant etc, toilets wouldn't flush in all of the hotel the 1st 2 days, no water for showers later at night, cleaners mainly attended to pool area and only replaced the room towels. Went to the market with an employee of the hotel who said other clients were going then said they hadn't turned up which left him and I so I told him I wanted to go back to the hotel only to be told I had to give him more money and was then put in a taxi alone back to the hotel. The whole experience of the hotel was intimidating and spoiled my stay in Tunisia, use a different hotel, check recent reviews.

reviews.review_title: Unsafe, Unprofessional, and Intimidating – Not Suitable for Solo Travellers
reviews.review_text: Believe the negative reviews and avoid this hotel. Unsafe for solo travellers, staff harassment, poor food, unhygienic service, no privacy, unfair deposit handling. Not a 4-star stay.  I booked an all-inclusive package and had one of the most stressful travel experiences I’ve ever encountered.  From the very beginning, service at reception was disorganised and unprofessional. After checking in late at night, I was told to wait for someone to take me to my room. I sat waiting for  approx 30 minutes, exhausted after a long journey, only to be told no one was coming and that I should go on my own. There was no reason to keep me waiting that long, especially so late.  Throughout the stay, I was repeatedly approached by male staff — from the bar, restaurant, and entertainment team — asking for my number, social media, and inviting me for drinks outside the hotel. One even offered a boat trip “at no cost,” while making inappropriate comments. After I declined all offers politely, I was ignored by some staff who then refused to serve or assist me. I went there to rest and enjoy time off — not to be harassed. This behaviour was neither friendly nor flattering. It made me feel uneasy, unsafe, and unwelcome. It should not be tolerated or normalised in any hotel setting.  The towel deposit process was also a disaster. I was not informed that the receipt would be required to get the deposit back. I followed instructions exactly — paid the receptionist, gave the receipt to the pool attendant, and received the towel. Later, I returned both the towel and the plastic card (which was issued in exchange for the towel), but was told I needed the original receipt, which their staff had taken and then lost. They also lost a copy of the original receipt. The manager told me I’d have to wait three hours while they “investigated” — even though I had already checked out and was ready to leave. The error was theirs, but I was punished for it. I never received my money back.  The room was outdated and in poor condition — the bath leaked, the toilet didn’t flush properly at times, the toilet paper holder was broken, and the TV couldn’t be used without paying a deposit for the remote. Cleaners would knock once and enter immediately without asking if it was okay — even while I was inside. There were no “Do Not Disturb” signs, and no respect for privacy.  The food was repetitive, tasteless, and completely unlabelled — no allergen information whatsoever. Ice cream was served once, pre-scooped, left melting in paper cups on the counter with no refrigeration — a clear health and safety risk. Although snacks were advertised as available daily between 16:00 and 17:00, I never once saw them being served.  I was unable to connect to Wi-Fi.  Entertainment was poor and unreliable and did not follow the published schedule. The à la carte restaurant was never made available, and staff continuously pushed guests to use the on-site ATM or book private services with them directly.  I also spoke with another solo traveller during my stay who had a very similar experience, which shows this was not an isolated incident. I won’t speak on her behalf, but it was clearly a pattern.  This was not a 4-star experience. It was unsafe, exploitative, and poorly managed. Avoid especially if yo are a solo traveller. It’s not just disappointing, it’s dangerous.

Room size was good and has balcony. The beds were comfortable and our bedding, towels were changed everyday. We went in May when pool slides, pool bar etc were not open as their season starts from June onwards which we were not aware and found disappointing.  Waiters, kitchen staff are all brilliant. Special mention about their Guest Manager, Manel, who is absolutely fantastic. She went above and beyond to ensure our stay was seamless and enjoyable. From helping with local recommendations and handling a few unexpected issues with efficiency and care, her support made a big difference. Manel was always approachable, attentive, and genuinely committed to making our experience exceptional.

reviews.review_title: Worst hotel I have been to. ROTTEN
reviews.review_text: AVOID… I have just returned from this hotel after a week with my grandsons.  Food…..Awful Rooms…Very dated ..no flush in toilet for 24 hours. Spent a lot of time at reception complaining. Told there was no hot water for over 12 hours. Bed not changed for the week we were there.Tiny veranda.  Drink…. awful all watered down. Spent £72 for litre of Smirnoff in restaurant across from hotel. (Smashed mine at airport)  Pool snacks… None, whatever was left in restaurant got put by the bar. Pizza and bread  Entertainment… good if you’re under 5. Same repetitive music …. Atmosphere… poor .. Nothing to do at night. In fact nothing to do at all. All in all I would not return to this hotel at all. How it got 4* 5* on trip advisor I do not know. I came home with 42 bites. Some really sore ones.  Shambles of a hotel. Some staff ok . No bank machine . I could go on an on …..  Grandsons enjoyed themselves so suppose that’s a bonus.

Not long returned from this hotel and i have to say that this was NOT a 4 star hotel experience, 2 star at best. None of the pool or beach bars were open once, no hotel entertainment except for kids which was terrible. The room was basic with rusty pipes around the bath. The hairdressers and beauty spa ladies have no diplomas up in the shop and were clearly untrained for the job for which i had to request my money back for the awful hairstyle they gave me. It was advertised as no smoking allowed in the cocktail bar that was never open yet people were allowed to use it as a smoking area which could be smelled throughout the hotel including the room i stayed in which smelt like stale smoke the whole time. The food was okay but repetitive, very limited selection especially for breakfast which was only fried eggs and omelette or cereal. The waiters and staff were lovely, very polite and friendly and the poor maids who clean the room as best they could with what little cleaning equipment they had didnt change the bed sheets once in the 10 nights i stayed aswell as that the towels are threadbare and no good. On one of the days there was a notice on the resturant door that there would be no hot water anywhere in the hotel from 8am until midnight so nobody could shower or bath, the next day there was a sewage problem and no water to flush the toilets aswell as taht there was only 3 toilets available quite a way from the bar and resturant area. My friend and I payed nearly £2000 for this 10 night holiday and it was a disaster from start to finish. I love Tunisia have been 10 times and will return again but never to this hotel. Avoid at all costs.

reviews.review_title: If u have 'more money don't come here
reviews.review_text: The worst holiday ever, what u mean same food everyday, no wifi like shi+ can't even call my familly, no water at the bar u serious, the alchol without alchol that's funny all inclusive? No people don't waste ur money in this hotel please read.... Carefull where u go, sure i know everywhere u find horrible things but this is the most, i barely know what hotels, 4stars is nothing i swear, u trying to do what u can't do...yah the cleaners do ur business and don't stole what is not urs.. We are guests and believe me we know everything. MY RESPECT FOR ANIMATION.. who work hard in this sun.. Big love for nova she left before us.. We love u and miss you keep smiling girl don't lost ur energy

reviews.review_title: Avoid definitely not what they promise you
reviews.review_text: One of worst expirence on all my 25 years of trips, traveling all around the world, never been so miss sold hotel, when you buying look like so nice and will get good time, soon you arrived you will see been miss sold and nothing was promised and offered you will get, defensively as hospitality worker I understand thinks can go wrong, but for me is all about how you will sorted, do understand my not be high season but still think one bar opened only won all resort is not enough, from the pool to the bar is very far, one waiter to serve all customers are on the pool not enough you wait for ever for drink. 4 star on my opinion is not even near Sorry very disappointed  If you think is good for you completely understand just want to make sure you are aware what you will get

Following your email, I spent hours trying to `cut & paste. I`m not very techi, can`t be the only one. In the end, I gave up. I won`t waste my time again! Regards, Graham Tyers. Regards to Basil. Avoid this hotel. Yarrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.

we had cockroaches in our room had cockroaches in the cheese in the restaurant, had an ants nest in our toilet after being moved rooms, the managers talk to staff like crap, the food isn’t great gave us all upset stomachs for the whole week we was there, we ate out a lot due to the food making us all poorly, cats in the restaurant which is unhygienic and staff saying it was ok there allowed in, some of the workers are lovely but there treated bad, the cleaners were all lovely and couldn’t do enough for you, animation was ok but was pretty much the same every night mini disco ect, the manager of the life guards was very rude and again treated hes staff badly, hôtel beautiful to look at but i wouldn’t return here again!

reviews.review_title: The hotel is fantastic and the staff r so helpful
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best holiday destinations I have ever been on and the staff are so helpful and friendly people ............................................................................................................

Ignore any negative reviews the hotel is beautiful and the staff are amazing. They have gone above and beyond with our disabled guest and for a birthday celebration. The animation staff do not stop and are super friendly. They make the hotel marvellous, a special shout out to Nova who always smiled and remembered everybody from day one.

Fantastic hotel the staff were very attentive and professional espially the animation team. The food was very good and always found something to eat, drinks very good and never had an empty glass. Will definitely be back in the future. -  Mr Hotel May 2025

Animation team and super Nassim , daizy nova sabwy , lots of great activities Clean and comfortable room  Good clean location of the port and shops  Various restaurants  Happy holiday for the first time I recommend .................

Really don't understand the negative reviews on here. First of all, the animators are amazing! Always full of energy and really happy. Our room was ready 1 hours early so we were grateful for that. The room itself was spotless. Comes with a TV with limited channels, a mini fridge to keep your drinks cool and quite a powerful shower! Beds are lovely and comfy. Maid makes up the room every day and provides a fresh big bottle of water (no need to tip). Staff are literally so attentive and are so grateful for a tip both at the bar and at dinner service, if you are a polite person they will look after you in kind. The food was tasty and a good variety, if you ask at breakfast for a steak for dinner they will prepare one for you for dinner in the evening.  Please bare in mind that the tourist tax is per person, per room, per night so it can be quite costly if there is a large group staying for a number of nights. There's taxis always outside the hotel although flag down a blue band one on the road for a cheaper price. The shop inside the hotel is reasonably priced and the shisha is lovely. Would definitely come here again.

Nassim was a brilliant worker at the hotel. Very attentive and good at his job. Nice food and reps. Lots of good entertainment. Would come back again. The pool is good and the sauna. Only thing I would complain about is the WiFi that sometimes doesn’t work.

Awful Hotel … go somewhere else.  We arrived at 11.30pm at night after a long journey. The hotel was  in darkness and the Taxi Driver had to knock on the door for access. No refreshments available, no facilities for making a brew in the room. There was a fridge the room which was unplugged, a bottle of still water was in the room but it was warm. Very dirty bathroom .. very unhappy with our stay

I recently stayed at the Royal Victoria attracted by its fascinating history, its prime location next to the Medina and references to illustrious figures like Churchill or Puccini. The staff is definitely very friendly and helpful, which I sincerely appreciate.  However, I cannot fail to express my disappointment at the overall cleanliness of the hotel. There is visible dust on many surfaces, and the carpets at the entrance are badly damaged, with obvious stains that have been there for some time. This general neglect conveys a sense of abandonment that contrasts painfully with the quality that the building deserves.  And already the cube was finding a cockroach between that made us flee the room.   It is sad to see a place with so much potential and heritage value being dropped in this way. An improvement in cleaning and basic maintenance would be enough to restore some of the dignity that still exists in its architecture and courtesy of its staff.

Dear Manager of Royal Victoria Ex British Embassy Hotel,  I was truly delighted and comfortable during my stay at your exceptional hotel. It is genuinely a beautiful and thoroughly cultural establishment that caught my attention, particularly the cultural décor and unique furnishings of your hotel. I recommend to my colleagues and friends to visit this beautiful hotel of yours when they visit Tunisia. Well done, and may you continue to be successful.  **Features of Royal Victoria Ex British Embassy:** - Close to the market and downtown Tunis - Very special breakfast and lunch/dinner meals - Beautiful and caring staff - A lively and charming atmosphere  Finally, I hope you continue to be successful. Thank you.  Sincerely, [Dylan]

reviews.review_title: All the charm of old Tunis
reviews.review_text: The hotel is in a historic building that once housed the British Consulate. Excellent location, at the entrance of the medina and al-Bahr Gate (connecting the old and new city). Colorful interior, with soft lighting and tiles on the walls. Extremely courteous service and good breakfast. There is also the restaurant, in case you are tired in the evening after exploring beautiful Tunis. I really liked the small terrace of the room overlooking Victory Square and the relaxing and very hot shower.

reviews.review_title: A charming hotel in the former headquarters of the British Embassy
reviews.review_text: Charming hotel at the gates of the Medina of Tunis, built in the former headquarters of the British Embassy. The traditional designs and patterns made with Tunisian tiles, which remind us of the Bey Palace home to the Bardo Museum, the hand-painted doors, ceilings, corners and attic, suddenly transport us to another time, another reality, almost like in a Michael Curtiz film with Humphrey Bogart, chased by international spies or hunting for hidden treasures.

Location is great.  Right next to the medina entrance. Only took about 15min from the airport (depending on traffic).  Cost me 15 The hotel is listed as 4stars but I'd says its closer to 1-2 star based on US/EUR standards. The amenities are pretty much the bare minimum.  You get a fridge though and glass cups.  I got two waters.  Not sure if that is standard or for my two nights.  (Didn't get replenished the second day) The room is quite small but the high ceilings make it seem larger.  There are only four lights in the room (bathroom, main, and two night stands).  One of the nightstand lights did not work.  During the day, there was good light from the windows.  The room was a little dark at night.  I had a view of a rooftop. The room is rather dingy.  I judge a hotel's cleanliness by whether not I'd feel comfortable walking around barefoot.  I used slippers (that I had from the flight)  The whole room had tile.  The bathroom floor was most dirty.  Visible dirt/water stains, etc  The floor on the rest of the room was better but not much.  There were two rugs on either side that look like they've never been washed before.  The bed was not very comfortable.  Two singles pushed together with no connector.  Not very firm (not much support).  Sheets seemed clean though.  One pillow and decorative pillow for each bed. There is a tiny table with a chair.  The water and cups were on top of the fridge.  There was a closet but no place to put your suitcase. The bathroom was very small, barely enough room to sit on the toilet.  The water faucet had no screen so water tend to spray all over the place.  The shower stall bottom actually looked pretty new and clean.  The water temperature and pressure was a little hard to control.  The door didn't want to stay completely closed so you had to be careful where you pointed the wand. There was a cold/hot temperature control in the room.  It turned on a fan but the temperature of the air never changed. Breakfast was actually pretty good.  Lots a variety including local things.

reviews.review_title: Great potential if it were properly renovated
reviews.review_text: Royal Victoria is a hotel obtained by renovating the former English Embassy in Tunis. It is located near the entrance to the Medina, so easy to reach both on foot and if you have a car as you can park without difficulty in the neighboring streets. The hotel is a bit “fanè”. Stairs dimly lit, terrace covered with pigeon droppings. Wi-fi not working the day we stayed there. Breakfast average. Not in line with a 4-star European. Great potential if it were properly renovated.

Good hotel in the center of Tunis (pedestrian zone) in an important historical building, well maintained and richly decorated. Staff very helpful both at reception and in the lounge, good both dinner and breakfast, both with fresh produce.

reviews.review_title: Location, character, service, history... This place is everything
reviews.review_text: The best possible location in Tunis.  Literally right next to the medina  (but not inside it, so it's safe to come and go at night).  It's as beautiful as the pictures, and the staff is wonderfully attentive.  A tunisian friend insisted I cancel a reservation and stay here instead – and I'm glad I did.

Great hotel in a convenient location to everything at the entrance of the Medina. Very nice and helpful staff. Breakfast could be more varied but there is everything of good quality. The spacious rooms. Great value for money. For my taste preferable to other hotels certainly more modern but less flavorful.

When it comes to the Medina, I believe this hotel has the best location. It is situated in the heart of the Medina, with everything very close by. Right in the center, where old and new Tunis meet.  The interior is breathtaking. If you want a touch of history, this is the perfect hotel. If you love something traditional and historic, this is the right place for you. The breakfast is also good, and the staff is friendly and always ready to help.

reviews.review_title: This place will knock your socks off. Highly recommend!
reviews.review_text: Jaw droppingly gorgeous. Clean. Friendly staff who were very helpful. Breakfast buffet that I still miss. (Yes, I will miss Tunisian dates for breakfast for the rest of my life.) This may have been the most gorgeous hotel we have ever had the pleasure to stay at. Highly recommend!

I really wanted to like this hotel but there were too many problems. The architecture is beautiful and the location is next to the Medina, close to the theater and a short car ride to the Bardo Museum. However the hotel is tired and run down. The pillows are horrible. The towels are worn and frayed. We booked the suite and the fridge didn’t work, the heat didn’t work, the water switched hot to cold during showers and at peak times there was almost no water pressure. The WiFi either worked perfectly or not at all. The staff was very nice and organized a good tour for us but seemed to forget to get our taxi for the airport. We asked for ice and they had none - that was a first! Worst was the cleanliness. The bathroom needs a good scrub and there was a cigarette butt on the bathroom floor the entire stay, so clearly the bathroom floor never gets cleaned. The hotel is inexpensive but I wish I had paid more for a better experience.

reviews.review_title: Receiving a warm welcome and a great stay.
reviews.review_text: Staying at the Rotal Victoria Hotel was truly wonderful, the best 3days of my 5weeks in Tunesia. Everybody was so friendly and helpful and the view from the room's balcony was worth a million euros. The single room was well appointed and in the bathroom one could find everything one needed. There was a large choice for breakfast in the restaurant, all very nicely presented in beautiful surroundings.

There is perfect place Nice people with the very Professional and polite staff  Delicious breakfast delicious croissants 🥐 and pan chocolates 😋😋😋😋😋😋 It was embassy of Great Britain 🇬🇧  And the location is very good  At the earliest morning you could enjoy of nice space front of hotel

Simply a perfect hotel.  A really nice hotel where together with my wife we found everything in the right place. Clean and centrally located with an exquisite staff, very kind and very professional. Sincere compliments. Recommended

Sleeping in storia.Albergo beautiful of a significant historical value in perfect location, right at the entrance of the medina but in a quiet square from which the tourist streets of the ville nouvelle branch off Cleanliness and kindness  I recommend it for an unforgettable experience

Great, from the night watchman, and Hassen, Omar from the reception of the staff at the restaurant, as well as the room staff and not to omit the gentleman who intervenes during a TV concern 😍, all great cuisine is good, breakfast also the room very nice and clean, hotel with a real oriental decor. A real stay of charm So thank you for being kind and generous with the Victoria Hotel, they all work with a heart and a smile. This is rare!!!! Thank you all

What a unique and special hotel!  My room had a balcony overlooking a busy square, fascinating at many times of the day.  The decor was fascinating, and there was an array of different-sized and furnished rooms. Best of all was the outstanding staff! They went above and beyond to ensure I had my needs met, always with a smile and a "can-do" approach.  Whether in the rain or at 3:30 am on my way to the airport, I was walked to a cab that they called for me. I have stayed in many cities around the world and the hotel and its staff were one of the best!

reviews.review_title: Charming hotel at the entrance to the medina
reviews.review_text: Hotel in a historic building, very nice at the entrance of the Medina. Typically Arabic furniture, well maintained and certainly of great charm. We were offered the upgrade to the Elizabeth suite, a beautiful very large room with sumptuous decor.  Nothing to say about that. The breakfast could be better, especially in the quality of certain products; beware for those with intolerances or allergies (my wife is celiac) because apart from eggs and fruit... it is difficult to understand even if yogurt has gluten or not.... Given the cost of one night, the value for money is definitely favorable.

Excellent hotel lovely staff very helpful and fun activities , salma ziko ,jacki natcho was lovely to interact definitely will return to experience again , very welcoming and friendly ,,, great food great weather animation hear is fantastic and very good I love this place really

Great hotel very clean and welcoming Staff brilliant always so very helpful  Restaurant great so much choice  The entertainment staff so very friendly and hard working  Rooms very comfortable and clean the only thing I would stay a glass in the rooms as we take tablets in the mornings and evenings don't like drinking our of the bottles but borrowed one from the bar The bar staff excellent  I like Bacardi rum and dark rum etc but didn't do any rum  So buy yourself some at duty free very cheap  The supermarkets don't sell any rum  Brilliant holiday will definitely go back

Very nice and friendly animation team always helpful and lots of activities the bar man is always walking round offering to get you drinks Salma and ziko and Jackie  All very good at there job  Nice and tidy around the pool area and grounds kept very nice

We had the best time  staff were amazing and really made our holiday. Especially Ziko, made us feel so welcome, helped us with loads of useful local information, best member of the team! Mappe, Nacho, Picasso and Jackie. We will definitely be back

Hotel is amazing. Team animation are superb. Really friendly and get you involved. Great for travelling solo and through activities get you to make friends.  Bar staff are awesome, reception, cleaners. I've had a blast.... I'll be back. Verry good

I come here with my wife and it's my first time in Tunisia the hotel is good the room nice and clean the food was okay the pool was nice and the animation team was very friendly and welcoming for all the people thanks for ziko he made the holiday much better

I come here for one week with my wife the hotel is good and nice food and bar was okay the room is good and clean pool was nice and the price for the holiday was really nothing and the animation team was very friendly and welcoming for all the people

This is my first time coming to Tunisia I came to houda hotel really nothing to say the staff and nice the food and good but the best thing was the animation thank you to the whole team and especially to ziko and natcho and jaki ....

I came with my girlfriend to spend a week the hotel and well the staff smells nice and welcomes the food and good the room and of course without forgetting the entertainment team that it always feels for everyone I recommend

Perfect stay I recommend, perfect animation super welcoming and very nice and friendly , yoga and gym super Good local cuisine great personal room nice and very helpful we will return with pleasure in the hotel next year

I come here for 3 week hotel is good food is okay the people work here they are very nice and friendly the best think in the hotel was the animation team they smile all the time and they are here all the day and all the night thanks for all the team special for ZIKO I well come back

Hotel that deserves a renovation of rooms that are very aging.  Hygiene sometimes limits dishes in the restaurant and bar , and repetitive and unqualitative food .  Cleaning staff is available and friendly but hygiene remains limited. When I arrived I had to change the sheets 3 times and clean the room again.  The staff at the restaurant are very welcoming, friendly and attentive and available, the same at the bar.  The lifeguard is very accommodating and available.  The animation service is at the top , of a great kindness and availability, fortunately they are there to set the mood, and I think it is they who do all the positive of the hotel.  Hotel located close to shops and marina.  Overall stay positive despite everything

Aging rooms, hellish noise at night (door slamming.)  Cleaning not at the top despite the effective intervention of the cleaning women. Repetitive food.  Nice and smiling staff. Different animations proposed, and animators at the top.

Food was okay but repetitive  Cleanliness was good  Animation team were good.  Nazhar the waiter was brilliant  Muhammad the excursion guide was fantastic  Rooms need some TLC Afternoon snacks were enjoyable Lack of sunbeds at the pool.  Bar staff are good and efficient

I put 1 because I can't put 0. It is not complicated we spent only one night in this establishment. Apart from the reception which is quite welcoming and the animators, the staff displays a head at the height of the establishment: sad  We had taken superior rooms... honestly I hope the rooms we had basic were really a mistake and that you do not make them look superior to the others. Thanks for changing us. But it doesn't catch up with the rest: Hello / goodbye does not exist / if you have a drink, we do not give you change .. there is not enough deckchair at the pool ... (obviously we are not the type to go reserve our deckchairs good others yes). The so-called private beach has no deckchairs and it is a walking landfill.... We had just spent 10 days in another hotel where it was quite the opposite... honestly the difference was brutal. We had planned 5 days there, we preferred to lose money for our comfort and go to another hotel barely 500m (reception at the top by the way and quality equipment we will return there )  No idea where the 4 stars of this establishment come from but with the same budget you have much better and without misleading advertising;)  And obviously when we announced our departure, the person at the reception just said ok as if it was usual (we were absolutely not asked what was going on ) Anyway, run away.

This is the first time I've been to this hotel.  There is a great atmosphere, a good animation team.  A good DJ (already caught). The animations are varied. The team always smiles.  I will come back to it incha'Allah. 🤩🤩🤩🥰🥳🥳🥳💯

Animation team are excellent mbappe, and all the team kept us entertained day and night fantastic experience,food was good and drinks plentiful but did not like the vodka also weather was fantastic and plenty of places to visit😁😁😁😁😁😁😁

reviews.review_title: Animation team or top THANKS TO ZIKO
reviews.review_text: I came to this hotel to spend 14 days the entertainment it is or top with activities every day and every evening a deferential show thank you very much to the whole team and especially to Ziko it and always there so that in a good holiday ♥️♥️♥️

The best is the facilitators  The room not excellent but it does the job Just a little problem a cockroach in the room  Otherwise pool well activities well, Jacky, jawar, salma, dj Mbapped really always on top despite the big days

Every member of staff has a smile on their face , efficient in their area ,friendly and so welcoming . The hotel is clean ,well laid out with a super pool  area where the animation crew work so hard with daily entertainment. Food ?? Well , how many hotels have a chef baking bread as you stand and watch ..I had the biggest  yummyist fresh doughnut  . . Ignore other  bad reviews  this hotel is one of the best I have visited. And I travel alone alot ..this time with  a very happy family . Don’t think about it book it .

My daughter and her friend have been in this hotel since Sunday and this is the total disappointment: abandoned hotel no guests, they are asked to pay in cash without bill, the food is vile and does not respect the sanitary conditions, the reception is unpleasant and private travel wants to hear nothing to change hotels. The beach is remote and the rooms to renovate! In short to flee

Incredibly beautiful and peaceful hotel. The staff is the great strength they were all great, thanks to Mamia poir her massages, Faysal, Houssem, Youssri, Warda etc  The list is long but it's a 10 out of 10 The food is great with every day the discovery of a Tunisian dish the opportunity to taste them all! And easy to discover the surroundings and other cities ... I'm already planning on coming back...

Thank you to Samir and Rania for looking after me and my wife throughout our stay. We would both highly recommend this hotel for the service provided and its exceptional cleanliness. Our room was spotless, spacious and the entire hotel was well-maintained, which made our stay even more enjoyable.

I had a pleasant stay in this hotel with his parents m, the service was really high level, there reception was there to recommend me full of good deals, I thank Rania for welcoming me and catering service that organized my mother's birthday, thank you very much, I also thank spa team that allows me to spend a great time with my mother, thank you Manel for this relaxing time. I highly recommend this hotel but really.

reviews.review_title: a top hotel and a sensational spa!!!
reviews.review_text: we discovered a magnificent hotel even if small renovations would be planned for some carpets or exterior hangings it is extremely well located close to the marina, promenade, beach and shops of Yasmine Hammamet the hotel employees are adorable and considerate the buffets of the restaurant are superb, very well stocked and delicious... we quickly gain pounds:) the outdoor pool is beautiful as for the people present at the spa, we can only say thank you for their kindness and the care provided having a nice fall on my knee at the spa, the care was perfect and the care provided to my knee at the top A special thank you to the spa manager, Mamia at the steam room and the physio who has been looking after me all week We'll definitely be back!

reviews.review_title: I would have given it five stars, if it hadn't been for wrongly billed
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel, clean and well organized. The staff was always friendly and helpful throughout your stay. The comfortable room and great location made my experience really enjoyable.  I would have gladly given 5 stars, but at check-out I found an error in the charge of 60 euros more. The amount was returned to me in local currency, without an exchange receipt, causing an inconvenience at the airport: it was not possible to convert the money into euros, as an official receipt is required for the exchange.  A small incident that, unfortunately, partially ruined an otherwise perfect stay. However, I recommend the structure, with the hope that more attention will be paid to these details.

Very nice hotel, welcoming and attentive staff.  I did my sports in the morning, the coach advised me to exercise, with good service a small bottle of water and a clean towel. An aquagym session also in the indoor pool. Thank you!

I highly recommend this hotel which is very far from a 5 star!! The first room they gave us was dirty with a view of a vacant lot the cleaning is very badly done...the catering is the disaster everything is gross you pay water 2 euros a bottle and all drinks are paid. As for the hotel staff they are not friendly people. Marwa the daughter of the host tried to swindle us regarding the price of a taxi 60 euros to go to the airport...The women of the hammam are not honest attention they sell olive oil cut in rapeseed or sunflower oil and she sold 4 bottles at the price of 8 euros a bottle of the flight!!! Frankly this hotel is to be avoided absolutely they are crooks!!! MeS vacation was ruined. I paid excessively for it!!!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful place and its SPA Extra!
reviews.review_text: Hotel restaurant in a pleasant setting with a magnificent pool in a garden. Friendly and available staff.  But especially an extraordinary SPA with a great team!  Thank you Imene Belhadj, Director, for your listening, your advice and the personalization of the thalasso cure according to needs (my back is grateful to you).  Quality treatments realized by real experienced professionals, Thank you Mohamed, fantastic physio with golden hands.  Thank you Sabrina for the warm welcome in joy and good humor.  Like Mamia and Dalanda, the moments at the steam room would not have had the same flavor without you and your delicacy.

We received a very nice welcome, with a very nice setting                                   The staff is attentive and especially very welcoming. The spa area is very spacious, the treatments and the beautician is very competent.................................................................................................

reviews.review_title: An unforgettable stay at the Russelior!
reviews.review_text: We had a great stay at the Russelior.  The rooms are comfortable and very well maintained.  The buffet is varied and quite good (be careful how warm the dishes are when you arrive on the 8pm or more shots at the buffet).  Special mention to Marwa and Moez at reception for their warm welcome and great availability. They're amazing!  Small downside: the room access card often deactivates and there is no drinking water available.  We highly recommend this hotel and will gladly return.

reviews.review_title: Total disappointment, customer relationship (reception) of very poor quality
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed. I'm showing up with a voucher for four. Their system had a resa for 2. They leave me with my two children at the reception for hours and ask me to sort it out with their partner myself. Avoid this family hotel.

reviews.review_title: A pleasant stay... but lacking a 5 star experience
reviews.review_text: Hotel is very clean and highly maintained. However there was no tea / coffee making facilities or water provided in the room. Meaning that this had to be purchased. The air conditioning was no working we asked 3 times for this to be looked into but nothing was forthcoming. A pleasant stay but lacking some essentials a 5 star hotel should have.

Very nice structure, very quiet and serene place  Very warm welcome, very experienced staff, very professional and above all smiling, lots of skill  SPA very clean and especially with qualified physios , You have a very charming person at the front desk, ( SPA )

Hello despite that I am not a resident and visiting the hotel jets surprised by the beauty of the hotel and in the meantime I did a massage session the welcome was beautiful I wanted to thank the receptionist Sabrina and especially mr wassim it is a very professional and serious I highly recommend

1st stay in Tunisia and frankly not disappointed. To begin with the hotel was perfect from the reception, to the maintenance of the rooms where every day we had a little attention, through the restoration where we could find everything to satisfy our taste buds. Little mention for the Spa where we had booked a 4-day cure. We were extremely well received by the hostess. The care has been at the top and the people who practice it at little care for us. This is a place that allowed us to make this vacation magical. Thanks to them  Stephanie and hervé

reviews.review_title: 5 stars prestige!!!! This is more true in 2025
reviews.review_text: Hotel aging photos are not the current reflection!! Several things were not up to it: cold meals , hot tubs that had broken down for several months, Hamman extremely hot heat, indoor swimming pool forbidden to children -12 years old without supervision, they played ball! During our massage sessions next door very relaxing!!! The treatments are not up to the standard that 3 cabins for , 1 balneotherapy in bad condition , 1 dent boot , 1 jet bar for the back , on a mattress stained bad condition too!! The rest of the massage booths that are not resembling the photos!!! Don’t come here for a fitness like , it was sold to us!!! Very disappointing stay

reviews.review_title: Kitchen and Restaurant out of phase
reviews.review_text: A very lean buffet, a bland cuisine without flavor or soul... be careful be at the opening time of the restaurant failing that more nothing to eat... at 8:30 pm everything was exhausted... beware the chefs come before the residents but tjs on the sly... even half board the boil water is charged!!!  Breakfast does not even compete with that of a 3 star... Then book better in simple accommodation. Highlights: The rooms in the annex are more spacious... Cleanliness unequivocal ... The hotel is very well... Restaurant and kitchen a real disappointment

reviews.review_title: Unfortunately, it is no longer a 5 star hotel,
