Our room was clean and lovely. Better yet, the staff was kind and warm and friendly and helpful. The food was good too. We enjoyed our time here. We felt very safe in Tunis. The hotel is near other restaurants, grocery stores and a gas station..

Very nice well appointed rooms and good bedding. Quiet rooms and especially a staff with little care who do everything possible to make your stay pleasant. A perfect welcome , and personalized. Note a very nice terrace above the rooftops of Tunis.

This is a great experience. The hotel is located in an excellent location, the surrounding business circles, attractions within walking distance, travel super convenient. The room was clean and tidy, the beds were soft and comfortable and the bed was good for a night's sleep. The front desk is warm and attentive and highly recommend this treasure hotel! Once in the lobby, you'll be drawn to the elegant decor and the atmosphere will fill up. The rooms are spacious and bright, the smart home is well equipped and the details are of excellent quality. Room service is responsive and on demand. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The hygiene is impeccable and the facilities are new. Check-out also received a companion gift, warm and thoughtful, is an unforgettable stay!😁😁😁😁😁😁😁

Our stay in the hotel was absolutely to our expectations. From the moment we stepped in we were made to feel welcomed and greeted with bug smiles. A special thanks to both Ons and Rania who made sure our room was to our liking and helped us with all our questions and travel arrangements. The hotel is as the pictures 4 star very clean and comfortable and plenty of hot water for the shower! Many thanks

Wonderful and friendly service. Great attention to detail. Thanks to Ramzi for his good service. Very welcoming and attentive to our needs. I recommend during a visit to Tunis. Close to many restaurants and the Belvedere Park.

reviews.review_title: What a lovely hotel close to the Belvedere park
reviews.review_text: I was charmed by the staff, all were very kind and professional. I would recommend the hotel to anyone staying in Tunis. The rooms are really nice, the breakfast selection is also good, simple but good (I indulged on the figue jam :). The restaurant offers a selection of delicious meals and on the top floor, there is a pretty decent gym and rooftop terrasse. Next time I return to Tunis, I will absolutely stay there again.

Impeccable staff, top service, friendly atmosphere, perfect breakfast and dinner, very clean room. Thank you so much for your kindness, kindness and professionalism.. I loved my stay. I will be back very soon.

The Hotel Belvedere exceeded expectations. The staff was professional and friendly. Hotel rooms, reception and gym are first class. The all inclusive breakfast and restaurant was excellent. We will definitely return and recommend the Hotel Belvedere to our friends.

Excellent service, clean hotel, extremely kind staff, always smiling and kind to the comfort of its guests. I highly recommend Le Belvedere, I spend my short stays there for 3 years and I am always very well received.

Hotel on top! The best welcome in Tunis! Ramzy is a welcoming host and always available. Very clean and nice rooms. Breakfast is good , dinner also.  The menus vary.  I'll go back next time without hesitation. I recommend 100%

Comfortable and clean beds.  Staff available and welcoming Affordable rates  Healthy and diversified catering I recommend the Hotel Belvedere Fourati for all your stays in Tunis.  I'm ready to come back next time I'm in Tunis.

Excellent hotel for my business missions. The room is good.  The service is efficient and discreet. The meals and breakfast are of very good quality. I highly recommend this property for both tourism and business stay.

This is a very good hotel, the rooms are very good as well as the menu It is well placed  The staff is very friendly  The restaurant is good It has a large hall well placed for meetings and other ceremonies. The building is well ventilated

Hotel of excellent quality. Very comfortable rooms. Nice conference rooms. A very considerate, attentive and efficient staff. A restaurant of very good quality. Overall excellent address to spend a tourist or business stay.

Very professional agents and high standard hotel. They give gifts after finishing our journey. We are very happy to live in this hotel during ou trip. I hope to live here again next time I come in Tunis. The room are very clean and when you loose something it will choose this hotel

Great hotel, I think it deserves the first place in Tripadvisor indeed. Very professional personnel, kind and helpful, any minor problem is solved at once. Ramzi is a brilliant supervisor, and all staff pleasant. Free Parking for the clients in front of the entrance, a big plus. I stayed in the senior suite, I couldn't make a better choice. I also used the Hotel Service for a dinner, everything impeccable. Highly recommended.

The best hotel in Tunis.  Comfortable, well located, and above all an extraordinary sense of service.  Ramzy and Rania at the front desk are extraordinary, and at the restaurant the whole service team is caring.  Ramzy in the evening and Karima in the morning in particular.  And the whole team without exception.  I highly recommend this property.

Our stay at Hotel Sindbad was fantastic. The staff was tremendously helpful and service mindful.Restaurant Sharazedes staff were very helpful, cute and fun. The food was incredibly delicious and we enjoy our stay. The rooms are fine. There are nice pictures right over the beds.

It was very good. Excellent service and the restaurant sherzhad had good food. The waitors there were so kind and welcoming, all of them. It was good that some days it was buffet and some days à la carte. Also good desserts and the environment was cozy and enjoyable.

Special mention to all staff of the establishment for their presence, kindness and availability. And especially to the staff of the restaurant SEHERAZADE where each customer is received as a distinguished guest. (Thank you HAFAD)

Since 2018 we come to Sinbad in Hammamet twice a year! Were great welcome by the director and his assistant Imen! Wonderful hotel, with a great, neat garden. The white sandy beach invites you for a daily walk! The great drinks of Mourad must not be missed every day, always a surprise! The whole team, from the cleaner, gardeners, service staff, security, beach boys and the reception, to the director, always have a friendly smile and for a little fun, you feel at home

Dear Sinbad team   For seven years we have been travelling to Sinbad in Hammamet twice a year. Just fantastically beautiful . Today we got to know the director and his directorate assistant Imen .  Two great friendly people who do a great job .  The hotel complex is beautiful and very clean and well maintained.  Also the rooms are very nice and clean . The whole cleaning team does a great job.  The food is excellent and very varied. The service staff is very friendly and helpful as well as the beach staff.  Every day we take a fine aperitif at Mourad getting friendly and cheerful and always having fun. The whole team is great also the gardeners are always very nice and friendly. We would like to thank the whole team for making our holiday so perfect.  We wish you all the best and love  Claudia & Urs

Amazing hotel with service also, people are very welcoming towards tourists. The Cherrazade restaurant I strongly recommend, looking forward to coming back one day!  Everything is amazing, having made a lot of trip I totally validate.

Great hotel with a staff with a sense of service and real technique. Clean and very nice beach. Lunch restaurant on the beach. Evening restaurant alternating quality buffet and à la carte. The hotel is very clean and very nice. The rooms are spacious. With shower and bathtub. And separate toilet. We'll be back.

We had a great time at Sindbad, Hammamet. Thanks to the waiters for their kindness, their welcome and their little care. The team is very friendly and does its best to meet expectations.  Thank you very much to Hafedh for his kindness and listening!

A wonderful family holiday. A great team and very attentive. We have nothing but praise for all the staff and infrastructure of this beautiful establishment. The meals and breakfasts are very good and varied and hearty. The private white sandy beach is splendid. I do not understand the content of some previous negative opinions. For us who travel a lot this property deserves these 5 stars. We'll be back

Impeccable staff , great sherazade restaurant , helpful and welcoming staff , kindness and friendliness dint a lot of establishment should be inspired, the Sindbad hotel is really great , welcoming , with top staff

Perfect hotel with comfortable and pleasant bungalows in the middle of beautiful gardens and by the sea. Warm welcome from all the staff who are in our care.  Very nice beach restaurant but also the Sherazad which offers us an excellent buffet very varied in the culinary tradition with always as much attention from the whole team and especially the good humor and charity of Hadh. Thank you all!! Ideal setting to rest and enjoy the pools but also the passage through the Spa   I recommend

We had fabulous time in The Sindbad hotel Hammamet. The staffs in all areas are very professionals and work to a high standard  particular in restaurant  Sheherazade.The food was excellent all night sometimes Buffet or ala carte  .The waiters in Sheherazade are definitely Five star  Last word goes to Safa the room attend the room was always spotless every day with imaginative bed decoration.

reviews.review_title: VERY GOOD STAY AT THE HOTEL SINDBAD IN HAMMAMET
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel, beautiful gardens, located by the sea, 3 swimming pools including one heated, professional massages at the SPA. Very good breakfast buffet. As for dinner, varied buffet, possibility to order dishes according to proposals and several times during the stay, à la carte dinner at no extra charge. Congratulations to HAFEDH and its team for their service, attention, diligence and professionalism.

Excellent stay at the sindbad hotel with family. Very welcoming staff and little care. 3 swimming pools including 1 indoor heated, ideal with children so early in the season. Ideal for families, with 3 single beds for children, and a separate bedroom with double bed for parents, + living room.  On top!

reviews.review_title: The restaurant sherazad is great, waiters with little care always attentive and with a smile!  The hotel sin
reviews.review_text: The restaurant sherazad is great, waiters with little care always attentive and with a smile!  Hotel sindbad is an exceptional place that combines tranquility and pleasure, I recommend it without hesitation! If you are looking for a place where you can rest while pampering then go for it!

Hotel is located directly on the sandy beach. However, in reality it looks different with regard to sandy beach etws because there are actually only 2 rows of loungers there and not as many loungers as on the picture because the sea level goes much further out. The service on the beach was mixed. If you are close to the restaurant you get towels and are served courteously than if you are further away. Beach and sea were clean. Dinner problem here were the flies that gladly helped themselves to the dessert.

reviews.review_title: Have a nice stay, I advise
reviews.review_text: Nice place, friendly staff, helpful, professional and welcoming, Good buffet, comfortable and clean room. Nice beach, 5 good restaurants: Especially buffet restaurant Sharaza ( The waiter Mohamed is adorable! ) also Tunisian restaurant , Thai , Pizzeria, Restaurant of the nice beach. The Spa is nice and clean

Jalila was at the top, I recommend  A perfect stay, where it is good to come. A welcoming staff and a good atmosphere.  The good weather was there, which made the stay even more enjoyable. I recommend the hotel and the activities they offer.

reviews.review_title: I can only recommend the hotel. Is well known in Hammamet. This makes driving a taxi easy.
reviews.review_text: The service is excellent. The staff were very friendly. Clean facility. Leisure activities are very good. The food is delicious. Buffet food and à la carte in between. The place is really recommended. Would love to come back.

Jalila our maid is super friendly and absolutely trustworthy ! She lovingly decorated our room every day, with fresh flowers! Overall, the staff at the hotel is very accommodating and helpful ! We will definitely come back!

9th visit new animation team all good Hotel just gets better everytime I come Manager Fiasel is excellent all staff superb.  Facilities exceptional. Special thank u to Khalid, Amin, Ben, Monta, Sara, Tomorrow and the lovely Looka, you have made my holiday memorable.

reviews.review_title: Lovely holiday at the Marhaba Beach
reviews.review_text: Had a fantastic time at the Marhaba Beach. Check-in was a little slow, but the reception staff were very friendly.   Food was very nice and always a good choice, and the waiters were always happy to see you and greeted you with a smile and a lovely welcome.  All of the staff in the hotel were lovely and always smiling and happy and the customer relations guy listened to our suggestion in the restaurant regarding children's food and made sure it was implemented.

The experience was very nice, the rooms were clean and we got rooms with sea view when requested. The food was good and diverse and the servers were very welcoming. We had fun activities every day and the team which organized them was very friendly. We also had fun shows every night after dinner

What a fantastic day with the animation team. Momo and the team are outstanding.  Made everyone so happy from pool parties to games to make our holiday fantastic. Momo is a credit to Marhaba beach.  Such a lovely holiday.   We are looked after so well.

Absolutely beautiful hotel, pool entertainment & children's entertainment is absolutely amazing.  The staf are so friendly & are so helpful with absolutely anything you need. They have a verity of food choice including the beach bar. Always beds around pool and beach i would 100% come back again.  The kids entertainment is from morning until night time & they are by far the best we have ever been to. The pool foam party is the absolute best. Khaled is the best

I have just stayed at marhaba beach hotel in sousse in may 2025 and I have to say it has been the best holiday I have had in a long time. I stayed with my family and they have all said the same as I have. From arrival the staff are possibly the most friendly staff I have ever met. We were worried before we arrived about our children eating here but there was not a single meal time we struggled to feed them. The staff in the restaurant could not do enough for us and made our children feel so special every single meal time.  The bar staff are amazing and were always smiling, we finished one drink as another was given to us. The bar man in the pool bar called mamoud always had a smile and always having a laugh with us.  The cleaners were amazing our room was spotless every day and also left us surprises most days such as swans and flowers made from the towels.   Finally marhaba beach has definitely got the best animation team I have ever experienced.  Sarah is amazing with the kids every day. Momo khaled , Amin , looka, Ben , Sam and DJ monta were the happiest people in the place from morning till night , with great activities and shows on the evening.  And the foam pool party was something special   They have truely made this holiday special for us all   Thank you so much

Lovely hotel with a great location.the beach is unreal! Best place I have stayed with my family. Everyone is friendly and always look after you. Rooms are lovely and clean. The entertainment are great too! Always things to do in the day and the entertainment on the night is fab.Will definitely come back.

Have stayed at this hotel 3 times now and its a Brilliant family holiday, everything you need! Hotel staff and animation team are amazing, very generous and helpful, highly recommend! Cleanliness is 10/10, Location is great.  Will definitely be coming back for a 4th time

This hotel is a really good hotel to come and stay we love it they staff are really friendly and nice to get on with and the kids club is amazing my kids love it and Sarah who run it is really friendly and nice the kids adore her which is lovely to see thank you for a lovely stay we will be booking again with this hotel

Me and my friend had an (unexpected) amazing time at Marhaba Beach in Sousse! From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel right at home with their enthusiastic service. Every person we encountered, from reception to housekeeping to the restaurant team, was trying to make sure we had a nice stay.  The rooms may be a bit outdated, but they were clean, comfortable and the beds were very nice. Also the balcony overlooking the garden was a nice space to relax.  The restaurant gave us enough options, the food was very nice and the waiters were very friendly.  The animation team made sure we have had a lot of laughter. They truly made an effort to the shows with their energy and creativity. Special thanks to Khaled, Momo, Amin and of course William  Highly recommended! See you all next year!

Great hotel food and pool bar are brilliant got to give a massive shout out to the animation team they are amazing looka  and all the gang the room are beautiful and would definitely recommend a sea view we will definitely be coming back next year

reviews.review_title: The best holiday  especially with looka❤️
reviews.review_text: Had the best holiday at Mahaba Beach everyone is so friendly and will do anything for you  The best animation team Looka, Sam, Monta, Ben, Khaled, Sarah to name a few and all the waiters and bar staff Would recommend this hotel to everyone and will definitely be back x

reviews.review_title: Best holiday in a long time
reviews.review_text: Very nice holiday, a superb country, a hotel with impeccable service. The staff is the friendliest of all my trips. A big thank you to the animation team for making our stay unforgettable especially Momo with whom we had a lot of fun.

reviews.review_title: Marhaba Beach always great Thank you
reviews.review_text: Thank you for this beautiful stay, I really enjoyed the reception , the buffet and Biensure the animators nod to Momo and Looka . Offers entertaining and superb games. Thank you and see you soon. My favorite hotel in Sousse. I highly recommend this hotel

We had a fantastic week at this hotel. The entire staff has only one goal: to please you and that with a big smile. Clean rooms, great food with very wide choice so something for everyone. The animation team is tireless and offers a host of activities that they also enthusiastically participate in and do not insist if you choose not to participate.  We were lucky enough to experience the opening of the summer season 2025 and were treated to a super show.  Khaled, Amin, Momo, and the others, you are the best!

Poor hotel - a disabled child was splashing in pool and staff shouted at little boy , said he wasn’t allowed in pool if he was going to splash, management threatened the mum if she wrote a review about it and made her sign a document to enable her move hotel.  Management and TUI - went into reception area and wrote a false witness  statement about a disabled child and said was wrote by guest in hotel!   I sat in and watch at how the mother was treated, she was in tears as they stated her child did things she wishes he could.  Blackmailed her too! Avoid if you have a child with needs or one who like to splash

Excellent experience at this hotel. A little old but very well maintained and very clean. The food is excellent and varied. The service is beyond my expectations. The animation team does a superb job all day with their varied activities. Thanks to Momo, Khaled, Sam, Amine, Monta, Sara and Louka!!!

Very good stay at the Marhaba hotel near the beach. Very nice welcome, staff with little care and entertainment for all. Buffet varied, superb room.I recommend for a stay with friends or family. Spa and massages offered at very attractive rates and good services. Excursions possible also ( quad/ camels) but not tested.

We had a great experience at this hotel over the last weekend. The vibes were immaculate and the staff were always helpful and kind. The animation crew kept us busy and the bartenders always made us laugh (shout out to Momo and the rest of the animation crew) and a special shout out to Mahmoud the bartender who kept us happy and always was cracking jokes. Our experience here was mostly laughter and enjoying the excellent services and we are very thankful ♥️

We have returned to marhaba Beach as we love the hotel & was great to return see some old faces and meet new ones. The kids club has improved greatly since our last visit in October. Sarah ran the kids club/disco & my children loved her she is a great asset to the team she is a natural with children It’s a gift with her as I see how she was with all the children a genuine talent I implore you to keep hold of her as they will look forward to seeing her next visit. My children were so happy to see Looka on our return they’re very fond of her from our last visit  We also would like to mention the following staff who just make the visit extra special each time we come Looka/sarah kids adore them  Mokhtar Dhifli best waiter always attentive Everytime we have visited he treats us like royalty and my children love him like an uncle Mahmoud runs the pool bar always busy making guests happy with a smile on his face and keeps things running smoothly always Whenever we arrive we always visit  Shout out to anis the poolman for keeping the kids safe even if he does wear that shocking man united hat Lool jawhwrhan or as my kids call him the fish man as they love to have a fish pedi which makes them giggle & laugh Naima our cleaner we were so happy to see her she loves my children we adore her. Special thanks to Willy guest relations who goes out his way to keep guests happy he also brought foam party forward so my children and I didn’t miss out as was scheduled for say we left we are grateful for that as made the holiday that much more fun. The room view was amazing as always which is why I always book sea view it’s a stunning view to watch the sun rise and set. We cannot wait to return again the children were so sad yesterday and are asking to return already so I Better get booking again. Until next time our friends.

Everything is great, we are very pleased with our stay, very clean, clean rooms, large selection of food, everyone is very nice and friendly, the animators are the best 😁 animations for children and evenings for adults . Thanks you animatoin team , i love you so much ❤️❤️

The rest was great. We are happy with the stay. The food was good, the service at the bar and restaurant was high. The room was clean, cleaned daily. The animators did a great job, there were a lot of activities, attractions, games and fun. Tasty food and a large selection. I highly recommend this place.

Pleasantly surprised.An animation team listening ,pleasant. and very professional. Every evening , a holiday atmosphere . I thanked all the restaurant teams and the animation team alfa, mazi ,dj turki ,astro ,mimi ,tokyo zico

I had a very good experience at this hotel. The staff were very helpful, whether it was about repairs in the accommodation or advice on various personal problems. The kitchen was very good, the entire hotel was meticulously kept clean.I would like to thank two ladies, receptionist Saoussem Noumi and guest relation Ichrak Kallala, who were always willing to help in any way. It is impossible to name them all, but thank you all for a wonderful and unforgettable stay.

We have just come back  from Shems,  we travelled as a large family of 9 children range from 10 to 22, but I can honestly say that the hotel catered for everyone and kept us all busy because it is the staff who make this place what it is most specially the animation team !!... the hotel is clean and pool areas really nice. The aqua park is fab and kids and adults all loved the slides ! The food is actually really really good and varied, however if you have fussy little ones who will only eat nuggets then you will struggle ( they do have pizza every meal and fries every lunch time. Pasta is also available,) The animation team were absolutely fabulous- we are a large family with big characters, but they embraced our craziness and joined in our mad games, they made an effort with every single one of the kids and really made our holiday !!! Thankyou Zico, Ash,James Alfa, and mazi. ( sorry for the names we forgot ) The bar staff were all super they even found F1 for my partner on the big screen !!( apologises can't remember all names !)  On our first day  Med Saleh served us and he told us it was his first day, but he looked after us all week bringing drinks to the pool and chatting- Shems made a good choice employing him !. Now for the very few negatives, the bungalows are basic, clean and for what you pay good and perfect for two people, however we had a 'family room '( same bungalow as a double room with two single camp beds in ) fine I guess for toddlers but we had a 17 year old, 10 year old and myself and my partner, not ideal that there is no door between  bedroom part and lounge part so  no where to change, no privacy, couldn't even change behind an open wardrobe door as they have holes in 🤣🤣they are too small for parents with older children !. My only other moan would be certain parts need some TLC like the aqua park toilets. Overall we had an amazing holiday with very lovely staff who really cared and looked after us all week. This was a cheap holiday, it was 5 star for staff and pools, the rooms are not. It is value for money - thanks shems for a super week !!

reviews.review_title: The best hotel with the best staff
reviews.review_text: This hotel is very nice and adapted for children. Great animations with lovely, friendly people who take care about you and they keep you busy all the time. Big thank you to all animators a especially to : Zico, Ash Mazi, Alfa, James, Turkey , Tokyo and other lovely girl. A big thank you for Mohamed's team from restaurant . Yours service was excellent and professional. Food in that hotel is delicious and you can find a lot of options. All staff from restaurant looked after us and treat us like VIP . Bar team very nice and smiley. All people who works here are friendly, helpfully and always with big smile on face.  The rooms are nice and big enough. Type of room is bungalow. Great swimming pools and slides. Regards from Rafael and Monika with kids

We really enjoyed this resort, I must praise the large selection of food. The animators had fun every day and were very friendly. Great pools with sun loungers and the water park was great. The bungalow is more for the undemanding, but completely sufficient. Everyone here is smiling and friendly.

Hotel very good value for money. The staff is very kind, very considerate.  Rooms are cleaned daily and towels are changed every day as well. Wide choice of food with quality products. Good entertainment. The pools are very clean. Really we had a great stay, we will come back.

Very good value for money. Good people.  The excursions too were well especially the island of Kuriat really unforgettable, a pure wonder really.  We met very beautiful people too, top!  Dedication to Riadh from the bar , top the cocktails 😊

reviews.review_title: Wonderfull hotel and very good animators
reviews.review_text: Hotel is good. Restaurant and food very good. The rooms clean. Super swiming pool. Animator do it super show every day with Zico, Mazi, Alpha, Tokyo, James and very good DJ.  The beach is smaller but good, beautiful shallow sea, super for small children.

Value for money 👍🏼, friendly hotel, great animators, very good food, friendly staff...... and especially Mazi animation. Have a nice stay with friends and family.... The evenings are beautiful, we are not bored because many activities in this club

This is the 3rd time that I have been to Shems with family. We have lived the place since our first visit. It gives you everything that you need without leaving the complex.  The food is always good and I challenge anybody to not find something that they like.  The staff could not be more friendly if they tried and the Animation team have definitely been stepped up a level this year by Zico. Accommodation is always clean and rooms are cleaned towels/ sheets changed daily.  My only complaint on this visit is the bar. They appear to have new bar management and it's not for the better. I can say with 99% certainty that the vodka is watered down and I'm pretty sure the whiskey is too.  This is not a good move for Shems and needs sorting before people start booking other hotels, as I will be.

Amazing hotel and amazing staff. My first holiday and I have really enjoyed myself. Animation team were all fantastic. They all made a big effort to make sure we was having a good time and got involved with activities. All very friendly and polite I will definitely be coming back 😊

This îs the Best Holiday i ever hâd it was really Nice experience in Tunisia and in shems i mean everthing is orgenized from food and rooms and sports fields and thanks for the animation te-am especelly James eminos and all the rest .. ❤️ the animation te-am are displin and they do profesional work .. it was the first time in Tunisia and IT will never be the last

reviews.review_title: 3rd time, amazing holiday, will definitely return.
reviews.review_text: This is our 3rd time here, in 11 months.  Things have changed since our last visit but for the better. The animation team are amazing so friendly, funny and accommodating :RiCO❤️, zico,  Eminos, James. Mimi. Tokio. Turki.dj astro. Alfa and mazi, our favourite.  ❤️❤️❤️. Food lovely, all round entertainment all day lots of activities to do. We love the place hence so many visits. Very warm welcome each time, out place to go. Would highly recommend this place. Can't wait come back again. ❤️❤️❤️❤️

Amazing hotel very well received and too nice darling, it made us awesome colorful bracelets and very funny, always a big smile and awesome professionalism, I highly recommend the work and perfect thank you very much for it is vac Amazing 👍🏻

reviews.review_title: Very good experience for our first time in Monastir.
reviews.review_text: Very good hotel, nice bungalow and tranquility. Happy band of animators with whom we had a very good week, with Eminos, James and all the others, village leaders included, we will return soon I hope, it will be a great pleasure.

reviews.review_title: There are very nice people on vacation, chouchou makes beautiful bracelets at a good price, they are high quality and tr
reviews.review_text: There are very nice people on vacation, chouchou makes beautiful bracelets at a good price, they are high quality and traditionally made bracelets, she is smiling every day. everyone loves chocho. ichrak kallala can help with everything and is very kind. They have beautiful pools and everything is clean. The animators play a lot of games with us and try to involve us in everything. The receptionist Jawher is very kind and helped us with the accommodation and you can ask him anything

A very good Hotel , the staff is great , beautiful welcome, the restaurant , the bar , the kitchen , the aquapark is great , a big thank you for the entertainment team ( zico , Rico , Ash ... )  The activities and shows are great....  Merci Shems Holiday.

My second time  in Tunisie  And shems holiday village  I want to thank everybody for my gréât holiday  Everybody thé bar staff and thé restaurant also  Big thank for thé animation team they were so great and lovely  Everyone was lovely i defently will Côme back son

reviews.review_title: Review of my stay at hotel africa
reviews.review_text: I had a great stay at hotel Africa. The staff at the reception welcoming and very helpful.. my room was comfortable with a fantastic view😍 I will definitely go back very soon!  The location is just perfect and close to several places🙂☺️

reviews.review_title: A great stay at this hotel
reviews.review_text: Stayed at this hotel for 5yams and was an excellent experience in every way. The hotel''s location is so special, The rooms are clean and very comfortable, featuring elegant and quiet decor that provides a relaxing atmosphere. The room service was fast and efficient, and the staff was friendly and helpful to the utmost. Breakfast was varied and delicious I would definitely stay here again for anyone seeking comfort and excellent service!

I had a wonderful stay at Hotel Africa the location couldn’t be better right on Avenue Habib Bourguiba, just a short walk from the Medina and surrounded by shops, restaurants, and cafes. My room was clean, comfortable, and offered a stunning view of the city. The this hotel offers great value, excellent service, and a perfect central location. Highly recommended!!

I stayed at Hotel Africa and the experience was excellent. The location is just perfect right in the heart of the city, along Avenue Habib Bourguiba, within walking distance of the Medina and many restaurants and cafes. The room was spacious, clean and with a wonderful view of the city. The staff was always friendly, helpful and very professional. The breakfast buffet was varied and plentiful with both local and international options. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Tunis!!!!

I would like to thank and appreciate your top-notch hotel for everything you gave me during my stay. Service was excellent, welcoming, accommodating, friendly and helpful staff, clean and comfortable rooms, great location. An unforgettable experience I would recommend to everyone. I wish you continued excellence and success and will be staying back with God's permission.

Amazing stay clean, stylish rooms and top service. Special thanks to the staff and especially Maram very respectful and lovely for her exceptional care. Would gladly return and highly recommend!   It’s rare to find this level of personalized service, and it made a big difference in my experience. Thanks to this warm and dedicated approach, I felt at home throughout my stay.  THANK YOU AFRICA TUNIS

reviews.review_title: Very good stay at the Hotel Africa
reviews.review_text: Very helpful staff.  Special mention to Maram, the relationship/communication manager who was very warm and available during the stay! A pleasant and professional person.  I recommend this hotel for a stay in Tunis.

I had a great time. The location is really top, right in the city center, close to everything. super convenient and everything is next door. I recommend this hotel for its location and the kindness of the staff. The food is correct, good value for money.  Recommended 👍🏻

Great hotel! The staff is friendly, the rooms were clean and tidy. The price was fair for the quality and size of the rooms.  In particular the attention to the customer of Maram. He welcomed us and in a moment we checked in and they brought us a welcome juice.  I recommend it to everyone.

Dear Hotel Africa staff,  I would like to express my deep gratitude for the exceptional welcome and impeccable service I enjoyed during my stay. Your professionalism, kindness and availability contributed greatly to making my experience most enjoyable.  Thank you to the whole team for your constant smile and attention to detail. I will have an excellent memory of my time at your institution.  Looking forward to coming back soon.  Very cordially,

I had a great stay at the Hotel Africa Tunis. The location is great, right in the heart of Avenue Habib Bourguiba with a wonderful view of the city from my room which was clean. Breakfast is varied and delicious. Thanks to the whole team for their hospitality I highly recommend this hotel for a pleasant stay in Tunis😍😍😍😍

Skip this hotel, shabby, shower knocks nothing of (shower curtain) no minibar, no water in the room, telephone for reception unintelligible, slight defect in the hallway, door of the shower starts to rot. Air conditioning does make noise but does little else. Lobby very unsociable...

Had an amazing time at Africa Hotel Tunis! The location is perfect, right in the city center, close to everything. The rooms were super clean and comfy, with a great view🥰 the staff were friendly especially Maram the guest relation she was so lovely and always making sure I had everything I needed also the breakfast was really good with lots of options. Definitely a great place to stay in Tunis❤️❤️❤️❤️ I’d totally come back!

An exceptional stay! The hotel offers a pleasant and warm environment, with attentive staff and always available. The rooms are comfortable, well equipped and clean. The location is ideal, close to the main attractions. The breakfast was delicious and varied, a real treat. I highly recommend this property for a successful and relaxing getaway!

I had a fantastic experience at this hotel! From the moment I arrived, the staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive, Maram was a great help too she was friendly and sweet The room was spotless, modern, and very comfortable, with a stunning view of the city. Breakfast each morning was delicious with plenty of options, and the location couldn’t be better—close to major attractions, restaurants, and public transportation. I truly felt like a valued guest and will definitely be staying here again on my next visit. Five stars all the way!

The hotel is nice and has a warm atmosphere which makes the stay particularly pleasant the staff is very welcoming especially Maram the PR Officer 😊The rooms are spacious, clean and well equipped, offering optimal comfort. Moreover, the location is impeccable It is a perfect place for a relaxing and pleasant stay

I recently stayed at Hotel Africa and it was an incredible experience the staff was extremely welcoming and the rooms had very nice views on the habib bourguiba avenue and the hotels location is perfect close to everything in the city 👌 I highly recommend it

reviews.review_title: Africa Hotel best hotel in Tunisia ever with friendly staff ,good food too
reviews.review_text: Safe environment,great place good food .Everyone is friendly but the best one was Maram at the front desk ,she helped us check in and always checked up on us.Her English is fluent .The chefs are also friendly I loved the pizza parlour and the cake table so nice.

We had a great stay at this hotel! The staff was incredibly welcoming and attentive. The room was spacious, clean and very well equipped, with great views. The breakfast was varied and delicious, perfect for a good start to the day. The location of the hotel is also great, close to everything. We highly recommend this property and will return without hesitation

Second time I'm staying here. Food is great. The wifi is really bad in the upper floors. Market is close by. Not too far from tourist attractions. Maram has been a great help and speaks great English. She helped me organise a taxi to saidbousaid

I arrived with a friend to spend 4 days in Tunisia . pity that at our at 3pm the reception was icy it is no one of a certain age! Fortunately the heat is on the rendezvous as well at the level of the entertainment team as the housekeepers and gardeners .beach own varied food there is for all tastes .Bed correct. The only one resides in the welcome otherwise everything was at the top .ambiance at the appointment we are not bored for any age.

The hotel spot very nice, clean and hot pools. The facilitators are motivated and friendly. I recommend group of friends and family! The meals are good, the rooms are cleaned every day. Nothing to say value for money.

The hotel is clean and comfortable. The staff is super nice whether it be maids, reception and waiters. And of course the animation team is great. Many thanks to Said and his team!!  In addition, the cocktails are unlimited and the buffet is really good.

We stayed with my mother at this hotel for 1 week. Top hotel, excellent cuisine, perfect cleanliness up to the rooms. Excellent service, very pleasant and smiling entertainment team! The girls at the spa are impeccable, the massages perfect 👍  The beach is beautiful and very well maintained.  We recommend!!   Nina and Sylvie

A pleasant welcome with an ideal reception. Food service like drinks at the bar are very good. The room is quite suitable. The entertainment around the pool is more than great, especially the entertainment manager who is 100% dedicated to setting the mood.   I would be happy to return to this hotel for my next stay in Tunisia!

Very decent and well placed hotel, very good and varied catering. Staff available, charming and welcoming.  Choose the all-inclusive formula, and among other wonderful cocktails at will! Animations on top despite the very beginning of the season, a special bravo to Tef for his humor and kindness!

Great stay, the Animation Team is at the top with a Special Mention for Saïd and Tef👌🏻 the restaurant is very good also (little extra for the omelet in the morning it is 🤩) all the staff is taking care and the sea is 250m away.

Excellent location 200 meters from the sandy beach, Various and well-cooked restaurant buffets  Clean and comfortable, Exceptional entertainers! Special mentions to Said for his interpretation of Café des Délices memorable souvenir and a nod to Def for his kindness, his perfect imitation of the cat!

Great stay... a great setting, excellent welcome , very good buffets... and an entertainment team at the top! The staff at your disposal! Recommended... Thank you Said, Def and everyone else! Hoping to come back and visit this beautiful region.

Very welcome, very good animations. Clean and with a very friendly setting. I recommend spending your vacation here if you are looking for calm and change of scenery. A nod to Tef for his kindness and good humor on a daily basis;)

reviews.review_title: the nicest hotel in hammed, come to this hotel be sure
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel, small but very cozy, suitable for families with children, good food: national dishes, pizza, various seafood, very good staff, animators are also up to the task, not obtrusive, but entertain very well, especially note animator Tef, speaks very well Russian

We stayed at this property with my girlfriend and had a great time. The service was great, with a very warm welcome. The buffet is good and well presented. The rooms in the bungalow style are nice. Many thanks to Amine and Jidi at the bar, always adorable and professional, as well as to Mohamed at the pool bar. At the reception, the whole team is welcoming and efficient, special thanks to Amine for her kindness and availability. A top team, thank you all!

I came with my mother to enjoy Tunisia. The entire staff of the hotel welcome as animator is great, welcoming and very kind.  Both the beach and the pool are spotless and beautiful! The food for breakfast, lunch and dinner is also varied very pleasant. All day long entertainment is organized to make us spend pleasant moments!   It is the best place for the French who want to come to Hammamet and take the opportunity to discover Tunisia!

A perfect stay! Upon arrival, the warm welcome of the staff immediately puts at ease. The rooms are spotless, spacious and beautifully decorated; the bedding is very comfortable. The leisure facilities (swimming pool, spa, gym) are well maintained and easily accessible, ideal for relaxing after a day of activities. Breakfast is varied and plentiful, with fresh quality products. Special mention for the spotless cleanliness of the premises and always attentive service. In short, everything is on top: I highly recommend this hotel for a relaxing stay without false rating!

reviews.review_title: Theft in disguise or misreading of laws
reviews.review_text: I am currently at the hotel the Hammamet hotel and spa room 215 very very disappointed with the behavior of the reception barely arrived for a two night stay from May 17 to 19 the hotel ma charged a tourist tax of 48 dt instead of 12 dt as mentioned on my booking voucher N 801163583 made on the site stayforlong after complaint has twice at the reception and direction that persist on their resonance  I will not let this incident pass so I will intervene at the level of Tunisian authorities of tourism to claim compensation and excuse  Because the tourist tax as stipulated in Article 46 of the Tunisian Finance Law of 2024 is a tax of 3 dt per day per person for tourists of the arable magreb of which of am. Apart from this incident the hotel is quiet for the season and friendly staff

Location of the hotel 300 meters from the sea. Clean, comfortable and cozy. The food is varied and delicious. Staff services at the highest level. Very good, fun and winding animators, special thanks to animator Tef. Have entertainment activities on a regular basis, no time to be bored 😁

We stayed 9 days at hammamet hotel & spa and it was wonderful vacation, we enjoyed every single day here, the food was so delicious and the staff at the kitchen polite and helpful,  the animation guys were  funny and friendly , the reception staff were so friendly and helpful during all our staying.  Our room was clean and they come to clean it every day and gave us fresh towels and bathroom supplies. The hotel has a private beach and clean and crystal water . I recommend this hotel to everyone who's willing to enjoy summer time .

Very friendly staff nice hotel, very good meal but often cold pity for a first experience beautiful pool the spa is very well held very nice setting to resource equipped with animation always at the top very considerate with guests

Very good hotel , restaurant very nice and good food the service animation very well and very welcoming staff. The rooms are very clean and tidy and all the staff is there at disposal. The spa and pool very well and the beach too

We were delighted with our stay in this hotel by the setting but especially by the support of the staff, both from the reception by its dedication but also for all services ( Catering ,animation , and room staff). A big thank you from Brigitte and Jean-Francois.

Perfect destination, warm lovely and clean, great entertainment. Animation team were brilliant. Especially Alex, he was really good with the kids. Meals were always good. And the snack bar the kids loved, they could get fresh pizza made for them! Would deffo reccomend

Amazing holiday resort and the entertainment team were so good with the kids and the adults in the evening!! Alex, Fifi and Kyle thank you!! The food was tasty and such a great variety. Special mention to the pool bar who made fresh pizzas everyday!

Diar Lemdina has loads of great qualities. Its absolutely beautiful in a great setting within the Medina. The staff are wonderful, particularly at Reception, the main restaurant and the bar. The swimming pools are lovely - we mostly used the main pool away from the hotel lobby.  The beach was wasnt quite open but looks good, The beach is dirty however this isnt the Hotels fault. Food was a bit limited for choice after a week. Our grand daughter struggled a bit but the pool snack bar was great and we used that a few times. We had italian at the sister hotel and I have to say that was poor. Our apartment was fine but the aircon didnt work and the kitchen area was poorly equipped. Shower water pressure was also not good. Location within the complex was lovely though. All in all, this Hotel was very nice and definitely worth a visit. For all its faults I would recommend it.

A great stay at the Diar Lemdina hotel. 10 days of pure happiness supervised by a superb entertainment team that offers activities from morning to night without ever being insistent! Merci Alex, Natacha, Fifi… Many thanks also to Jasser who took care of our son during meals and Latifa (sorry for the spelling) for cleaning! Take care of yourself

reviews.review_title: Great hotel very clean and very well placed in the medina, animators at the top indoor heated pool and 3 outdoor pools
reviews.review_text: Great hotel very clean and very well placed in the medina, indoor heated pool as well as 3 outdoor pools.staff listening and very pleasant, animators at the top Small downside on the choice of dishes but the whole remains well Very good past holidays

I booked to go to this hotel last year and it did not disappoint me. I was travelling solo to Tunisia and to be honest I was slightly anxious. When the coach pulled up at the Hotel Diar Lemdina I was delighted to see how beautiful it was, I loved the traditional themed building and it was joined onto the Medina.  A man came out and took all of my luggage to the reception whilst I checked in, I was slightly early for check in and my room wasn't quite ready so the staff told me to go to the restaurant and get something to eat and drink! The staff where awesome. When I explained that I was on my own the staff made an extra effort and made sure that I was okay throughout my 10 night stay here.   I chose to use the adult pool throughout my visit which was always quiet and well maintained, the life guards were so helpful when I needed assistance getting my sun bed out and putting up the umbrella.  There was always something going on throughout the day at the other pools and the animation team were always on hand to inform me of what activities were on that day.   The evening entertainment was very good also, the hotel staff were friendly and upbeat, I was quite happy having my dinner at night and going for a walk through the beautiful Medina which is joined onto the hotel then heading back to my room.   I went on an all inclusive basis and the food never disappointed, especially the breakfast's, everything was fresh, a terrific selection of food, I was impressed with the omelette making section and the crepe service, syrup and Nutella crepes were unreal and the waiting staff again went above and beyond to assist me at mealtimes.   As I was on my own I imagined having a small room with a balcony or terrace but my suite was huge, very roomy, lots of cupboard space, 2 bathrooms, 1 with a bath and a lovely balcony. My towels were changed daily and my bedsheets were changed every second day, most days I came into a beautiful towel design and fresh flowers on top of the bed. The maids were also extremely friendly.   I had a fantastic stay in the Hotel Diar Lemdina. Looking forward to going back with my mum in September.

Best trip we had in years! Friendly staff & quality entertainment! Plenty options on food with the choice of going to enjoy other restaurants! Quite close to the beach no more then 10min if you have a small child!  Aqua Park just around the corner! Will definitely comeback as we felt amazing!

Arrived on the 20th of May in this hotel my and my family we're received very well and got great service also we really enjoyed the animation team how nice and approachable they are. The restaurant service is great as well still here for a few days lets see how it will go!!

Super happy with the simpas animators who make people participate good atmosphere will not forget this stay affectionately Marie and Jack................................................................................................. .....

Recently rested at the Hotel Diar Lemdina in Yasmin Hammamet (Tunisia), and on the whole were very satisfied!  The first thing that was impressive was the atmosphere. The hotel is decorated in a traditional Tunisian style and is right in the centre of the tourist medina, as if you were in an Oriental fairy tale.   The location is super: the hotel is on the grounds of Medina - around shops, cafes, entertainment.  The food was generally good. There was a good choice for breakfast, fresh pastries, Tunisian dishes. Lunches and dinners have sometimes seemed monotonous, but you certainly won't stay hungry.

Top really 🤩🤩🤩🤩 I will return without problem animator at the top food at the top we can eat at your time and the atmosphere is good without worries I will return we spent 10 days at the top the sea is good and beautiful and level cleanliness nothing to complain

Good hotel central to the medina top location hammameth Yasmine good staff top animation team rooms neat and clean  Looks traditional food buffet is neat all well arranged pools and cartaghe land is included in hotel

Excellent hotel and good entertainment for all ages  Good animation, nice special signing frame for Alex and the whole team  A great experience here and I do it again of course big thank you for everyone here...................

reviews.review_title: Very good and clean hotel with good location
reviews.review_text: Very clean and good hotel. The stuff is very polite and helpfull. Food is very tasty and various. The room was big, the bed good, it was cleaned every day, towels were changed every day too. We can recomend this hotel.It is included visit in two museums.

Great clean and welcoming hotel, great room with good general atmosphere and very good value for money.  The restaurant is of quality and varied, moreover the staff is very good. Thanks for your commitment and professionalism in carrying out your work on the beach. Special thanks to Wael for taking care of us.

Atypical hotel with lots of charm, welcome and very nice animation. The buffet is varied, the breakfast very hearty. I advise taking All inclusive. Private beach, about 5 minutes walk from the hotel. Right in the city center.

Amazing 2nd time being entertained by amazing people big shout out to alpha also to shaleem the manager got amazing manors and also nothing is  to much hassle I love this place 2nd time I will be back for sure they are the kindest people I've ever come across and I've been well travelle

Whole team is amazing second day in and would defo come back. Defo the best place on hammamet alpha is one of the best always interacting with everyone making our stay enjoyable. Cannot rate this place enough people come here and stay absolutely amazing

Top hotel, clean, spacious room is very nice. Perfect animation for adults and children. Fresh and delicious meals. Server, very nice hoste  Stay nickel cheap price  Great location, next to the beach the city center. Park for children  Water park 500 m the 2 Park  I strongly advise

Fabulous hotel 2nd visit will definitely be rebooking for 2025. Everything on your doorstep. Rooms immaculate,I had a pool view by the quiet pool just as requested. Food lovely always something to suit even the fussiest of eaters. Entertainment amazing overall a lovely stay

Superb hotel meeting my expectations. Again thank you for the welcome and the very appreciable kindness of all the staff. Services provided at the top (concierge, laundry, room service, sanitation always impeccable. Spa and thalassotherapy as well as treatments are of quality and very affordable. A big special thank you for Mr. Director and Mademoiselle Mouna for responding to my uncle's request for my birthday, I was very moved it will always be an unforgettable moment. Superb view from my room a real little paradise, I have nothing to say negative it will be bad faith. 15 days of real vacation for a more than reasonable price with services of this quality. I highly recommend this hotel. Thank you again and see you soon.

Arrived at Nour palace after early flight  Was greeted by extremely kind and friendly staff. Was welcomed with refreshing juice. Waited short time before being shown to my room porter was very helpful showing me how to work the basics tv safe etc… I had garden view showing pool and the beach I could hear much laughter and people enjoying themselves. Reception staff were fantastic in making me feel welcome. The pool was very nice clean and appealing. Went to the restaurant food was amazing staff very friendly. Much variety for all. They catered for everyone .  Bar staff very attentive much humour had by all quests included. Met animation team great fun never a dull moment. I had the privilege of being there when they opened new restaurant was quite an experience all staff quests were in great spirits .  I had a couple of small queries regarding my holiday I was introduced to an amazing women named Mona she represented the hotel and  helped me  with any questions or queries. She was amazing in Every way. Security was fantastic. Only complain was weather was cloudy at times. MAY!!!! Not my first time I’m Madhia but first Time  Nour palace I already booked to return this year my family will also join me. Beach is fantastic sea is crystal clear loved it highly recommend.

I had an amazing stay at Nour Palace Mahdia! From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel welcome with their warm hospitality and professionalism. The hotel is beautifully located right on a stunning beach with crystal-clear water — perfect for relaxing and long walks by the sea.  Our room was clean, spacious, and had a lovely balcony with a sea view. Housekeeping was consistent and thorough every day. The food at the buffet was excellent, with a wide variety of options that catered to all tastes. I especially appreciated the delicious local Tunisian dishes.  The pool area was clean and well-maintained, with plenty of sunbeds and a fun atmosphere thanks to the energetic animation team. There were always activities available, but also enough quiet spaces to simply unwind.  Overall, Nour Palace exceeded my expectations. It’s a great destination for both families and couples looking for relaxation, good food, and friendly service. I will definitely be coming back!

Very good hotel, beautiful common interiors, restaurant and beach. Very good food, fresh, varied and very tasty. Service in the restaurant very elegant and polite especially Jaaeer and Yassine. Close to the city you can walk along the beach, in front of and in the hotel there are gift shops.

very good animation team, listening to our proposals , always available. very clean, beautiful exterior. very friendly staff, always attentive, with little attention to us  very good stay of a week spent with a friend! I recommend 1000 times!!

A team of animators at the top, different evenings each evening, special part for children! All the staff on top! As well as maids , clean room , towel change daily! Staff attentive , answers the request, always available! I recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great hotel with the best animation team
reviews.review_text: The Nour Palace hotel met all my expectations. And above all, the expectations of my five-year-old son. The greatest credit for this goes to the animation team. It is impossible to mention them all by name, but each one of them tries their best and takes care of the guests in the best possible way. I could easily leave my son with them and swim at the same time. They are open, speak different languages ​​and always meet the guests' needs. My son had the best relationship with Sarra, but the rest also try very hard. And even when they are tired, they do not show it. I thank them very much for everything. Mouna is also very nice, she takes care of the hotel-guest relationship. The meals are varied. Everyone will find something delicious for themselves. The hotel is not the youngest but it is maintained in really good condition. Rooms are in good shape. The beach is sandy, large swimming pool and great slides. I highly recommend it to all those who are undecided.

Very nice hotel with a superb sea view. the animation team is super nice thanks to Sarah and Bio for our good times! Thanks to Nadia and Aziza for the always pleasant room maintenance! Thank you to Yassine for the service at the restaurant always perfect always a little attention for her customers ❤️ thank you to Mouna for always being concerned about the well-being of her customers!

Everything is perfect, special hospitality of Mouna Hassan Sassi is the best waiter in the bar Everything looks nice i enjoyed the beautiful sea all spaces are clean  People smile at me all the time here and they welcome guests from all nationality i will come again .

reviews.review_title: Our experience at the hotel nour place mahdia tunisie
reviews.review_text: Warm welcome, friendly staff. Ms Mouna very dynamic, kind listening to the little care. The new director very nice. The atmosphere is excellent, the dishes are varied. Have had a great time. I highly recommend this hotel.

The hotel is beautiful,near the beach. ☀️🏊🌅🏝️ The food in restaurant was excellent. Rooms are cleaned every day. All people in hotel are friendly to us. Every night we have disco night with animator. We dance, we sing and we do a lot of different things.👍😀💫We wish all the best for everybody in this place.  The guest service is very friendy and if you have any questions,she will answer. 🩷

Excellent start of the Nour Palace Hotel.  Very clean. Animation on top. ❤️ For a business stay, the Tunis room is at the top. Correct catering.  ❤️ Satisfied for a start of the season 🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳

Perfect hotel and even better animation Team!!! We loved it here! Thank you for wonderfull holiday!!! Food animation team Hamma and Bio were the best dancers and happiest on the team. Sara is a sunshine! The rooms are clean. Food very good and lot of types of food 😍

All staff are very friendly and helpful and attentive to guests.  The buffets there is the choice to please everyone "the negative is the white wine that is at each service is undrinkable because it is served hot and given the temperature 🤨" With the Best of KHALIFA guides we made the best visit away from tourists even in the market we made a visit without being disturbed and we saw beautiful places.  The guide Ali is good too and he listens.  The animations of the day and evening were pleasant and the animators at the top.

A little bit of disappointment. The hotel is big and right at the sea those are the pluses on which I believe the rating is based on. You can see that there are no investments in this place, all furniture looks very old. The rooms are spacious which is a nice surprise. But to be honest I have chosen Tunisia as from the past experience in other hotels it had the best animations. From the reviews, I saw that animations at this hotel are great but it seems that all has changed in September. I was there at the beginning of the month and hotel seemed in full capacity. But the animation program was very poor. The long list of day activities which was presented on the hotel's wall has nothing to do with the reality.  A few times there was a water polo, the only thing that happened daily was aqua gym. For zumba- we had to ask daily the animation team about it. It is the first time that instead of animation team encouraging guests to take part in activities it was the guests that asked for some of them. Volleyball- it was a ball at animation's booth and again You could go and ask for it, there was no organisation of the plays. Only the animation boss had some energy and really tried.   As for the food it was overall good but some some of the waiters tried to flirt and when turned down started to be rude. Also at some point all salt shakers disappeared. And I would even understand if this was for a half a day for cleaning (still would be a disappointment in 5* hotel) but the situation lasted for a few days. The salt was available at one place of the dining room on the plate... Some people took it in their fingers... simply disgusting. There were no beer kegs at the diner- the beer was placed in plastic water bottles and then from that the waiters poured it down Your glass...  The a'la carte restaurant.... This was even more weird. For all such restaurants in the hotels I went to You choose the dishes from the menu at the table and then they arrived at Your table. In this hotel this is copy and paste from the dining hall. Literally. There is just an open buffet with the same dishes as in the main restaurant. The only difference I saw was tiramissu.   Also watch out at the exchange office. Always check if the amount received is the same as on the paper they gave You. I hope it was simple mistake but I received less, ofc I pointed that out and received total amount but still something like that happened to me for the first time.  Overall if the weather is good and You are looking for the cheap hotel near the sea it is ok. The sea is beautiful with easy access and without rocks. Just a lot of seashells which brings even more beauty to this. Watch out for jellyfishes though.   Sadly this region is quite a long way from all interesting places. You can visit Mahdia but for all the organised tours usually You need to consider whole day out.

hotel worth its price.ANIMATION TEAM THE BEST IN THE WORLD. Nice weather, we meat loads of nice people, children had a great time, adults too, the best vacation.   Food was ok, fairly clean.  we will definitely come back. I recommend,well spend money.

reviews.review_title: Not at all a 5-star for me a 3 worst hotel I've made I wouldn't go back
reviews.review_text: Not at all a disappointed 5 stars I wouldn't go back 22days 15 without eating it was very hard food always the same thing key issues non-stop No entertainment in the evening brief disappointing cocktail paying no theme restaurant disco close worse hotel I made

Good hotel, clean with professional staff, large rooms beautiful view, varied restaurant and good food, heated pool , beautiful garden and beach. The only negative The mosquitoes. I recommend visiting this hotel.

6th stay at the Nour Palace and one more faultless! A big thank you to the manager Mr Yassin who manages his hotel with excellence. Various buffet, impeccable cleanliness, perfect animation. A nod to the staff of the hotel (restaurant, cleaning, welcome, entertainment and so on) who is of unparalleled professionalism and sympathy! Of course, I'll get back to it as soon as possible!

I had a great stay at the Nour Palace Mahdia hotel.The hotel was very clean and very quiet and especially very huge. I would like to express my deepest gratitude to Mr. Elloumi Yassin the hotel manager who showed great professionalism and unparalleled hospitality throughout my stay (I felt at home). The restaurant was good and the hotel location is excellent directly opposite the beautiful Mahdia beach which is considered one of the best in Tunisia. I would like to personally thank Mr Helmi and Mr Hamdi for the restoration and Mrs Aïcha the governess general and the cleaning lady Mrs Afef for their exceptional work. I would be happy to return to this hotel.

The hotel is good, the view from the balcony is just great, the food is delicious, the pool is cool, clean, the animation team is cool, you will never be sad.❤️❤️🥰🥰❤️❤️🥰🥰❤️❤️🥰🥰❤️❤️🥰🥰❤️❤️🥰🥰❤️❤️🥰🥰❤️❤️🥰🥰❤️❤️🕺🕺🕺🕺🕺🕺

Staff are all lovely and friendly. The rooms cleaned daily and are of a good size. No kettle or fridge in room which I missed as the coffee machines at bar area are turned off at night and your not allowed to take drinks from restaurant. Reception staff very helpful.  Animation team work hard all day around the pool.  For me as solo traveler I found there is nothing to do at night as the shows I felt were pretty child like. Last year I went to a 3 star and they brought in entertainment some evenings which were amazing.  Down sides for me personally was from day 1 constantly being asked by animation team to write review on here and some reviews were written by them.  Food … selection of hot food very poor and repetitive. Plenty salad items on offer. Snack bar only does crepes or pizza . No kids menu here.  In all I enjoyed my stay but would not return as this was my 3rd year in Tunisia and there are better hotels in other parts with more on offer .

reviews.review_title: The hotel was very good, as soon as we arrived the lobby itself looked great. Furthermore, the pool was amazing.
reviews.review_text: The hotel is beautiful, as soon as we got here it looked great. The restaurant was great, with delicious all you can eat food. The pool looked good and was nice to swim in. The animation team was amazing and fun, always dancing or singing. The shows they put up were always entertaining. Zambala is the best dancer and was my favourite entertainer.

Restaurant is very good and clean,the service is amazing,the animation team is amazing and  very fun to be with.The pool   Is very big and nice,the beach is very big so you have loads of space, the shows here are amazing and fun.zambala is the best dancer here he’s very fun to be around and will always make you happy.❤️

It was my first trip solo with my 3 kids and I was concerned I’d made the wrong choice with Tunisia but I was wrong. The animation team have been incredible, doing much of the heavy lifting with the kids and the activities are none stop. They are great fun and kept us all laughing. All the staff and polite and friendly and the food is basic but good enough as there is lots of choice. The rooms and communal areas are kept very clean. We are considering breaking our own rules and coming back again next year.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, great location, great staff and animation team and great food.
reviews.review_text: This is a great hotel. The staff are all very helpful and willing to please.  The Hotel is very clean, well equipped and a friendly place to be. The food is extremely tasty and varied. The animation team are really good, especially France and Johnny. They all try very hard to please, entertain, amuse and keep us occupied. Well done to everyone. I appreciate all the effort to the staff put in to make guests time here a special experience.

reviews.review_title: I like being here its very nice.
reviews.review_text: Its good and very beautiful animator good beach good swimming pool good food good place is good the room is good the veiw is good, i really like it Bartender are good the disco are good the security are good the chef animator are so good and the hotel is very clean.

I really do enjoyed my stay at the hotel.  The hotel itself  is nice and clean , the beach is beautiful and the best part of my stay was all the animations. Animation team is great they are doing great job to entertain us.  Special thanks to Sam❤️ , Zambala and Franco.

I rate the hotel average, especially for the food, and I mean breakfasts and dinners, small selection, basically none. What I can rate well is the animation team, they did a great job to make sure they had something to do. I would not come to this hotel again, as I mentioned earlier, because of the food.

Great time. On top of the beach with hotel provided lounger and umbrella. The weath was great and a lovely pool. The food was great, with a good mix of local and international. The entertainment team were ausom with high energy and the kids were happy all day. I would definitely come again.

We have just returned after a fabulous 2 week holiday here. The best holiday we’ve had for years! Monastir is a lovely city which if full of history and has a beautiful beach and marina. The hotel is comfortable and clean, and the staff are fantastic. Special thanks to Sabeh, the best barman ever! The entertainment team: Franco, Franc/Jounni/Snoop/Bani/Wafe/Jiji/Yakin/Sam/Alex/Simo/Bob made our holiday the experience it was. They were absolutely brilliant and are the reason we will return again and again. Thank you all, we miss you already! x

The hotel was very nice the people were very funny and kind the food was really good my bed was comfy and ever time I came back to the room it was clean and nicely decorated overall this hotel is the best hotel I’ve ever been to and I will definitely be coming back

reviews.review_title: Super welcome team with little care
reviews.review_text: “We had an amazing stay with friends at the Delphine & Habib Hotel in Monastir! The welcome is exceptional, we really feel at home. All are in the care of the staff — from the manager to the front desk staff, from the self, to the maintenance.  It is one of the oldest hotels in Monastir, being gradually renovated, which gives it a lot of charm.  Every day, they take the time to ask us what we’ve done — our little excursions and walks ‘in the snatch’ version (zero organization, 100% fun 😂) — and they offer us places to visit that only the locals know. They are very interested in our program and experience.  We highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to relax, feel well surrounded, and have a real and friendly experience. Thank you to the whole team for this great adventure!”  Far from the far too luxurious complexes that lock you up and oppress you. It was our experience and it is authentic.  Thank you 🙏 to them

Great Hotel, seen on beach and pool, great restaurant and great atmosphere, Team animation at the top and staff at the top, I recommend,  Special mention for Zambala, always smiling and a great host 👌🏽🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
Great location, fairly clean rooms, friendly atmosphere, good food, overall fairly good service, reception always available and good quality price, advisable for the spring/autumn season.

Hi! I'm having a wonderful stay at this hotel – everything is perfect, but the animation team truly stands out! Their energy, creativity, and kindness made my vacation unforgettable! Room is also good like the food in restoran. Zambala is the best guy 🫶🏼

The hotel was lovely, staff were so friendly and helpful. The entertainment team were amazing, made my little girl feel so special and included. Food was lovely, some not so nice days but ye can’t win them all. We did book a boat trip that was awful, full past capacity I’d say so we got off and the guy booked another excursion for us which was great. I’d go again. Wafe and franko were amazing. And the lifeguard, Wahid, he was fantastic! Helped my little one with the slide and build her confidence in the pool

Good hotel, met well, put bracelets on immediately, gave the room immediately after cleaning it. The room is clean. Every day clean towels and cleaning. Meals at the level of all inclusive. Good animation, cheerful guys, all day find entertainment for everyone, even in bad weather!!!

Hi hi, Hotel Dolphin is great. I was here with my girlfriend on our first vacation together and we really enjoyed it. The hotel is in a great location, close to the center, shopping, history. I rate the hotel services as 4*. But I would rate the animators as 5*, their positives, their activity is great, they can entertain, take care of your children, and they have a great attitude and service... everyone was very helpful and nice. But I have to highlight the animators once again, they have a great attitude towards all people, for all ages. So we will be back.

reviews.review_title: How on earth can this ever be rated 4 star?
reviews.review_text: Of all the hotels I have been to, this is by far the worst 4 star by a country mile! From misrepresentation of water slides which are no longer there, to food which is at best, edible. I am not saying that the staff are bad, far from it, they were friendly and helpful, but how can they deliver a great experience when you room smells of sewerage depending on the wind direction, you have to 'shoulder' your balcony door open (three rooms identical) and not be able to lock them? Any gaps in the frames were stuffed with newspaper in an attempt to stop the  draughts. No towel rails to hang your towels on after use. Drains that flow so slow that the water floods the bathroom when taking a shower.Safety was just non existent. No emergency lighting that worked on stairs. When we had a power cut (staff acted like it was a normality and carried on like nothing had happened) visitors using phone torches to use stairs,some dragging thier luggage with them, So unbelievably dangerous. Electrical cupboards unlocked where children could easily access with potential death. I have never, ever been offered ratatouille for breakfast! The meat cuts for lunch and dinner were the cheapest, boniest, fattiest you could possibly buy. I struggled to find something varied to eat. No spoons to eat your desserts (though the desserts were varied and were very nice) Forks provided in the counter to serve yourself olives and sauces( seriously 😳) The music was the same artist daily and no modern day songs. It blasted out all day over the pool area. The coffee machines were switched off in the resteraunt for lunch and dinner...Guess no one wants any after breakfast? The machines in the bar areas did not work properly,  so it was difficult to get a nice hot drink during yhe day. The man at reception was a crook. Trying to stiff everyone  when converting currency.  Acted upset when challenged and reluctantly gave the extra change owed. The wine was undrinkable,  understood it was local, but suitable only for chips.  The beer was watery. If you wanted to buy branded products, they were extortionate. So utterly disappointed with Thomas Cook! Thomas cook apparently owned by  Polish company now, obviously not the trusted brand of years past so please avoid. Currently this hotel is still advertising the water slides which were removed in 2023..... I strongly suggest you avoid unless you are prepared for a 1 star experience, there is no way this could possibly be described as a 4star hotel!

reviews.review_title: Sendito Bellevue Park 5* we will be back!
reviews.review_text: Visited Sentido Bellevue Park the 2nd time in two consecutive years with my daughter. 12th-22nd May  2025.  She absolutely loves it here, and she requested to come back. All the staff are lovely, friendly and kind.   Thank you, the reception team, who honoured my request prior to our visit. The maids kept the room clean to a high standard, gardeners keeping the place beautiful, spa staff thank you for helping me unwind. The animation team is so good, keeping us entertained with lots of fun and energy! Bar staff keeping the drinks flowing, serving with a smile!  Finally, a big shout out to the chefs, especially Hassen and Wassim. You guys work hard! Thank you so much for the delicious meals prepared and keeping us fed for the 10 days and the waiting staff at the restaurant and management. You are appreciated 👏🏼   Keep up the hard work, and we will see you soon! Thank you all  for being part of my daughters holiday memories!

Perfect Vacation!  The hotel was fantastic — beautiful location, great food, and very comfortable rooms. But what made it truly special was the animation team! They were so talented, friendly, and full of energy every single day. From morning activities to evening shows, they kept everyone entertained and made us feel welcome. Highly recommended!

Amazing Stay!  We had a wonderful experience at the hotel — the rooms were clean, comfortable, and the whole property was beautiful. The staff were always friendly and helpful. A special shoutout to the animation team who made every day fun and full of energy with great activities, shows, and games for all ages. They really made the holiday extra special. Can’t wait to come back!

reviews.review_title: My memorable holiday Sentido Bellevue Park
reviews.review_text: In this hotel l am 5th time.I want say thanks for all high professional animation team, for amazing evening shows, for the disco.
