Many thanks for all staff, for barmens, for receptionist.l want to say ,that food is really 👌 😋 amazing 👏 l will return in this hotel ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ Many thanks for my inforgettable holiday in this May ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️

The hotel and animation team are delightful.  Very beautiful and well-maintained territory, all in flowers. Lovely food. The chefs are first class. The waiters are marvellous and friendly. Mrs Gdah Imen is an amazing cook and person. Special thanks to her for the incredibly tasty pancakes and pasta. I give it 5 Michelin stars.  There were some marvellous watermelon shows at lunchtime. Thank you!  The gardeners maintain the grounds to a high standard. Especially want to mention animators all, Nader, Gustavo, Leo and all other guys (I am sorry, I do not remember all their names).  Many thanks to Aina as the leader of the animation teamю Without them the holiday would be completely different. There is always entertainment in the hotel thanks to the animation team. From yoga, pilates, dancing, darts, volleyball, archery and much more.  I would especially like to note the evening shows and karaoke. We will definitely return to this hotel!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Very nice hotel, the food is excellent, the environment and the rooms too. Regarding activities, you always have a choice. Perfect animators, they take care of you perfectly, they smile. You can participate in Aqua aerobics, volleyball, water pool, archery, basketball, aerobics in the sun. We felt great here. One of the best holidays. I recommend visiting🌹

Absolutely amazing stay! The hotel was stunning—clean, stylish, and super comfortable—but what truly made our vacation unforgettable was the animation team! They were energetic, friendly, and full of life from morning till night. From fun pool games to lively evening shows, they brought so much joy and laughter to every moment. Huge thanks to the entire staff and especially the animation crew for making us feel so welcome and keeping the good vibes going all day long. Can’t wait to come back!

Great location on the beach, amazing food. The sea is clear, the sand is really soft. The holet has a great animation team, which has shows during the day and activities by the pool, but also shows in the evening. The rooms are big too and everything is clean and the staff is really helpful and friendly. Definitely recommend

The hotel is right in the beach, the rooms are very clean and spacious. The food is diverse and very tasty, and not to mention the entire animation team who had shows every night, and a full program by the pool with diferent activities (archery, water polo, aqua gym, yoga, dancing)! Nit to mention the architecture! Recommending and definitely will be back

What a fabulous  hotel fantastic staff fantastic food .the frist  time we have been here will be booking again to return very soon.thank you all for makeing our holiday fabulous rooms very clean loads  of sunbeds very relaxing round the pool and on the private  beach ⛱️ 😀 😊 👍🏻 xxx

reviews.review_title: Aida is for you, our Diva💟
reviews.review_text: But what an incredible journey The hotel is very well clean The food is varied and very very good I feasted.  And what about the animation, a very special mention for the whole team that accompanied us throughout the stay with their good humor and kindness. They are excellent, for having done a lot of hotel I think it is the best animation I have ever had, dynamic , adorable, activities like Zumba with Gustavo, Archery with Aida and Leo, great.,Aqua Aerobics, Dance court , Cooking court, making cocktails, Volleyball, Waterpolo, Yoga , beautiful, also great shows 💯 Thank you to Mondo who manages everything perfectly and beautifully kind. Really a huge bravo and a huge thank you to the whole team. For the service a huge thank you to Moktar who has been taking care of us all week. Thanks for the room service.  Thank you Sentido Bellevue Park.

reviews.review_title: O club - Sendido Bellevue Park Sousse Tunisia
reviews.review_text: We booked a week in the Sendido Bellevue Park hotel in Sousse in Tunisia with O'voyage, we had a personalized care from our arrival to our departure with two adorable representatives Hamdi and Youssef who participated in our great stay. They came to talk to us every day to find out how we are and if we needed anything. They were even there for our teen while we were on a trip with O'voyage.  We also met the guide Lofti with whom we had the chance to visit the Medina de Sousse (at an extra cost but really worth it, for a very reasonable price), several very interesting excursions are offered by the trip. We will come back for the desert excursion. The hotel and the services announced were there, a magnificent trip to Tunisia. Thank you.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel with a friendly service, good food.
reviews.review_text: We have just returned from a holiday here, I’m already missing the hotel! A really lovely hotel, the poolside and beach are great, there is an amazing waiter called Adam who is brilliant with drinks. The food there is plenty of choice every night , we particularly enjoyed Tunisian night. The animation team are amazing so full of fun and provide lots of activities throughout the day, there are also some excellent shows in the evening. A good all round holiday and we shall definitely come back.

We are very satisfied with our holidays.All the staff without exception was perfect.I fell in love with the animation team - adorable, friendly, talented and very serious young people in their work.We also loved the shows.I loved the one of the animators,which provided me with cheerfulness.🤗🤟🫶

A decent, outstanding hotel with professional staff from management to staff to simple workers to party activists and chefs  Check it out because it’s among the best hotels in Sosa Tunisia and is ideally located  Eaton Tour Tourism and Travel is an Algerian travel agency specializing in tourist Trips, Travel and Travel. If you’re looking for specific information about their services or offers, you can visit their website or contact them directly. Welcome

reviews.review_title: Wonderful Family Holiday – Highly Recommend Sentido Bellevue Park Hotel!
reviews.review_text: We recently stayed at Sentido Bellevue Park Hotel as a couple with a young child, and it was easily one of the best holidays we’ve ever had. From the moment we arrived, the experience was seamless, welcoming, and full of thoughtful touches that made all the difference.  A special and heartfelt thank you to Amine at the front desk, who truly made our stay exceptional. When we first arrived, there was an issue locating our booking, which could have been stressful—but Amine handled everything with such calm professionalism and kindness. Not only did he resolve the issue quickly, but he also upgraded us to a beautiful junior suite, ensuring we were comfortable and happy right from the start.  Throughout our stay, Amine continued to check in on us, always greeting us with a smile and making sure everything was going smoothly. He was incredibly helpful with any questions we had, offered great recommendations, and made us feel genuinely cared for. His warmth, hospitality, and personal attention truly stood out and set a high standard for the rest of the staff. It’s rare to meet someone who takes so much pride in their work—Amine is a real credit to the hotel and played a huge role in making our stay so memorable. Thank you again, Amine—you went above and beyond.  The hotel itself is stunning, spacious, and ideally located right on the beachfront. There’s plenty to do for all ages, and our little one had an absolute blast. The shops inside the hotel were fairly priced, with very friendly shopkeepers, and the Terrace Bar offered a lovely atmosphere where staff would take the time to ask about your day—a nice personal touch.  The animation and entertainment team were also a massive highlight. Full of energy and always engaging, they offered daily activities and fun for both kids and adults. They made a genuine effort to connect with guests, and our child loved them—they made every day exciting and special.  The food was excellent, with plenty of variety, especially for seafood lovers. There were always fresh options for children, plus salads, fruits, meats, and delicious freshly squeezed orange juice every morning. And we have to mention the desserts—they were outstanding! Poolside snacks were also fresh and well-stocked each day.  We really appreciated how attentive the dining staff were, especially when it came to families. Because we had a young child, they always had a highchair ready and waiting for us at each meal. They made dining stress-free and even joyful, with lovely touches like rose petals on the tables, and chefs who always greeted us warmly and checked that we were enjoying our meals.  It’s also worth mentioning that tipping the staff goes a long way. The team works so hard and really appreciates the gesture. We found that a small tip was met with extra attentiveness and kindness—though truthfully, they were already going above and beyond.  Our room was clean, spacious, and comfortable, and the entire hotel was well-maintained and thoughtfully run.  All in all, Sentido Bellevue Park Hotel is a truly fantastic resort. Whether you’re a couple, a family, or traveling solo, this hotel offers a perfect blend of relaxation, fun, and outstanding hospitality. We’re already planning our return—and we’ll definitely be looking out for Amine when we do!

atmosphere was so warm and welcoming, and the staff were incredibly friendly and attentive. From the moment we arrived, I felt right at home. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the amenities were top-notch. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy, friendly environment to stay in. Looking forward to visiting again soon! Big thank you to the wonderful  animation team they went far and beyond to make our holiday memorable ❤️

Wonderful, everything perfect. Friendly staff, all nice. Food tastes good . Service fast and great. There's plenty of choice.  Entertainment program is very good and a lot of variety, good shows also of entertainment.  Again a nice time with my dear Aida 🥰

reviews.review_title: Luxury hotel and brilliant animation team
reviews.review_text: Our vacation at the hotel was fantastic from start to finish! The atmosphere was relaxed and welcoming, and the staff made us feel right at home. The entertainment team was the highlight – always cheerful, engaging, and full of creative ideas to keep everyone entertained. They truly went above and beyond to make each day fun and memorable. We’re already looking forward to coming back!

We had an incredible time at the hotel! The facilities were excellent, the rooms were spotless, and everything was well organized. What stood out the most was the amazing animation team – they brought so much energy, fun, and positivity to every activity. Their passion and friendliness really made our stay special. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience!

name: La Cigale Tabarka Hotel Thalasso Spa & Golf

reviews.review_title: An exceptional stay in a family and warm environment. Congratulations to the whole team for this magical family moment.
reviews.review_text: We would like to warmly congratulate the entire team of the La Cigale complex for the exceptional quality of hospitality, service and atmosphere. The setting is pleasant, respectable and perfectly adapted to families. A huge thank you to Mr. Tarik, whose professionalism, kindness and availability marked our stay. Bravo also to the creative and caring children’s entertainment, and to the restaurant for its tasty and varied dishes. A place where we will happily return

Superb hotel, extraordinary setting, very clean and breakfast very varied and very good. staff at the top, professional and with little care for guests. I highly recommend this beautiful hotel. Go ahead, it's worth it. This is really a 5 star hotel and more...

reviews.review_title: Amazing resort in a Roman enclave of Tabarka
reviews.review_text: As I just checked out of this resort, I would certainly highly recommend for an amazing stay. The resort is impeccable, clean and masterfully decorated and beautifully laid out. Rooms are large and spa is good with variety of spa services. Breakfast is laid out well. Unfortunately it has limited vegetarian options. Only drawback is room service staff lack of English will be a bit of challenge ordering room service. There is coffee in the room but without creamer or milk, once has to pay for  it as room service. For a 5 star resort this I felt of a bit shortcoming on their part.

reviews.review_title: A nice welcome... but a disappointing end of stay
reviews.review_text: I stayed two days solo at the Hotel La Cigale Tabarka. When I arrived, I was pleasantly surprised by the warm welcome of the manager, which immediately put me at ease. The environment is superb and the perfect setting to relax. However, I was a little disappointed by the departure: while the manager had greeted me very well on arrival, he did not even greet me when I left, as if my stay had not counted. Too bad, because a little attention or a simple “I hope your stay went well” would have been enough to end on a positive note. Maybe it’s because I didn’t spend a lot on extras (catering, spa...), which cooled the attitude. It’s still a beautiful place, but this little detail left me with a mixed impression.

reviews.review_title: BEAUTIFUL! MERCI SOUNDOUS! ASMA! OUMAYMA! AYA! RYM! AND AFEF:)
reviews.review_text: The hotel is beautiful, large, and several universes are offered. We had an EXCELLENT time and would have liked to extend our stay. We enjoyed the gym, the pool, the children's playroom — which is a real plus in this hotel (thank you for thinking about it) — the spa for a massage session, the More cafe, the restaurants... Really, it was great. The hotel is always clean and smells wonderful. It is a very, very nice place.  But the real added value to all this is the staff:  “I’ll start with Soundous, the masseuse who gave me a massage at the ballot boxes. She was very professional, took her time and took care of me. His words are beautiful and sweet. She remained very focused throughout the session. Her massage drew tears from my eyes. I had a great time and I would be so happy to see her again when I come back! THANK YOU SOUNDOUS!!  “Then there was Asma, a charming hostess who knew how to listen and meet my needs:). Her investment touched me a lot, and she was able to rely on her colleagues Oumayma, Aya and Rym, who very quickly showed that a real team existed. Really, a BIG THANK YOU TO YOU GIRLS!!! I also hope to see you again during my next visit.  “And then Afef, the animator of the game room. When they heard that they were going to leave permanently, the children began to cry. All they did was claim Afef throughout the stay. These were happy moments for them, and it did us parents great good. Thank you for your investment, your smile and your sweetness.  It would be a great pleasure to see these people so dedicated to their profession, professional, and who remain attentive to the needs of the customers.  The hotel is beautiful, large, clean, and offers a lot of services, but nothing would be possible without these people worth gold. Thank you for who you are, and for your professionalism.  Cons: the restaurant meals are average, but the breakfast is full and delicious, and the service remains great!  Thank you to the whole team! I highly recommend this hotel!!

reviews.review_title: Relax, be pampered and sport in a dreamlike setting.
reviews.review_text: Pure relaxation in beautiful surroundings and with friendly people. The service staff is very nice and helpful throughout. The facilities and layout of the hotel are top. We immediately felt very comfortable and would have liked to stay longer.

Overall the experience was great, I loved everything about the hotel, it felt like everything was very well through of and even the staff they seemed more experienced. We did the duo SPA and it was outstanding I would go to say it was the best spa experience I ever had

reviews.review_title: Hotel and complex very good, staff and service unfortunately disappointing
reviews.review_text: The La Cigale has a beautiful, well-kept complex and also nice rooms. Breakfast could be better in this hotel category. Unfortunately, the staff tries to be a bit more genteel than their most distinguished guests. Since we are quite normal, we would be more happy about a friendly and personal warmth. Compared to other 5 star hotels, such as La Badira in Hammamet, La Cigale lacks a lot. Today we had to recode the room card three times. That's not a bad thing. But that an employee comes to the villa and then tells us to pick up the key at the reception is not worthy of 5 stars. Hotel and facility very good, staff and service unfortunately disappointing. I got to know Tunisian cordiality differently in recent years. I hope I experience that even better in the next two days.

reviews.review_title: Stay away specially if you have kids
reviews.review_text: Stay away from this hotel, specially families , horrible beds mattresses that caused back pain and hours in the emergency. Not clean, cockroaches in the bathroom and they charge you crazy amazing for kids that stay in your room in small smelly rooms

I would like to thank the whole team for their warm welcome and exceptional hospitality. From the moment we arrived, we felt a real attention to the guests, which made our stay even more enjoyable.  A special thank you to Asma, of the guest relationship, whose kindness and professionalism accompanied us throughout our stay. I would also like to express my gratitude to Dr. Anis, who welcomed us kindly at the spa and took care of us with great attention.  A big congratulations to the kitchen team, who regaled us with delicious dishes, as well as to the service and housekeeping staff, whose impeccable work contributed to our comfort.  Thank you again for this unforgettable experience!

I would like to express my gratitude to the whole team of the cicada tabarka for the excellent, impeccable quality of service. My thanks in particular go to Mrs ASMA responsible customer who by her attentiveness listens her kindness her professionalism made our stay most pleasant  Its know-how is most effective in filling any eventuality that may hinder a little of the happiness of its customers  Thank you ma'am and good luck

We stayed at La Cigale for three nights, and everything about our experience, from check-in to check-out, was wonderful. All the staff we encountered were friendly, highly professional, and clearly well-trained, making our stay even more enjoyable. It’s evident that they are carefully selected for their roles.  Our room was comfortable and luxurious. It was impeccably clean, well-equipped with everything we needed, and offered a stunning view of the golf course.  One evening, we ordered room service, and the food was perfectly cooked and absolutely delicious. We didn’t have the opportunity to use the spa, but we did enjoy the swimming pool, which was spotlessly clean and maintained at a lovely temperature.  A special mention to Farid at the breakfast and dinner buffets—he was exceptionally attentive and helpful, adding a personal touch to our dining experience.  We would highly recommend and definitely stay again.

I highly recommend this hotel it is at the top, the staff also ... enjoy the thalasso center and especially the massages, I want to thank Mrs. Sondos who had magic in her hands ...really a professional...thank you very much

Subject: Thank you for staying at the La Cigale Tabarka Hotel  Madam, sir,  I would like to express my sincere thanks to the entire team of the Hotel La Cigale Tabarka for the excellent welcome and quality of service we received during our stay from 03 to 05 February 2025 a group of 60 people   Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed, and throughout our stay we appreciated the professionalism and availability of the staff. Your team has been by our side at all times, ensuring that our experience is as pleasant as possible. This attention to detail and constant attention make all the difference. A special mention to Mr Tarak and the charming and smiling hostesses of the reception, who made our experience even more pleasant by their exceptional welcome and kindness.  We will keep a wonderful memory of our time with you and will not fail to recommend your establishment. Another big thank you to all of you!  Very cordially, ATB FRIENDLY MOHAMED ENNAIFAR

For breakfast it was good but too bad for dinner it was too expensive compared to the food. There’s nothing special, it wasn’t too good.  The staff are too welcoming and kind. And I liked the indoor pool I enjoyed.

The experience was perfect, the establishment fully met our expectations. Despite our quick passage, we hope to have the opportunity to return very soon The room was perfect with a very nice View. I recommend this hotel without hesitation.

reviews.review_title: A hotel that has become rather a good 4*
reviews.review_text: This is the 2nd time we book with family, in this hotel (the 1st time in 02/2022). Between the two visits, the hotel underwent a nice degradation: 1) The hotel seems poorly maintained, quite a lot of wear, imperfections have not been repaired/maintained. Too bad not to take care to keep a certain standing. 2) Wifi does not work, simply, in the rooms (on the 1st). We had to tap and blow up our French 4G packages. 3) The buffet restaurant is not worthy of a 5*. Quite a few stands (grids, etc) are empty, the only new thing is the price which has increased (135 TND for the evening). We revisited the evenings after, same observation. Avoid it. On the other hand, à la carte restaurants (coral and basil), are a better value for money. 4) We recognize a 5* straight away by the quality of the toilet towels that need to be renewed and soft, there they have become dark gray and hard, by passing them by machine, some towels are almost unusable. It's time to change them. 5) Some people at the service are not correct, at the buffet of the BF, a person almost refuses to serve you and he does it with quite a few other customers. Others, when maintaining the room, criticize guests aloud. Finally, we had a mishap, about a request at the restaurant where we were guaranteed a gluten-free product, except that it was not. The after-effects were significant on health and the rest of the stay wasted. It's time to remove a star from this hotel and update it, only to return it later once there's an improvement.

reviews.review_title: Excellent service and exceptional hospitality at La Cigale Tabarka
reviews.review_text: During my business stay with a colleague at the La Cigale Tabarka Hotel Thalasso Spa & Golf, I was impressed by the first-class care and attention to detail.  The rooms were luxurious, spotlessly clean and offered a perfect balance between comfort and functionality. I would particularly like to highlight the hotel manager who not only warmly welcomed us, but also made sure that our wishes were fulfilled. He made it easier for us to access the golf courses and provided us with a personal contact person who was always available for our concerns.  The entire hotel complex, from the Thalasso and Spa areas to the golf courses, is in excellent condition and offers an ideal environment for both business and leisure stays.  A big thank you to the whole team for the professionalism and hospitality. I look forward to coming back soon! A. Bouzid, Düsseldorf

A luxurious hotel with the highest quality service. Everyone was friendly and caring. Really nothing to say. It was a great discovery. We also discovered the city of Tabarka and its surroundings. Good continuation guys.

Rooms 1125 1127 1129 have an unpleasant view so to avoid and opt for the upper floors. Besides I felt that the 1125 and 1127 are not part of the cicada so much all my experiences at the cicada were superb .otherwise everything is impeccable

This is one of my best holidays in this hôtel as it has  been amazing thanks to thé staff. I would like  to thank thé entertainment team especially Didi thanks to her thé children had fun as well as thé adulte. Thanks Didi and all thé animations who work so hard

This is my first time in this hotel and definitely not the last.... Everything has been so great especially the animation team and their vibes specifically Didi who takes care of the kids and adults . I had fun with my partner thanks to the staff and how they have been friendly . Thank you Samira club

It’s the third time I came to Samira club and I met the new animation team. I would definitely recommend meeting mimi and Rio. The staff was really welcoming and friendly and the shows were very entertaining. There’s a variety of food for everybody and the animation team are one of the best I’ve ever met

This was my first time visiting Tunisia.  I travelled with 3 other females. We had a 5 night stay here.  As we are all vegetarians this was a issue as the all inclusive menu was limited for us.  The first day was difficult but once we managed to speak to the restaurant manager he ensured we would have a vegetarian menu.  This was a lovely hotel to stay in and the staff members were very kind to us. The animation team was wonderful and the night entertainment was one of the best I've experienced in comparison to other countries I've visited. Lovely stay and I managed to do  the parasailing which is based at the private hotel beach. The beach is clean and peaceful with only hotel members. We also booked a few excursions such as pirate ship, quad biking and visited the Santorini style sidi  Bou Said about visit was beautiful through the hotel reception team. Lovely hospitality also used the SPA at the hotel. The hotel is very spacious so lots of walking around. The rooms are Tunisian style traditional detail. Very different to where I have stayed in the past but I loved the traditional stay which added to the experience.. wonderful stay..

reviews.review_title: The complete animation team has been swapped
reviews.review_text: Not what it used to be in terms of animation 😔  as I saw, the whole animation team changed which is also okay if it was the feeling of Samira.   we always felt comfortable around the whole day the last holidays and were always very well looked after around the clock by the animation team.  but what I see in the videos now scares me of summer 😔  Having no one left in the team who feels and lives the Samira Club Hotel is not exactly beneficial.   We hope it will not be a disappointment in the summer.   The animation team is the be-all and end-all.   And the animation boss before did it sooooo great !!!  If it's a disappointment, we won't come back to the hotel.

reviews.review_title: Animation currently not convincing // Animation currently not convincing
reviews.review_text: Hello everyone,  I see so many videos right now and I hear so much bad news from the current animation program... I know that with a new season a lot can change.  But I don't see anything better or something that's improved right now. A show usually performed by the entire animation team is currently danced by 2 or 3 people.  I think it's a shame that there's no one on site who knows the program and the heart of the Samira Club.   I just want to draw attention to this once.  I would be sad if the animation is not as good as when I visited last year!   Hello everyone,  I am currently watching so many videos and also hearing so many bad things about the current animation program... I know that a new season can also change a lot.  But I don't see anything better or something that has improved right now. A show that is usually performed by the entire animation team is currently danced by 2 or 3 people.  I think it's a shame that no one is on site who somehow knows the program and the heart of the Samira Club.  I just want to draw attention to this once.  I would be sad if the animation is not as good as on my visit last year!

Vacationed in May 2025 with Samira Club. Very worthy "3": the location of the territory is excellent, 1 - I line by the sea, great clean beach, sand is fantastic! The bungalow accommodation is certainly for the amateur, but I loved it, everything they need is available, cleaning every day, changing towels every day, safe is available. No hairdryer, but you can take it to the reception. Nutrition is varied, you won't stay hungry! The sea, the beach, the pool, everything's great! Terrace and beach bars are open, steak bar is open 24 hours a day. Employees and staff are friendly and very cool guys, to any request immediately reacted and decided when necessary. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay and to restore your physical and emotional health. The atmosphere in the hotel is a separate topic! Great!!!! Everyone who works there creates it, but I want to say something about the animation team. You guys are FIRE!!! Worth only of - for them visit this hotel this season!!!! I work all day, evening and at the pool and the beach... the program has different activities: sports, dance and many, many things, as well as evening programs. Incendiary, friendly, positive, energetic and very beautiful TEAM!!!!! It certainly won't be. Guys, respect for you! You made my rest! Love and hug everyone! Thanks to the Samira Club Hotel and everyone who works at this hotel. You are the BEST!!!! I wish you grateful customers and prosperity! With respect to Natalia (Russia, Siberia, Krasnoyarsk Krai, Lesosibirsk)

Good weather we love Tunisia,our fav country we having fun at the hotel people so nice here the food is good ,and our friend animation the best, they're so friendly and lovely thanks all we love u ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

Tout est formidable les animateurs sont bien courageux bravo 👏 we love the weather and the hotel its à vibe here ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

We love the hotel having fun here the weather is good,we will come always here,the animation so friendly here dancing always love that we love the crazy girl arinaaaa shes so nicee we love the vibe here thankuu all super good🥰🥰🥰🥰😍😍🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰😍😍🥰🥰🥰😘😘🥰😍😘😍😚😍😚😍😚🥰😚😍😚😍😚🥰😚🥰😚🥰😚🥰😚🥰😚🥰😚🥰😚😍😚😍😚😍😘😍😍😘😍😘😍😘😍😚😍😚😍😚😍😚😍😍😚😍😚😍😚😍😚😍😍😚😍😍😚😍😚😍😚😍😚😍😚🥰

Room are good very clean and really good and every day clean and fresh towels eat also very nice and the animation team is top really nice performances and are super friendly people really recommended to go for that price it is really good

Super holiday , i would like to come back again i thank all the staf , and i like intertment team so much , my besty mimi, Ala , ali , gogo , Gaston , fadi , max,,,❤️❤️❤️❤️🫶🫶🫶🫶🫶❤️❤️ so beautiful sea , good food , pool ,bar thank you for all the people and all the service

I'm really very happy for this hotel I like the service in the bar I like my room and the pool it's very nice vacation I like the Tunisia people and I like the animation it's the best here in samira club rely I'm very happy thank you for all the service here thank you ali Ala mimi the best animator I love you all

Our stay at the hotel was exceptionally welcoming by the staff. The rooms were clean though basic... no kettle, fridge or hairdryers. However the hotel was very clean. The staff were very polite, friendly and helpful. The entertainment and bar staff were AMAZING, nothing was too much trouble for them. The food was good quality but repetitive.

The staff doing the entertainment are a fabulous bunch. They were really welcoming and helped us feel very comfortable in the surroundings. We also found them to be exceptionally  , and thank for all the animation Gaston , ala,Ali mimi Rio💓

George had a lovely time mimi was really good with George as he got special need she spend all day with him he had a lovely time thank you all  and  alll staff are lovely,  so good animation so good program,  gaston , gogo , ala ,Ali,  rio , dali  thank you all

Really friendly place gaston and mimi and gogo and the rest place lovely beach close by all team members are good my son is autism there was really good eot him 😀 👍 😊 😄 👌 ❤️ 😀 👍 food not the best for English people but If u aks there with help you going hone tomorrow been a really good week

reviews.review_title: Very good tour offers at attractive prices. The city itself contains interesting places for self-guided tours and walks.
reviews.review_text: Without excess, according to the facts 1. The bungalows are clean, daily cleaning. There are no animals, the linen is clean. There are toiletries besides dental bills and toothpaste. 2. The territory. Well maintained, clean, lots of greenery. There are gazebos on the territory, outdoor recreation areas with soft areas.  3. Kitchen. A large selection of good quality dishes. The meat is amazing. There are no hot drinks at lunch and dinner, but they can be taken in the bar area. 4. Bar. Multiple bar areas. Sufficient choice of drinks and alcohol. 5. Staff. Friendly, friendly, and sociable. They provide assistance immediately upon request. The bartenders and service staff are qualified and respectful. 6. Entertainment. Aqua park, slides in the central pool, stable yard, slot machines, football, volleyball with good fields. There are many interesting activities for children. There are offers for every taste on the beach The animation team is very good. Starting with morning entertainment by the pool and beach area, ending with evening shows. The guys themselves are funny, everything is OK during the

It was a speacel hotel for everything I want to start talking about service reception they work so much 24 hour about restaurants it was good food in morning in the evening in the night really thanks for everyone he working there ... About animation I don't have what I say really is very very good animation in Tunisia they have skills about everything ... I try to come back soon

reviews.review_title: Wonderful world of animation, we had fun from start to finish..I recommend without any problem..
reviews.review_text: Good evening 3rd visit to this hotel Samira club..tjs at the Top every year..especially the animations..really excellent🤪one host in particular...Gaston The best of the best..see you next year..🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩buffet,rooms everything was superb..

Best experience in the best hotel ever !The managers imed and nizar  thanks for the best welcoming and customer care ! Looking forward to come again . Everything went smooth . All the employees there are so professional . I could live there forever hahah !

Terrific 5 star stay! Favorite place we stayed in all of Tunisia. The staff were incredible, the food was delicious, the experiences that created memories for a lifetime. You must do a special dinner at sunset.  Nizar is the best conceirge ever.  We stayed at many hotels in our stay and this was the absolute top! You must go.  My only sad thing is that we didn’t stay longer

We come regularly to the Anantara Tozeur. With each new stay, the experience is incredible and unforgettable. Nizar, Hotel Concierge and conductor of our stay, was perfect as always. A very big thank you to the restaurant manager, the SPA manager and all the staff for their availability, helpfulness and kindness, each contributing to our well-being throughout the weekend. You were wonderful. See you soon.

Amazing experience with my family at Anantara Sahara Tozeur in Tunisia, which far exceeded our expectations. The chef and the entire staff were attentive and professional. Nice and clean rooms.  Special thanks to everyone.

reviews.review_title: The place to stay in Tozeur!
reviews.review_text: The place to stay when in Tozeur because you are in the desert but only 10 minutes away from the airport and the city.  Great facilities! Welcoming and friendly staff! The only downside is that the restaurants are quite expensive.

reviews.review_title: A Perfect Family Getaway – Exceptional Service & Delicious Food! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews.review_text: We had the most wonderful stay at the Anantara Hotel – a true oasis in the desert. From the moment we arrived, the service was impeccable and every staff member went above and beyond to make our family feel welcome.  A special thank you to Chef Badii, whose culinary skills made every meal unforgettable. The food was absolutely delicious – fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. We looked forward to every bite!  Mornings were a treat thanks to the amazing team at the breakfast bar. Amira was an absolute star, kindly keeping our daughter happy with an endless supply of her favorite strawberry juice (we’re still hearing about it!). And Haider deserves a huge thank you for crafting what our son insists were “the best Nutella crepes in the world.” Watching him make them with such care made breakfast feel extra special.  We also want to extend our thanks to Ahmed, who ensured our room was perfect and helped us settle in comfortably. The view of the desert from our room was breathtaking, and everything was spotless – a true reflection of the hotel’s high standards.  May is a great time to go.  It super busy, great weather, and everyone is very attentive.   Thank you, Anantara, for a memorable and relaxing experience. We can’t wait to return!

reviews.review_title: Oasis of pleasure in the desert
reviews.review_text: Splendid resort in the middle of the desert. Beautiful suite with private pool. High class common areas with splendid gardens and superb swimming pools. A very nice spa also and 2 qualitative restaurants. Everything not to leave the resort and good because not much to see in the area except shebika. Guaranteed relaxation. A special mention for the very nice mehlsi chef and for saden who every night reserved us a surprise in the room , including a composition of flowers on our bed for the last evening.  Many thanks to all our very friendly Tunisian hosts. But take care of your environment.  What a sadness to see the ambient filth of this beautiful country.

I would like to share my first experience in Tunisia, specifically at this hotel. Having previously stayed at Anantara The Palm Dubai and Anantara Al Houara, as well as numerous other locations around the world, I was not expecting the staff and food to be as amazing and delicious as they were. I would like to extend my compliments to the chef for being so kind to us and providing excellent service at Anantara Sahara Tozeur. The atmosphere, hospitality, and overall vibe of the place were also exceptional. Thank you to the chef for creating unforgettable memories for us with such exceptional meals.
Everything is perfect, the setting, the hotel, the services, the equipment and especially the staff. Bravo! Keep going!

reviews.review_title: The best in Tunisia, don’t miss it!
reviews.review_text: This is the best 5 star property in Tozeur, Tunisia. The property oozes luxury over a wide space with rooms built for tranquility. Every room has its own porch with garden. Spa is amazing with multiple offerings. Food is amazing and to name one that stands out exceptionally is the Asian restaurant onsite - Mekong. Who knew one can get Asian food in Tunisia that too far removed from Tunis. Breakfast is vast with lots of options.

A magnificent evening spent in love with a meal cooked on site and enhanced by a local musician. This dinner was sublimated by Marwan's service. This signature Anantara experience is to be shared absolutely during your stay.

A just perfect stay and beyond our expectations. A 5* hotel at the gates of the desert where calm is king. The rooms are beautiful and very clean, the staff is very smiling and kind , the service is exceptional, we felt like we were in VIP mode from the moment we arrived. The excursions organized by Nizar we will leave an indelible memory and Saddem knew how to give a very romantic atmosphere to our room each evening.

reviews.review_title: IT WILL BE AN EXCELLENT HOTEL IF THEY TAKE MORE CARE WITH  CLEANING
reviews.review_text: We were looking forward to visiting this hotel, which was said to be wonderful! It really is a beautiful hotel, with spacious and comfortable rooms. Access to the various areas is via small cars, which always arrive quickly. The staff is friendly and the restaurant is wonderfully well-appointed, with a wide variety of dishes for both dinner and breakfast. They set up a place to watch the sunset, which was wonderful! Unfortunately, however, the maid's cleaning service left a lot to be desired. They forgot to put on a shower cap, two bath towels and, what made us believe that cleanliness is not the strong point of this beautiful hotel, they didn't straighten the sheets on the bed!
Nothing to say, best hotel in Tunisia We couldn't hope for better Thanks to the whole team

I would like to thank the whole team for their warm welcome and exceptional hospitality, especially Nizar. All the staff were very attentive. Extremely comfortable room with stunning views of the desert. The establishment fully met our expectations.

Very nice establishment with very nice rooms.  Very attentive staff and little care. Congratulations to the manager for his presence and professionalism.  Superb area with several activities and excursions. Thanks to Nizar for his advice.

The room and cleaning staff have been lovely, but unfortunately the food at the Asian restaurant caused severe food poisoning. I’ve been extremely unwell, vomiting and spending hours in the bathroom, to the point I couldn’t sleep at all. It’s left me feeling anxious about eating anything else during the rest of my stay, which has really impacted the experience.  (We only ate food at the hotel…)  No accountability was taken. The manager said maybe it was an allergy or a sunstroke. Even though I have not been in the sun, because I am not a person who likes to tan at all, I have been drinking consistently water and been in the shade. An allergy would not cause somebody to throw up the entire night and have to spend their whole night on the toilet. The best they could do for me was send a guy to clean up the vomit or offered ‘medication’.   Unfortunately, the overall quality of the food is also quite subpar. In addition to poor customer service.

Lovely stay, food and especially the Kitchen / bbq is excellent.  Badi and Imed were friendly and helpful. Rooms are modern and super clean.  Unfortunately, the kids club is limited. Advantage of our stay is that the weather is summery and the hotel is super quiet.

I would like to share my experience of this trip to Anantara Touzer Hotel “Compliments to the chef! Thank you for making our trip enjoyable Every dish was a true masterpiece—beautifully presented, rich in flavor, and crafted with clear passion and attention to detail. It’s not just a meal, but a memorable culinary experience. Thank you for sharing your talent and elevating our stay!”

An exceptional stay, this hotel is beautiful, clean and quiet. I would like to thank the whole team; starting with the reception, a warm and pleasant welcome thank you to Rabaa, Dorsaf and Nizar , in terms of catering it is a delicious and tasty variety in a chic and refined setting, a huge thank you to Olfa, Amira , Taha and Syhem ...     My stay was extraordinary trying the Magic in the Desert package at the spa, a perfect formula thanks to the fairy hands of Nesrine whom I greet by thanking her for her professionalism.   Really I recommend 10000000000000% this team that made my vacation beautiful and zen at the same time.    Thanks to Jamel the nice Bartender too     Not to mention Saddam for his good attention to decorating the room and the small chocolate on the pillow that makes pleasure.     I tell you soon and I will return with pleasure and especially I would not hesitate to recommend ANANTARA TOZEUR this wonderful hotel.    My extreme satisfaction.   Thanks to the whole team   You're on top

reviews.review_title: The best time way had by us  can't fault a thing.
reviews.review_text: Everything from start to finish of our holiday was fab. Definitely be back maybe September/ October. The staff go out of their way to help you. Our wee Norah how cleaned our room every day was a star always cheerful. It's a  10 out of 10 from me. If anyone has booked enjoy.

Lovely hotel, very friendly staff they can't do enough for you, the food was fab and the Animation team were brilliant. Would definitely go back one day. The pools are lovely it's a little walk to the beach but it has its own bar there. There's lots of things going on by the pool.

Just got back from a week stay with my partner and baby. Our stay was absolutely amazing from start to finish.The entertainment team was brilliant. I got a massage in the spa which was one of the best I’ve had. Food was amazing which I wasn’t expecting from an all inclusive. Booked through Tui and was perfect from start to finish.

I have chosen this hotel because of the spa which I used in the past and liked it a lot. The hotel feels authentic though a bit outdated in some areas with a good service overall.  The people at the restaurant are lovely and serve you well irrespective of whether you tip them or not. I know that it is a big issue in other hotels but not in this one. However, I do recommend leaving some tips as it makes you and the people who provide you with a great service happy.  The food choice was limited but I always managed to have something which I really loved. The hotel had a nice indoor pool as well. My main concern was the constant irritating humming noise which was at the background all the time and it was just impossible to sleep. This noise has something to do with ventilation or old engineering wiring. I spoke to a few other guests and all by one said that they had no any issues with any noise. Though one other guest also reported some noise which was evident when she would go to bed at night. The cleaning and the room itself was wonderful.  All in all  I had really lovely time in this hotel but I have to give it three stars only because of my inability to have a nice sleep there which is extremely important to me when I am on holidays.

reviews.review_title: a beautiful place to recharge and rest
reviews.review_text: This is my 3rd stay, and I am still so thrilled with my stay. A hotel and restaurant staff at the top, a spa team with little treatments A beautiful beach quickly accessible Renovated rooms Responsive reception agents who are anxious to facilitate your stay

We were very excited by the reviews and the score of the hotel. We booked in TUI for May 16 for 7 days. I'll quote the hotel's good and bad points. Excellent staff strive to serve the guest. Very clean common areas in marble and walls in Arabic style. The best the SPA is luxurious with modern whirlpool chambers, sauna, jacuzzi and other excellent quality services in addition to the staff q attend. The food is varied and the pastry part super. Negative points the standard alcoves are small, the balcony also, no air conditioning, towels and sheets do not change them it is time to ask for the change. The bathroom is medium level no toiletries just a soap and a plastic hat, no makeup mirror, the fridge is very old and poorly located, no coffee maker. The bed has 2 small pillows and does not put a bedcover. This is the worst point. The beach is removed from the hotel, it is time to walk along a path, there is no animation on the beach. Regarding the attention if it is true that there is preference for English customers since they are the majority. We were given some of the worst rooms.  Conclusion hotel with specialty for English, senior citizens in the majority. For us a 3 star hotel no more.

One of the best hotels I stayed in the staff absolutely amazing everyone is friendly helpful and professional. Service staff restaurants and bars very friendly and helpful I can name every single one will take ages. Recaption staff very helpful and accommodating. Our house keeping Maysaa was very helpful make sure everything in order last but not least especial thanks from animation team best entertainment team I ever see Chico, Hamouda, Mr bean, Mady, Akram, Chatti, Meryam, Mario. Over all very excellent experience made me feel like home.

We stayed here last week. The hotel is clean and modern with two lovely outdoor pools in well kept gardens. We didn’t use the indoor pool. There are plenty of loungers and it didn’t feel overcrowded. We had a pool view from our balcony, the room was amply sized and immaculately clean. The food was excellent and varied all week, we met the head chef who was lovely and even offered to cook specially for my partner who is gluten intolerant. There were some gluten free options available daily including bread and desserts as well which were kept separate. All of the staff were friendly and polite and the entertainment team were great, engaging but not pushy. Great value for money. We’ll be back.

This is a vast complex with every facility you could desire for a holiday. The check-in was fast and efficient with luggage assitance to your room. Rooms are nice and spacious and well maintained with a good sized TV including UK Channels, Fridge and  a bathroom with fresh towels daily and shampoo, soaps etc.  The hotel has a vast range of facilites including a seawater indoor pool, spa and gym (extra cost) and a selection of indoor and outdoor bars, kids club and outdoor snacks. There is also a private hotel beach with a bar a short walk away. All ther staff are amazingly friendly and greet you when they pass. There is a huge shop in the hotel that has all the stuff you might have forgotten to pack plus a big range of local sovineers. Dining here iis amazing, food is top quality and the selection is vast at all meal times. You can choose  to eat in the dining room or the cafe with waiter service or enjoy a paninni from the pool bar. Soft drinks and coffee are branded products like Coca-Cola and Nescafe but the spririts and beer are local varieties, but not bad!  Every day there are lots of activites organised by the animation team including darts, french bowls, water exercise etc. The animation team are amazing and work really hard to encourage guests to have fun on holiday. Special mention for Mr Bean who does the french bowls and he works hard to make everyone feel comfortable whilst playing the games. This is a Tui hotel and it has to be mentioned that they provide supeb support at the hotel and whilst travelling. My first time in Tunisia but I will return as the security is good, people are friendly and the value for money is excellent. Royal Kenz gets a 9/10 from me overall.

We are here  at the moment and we were here in September 24, tonight we were at the Changinng Ladies show what a wonderful evenings entertainment thankyou to all concerned  for a brilliant night.Over the years we have stayed at the Kenz on many holidays and  it is one of the best hotels we have ever been in.The whole staff from reception to maids go the extra mile to make sure you have a wonderful holiday.We still have another week of  our holiday to go at this special place,great staff,good food,good rooms and entertainment who could ask for anything more.

I have spent an unforgettable week in the hotel , It was an awesome experience, I have really appreciated the place , very clean and with positif Vibes , amazing animation , especially chatti  and amigo , the staff are very professional , the food was very good. Big yes for this hotel

Beautiful hotel, kept very clean and everyone is so welcoming.   Entertainment is amazing. Lovely spa, would highly recommend trying it out. Food was all displayed lovely, especially the cakes. All fresh and tasted good. Room 40 I stayed in. Good location and near everything.  Would defiantly come back and stay.  Thank you for making my holiday great

My experience was unfortunately bad I would like to fix it in the future Reception : Distinction between foreigners and Arabs in treatment and the color of the blankets to discern and even carry luggage while I was with my husband and little girl. For rooms : Not all services as an alien !! An old bed with spots, a white towel quality, and a fresh, blue alien spots. Restaurant : Foreigners are greeted with a smile and service without a request, but the yellow wagon holders are the same and the workers are worried about even the tables in terms of adjustment and the quality of the wagon and knives, so that the water is cold for foreigners and hot for yellow wagons.

reviews.review_title: Not a four star too many little imperfections
reviews.review_text: It was sold as a 4star hotel,in my humble opinion it scrapes a 3star rating First the good points Animation team first class not too pushy but very approachable always with a smile and a kind word.Food fine good variation on occasions in need of reheating.Environment spotless,plenty of sun beds or chairs if required. Both outdoor pools slightly cool,stated heated didn’t feel heated. Room ok beds horrid felt like sleeping on boards.My mains issues were with the drinks,only 1each of local Whiskey.Rum,Gin and Vodka available no other drinks several cocktails not made fresh ,asked for a Bloody Mary but didn’t serve tomato juice once more most 4star hotels would provide these little extras.Second bribe is the glasses no issue with plastic glasses by the pool area but these were small tumblers serving about a third of a pint.In the main area lager served in small half pint glasses again something you would expect in a 3 Star establishment. You could get lager glasses if you asked for them once more you shouldn’t have to ask.My wife visited the Spa and stated it was exceptional she paid 85 Tunsia dnr .In conclusion some aspects suggest a special hotel but overall it’s the minor issues that spoil this hotel ps nighttime entertainment leaves a lot to be desired,for example on bingo night we were charged 20 Tunsia  Dnr (£5)for a sheet of bingo cards ,they must have sold at least 100 three prizes given out for the first game prize T-shirt Prize for second game bag of hotel goodies and for winning the third game a 30 minute massage just not sure what happened to all the money took on the night (2000 Tunsia Dnr (£500) Thus once more does not reflect 4star entertainment Final complaint Tv only 1 English station out of 40+ channels As stated ok hotel but not 4 Star it falters to deceive

I just got back from the Royal Kenz not long ago, and i've never written a review before for a hotel but me, my mum, dad, and boyfriend can safely say they have one of the best entertainment teams ever. Especially Mr Bean, who was a great laugh the whole holiday and made it even better. The hotel itself was beautiful, so much to see and all the flowers around it made it one of the prettiest hotels i've been at. The food was good, they always had a hot dessert that you could watch getting made this could've been crepes, or chocolate fondue, or tiramisu. The desserts were a 10/10 everyday and they had plenty of fruit on offer as well that was all fresh and delicious. I really enjoy the fact they had a different theme for the food each night, one night being a "gala" theme with plenty of alcoholic and nonalcoholic cocktails for you to take on your way into the restaurant! The only small issue we had was with the rooms, no air conditioning is available until June and the rooms are already roasting by May. So to try combat this we would leave the balcony door open, but that resulted in me having more mosquitoes bites than ever before (and my record is 15). Our toilet was also a bit broken, specifically the button to flush it and sometimes the toilet would just flush itself for ages but that wasn't a big issue. The restaurant staff were great, so nice and by the third day knew what drinks you wanted, same with the bartenders especially the ones working at the pool bar who were wonderful. Overall, I would definitely go back here as it was a great experience made even better by the staff which is the reason I wrote this review, thank you Mr Bean for making our holiday what it was!

reviews.review_title: The entire team of TUI SUNEO ROYAL KENZ
reviews.review_text: Hotel perfect excellent reception team Mohamed .Imed ... Very welcoming smiling excellent 🕺  The food super good impeccable room So no children to run everywhere and scream, so calm found. This is my first experience at this hotel and it was really excellent.

Excellent hotel, excellent restaurant, excellent staff, excellent amenities, excellent room,  We had the best week ever. The hotel was absolutely spotless, the staff very friendly & extremely polite. The view from our room was lovely. A 5 minute walk to our own private beach.  I can’t the hotel in anyway. Absolutely brilliant. We will definitely be going back.

Very attentive and friendly welcome! The staff is non-stop to the small care ... The Thalasso center is wonderful and divine care ... I had the care of the nurse and the doctor, having been ill, the care was quick and effective ... Meals come with lots of choices for everyone! I had my hair done, it was also impeccable... The location of the hotel is close to interesting local shops... What else can I say? Everything has been positive and look forward to coming back for a week of real relaxation!  Thank you for everything!

Absolutely brilliant stay at this wonderful hotel.  Can't fault anything, the hotel is spotless (our room was really well maintained), the food was th best I've had at an all inclusive,  and the staff were exceptional.   The gardens are lovely and the private bit of beach with the bar and toilet facilities is great.   Will be booking to come back next year and can't wait!!

Unfortunately, the quality of service at the hotel leaves much to be desired, especially towards Arab guests. Foreign nationals seem to enjoy privileged treatment at all levels, even though all customers pay the same rates. When we express our dissatisfaction, the front desk staff show indifference and adopt a mocking attitude towards guests.

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel but improvement to give ...
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel, lovely and kind staff but not insignificant; the restaurant lacks fantasy, buffet rich in fresh vegetables, variety and presentation. Room service poor for this category of hotel.  Thank you for the welcome.

reviews.review_title: Luxury Hotel and Thalasso on Top
reviews.review_text: Spacious and luxurious room , refined decoration, beautiful marble and mosaic bathroom , worthy of a palace .  In addition, superb terrace with open views of gardens and sea.  I particularly appreciated the quality of the restaurant: refined fish dishes, Tunisian pastries... I will keep an excellent memory of the personalized welcome of the hotel guests , the involvement of the staff, attentive and diligent servers , managers attentive to the smallest detail and who ensure the satisfaction of the guests .  The maids do a neat job (thanks to Mrs. Ismahene attentive to every detail).  I will probably return to this establishment mainly because of the exceptional services in Thalasso (unforgettable massages by Mr. Salah , extremely gifted and professional and which contribute to the excellent reputation of this thalasso center as the best in Djerba.

reviews.review_title: An ideal week for well-being and rest
reviews.review_text: I return after a warm and very good stay of a week.  A total rest , a superb setting (outdoor interior) . All the staff is extremely kind .Whether at the reception (reception ), at the restaurants , at the bar, the cleaning service of the suites and the maintenance , all provide an efficient service of quality . Thanks to them!  In short , the Hasdrubal Prestige contributes to the reputation of Djerba called "Djerba the Sweet"

Superb and personal hotel of absolute kindness. The rooms are really luxurious if we ignore the small maintenance details not carried out.  On the other hand, unfortunately, freezing room with barely 18.5 ° despite heating (totally inefficient reversible air conditioning) at most, . Taking advantage of it naked is simply not possible. An extra radiator was put in the bathroom to allow us to use it (we usually shower naked 😄). We will not come back again at this time of year, for sure, because our pleasure is wasted... And as the payment of the stay is made upon arrival, impossible to shorten the latter 😒

Great location excellent friendly and professional staff only small catch is the feed there is progress to be made and above all it would be necessary that the waiters respect the orders   Close to the casino  Golf by taxi or hotel driver

reviews.review_title: Hotel to avoid, despite very good care at the thalasso.
reviews.review_text: The worst thing for me (if he had a flight home I would probably have interrupted my stay): what some call "music", namely a sequence of rare notes without soul, without character, repeated every minute, what I say, every 30 seconds, for hours, every day the same. And impossible to escape, I could hear them from the balcony, in some parts of the park, during breakfast, during treatments... and even at the Moorish cafe! There were only in the "administrative" parts, reception for example, where one could escape. It was to the point that I woke up in the morning to hear those notes in my head. For me unbearable. This music seems to be a problem for the staff: during the treatment, when I asked to turn off the speaker in the room to hear only what was coming from the hallway, the person concerned would tell me either that he had not heard these sounds, or harsher words like "it breaks my head" (sic).  There are also some shortcomings on the part of the staff, shortcomings are difficult to understand in a hotel of this category, in particular: •	personnel who walk into the room at great strides without announcing themselves, which happened 3 times while I was in the room and which must have happened also in my absence. You can imagine the embarrassment of being half naked in front of a lady. •	at the reception, where requests are properly received, but without more, followed by broken promises, twice out of three; an example: since my robe has been removed without being replaced and there is no cleaning lady in the corridors, the reception, to which I have indicated that I will have treatment in less than an hour, told me that the necessary action will be taken immediately. Now 10 minutes before the treatment, nothing; I then decided to go around the building, finally coming across a charming person who helped me. When I returned from the care, there was still no bathrobe...  •	at breakfast the services are systematically removed as soon as they are served again, without the managers wondering if the customer will still need them, so without thinking about either leaving them or replacing them.  I still want to point out that the care was very good and the staff generally friendly and smiling, except at the reception, except for the very friendly person who received me on arrival.

Not worth the 5 stars awarded. You should think about renovating the furniture of the rooms but even more to dust them (being allergic, I digested well from my arrival). I understand that we are out of season, but good from there to close everything except the lobby bar.. Very average catering, it was necessary to announce to your customers that dinner would be served in the à la carte restaurant (1 starter, 1 course, 1 dessert) instead of the buffet before collecting the Half Board fee, something that is a scam in my humble opinion. Caring staff despite the austerity measures imposed.

Nice hotel with beautiful gardens and beautiful outdoor pools, but aging on some services. Great very nice suite with terrace but used bedding and despite our request to change it, nothing was done. Coverage provided stained. Problem with the use of the TV, which worked very badly (complicated channel change and awful sound). Thalasso very well with a great staff welcome. In the off season, not all restaurants are open.

reviews.review_title: Very good hotel for thalassotherapy, catering to improve
reviews.review_text: Excellent Thalasso treatments, competent and friendly staff, a large indoor seawater pool with magnificent hydrotherapy.  Outdoor swimming pool also top, beach that unfortunately lacks maintenance despite the staff who go to great lengths to settle us well.  Beautiful room, great spaces, impeccable services and cleanliness. Very quiet place.  Catering, the weak point, promise of five restaurants when in reality only one is open for lunch and another for dinner. Besides, the cuisine lacks flavor. Decent breakfast.  Perhaps we should go to this hotel in high season, we felt that some services were suspended.

Exceptional service room sound top personal very welcoming and warm  Cleanliness small note for the service of MR Abdel Waheb with Anoir who prepared us superb cocktails and incredible kindness thank you very much

Loyal customer of the 5* djerbian hotel from 2006 to 2018, after long stays at the Hasdrubal d'Hammamet from 2019 to 2024, including during COVID, I return with pleasure to the Hasdrubal Prestige to find and find:  - great comfort, calm and serenity - select clientele with a large European majority, respecting the Dress code of this magnificent 5* - exceptional thalassotherapy center, the best I know in Tunisia - the many outdoor swimming pools in freshwater, seawater and thermal water, in the form of independent lagoons - a general management and a reception desk ✌️ -a restoration 👍  An excellent stay at all levels; definitely the next 👏

We stayed with my girlfriend for 8 days at this Pension. I highly recommend if you want to be tempted by several Things to do. You will be served by lotfi in the Inn and it is raouf who will take care of you to accompany you and make the most beautiful walks on djerba! So we were able to do quad biking, horse-drawn carriage, camel horse, desert visit,... we will keep all these images in our heads forever! A pleasant experience with people in gold! You can trust them with your eyes closed!

We stayed 8 days at this Inn, we did Things to do with a gentleman named RAHOUF and LOTFI perfect nothing to say! We were strolled, visit the desert, quad, camel, carriage,...! It was just perfect I Trip Tip this gentleman if you have the opportunity to do it with him nice and super nice I highly recommend!! ☺️

Back from a new stay at this Pension. My review is still as positive.  The staff is very attentive, everything is done for your well-being. I always Rating the extreme kindness .. of all the reception staff (olfa, Alia , Adel ) at the restaurant (Ali Houcine Sabri Hassem Mehdi  Some health concerns and I was able to find from all the necessary comfort and availability of staff. I have benefited from treatment doctor , clinic nearby .. Bravo for the beachgoers and those of the security of the place .!!!!and Anouar ...always impeccable, efficient and smiling!   At this time, quite a lot of people at the hotel; despite this, the calm, the  tranquility reigned there. Improvements to note .... at breakfast ..at the beach ..  Congratulations also for the thalassotherapy care ... competence , benevolence: a very beneficial moment! Anyway, I just think about going back!

three weeks dream....I know this hotel since it opened in 2008. We go twice a year to meet our friends who receive us as if we were family. I would just like to thank all the employees who made our vacation 3 weeks of happiness. at reception: Olfa,Alia,Adel Ali. the boy to young: Hassem Ali. At dinner: Sabri  at the beach: Anouar, Chadi.  My friend Djamel the king of restaurants  and especially Raouf the general manager always present and who even this little world like a conductor. the beach is beautiful the garden and the indoor seawater pools are beautifully maintained. I would give special mention to the thalassotherapy and its surprising indoor pool supervised by Mrs. Rhim and her competent staff.  We have only one wish to return as soon as possible to this little paradise.

Since our last stay in 2022, we have seen a lot of improvements: beautiful breakfast buffet with a huge choice of breads, juices, pastries, Tunisian pastries, cold cuts, cheeses. Orange juice is always pressed on request as well as the preparation of pancakes, Tunisian donuts, various egg recipes.  A lady bakes Tunisian bread. To note the superb maintenance of the beach and congratulations to Chadi, the beach attendant, who is in the care of the residents. The garden is beautifully maintained. All the staff is always as pleasant and dedicated. R. LAMBERT

Thank you to the entire Hasdrubal Prestige team. Second visit and always as pleasant. I would like to thank Adel, Alia and Olfa, as well as all the other staff. This Inn is a luxurious nugget: you feel peace and tranquility. The service is impeccable, as well as the maintenance of the rooms, not to mention cleanliness. The Breakfast buffet is a must. Thank you very much for this extraordinary stay.

Everything to our complete satisfaction, a very warm service staff.... Above all the pool bar, thanks to Abdel, who can read every wish from our eyes. Our grandmother enjoyed every second with the restaurant staff as well as Abdel us camel.... Thank you very much, we will see you again soon🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏Ichalla

a hotel that I do not recommend at all, the management, the lack of responsiveness on the part of the management are a shame!!! I don't know who they think they are, but one thing is for sure, they don't deserve to work in the hotel business. For a 5 star they should learn what customer service is.

3rd stay in this magnificent establishment, clean and spacious room, large well maintained pools. The only point to highlight is the gym, no equipment and leave to abandon..  special mention to Ali and Olfa at the reception

An all round lovely stay at Alhambra Thalasso. The staff were all amazingly friendly, kind and welcoming. The hotel itself, whilst not brand new, was beautiful and well kept. The rooms were spacious and cleaned every day, fresh linen and towels were appreciated.  The buffet restaurant catered for a number of tastes, but could have a little more variety. The waiters were excellent!  The drinks served on all inclusive were tasty and plentiful, and the barmen never skimped on alcohol measures.  The weather was perfect and is a huge selling point to go to visit Tunisia.  The only thing I would mention is that the hotel is further away from the centre of Hammamet than you may think, so keep that in mind if you’re aiming to visit the town.  Thank you for a lovely holiday, from Will and Jess.

Very pleasant spacious room and especially a big thank you to the fram team for their responsiveness and kindness. At the reception Leila is charming and professional at the top really, not forgetting all the hotel staff. Very nice experience to renew

reviews.review_title: Good stay but poorly maintained hotel
reviews.review_text: Good stay overall but does not deserve at all its 5 stars hotel aging especially for the rooms carpeted corridors etc, see obsolete for the thalasso part too bad because the team is great! Tonight the director the salesman or the people who performed the care.   There was also Myriam for the henna so nice and beautiful gifted what she did to us with my friend. Thanks again!   Catering was good homemade just it lacked fruit at that time.   All the staff was friendly and welcoming especially the friendly entertainment team not insistent and invested.  Special mention for Adel at the pool too kind and attentive with everyone anticipated every need really top!   Thank you for the stay which was still good but a little refreshment would improve the feeling

A big thank you to the entire Fram animation team as well as the center manager. Team at the top, always smiling and good mood. Various and varied activities on the programme. They're amazing. Little nod to the very welcoming hotel staff I recommend this hotel club😎

A memorable personal stay with little care we feast in the restaurant there is choice the rooms are superb and thanks to the team Fram mimi Mario pikachu   They made the amazing stay always available and smiling I highly recommend this beautiful beachfront hotel
Hotel friendly  Very clean room  Friendly and warm atmosphere with a lovely team of animators and a special affinity with willy and pikachu  The main buffet is quite correct and the staff is helpful.

First time in Tunisia and very satisfied with the setting, hotel and services offered. From the reception to the restaurant or shop staff without forgetting the animators always to the little care always a nice word by the way, excellent stay I recommend 100%

Great hotel with a good entertainment team (rio mario willy pikachu mimi....) bar very nice authentic restaurant with beautiful discoveries and waiters with great care. Welcoming hotel with leila and the rest of the reception team who will be caring for you. The thalasso on top to relax well. Great stay at this hotel.

A pleasant hotel to stay both for its setting and for the entertainment team.  A team with little care for us, helpful staff, always welcoming with good advice and lots of smiles  An animation team at the top, thank you to all the animation team for their welcome, their good mood, the various activities and evenings offered. A top team with lots of energy, guaranteed laughter  The thalasso was really happy for my spouse and I, a real moment of relaxation  A big thank you for his quality holidays

reviews.review_title: First stay in Tunisia in the Alhambra
reviews.review_text: Top Alhambra thank you to all the team ultra pleasant, first stay in Tunisia to discover the country.  The animation team is at the top thank you for these good times  I discovered the Tunisian dishes also really good there is everything you need at the buffet, the service is very good also.  There is everything you need in this hotel to have a great time.

Great team, beautiful and clean hotel, superb corner! The welcome is very good, the buffet has lots of choice and quality,  with local or traditional. Animations are great. I recommend, everyone is friendly, friendly and with little care! 🤩🤩🤩

Great relaxing stay. The thalasso center has perfectly met our expectations, the treatments are carried out by a team of real professionals. Excellent cuisine and no complaints about the different services. The hotel deserves to be renovated but the comfort is there. Choukrane

First stay with FRAM, pleasantly surprised, everything went very well! The animation team is very present and friendly (thanks to Rio, Pikatchu and Willy).  The hotel, certainly a little aging, is very nice. Our sea view room was spacious. The buffet meals were good. A small downside on desserts that were not up to par and very repetitive. Too bad not to put oriental pastry..   The staff of the hotel (reception, dining room, swimming pool) is school and pleasant.  Small black dot, for my part, on cocktails that are made by machine and served in plastic glasses. I didn't find them good.  I will be back with my mom with pleasure!

reviews.review_title: Hotel of size and human warmth
reviews.review_text: Departed for our honeymoon all the staff was at our care. A week of complete relaxation with teams as much entertainment ( pikachu , Mimi, Willy and the dj😍), as catering , from, welcome (a special mention to Taha 💐), swimming pool, thalasso ( ALL L: TEAM) really adorable! We loved our week! Thank you 👌🙏 we did not make any excursions on site and took full advantage of the thalasso so no opinion on the excursions ☺️

Old but beautiful hotel, very nice staff, animator at the top it raises a little the week.   Poor catering always the same, I have never experienced this.  Bath too high.  Little choice, always serve the same strawberries cupcake,   Purée fries rice brief tjs few choices for children.  No slide.the dirty beach we went there once horrible. False advertising however it is 4 times in Tunisia but the .....

Currently on holiday at Alhambra hotel. I had emailed to ask for a pool view room but we weren’t allocated one. We have a large room though but no balcony which is a bit disappointing. The room is clean, the beds are comfy but it’s basic. Air conditioning isn’t working until June !  Food- there’s a good selection of food available at breakfast, lunch and dinner but no snacks available in between. It would be nice to see the pool bar open for drinks and snacks.  Entertainment- it’s a small animation team who are all friendly and provide activities all day and in the evening. A special shout out to Pikachu and Willy who made our holiday really special. We loved the aqua gym in the morning and their friendliness and enthusiasm.  Staff-Also a special shout to Adel who always found us a sun bed and looked after us bringing towels, pillows, tables, cushions etc. All the staff were super friendly in the hotel, they remembered our names and welcomed us every time they saw us.   We walked to the beach one day but nothing was open and it was dirty and uncared for with no staff and no sign that it had been open at all.   The staff really made this a special holiday for us. Get involved in activities and enjoy all the hotel has to offer.   Pikachu, Willy and Adel you were amazing and we’d return just to see you!!!! 🤩🤩🤩

Very nice hotel. Staff and the animation team are lovely and funny. Drinks are delicious and the food is very good. Reception is very accommodating and willing to help with anything. Lots of good activities to do and nice shops with friendly people. Animation team are very enthusiastic and make every day funny. Would recommend to everyone.

Very nice place very nice hotel equips great food services very friendly helpful always smiling the team of awesome fram animation did not change anything very good animation always smiling nice people meet during our trip regarding the cleaning of the rooms is not terrible a little better do I think.we will come back to it hesitation.

Very nice hotel😍 very welcome😍, the animation team with fram at the top with pikatu, Mario , Willy, Rio, Mimi 😍😍👌👌👌👌. Excellent food😍👌👌👌👌. Disappointed with the cleaning of the rooms 😩😩😩.  Great location close to the city and the beach. Taxi available at any time of day

An animation team at the top I feasted with pikachu Willy mario mago mimi and chef rio they set the mood and are there to help us integrate without counting on the bartenders who are at the top and also Adèl the lifeguard who is always there for us and also I do not forget the reception who react well to all what we ask without forgetting also the housekeeper and the people who maintain the hotel big kisses to all❤️🧡🥰

The hotel where I had the opportunity to spend my vacation made a huge impression on me in many ways. From the very first day, you could feel the friendly atmosphere and the professional attitude of the entire staff. The service was incredibly kind and helpful – no matter the time of day, you could always count on a smile and a quick solution to any problem. I can’t forget about the animators. These are passionate, energetic people who organized fun and engaging activities for both kids and adults every day. Thanks to them, boredom was simply not an option. The hotel truly met all my expectations, and I would gladly go back there again.
