I like Italian restaurant,waitress was so good name is Firas. He is excellent. Also in reception name is Islam booking for the restaurant. She is a lovely girl. She is helpful. Pool and water park perfect, clean area. All state very helpful. Safe holtel.  The itertiment group is very good.  Foods for kids is not good, cheese for pizza wasn't good, chicken nuggets some days, some food like pasta tomato souse for kids was hot.  Tissue and ligut soup for the hand was it was not in the room. Also for some parents has kids who need hot water in the room is was not electric kettle.

Great time here animation team don’t stop working to keep you all entertained. Rooms are ok, food is the same but what you expect for a cheap holiday in the sun.  Lots of lifeguards to keep kids safe. Has own beach so you don’t need to leave.  ❤️❤️❤️

Hotel was absolutely beautiful.Clean and a lot of space.all staff were friendly,animation team ,lifeguards and waiters .would like to personnaly thank Firase in the libanais restaurant who was  soo professional and made our dinner very special . The whole holiday was perfect from start to finish .
The best hotel in Tunisia and animation is top tier !!and the eat it’s good . The room clean and good .😍😍🥰🥰🥰🥰😘🥰🥰😍😍😍😍😍❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰
I visited hotel thalassa everything is nice, and the animation especially yaya🩷🩷🩷🩷❤️🩷💕💕🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🫶🫶🫶🫶🫶😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍🫶🫶🫶🫶😍💕❤️🩷❤️🩷❤️❤️❤️🩷🩷❤️❤️🩷💕😘😘💕❤️🩷💕💕💕🩷😘💕🩷😘😘😘

reviews.review_title: Good animation. I’m feeling very happy here. It’s interesting and funny!
reviews.review_text: The hotel is very good. Food is delicious and animation is brilliant! I had got very good moments with animation lio . We play a lot of kind of games like water aerobic, dartboard and more interesting games. Every night had got a programs and everything were perfect.

Super hotel  Fantastic time it's a lovely hotel I will definitely recommend it to anyone the rooms food stuff and most importantly at night 'the animators are full of energy and very sweet with the children and always ready to help  Top top top hotel I highly recommend ♥️🌹❤️

I had an exceptional stay with my family and friends all been top and lives up to our expectations of good food and room service and a special mention to all the animation team and chef who made our holiday more pleasant and unforgettable ❣️

Great stay at this hotel 🌅 The animation team is amazing. Joy and good humor are waiting for you. The rooms are modern and spacious and comfortable 😍 Excellent food. The staff very friendly and smiling and helpful  Hotel very clean  Special mention to the waiter who runs the Moorish coffee which is very warm prepares good shisha and green tea 😍

Stay top with the animation team lots of atmosphere  The hosts very nice ́ evenings very friendly 😍🥰 Very large hotel lots of choices different restaurants  The dishes are varied  Clean swimming pool nice view 🥰 the beach 🏖️

Pleasant stay at the hotel thalassa 🥰😍 Many thanks to all the animation team  The animators very friendly and smiling 😀 a good hotel  Clean swimming pool 😍 The dishes are delicious many choices of Lebanese dishes ‘ Tunisian  Helpful staff

Great stay 👌 Thank you very much all the animation team  Very interesting sports activities (petanque 'aerobic ' gymnastics  Well-organized shows  Thank you for the very warm welcome  The rooms Very clean 👍 and pretty decor  The very varied diet is delicious especially the Tunisian plas ❤️🎈 I am very happy  A bientôt thalassa ❤️

Enjoyable stay  Really thank you for the very warm welcome 🥹 A good hotel clean rooms  Large swimming pools and with te beauggan  😍😍😍 The very varied diet is delicious  A big thank you for the animation team  The animators very friendly and smiling 😀

A great stay in thalassa, nice hotel , Good weather  And especially all the entertainment team at the top very friendly sports activities  Pool very clean , the dishes are very varied  Animation for children very pleasant ❤️🥰 A bientôt thalassa 🥰🥰

Magnificent stay, warm welcome, the hotel is very well maintained rooms are clean staff and impeccable service. A big thank you for the animation team that brightened our stay and made it very pleasant.

As soon as we arrived we were treated like royalty, the service is always at the top. The kindness of most of the staff and especially the maids your attentive, at the level of animation nothing to say toppppp• the servers nice, swimming pool and clean, very nice with large comfortable bed, very good varied buffet for all tastes we recommend it for our friends and family very soon

I stayed at the Thalasso Sousse hotel and I must say that the experience was extremely disappointing. From the moment we arrived, the welcome was cold and impersonal, without any effort to make us comfortable.  The food was far below expectations for a hotel of this category: few choices, poor quality, and often served lukewarm. The worst part was witnessing the boss’ behaviour towards his own staff. In front of customers, he allowed himself humiliating remarks and a totally inappropriate authoritarian tone – an awkward and shocking scene.  As for the rooms, they were in catastrophic condition: questionable cleanliness, defective equipment, uncomfortable bedding, and a strong smell of moisture. Clearly, the establishment needs serious renovations and a complete rethinking of its management.  I definitely do not recommend this hotel, either for a relaxing or professional stay. There is much better in Sousse for the same price, with true respect for the customer and staff.

Pros: location, beach, good sea, sand and not deep. Territory and food . Opportunity to visit the spa treatments and thalasso center. It's a swanky water park for kids. It is not difficult to travel around the city by taxi or on foot, either for sightseeing or shopping. There is a place to walk. Hotel rooms are standard. Cons: when they take the towels when cleaning, they don't always return them soon. There are no refrigerators in the rooms. They're brought in on request, if you have to and for a fee. I recommend not cranky tourists who do not want to overpay for holidays.

I just come with my kids and all rest family we really had enjoyed the time in this hotel the food was amazing and the hotel clean,  we loved this beautiful hotel and we have a lot of fun with entertainment,  they make us happy and our kids too so happy , the all day they do a lot of activities and every night they make lovely Show , we really need thanks them s lot and special to Mr Madi Aymen that he have a of attention and organization with his Job that make this amazing entertainment do them best ... We hope to meet all staff next year ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

Very nice place and a nice environment. The program and the animators are excellent. I can not complain ,even the food there is good especially for difficult eaters. There is a direct path to the beautiful beach. All in one hotel,animators,landscape is 1A.

Unforgettable week..for the first time, we will go back, that's for sure, and in this ryad. Everything was perfect, impeccable cleanliness, varied and delicious meals, but especially a ryad on a human scale with a fantastic atmosphere thanks to the animation team. The animators are super nice, with an overflowing energy and leave no one alone.In barely 24 hours, they know our first names and know how to lead us into great games creating convivial moments between holidaymakers. We were even able to make friends thanks to them. All the staff is super, helpful and helpful. The pool and proximity to the beach make it a perfect place for a great holiday.

reviews.review_title: BEWARE Hotel Meninx, Djerba , Tunisia CLOSED
reviews.review_text: BEWARE  Hotel Meninx Djerba, Tunisa,was closed last week 14-21 Jan.  We were booked for it through Loveholidays and were not informed of it by either Loveholidays or the hotel.  Friends and I were shocked and panicked when we arrived late evening. We didn't know where to go or who to contact.  Loveholidays had an emergency phone number but it was useless as I only bought a data sim and couldn't make calls.   Thanks to our wonderful driver from the local taxi firm KBCar, who found out we were transferred to another hotel nearby. He then took us there free of charge.   So if you are booked for it is the next few weeks double check before you leave for your trip that it has reopened. Didn't want to give any stars but had to give one in order to post this review.

reviews.review_title: Hotel Meninx and world tourism to flee
reviews.review_text: Very dirty hotel with according to world tourism impeccable hygiene standards  Multiple bites of bedbugs or fleas I don't know; diarrhea  Unbearable smell in the bathroom because the flow of  Sanitary dirty and the word is weak when arriving  Worldwide tourism photos in support calls me a liar and supports the hotel staff who I confirm are present and pleasant but not professional  The TV never worked despite several passages by the “technicians”

reviews.review_title: Very nice experience, we have never known such a beautiful animation. We'll come back to that, that's for sure.

Note Well deserved. Especially a big thank you to the animation team. Great and makes our stay very pleasant. Tjrs present to please us.  Bravo and THANK YOU. We'll come back mostly for you. Clean hotel. Nice staff. Thank you.

Great entertainment!  The team is on top!!! Very welcoming. The hotel is large , with three swimming pools, one with slides. Near Midoun. Some shops, Spa, cafe,   pharmacy etc... 15 minutes walk.  Some flaws of the hotel, but does not interfere in any way with the stay.  Bis to the team 😘 Mila 🌞

The stay was at the top, the hotel I highly recommend, the staff is very nice and at the small care of the guests. The buffet top very varied, with Tunisian specialties but also more “soft” things, the hotel rooms correspond to the description, I recommend!

reviews.review_text: Top hotel, staff and animators very welcoming and with little care.  Very good buffet. The rooms are basic but clean. Hotel 5 minutes from the beach and close to all activities. I highly recommend, leaving in November allows calm, we loved it!

Great stay at this property ❤️ the animators are top!!!! The spaces, services, rooms, restaurant everything is great!  Exceptional encounters, we've been in care all week. Thank you all we will come back 👌👌

The animators all super nice with all kinds of activities superb well liked pétanque with Alvares the dance evenings nothing wrong very good atmosphere contacts him animators with the clientele and great do not hesitate to pick us up to go on the dance floor you have a great team good for that we return regularly to your hotel

Great animators nothing to complain always present for the customers we will come back next year with the whole family c is on animation at the top we had a good time in addition the sun was at the rendezvous as usual obviously thank you very much for this week in your company

Very good hotel, I recommend  Good food, great comfort and a very good entertainment team. I highly recommend this hotel  Lots of activity around the hotel and the sea is not even 100 meters away.  We had a great family holiday!!

Very friendly hotel, animator at the top! Cleanliness nothing to say! And the staff and very attentive and responsive in case of problems! A small shop is available for souvenirs at very affordable prices! I recommend this hotel!!!

Mosquitoes galore with 3 children. All filled with blood at least 20 kills a day. Smells of sewage that attract them... a lot of kids are antibiotics because of mosquitoes. Photos on supports.  Reimbursement of sheets at 25 euros supposed to have come from Italy while for a mediocre hotel we suspect that it comes from Tunis at max 5 euros .. and besides they were yellow because obsolete.  You have to pay 10 euros to have a towel and 1 turkey to have it cleaned. Very petty protocol. I think that's how it is in most hotels, guests are there to pay only.  I was lied about the mini club being said from 3 years old and arrive there I receive an email to tell me that no it is 4 years. Good because the animator tired of the day before shows videos on mobile to children.  See photo 📷  Music at the bottom until midnight windows that move so loud the bass are. We had to change our room to repack five bags without any help.  Here's to our vacation. Fortunately the sun was there as well as the sea.

First I would like to say that I love this hotel so read the review instead of the title.  I come to this hotel since 2018 I always found a great atmosphere but this year I was a little disappointed there are two hotels there is the meninx near the beach and there is the Riad meninx a little further away. the two hotels are connected the Meninx has a more lively atmosphere with most of the entertainment team and the Riad is a quieter and more relaxing hotel.  I was settled in Riyadh but I often went to spend my days at the meninx in relation to animation.  Let's start with the positives I found this year at the reception it was perfect and nickel I was very well received by the receptionist the same day I arrived and with mint tea each time I showed up at the reception or each time I had a problem there was a positive reaction from this service there in a quarter of an hour my problem was solved it was perfect, it was nickel,  at the household level it was perfect the housekeeper was discreet I never saw her the housekeeping was perfect the housekeeping was done I had nothing wrong everything was nicke it was perfect,  at the level of the restaurant there I had nothing to complain about I could always find what I wanted to eat whether for dessert or dish of resistance as they say, the waiter always had a kind word no more or less as they say and he always knew what we drank as a drink nothing to complain about at that level in addition the person responsible for the restaurant spent every day either at lunch or in the evening taking a walk in the restaurant to see if everything went well at the customers were satisfied it was perfect at this level, let's now move on to the level of animation so two hotels so two entertainment teams. The animation in this hotel has always been the highlight of this hotel it was always great I never had anything wrong with it but this year it was completely different.  we'll go first through the positives the positives in terms of animation the shows are always there the cabaret dance shows were great , the halloween decor perfect, the couples game show perfect the animator Ahouse had a quirky humor and well placed as they say that passed very well it was a humor without mockery compared to the customer, it was perfect a lot of laughter and joy.Now by the animators the manager of the Riad Ahouse always had a kind word always said hello every morning and was of a discretion no more or less Ghali perfect always smiling nothing wrong at this level, Lariss always very good dancer me who knew him when he arrived in May June 2022 what evolution for this animator always a kind word always smiling nothing wrong  Regarding the intern Kimo and Zizou always nice always smiling and a little bit joker at times but it went very well. All these facilitators I just appointed speak with all the clients without exception  However, for the rest of the animation that I will not name, they will recognize each other. I've been extremely disappointed me who's been here for 6 years I don't want to be the exception but all the customers pay the same service so we all have to have the same service.  I notice that some facilitators never say hello it's a lack of respect for the customer.  When we work with clients, the minimum is morning morning. I don't ask for communication every day.  Besides, I usually play pétanque and this year no animator has come to rest me to play pétanque and I do not understand  Not why.  Did this activity disappear from the club? I had darts, aqua aerobics and gym. For dj Alex , it would be nice if he had several playlists because when we come to every night we know the playlist by heart of the music and the list by heart so it's a little awkward. regarding the other animators as I said I don't want to name them they will recognize themselves there was a total indifference and I don't know why usually me when I come I say hello They come to talk to me nothing at all inexistence I know that it's the end of the season I know that everyone is tired so why some amateurs say hello are smiling and kind and others are not explain me I don't understand despite this little inconvenience it will not stop me from coming back to this hotel with my family or friends because I have always found a great and perfect atmosphere

Very nice hotel, comfortable room as it should be (just the corridors that resonate) but that did not stop my 3 children and myself from sleeping well in the night or in the morning (8-12 and 16 years old), staff reception, catering and very kind, helpful and respectful maintenance. A dynamic animation team, smiling, really invested and caring. Very nice SPA session really a good time (hammam, scrub, massage). A great stay!

reviews.review_text: This hotel and horrible no variety of food (gizzard, liver and other offal in general) hygiene and deplorable, the animators serve with hands in food dishes a lot of fly and mosquito, sheets and towels very very dirty window that does not close, shower head dilapidated big lack of maintenance. I do not recommend this hotel too many negatives and again very dirty. Hotel never maintained a shame.

reviews.review_text: Best hotel in the region tozeur kebilie hotel goldenyasmin ras el ain tozeur listening to guests services bar security restaurant room welcome well done to everyone really 😂 a pleasure to stay at the hotel rs el ain goldenyasmin tozeur thank you

Thank you hotel golden Yasmin ras El Aïn Tozeur pretty hotel ras El Aïn services excellent👍👏thank you very much for the food service restaurant room beautiful bae excellent clean iscine thank you for the welcome thank you for your excellent hotel

As a group of 35 people spent two nights in El Ain Hotel, having two meals in our stay. Dinner buffet the first night was great with plethora of food based on meat, while the second night was lesser based on fish. Quality was good but the cleaning of tablecloths and cutlery was horrible. Maitre was rude and the service unwilling. The same was about the breakfast. There are two swimming pools , one outside and one inside, both filthy and uncared. No towels available also. Our rooms were around the main building, bungalow alike, quite clean with enough amenities, no welcome water though and the running water was full of salt making cleaning an ordeal. Anyway the change sheets everyday. Generally don’t expect cleaning by European standards, dead bags, broken and cracked glasses and plates are common site in the restaurant.

Mohamed's spa and massage service was very good. We made the plan complete and it was all very professional and pleasurable. The atmosphere very pleasant and they did not spare time being very delicate.   100% recommended for after activities in the desert.

Bravo 👍👏 hotel in a beautiful palm grove of Tozeur in southern Tunisia thank you for the service bravo 👏👏 thank you for the food the room the restaurant and the bar bravo and thank you 💓💖 bravoooooooo great pleasure thank you 😘😚 infinitely bravo

The hotel is in the tourist area far from the city center in a lovely palm grove. There is a good swimming pool where it’s possible to swim. The rooms are scattered around with many steps, not ideal for people with walking difficulty. The rooms are clean, not big but comfortable enough especially if you’re alone, there is no complimentary water or tea/ coffee. The bathroom is not big, separated from the toilet, with soap, bath foam and shampoo. There is a hair dryer. Dinner is buffet, average and finishing fast, breakfast buffet is confusing, apparently large but lacking many things (just oranges for fruit, only one kind of tea and hard to find, no choice of cereals, eggs only hard boiled etc). The staff is not very helpful

The hotel is well located, with good facilities and nice restaurants and bar. It proved to be a great base for our exploration of the area and I definitely recommend for individuals visiting the area.

Hotel that deserves repair.  Window that has trouble opening or closing.  Some rooms, view on piles of rubble and construction debris.  Towels, shower mats or toilet papers were still missing after cleaning the housekeepers.  At reception, staff do not communicate instructions to each other, so requests should always be repeated.  The indoor swimming pool closes at 6pm when it is indicated at 9pm.  The restaurant is buffet style.  Menus not renewed but remains correct.  A little disappointed with the services provided.

Superb hotel that I recommend, several times we go there and never disappointed, the hotel is well placed, nice room, all the nice staff and very kind, as well bartenders, waiters at the restaurant, animators or housekeeper, always a nice word, food at the top, only small flat just the dishes quickly cold but a microwave available, excursions to take on the beach with SABER , it is very nice and super nice much cheaper, I recommend 100% you can trust it very good organization, very nice horseback ride on the beach as well as quad biking and all its excursions and for the hotel I also recommend the Seabel Aladdin 100% I would not change there, warmly next time, thank you all for your pleasant welcome as well as the animators always at the top

Very good stay at this hotel, the staff is very welcoming and good quality. For your activities in Djerba, I strongly advise you to go to the private beach of the hotel, you will find there a very honest and reliable provider on its prices. It greatly contributed to the good quality of my stay!

If the hotel is a bit old, the staff, the outside, the entertainers and the food are at the height of a four star.  Isma made us a beautiful room every day and Walid, at the beach restaurant, made the delicious meal served at the table, more than pleasant.

I thought the bedding was too hard. This hotel has steps that are quite high, not suitable for everyone. Otherwise, the staff is very attentive, smiling and polite. The cuisine is tasty enough for a hotel of this category. The gardens and decoration are nice. There is a large swimming pool. The beach is convenient to access and well too. The hotel is clean. SPA treatments are quite effective for a decent price. Personally, I still preferred the Seabel by EL KANTAOUI.

Stay at the top , both entertainment, restaurants, welcome without forgetting the animators. Clean hotel ,I highly recommend, looking forward to returning this summer for a longer stay, ten days was not enough 😍.

The animators are excellent and fool pleasant especially Avatar the king of dance who always smiles in any situation. The staff is attentive and very accommodating the only downside of this hotel is the buffet which is very bland if not very good stay.

All the staff are friendly. 3 small negatives. 1. The comfort of the mattress of our room, it absolutely must be changed,. 2. The girl at the reception not nice at all and knows how to answer nothing. 3.The guy who takes care of the excursions in the hotel itself is very invasive, he will not let you go all your stay.  But everything else is spotless. An attentive management, a team with little care. The welness people...at the top, the shop staff just right. I was recommended this hotel be said say to take a rest so there never seen nevertheless a very warm welcome during our stay it turned out qlq adventures that did not sunny our stay lack of total security we wanted to make kayak the person in charge stayed in his little cabin and gave no notion in case of danger just a step too far and 20 min max. We were also entitled to the blows of not singing anymore in the nightclub because the DJ is afraid for his tablet he then left the club and cut us the music

The establishment itself is very nice: the setting is beautiful, the beach is superb and well maintained, the pools are clean, and the outdoor areas are really well thought out to relax. The rooms are decent and the overall atmosphere of the hotel is pleasant.  Unfortunately, our experience was marred by the behaviour of the staff, particularly the catering staff. The servers seemed completely disinterested in the customers. We have been repeatedly ignored, forced to raise our voices or be noticed, and have often been treated with cold or even rude answers. No effort to welcome with a smile or to make the stay pleasant. The nightclub was great but the DJ was tense, we sang or danced too much it pissed him off and cut the music   It’s a shame because the hotel’s potential is real, but the lack of professionalism and respect from the staff means we don’t have a good memory of the service. An improvement in this level would really be necessary for the experience to be up to the level of the place.

the hotel was very good but the staff really lame!!!! especially the director rafiq really you are the worst you are really not a nice guy we are in a club and we can not scream to sing? come down to earth man jsp you think you are for who but marwane you are the goat do not change the blood

!!!!After spending a week in this hotel I can tell you that it is a hotel to flee following its manager and staff. How to tell you that an all-in means what it means, the bar has hours ranging from 10:30 to midnight, the problem in there is that the waiters do not like to do their job they are friendly just with the women, experience going with your wife to the bar and you will see that they will only look at them and not in the eyes, however at 11:45 pm which means that the bar was always open I was asked to drink but the waiters did not want to serve me or anyone else besides they were only slowing down and making return trips in the kitchen not to serve us on purpose, then asking for drink the waiter answers me "NARDINMOUK I speak with him" asking me what it meant I ask people there and answers that it means "race to your mother" so I decide to go ask him why he says that, he starts laughing in my face then the manager of the bar comes to me and says MY FRIEND THIS IS NOT POSSIBLE IT IS A VERY GOOD WAITER HE WOULD NEVER HAVE SAID THAT. Going to see the manager the next day, he answers me my staff is the best he would not allow to tell you that so I tell him to look at the cameras because I knew the precise moment by asking him that he shows me the video in the same place but 1 hour earlier then I tell him it is not that time and I answer him precisely the time at which it knows past but what he does he shows me yet another moment just before it happens and cuts just when it was going to happen. He denies and then starts to rub shoulders with me and tell me you’re like my son I don’t want anything to do with you I just want you to have a good trip and that’s all , the next day he came to tell me that it was my fault because we were asking for a lot of drinks at that time and that he understood the gesture his employee had made if he had really done it because he still wouldn’t confess. Otherwise nothing else to say super nice housekeeper exceptional hotel just restaurant as at the bar where the staff is not friendly at all.

We stayed at Max's the restaurant affiliated with the hotel run by Whalid (which deserves 5 stars alone so good mood is contagious, thanks to you ) and we had a great evening thanks to him and the wonderful dishes prepared with love by the cooks  Animations are at the rendezvous with animators who want to satisfy us! Frankly I've never been to an exclusive hotel and they change their minds  The spa is also a very good way to relax... it is worth the price, with several formula adapted to each need, we would just miss access to a Jacuzzi;)   The hotel is well maintained... the only negatives we could find there: wifi not available in the rooms but in the living room and double beds so separate not convenient for a couple   Thank you for this week:)

I've been going to l.aladin for years and am delighted The structure of this hotel is beautiful, aperitifs on a large terrace , with sea view.the buffet is very good ,and above all very varied ,each can find its own Hosts, welcome, management , women on duty, waiters ,and I forget ,all display a big smile and do everything to please you

Big up to Mourad, the artist, who takes the time to make very beautiful henna. My companion very much enjoyed the whole body massage. Big up in whalid, the mainstay of the bar team for its constant and friendly welcome  Big up to Mounir, the finch of the waiter brigade. We imagine coming back to this hotel

During my 7 days of stay it was not swept/wiped once. Great food, everyone can choose. Sweet spots in the form of dessert were delicious.

I no longer have the words to describe my stay which was beautiful and unforgettable.  An animation team on top from morning to evening, with them we do not see time pass (Avatar, Mario, Leo, Iman, Jojo, Max, Adem, Gustavo, Badis, Speedy, Baya, Thomas,....🥰), the animations are varied between games to have fun without taking a head and serious games 😉 (dance lessons, water aerobics, archery, darts, pétanque, beach volleyball, ......) without forgetting the evening animations. The restaurant the varied buffets with 2x per week theme dinner in addition to the buffet restaurant, the service is almost impeccable, the staff is professional and always smiling.  Walid (restaurant at Max) it was perfect.  For late diapers I recommend the disco.  For rooms and excursions I leave you to judge for yourself because tastes and colors????.  Thank you 😍

A particularly welcoming hotel.Location that allows you to fully enjoy the beauty of the city, to participate in its life. Ideal for long walks. Very large rooms, satellite TV and wifi very satisfactory. It also has a beautiful garden and a large penthouse equipped for relaxing in the sun with swimming pool. Very friendly, kind and efficient staff. Rich breakfast. Repetitive dinner but really cheap.

Hotel not far from the sea and the medina.  Very welcoming staff, attentive and very responsive when needed. Stayed 5 days well spent. Everyone was very nice, but special mention for Houcine ❤️ Bashir and Sami.  I recommend!

My stay at the Residence Hammamet was very pleasant.  The location is great, the rooms are clean and the staff adorable, Samy, Me Leïla and Naima.  Special mention for fluffy pillows.  I recommend this hotel.

A good hotel, with very nice renovated room, a suitable location to discover hammamet and 5 minutes from the beach , kind and professional staff. The hotel has good space to rest. The hotel that seemed small at first impression would hide large spaces

reviews.review_title: Mixed Review – Great Value for the Price, But Room for Improvement
reviews.review_text: We booked this hotel for our family of 5 at a very reasonable price, so we didn’t expect luxury, but we did hope for the basics to be in place.  On the negative side, the room we were given was quite outdated, something from the 80s, and not very well maintained. There was only one socket in the entire room, and it was occupied by the TV, so charging electronic devices was always a challenge, especially with a family of 5. This led to constant queues for the one available socket. The toilet, shower, and kitchenette were all extremely old, to the point where we didn’t even use the kitchenette, but of course, we had to rely on the toilet and shower facilities. Cleaning also didn’t seem to be a priority. The lighting, storage, wardrobes, and windows were all very old and in desperate need of an upgrade.  Breakfast was decent enough, especially considering the price we paid.  On the positive side, there was a reasonably well-kept rooftop swimming pool with stunning views of the trees and the beach/sea in the background. The hotel also had a nice courtyard with plenty of greenery and seating, perfect for relaxing. The reception area was welcoming, and the hammam (spa) on the ground floor offered good service at a very reasonable price. We also had the pleasure of meeting Chawki, a very helpful person who sat by the entrance to the courtyard during the day. He offered us a Quad package at a very reasonable price, far cheaper than any quotes we had gotten from other sources. He is also a very good source of information on anything you need, and one of very few people who speaks English well enough to have a good conversation.  The staff were generally helpful, although interactions were somewhat limited since I don't speak French or Arabic, and English isn’t widely spoken in Tunisia.  The best feature of the hotel is its location. You’re not in Yasmine Hammamet, which is shiny, busy, and full of tourist traps with overzealous shopkeepers and taxi drivers who think it’s acceptable to charge 5 times the regular fare. Instead, you’re in the old Hammamet, or as the locals call it, the real Hammamet, not the touristy version.  Right outside the hotel to your left, you'll find plenty of food stalls, coffee shops, and juice bars offering fresh, tasty food at prices geared toward locals. If you prefer a restaurant experience, there are plenty of good options nearby. The old fort and old medina are just a 5-minute walk away, and the public beach is about a 2-minute walk. While you might need to walk a little further to find a cleaner spot, it’s not much of a hassle. Near the fort, there’s also an MG City supermarket, where you can pick up all your daily essentials.  There’s a taxi stand very near the supermarket. While the taxi stand marshal made it clear that the drivers will not use meters as they are only for Tunisians, we were given a fixed price for our ride to Yasmine Hammamet (10 Dinars). This now seems like a reasonable fare, especially compared to the much higher prices we were quoted by taxi drivers in Yasmine Hammamet.  Coming out of the hotel to your right, you’ll find an Orange shop where you can get a SIM card and data package, as well as a currency exchange with great rates. There’s also a very nice cafe arounf the corner where you can grab a coffee or a fresh orange juice for about 3 Dinars.  The Louage station to get back to Tunis is only a 5-minute walk away, on Avenue Mongi Slim, just outside Hammamet Hospital. Even with heavy suitcases and kids in tow, we managed to get there in about 8 minutes. Right near the station, there are plenty of food options, with the standout being Two M Pizzeria on Avenue Taleb el Ezzabi. There’s also Ettahrir restaurant (listed as Liberation restaurant on Google Maps), a traditional Tunisian spot, nearby on Avenue de la Liberation.  Overall, while the room itself was a disappointment, the hotel and the experience, considering the price we paid for a family of 5, were not bad. I hope that the owner/management will invest in modernising the rooms to bring this place back to its former glory, as it must have been quite charming in its prime.

Great location 10 minutes walk from the medina and beach. Numerous food points Possibility parking in front. Warm welcome.   We were 2 couples we were upgraded.  Nice big room. Modern toilets very clean. The staff welcome restaurant very pleasant and professional. Swimming pool 3rd floor with sea view.

Everything was amazing can't beat the price, bed was so comfy and service was un matched the room was very clean and the staff did everything to help thank you guys for making my stay memorable I will definitely be back in no time even just for the pool  Fethi

Oh dear!  Cheap for a reason. No maintenance - really run down in all areas.  Dingy.  Smokey.  Health hazard all areas. Positives - excellent location overlooking harbour.  Nice courtyard gardens. You must avoid at all costs. Staying here will make your skin crawl.

We spent 5 days in this hotel in October 2024. The rooms are simple, large and comfortable. The bathroom is also nice although the plumbing can be improved. Everything is clean and maintained every day. The staff is very friendly. We took full board. The buffet may be a little repetitive but they are attentive and responsive. The bar and outside are nice with entertainment some evenings. The pool is not heated so water too cold despite the good temperatures in October. We therefore preferred the beach of the hotel. There again pleasant staff and little care. In the lobby of the hotel 2 people offer excursions. We must not stop at the typical and somewhat insistent sales methods. They are finally very friendly and did not hesitate to help us when we encountered a problem with transport to the airport, without expecting anything in return. We did the camel tour and it was perfect! The guide is very interesting, speaks several languages. Pleasant walk with tasting and entertainment at the end.

reviews.review_title: Stay in Hammamet at the residence
reviews.review_text: This hotel was very good, well placed also to visit everything.  I have the pool, the private apartment incredible space and functionality.  I recommend this hotel value for money and the decoration the warm atmosphere.The comfort.

We stopped at the Hammamet Residence, for 2 nights. We were very well received with a small lemonade. The staff is attentive and very friendly! As for the environment, the hotel is authentic. The room is unpretentious: charming and comfortable. The bathrooms are clean and very functional, really nothing to say! I recommend this hotel if you are looking for authenticity. We did not taste the restoration. The location is ideal , 2 steps from the city center and all amenities. I recommend

I booked one night in this hotel. Upon arrival, met with a wonderful receptionist Sami who offered me welcome drink and a place of Tunisian dessert. He upgraded my room to a suite for free. Well, the room or now the suite is so nice and big. A/C is not working. Went down to the reception and asked to fix the A/C and got the answer that it’s not working in the whole property for maintenance. Went outside to buy a bottle of water because I lack it in the room. Tried one hour to struggle with the weather and later on, decided to change the hotel. Again went down asking Sami to find me any solution or I have to leave with bad feelings. Such a gentleman, he upgraded me again to a bungalow, means additional kitchen and balcony. Wow, at last I can open the room door and the balcony door so as to get better.  Breakfast is so simple. Location is great, few minutes from the beach.  What I like in there is the great staff and the location of the hotel. Please you have to inform your customers about any maintenance in advance but don’t let them be in.

reviews.review_title: A nice 3-star hotel near the centre of Hammamet, walkable to restaurants & the medina
reviews.review_text: This is a good standard 3-star hotel, within easy walking distance to town and many restaurants. It is clean throughout the hotel. The hotel is suitable for people who want to get out and explore a bit. As someone else mentioned, there is a bit of faded charm to it.  There is a rooftop pool and pool bar area - probably the best feature at this hotel - with views of the sea from here. There is also a courtyard bar. There's a ping pong table on the roof as well and paddles are available with a small deposit.  Breakfast is available as an optional extra, a reasonable 15 dt per person, though we preferred just to go out to a cafe.  Breakfast includes things like croissants, boiled eggs, Ouja (a Tunisian tomato and pepper sauce with eggs) and even a crepe making station. There is dinner for 30 dt.  There were regularly 5-6 tables of people dining.  A few other restaurants in the area have dinner at around the same price so we preferred to choose something different every night.  There was entertainment (a guy playing guitar and singing some old eric Clapton songs) on just one one night when we were there, which was a relief as I'm not really keen on all those so-called entertainments and animation.  If you're looking for one of those places that has entertainment every day then this hotel may not be your best bet.    At the front right of the hotel is a restaurant where they have music at night. Fortunately our rooms were on the back side and we couldn't hear anything at all from this.  Not sure how you'd fare if your room was at the front.  Regarding the staff, some are really friendly and helpful. Two of the front desk staff were great. I had a nice conversation with the middle-aged lady receptionist.   For excursions, there are a couple of guys at the hotel selling them pretty reasonably, about 120dt. Horse riding and camel riding and things like that.  They're just doing their job so try not to mind even if they ask you several times.  If you're not interested just politely tell them you're not planning on any excursions.  There are busses from the town's main bus terminal (about 10 minutes walk) to Tunis (one hour) and Nabuel (half an hour). There's also a train station that you can get to by taxi with trains for Tunis.  Nearby, the Cafe de la Plage is right on the beach where you can sip coffee or have snacks while watching the sea and the fishermen.  They are in a slow process of renovating the rooms.  We were offered an upgrade to a renovated room for an extra fee which we decided to go for.  Nicer bathroom and shower and the room just feels fresher and more modern.  It seemed like the upgrade money went straight into the receptionist's pocket, though of course I could be mistaken.   One of the staff is an older lady who seems like she's gotten a bit fed up answering guests questions. I asked here where I could put a small bag I was throwing away and she pointed outside. When I asked her what she meant she sort of rolled her eyes, took the bag, went out in front of the hotel and deposited it in a bin in the street! (Don't they have bins in the hotel?)  Overall I can recommend the hotel and would be likely to return if we come back to Hammamet.

Very nice hotel despite being a bit  dated. Very large and spacious room. Dehor more than acceptable.  Kitchen and bathroom to be restored.  Friendly staff.  Good location, close to downtown  Price in the norm.  Presence of the swimming pool and a bar.

reviews.review_title: Great location very kind and helpful staff
reviews.review_text: Structure dated but comfortable. Right downtown. Recommended superior rooms as the others are quite old as well as common areas. Very kind and helpful staff (Laila at reception, Khadija femme de ménage, Brahim the maintainer..,). An unpretentious hotel that allows a stay in a family environment. Lost a clutch in the evening in the pool that was found by cleaning women and delivered to the reception complete with everything. Catering definitely insufficient but in short with 30 euros a day you have what you pay.: I personally will return,,,

We were well received. The service is really good and we liked the Things to do at the Pension! I sincerely recommend this Pension. Regarding the food , I was really surprised at the common sense because it is really very good! The rooms are super clean!

Everything is nickel excursion ( horse quad camel ) and Pension . Everything is fine supervising the staff at the top! I would recommend to any person this Pension in 60 av Habib bourguiba. Location 50 m from the beach. Swimming pool on you with sea view. Pension Hammamet the residence.

reviews.review_title: I strongly advise against this place
reviews.review_text: I am deeply outraged by the appalling service and unbearable arrogance of the agents at the front desk. Their total lack of effort to provide an acceptable service is unacceptable. I strongly advise against this place. It is a dismal and terribly frustrating service.

reviews.review_title: Inn where you feel the guest is KING
reviews.review_text: Pension where the relational aspect is very present: welcome, smile, availability.... The staff is always smiling and ready to help Everything is perfect, rooms, catering, swimming pool, private beach, entertainment... Pension that largely deserves a 4th star. Congratulations to all and thank you for your hospitality and professionalism, something that is more found in some hotels in Tunisia Good continuation.

One of the best holidays we have been on as a family, the facilities of the hotel were amazing and the staff couldn’t do enough for us. The food was great and there was always activities to do throughout the day and entertainment on most nights. The hotel have their own animation team who are all lovely and try and get all the guests involved in what they are doing.  The room was cleaned daily and fresh towels, toilet roll ect. Too.

Nice large room.  King bed comfortable; however, the pillows were awful.  Mini fridge, safe, bottle of water in the room.  Beautiful pool and view of the beach.  Buffet breakfast has good choices and an egg station.  Room 224 had a green theme.  Some of the other rooms had a different color scheme.

The hotel lobby and pool areas are quite nice.  Rooms don’t mirror the public areas of the hotel.  Our air conditioning has been on for hours and the room is not cooling down sufficiently and has a stuffy kind of feel. The sleeping pillows on the bed are either supper lumpy or super hard.  The bathroom is extremely tiny, absurdly small.  The counter space in the bathroom is almost non existent. No bath mat supplied so the floor was extremely slippery when getting out of the shower.  There were pubic hairs on the bathroom counter surrounding the bowl sink that sat on that counter. Bedside reading light on one side of the bed doesn’t come on.

reviews.review_title: Quiet hotel to get out of a daily stress!
reviews.review_text: A perfect stay, in a perfect hotel! I wanted to decompress in a stress-free and quiet place.... My goal is achieved!  Evening meal and breakfast very good and with lots of choices   Very nice outdoor and indoor swimming pool   Hard to leave after 10 days of holidays ... The staff so endearing 😍  Thank you very much for this wonderful stay!

reviews.review_title: This is not a 5 star hotel
reviews.review_text: Would not recommend to anyone - one of the worst hotel experiences I've had. Poor service, low quality breakfast, room service refuses to charge to the room, AC broken, cheap and tacky design, not even allowed to bring your own water onto the site.   Watched someone spill cereal outside the breakfast area and walk away - the staff just watched, stood there and carried on talking, no one cleaned it away.  Do not understand the positive reviews, this feels about 20 years outdated and has been given no attention.

I had a great weekend at the hotel, marked by a total disconnection from the daily tumult and a complete immersion in serenity. This stay was placed under the sign of relaxation and well-being. The room was spotlessly clean and provided impeccable comfort, and the whole establishment is maintained with obvious care. The friendly and professional staff – be it the reception manager, the maids, the waiters or Chiheb at the entrance – made this experience unforgettable. However, I would like to make a comment regarding the reception upon my arrival. Indeed, the receptionist, Miss Rym, initially left me without attention, preferring to continue a telephone conversation without acknowledging my presence. She then informed me that the official check-in time was set at 3pm, which contradicted the information provided in advance by the travel agency, which stipulated a check-in time from 2pm. This discrepancy, although minor, has caused some discomfort and would merit better coordination between the various intermediaries in the future to ensure a more harmonious customer experience.

reviews.review_title: Annual stay at Radisson blu Hammamet
reviews.review_text: Satisfaction at the end of the stay, welcome by professional and attentive team. To be improved: possibility to obtain an interview with sales manager, reception imposes a request by email. A more flexible approach would be welcome. Flawless catering service thanks to the attentions of the HAMED server and the discreet but very efficient presence of the butler NABIL.  High quality thalassotherapy care by a competent and caring team (thanks to LEILA) We will gladly return

We have been to this hotel many times mainly for the amazing service from the staff and great location.  Nothing too much trouble for reception staff, especially Ruim who was very helpful, efficient and kind  Always something for everyone at the food buffet.
Very nice hotel, located on the beach, in a quiet environment. All staff are very attentive

Today we had a great day at the Radisson Spa  Wonderful therapeutic massage and plantar reflexology on the recommendations of the charming receptionist Wissem.  Very welcome Beautiful Hamman. To do without hesitation!

Very nice hotel, clean and well located. Welcoming staff, comfortable room, delicious breakfast. Stay relaxing and faultless. I highly recommend this property! Beautiful view from the room! That’s what struck me the most.

I’ve stayed in this hotel for a long time therefore i would like to say that this hotel has a very good location i love the food people are very kind helpful and nice i loved my sea view room a great housekeeping team the maids are always smiley 😊 thank youuu

The hotel is well suited for a relaxing holiday. Rooms and facilities are clean, the staff strives for a pleasant stay.  I would like to highlight the excellent restaurant. The food was fresh and we tasted very good.

reviews.review_title: Stunning hotel in a paradise location.
reviews.review_text: This is our third visit to this amazing hotel; each time during February half-term in the UK.  There is nothing we can fault.  It is in a stunning location, lovely breakfast and friendly staff.  We were upgraded to a suite which was incredible. The breakfast buffet will suit everyone's tastes.

Exceptional Service at Radisson Blu Hammamet  My stay at Radisson Blu Hammamet was fantastic, thanks to the amazing staff. Receptionist Rym welcomed us with warmth and professionalism, ensuring a smooth check-in and a personalized experience throughout our stay. The hotel itself is beautiful, offering comfortable rooms and great amenities. A special mention goes to Asma at the spa—her expertise and attention to detail made for an incredibly relaxing experience. The entire team provided exceptional service, making this hotel a top choice for anyone visiting Hammamet. Highly recommended!

I have just completed a 15-day cure at the Thalasso Radisson Blu Center in Hammamet and am totally delighted with it.  All the staff and the Director in mind Mr. Faisal Ouellani, listened to my wishes, and perfectly met my expectations.  The quality of the hydro treatments (showers, Hammam, pre-sotherapy, etc...) as well as the many massages very varied, were provided to me by attentive and qualified staff. Many thanks for alleviating my back pain, and especially to Mrs. Amira. I highly recommend this establishment for thalasso treatments and relaxation.

Very good stay at Radisson blue hotel, great location.  The staff is very friendly and considerate in all services (reception, bars, dining room).   The room with sea view, very clean with a little personal touch from the maid. Many thanks to Amira (Amina).   I enjoyed the Thalasso (1st goal of my trip), equipment, pools, spas and fitness.  The staff is very professional, very kind and considerate.  Thank you all. Monique and Yves Jotterand

Clean and comfortable room and great sea views, and a big thank you for the housekeeper, kind and responsive reception especially Iheb and Rym. Breakfast might be a little better if not good service at the waiters level at the restaurant.

reviews.review_title: Not recommended for family with kids
reviews.review_text: The hotel is quite empty during February holidays, the family rooms are perfect, also the food, but the kids' club is closed, No animation, Wifi is very poor, and the cellular network is bad (ooredoo),  There is nothing to do except eating and swimming! I don't recommend if you have kids.

A great stay at the Radisson Blu Hammamet hotel I loved the establishment and especially the sea view of my room a rich and varied buffet and I spent at the SPA a professional team and always with little care. Thanks to the whole team

reviews.review_title: A remarkable long stay in sublime surroundings
reviews.review_text: I have stayed in this beautiful Hotel since a good time considering my professional occupations in the region , I was able to invite my little family from Morocco during the holiday spent at the end of the year here in Radisson , frankly we had a pleasant stay absolutely fantastic , a warm welcome and friendly and very attentive staff , especially the reception counter , the maids at the head Madame Samiha with her service and extraordinary smile , the restaurant staff all and all without exception at the head Abdessamad , Kamal , the 2 Nabil , Ahmed , Aymen , the 2 women at the buffet dinner and of course the great chef master cook with his presence , smile and professionalism . A big thank you to all the teams for making our stay splendid , I will bring back my family and friends no doubt no hesitation inchaalah , and I would highly recommend this Hotel for those looking for luxury and conform to Hammamet ... Warmly  yahya;)

reviews.review_title: Golden people from the animation team. Everyone who comes here is going to have a great time. Dikke 10 plus.
reviews.review_text: I'll give the animation team a big A. Because of them we had a super holiday. Friendly and cheerful as a team should be.  We definitely recommend this hotel, especially because of the good care. We are there for the 2nd x in May that certainly says enough.

Thank you for the good conditions. We are satisfied with the hotel and the animators. The food is wonderful.Scooby, he is a crazy animator and smiling all the time, the bar staff is very good too, Mr. Khamys, he has good service, the restaurant is good food, the receptionist Ridha is funny too, but the problem is that there is no bar in the venue of the show.

I'll start with the staff because they were amazing, they paid attention to us, the rooms were clean, the food was great, the pool was clean, there are waiters who serve you all the time, they have a bar that works until late, there is music, billiards, quiz, darts, stretching, table hockey!! Everything you need!!! 2026 we are here again 😘😘😊

We were very pleased with our stay here. The food was extremely varied and delicious, the service was also top-notch, the staff was kind and smiling, and our mood was taken care of by a great team of animators scooby.momo. They made our stay fun and unforgettable.

Small friendly hotel, close to the Medina and the port. Staff very helpful, nice, smiling. Khmais(mustache waiter) is adorable at the service of the pool and bar. Momo the host is also available and listening. The food is varied and good with typical dishes. Nice and clean swimming pool, deckchairs available. Spacious and clean room with smiling maids. Brief hotel that we recommend where we lounge and sunbathe...😍
Good stay in hammamet we loved our holidays the animators very kind. Welcoming really great time with family. The food is good. Thank you very much for this stay. ❤️💙❤️💙🤲🏿🤲🏿👌👌🙏🙏👍👍🤩🤩🤩😎😎😎😎

We spent 4 days/3 nights with girls. We had a pleasant stay! - The room: clean, fridge, balcony, comfortable bedding, well soundproofed. - Restaurant: all-inclusive formula with unlimited buffet morning and evening. Various meals for all tastes, traditional meals. Everything was very good. Cocktail at will!  Animation: super nice animators, we have a lot of fun. Activities offered during the day and theme evening. -Personal: all the staff is very careful to have a pleasant stay.  - Swimming pool: outdoor pool and heated interior. Lots of deckchairs. - Surroundings: right next to the medina and carthageland In short, we recommend couple, friends, family!!!!

reviews.review_title: An unforgettable stay thanks to an exceptional entertainment team! I spent a wonderful week at the Eden Ya Hotel
reviews.review_text: I spent a few wonderful days at the Hotel Eden Yasmine in Hammamet, superb very friendly personal hotel but I want to highlight in particular the exceptional quality of the animation. Every day, the animators created a warm, friendly and cheerful atmosphere. Their energy, professionalism and kindness really marked my stay.  Whether it was sports activities, daytime games or evening shows, everything was perfectly organized. Impossible to get bored! A big congratulations to the whole entertainment team – you are the beating heart of the hotel and you made my holiday really special.  Thank you all for these unforgettable memories. I will return without hesitation, especially to relive this incredible atmosphere!

The animation team at the top, we had a good laugh with Scooby. The bar team is smiling (Azzedine welcomed us)  We recommend this hotel, the food is also varied and good for an all inclusive hotel.❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Thank you to the animation and reception team for their kindness, very good stay! Buffet meal that varies daily and wide choice, activities offered at the hotel. Indoor and outdoor swimming pool with towel! With friends, family or top couple

Great hotel , nice welcome , entertainment team at the top. Ideal for a couple or family stay with children. The receptionists as well as the housekeepers are very welcoming too.  Recommended this hotel  Various and typical restoration.

Dirty room (bath joints covered with mold), extremely dirty indoor pool! Hammam in breakdown... Poor entertainment, animators a little too familiar, especially with women... In short, a Wish version hotel: from the low end from A to Z. Tunisia, once but not twice. The only positive: the employees, very kind and really brave to work in such conditions.

The hotel is nice but not quite like the photos advertised lol both pools are very good and the staff are amazing all  down to the bar staff to the resturant staff and reception staff. Bar shuts at 12/midnight but they let you stay in there after which is nice. The blue Lagoon cocktail was my favourite and the lovley waiter in the afternoon makes a yummy green one. He used to bring them to our sunbed which I thought was lovley.   Sometimes it was hard to get a sunbed so I dunno how it is in high season. You are also not allowed to reserve beds.   The food is okay but not very hot but the deserts are delightful.  At breakfast they do nice omlettes The resturant manager Ali is soooo lovley and was always so pleased to see us. He's got really got banter.   I tried eating out a couple times as wanted to taste real Tunisian food and that did not disappoint.   This hotel is more catered to family's and couples. So if your a group of friends this might be a bit boring for you. The staff make this hotel luckily. The beds are like concrete and so are the pillows 😢 but the hotel is clean and friendly.   Momo taught us Arabic on the first day and I thought this was really nice.  Do not buy trips from this hotel the guy is a scammer!!!  I payed £12 For a boat trip with pickup and drop off and dinner and a couple from this hotel was on the same boat and payed £50!! When we got back from the trip the rude man from the hotel was then demanding money from us. I called my travel agent and they said don't pay him nothing you already paid. 😂 So I told him to go away but I should of reported him. The camera man is really friendly and makes you feel like a celebrity every night lol I probably wouldn't stay here again but I would defiantly come back to Tunisia as it's got the friendliest people I've ever met.  💕

I spent a good week in this hotel, the animation team and the staff are very nice,  Special signing to the momo animator and the roberto manager  The food is excellent and very varied 🏝️🇹🇳  The place is ideally located

A big + for the animation team, thanks to "cinderella(fabio) and mommy(mamadou)'s son"😁. The staff at the front desk is great and really helpful👍. The Spa is great, the treatments great👍. The pool is very nice and the rooms are nice.  From room 261 😉(mom, 35/wife, and sister-in-law 😉)

The hostel is very cozy the staff in the hotel tries to provide the guest with high quality service. The staff tries to make everyone happy the animators here entertain all the guests which makes you want to stay here forever in my opinion I will come back here whenever I can greetings and I leave my heart here ❤️❤️❤️

Very nice vacancy I loved it , amazing animation team specially Momo and Ahmed skoubi Roberto hiba , we will back soon , clean room nice pool good food 😁😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😁 anhhhhhhhhhhh

reviews.review_title: Lovely 4 star all-inclusive hotel v friendly staff
reviews.review_text: This hotel was perfect for a 4 day break. The staff are really friendly. Idriz in the shisha bar was lovely. The food was varied and there was lots of local food to try. The swimming pool is massive and beautiful. Can really recommend this hotel.

reviews.review_title: The city is very pretty with many activities vary
reviews.review_text: Good animation, the staff and animators are very friendly, the room and clean and clean every day what is nice, the site is very nice and the pool very large.The beach is next to the hotel which is very convenient for walking

reviews.review_title: We enjoyed our stay in this hotel!
reviews.review_text: We enjoyed our stay in this hotel. Room was clean and comfortable.  All the staff were very helpful and friendly.  The entertainment  team are Awesome! The hotel staff is very good. They had games every day and were very personable with everyone!   Thank you for everything!

Nice hotel, very comfortable room and bedding.clean nickel.good food, pastries cakes very good. Thalasso incredible a big thank you to all and especially to Mohamed who gave me a divine massage 🥰 Thank you

Excellent at all levels Very decent rooms, quiet (rare in most of the 5-star hotels in the region! Perfect services, close to the pool and beach Menus for all tastes It was our 3rd stay in Djerba, by far the best Thank you.

Thanks to all the staff  room with sea view, large, nice, ladies cleaning very nice Thank you  Meals we eat very well Thank you to the chefs and kitchen staff  , fish, vegetables, raw vegetables, meat etc...vennoiserie with fresh top of good fresh fruit  I like less their desserts, I like those of the Tunisian evening  fresh orange juice in the morning a plus  beach very well  We spent two weeks great.  We'll come back.  Thanks to the hotel team without forgetting the direction soon

Thank you to the entire hotel team. Third time we stayed at this hotel. Impeccable rooms. Top staff. Very nice animation team. Thank you all, not forgetting Osama our favorite photographer always so kind! We will be back next year  Corinne GERELLI , Philippe VAVASSORI

We had a great week. Access to the beach, beautiful swimming pool, beautiful thalassotherapy center and spa Kind staff, welcoming and smiling. The hotel is very quiet. The clean room. At the restaurant, lots of choices. Tunisian specialities are a treat. We will return without hesitation.

Great stay in this establishment that deserves all its stars. Excellent welcome, great staff, comfortable rooms, tasty food and impeccable facilities. Superb setting with sea views. An experience to renew very soon

reviews.review_title: Great stay at Ulysee. Gladly again;)
reviews.review_text: Great hotel with small shortcomings.   First of all, it has to be mentioned that it is an all-inclusive hotel and meets the Tunisian standard. And that's exactly what it did. The arrival was super organized with welcome drink, the rooms clean and were freshened up every day. The non-alcoholic minibar was also always filled. All staff were friendly and accommodating. The food was varied, as I said it is an AI hotel where there is everything every day and you can eat something different every day. The selection of AI drinks was really good, you know that differently. You should calculate the price m you pay doet times down to the day. That was 100 euros per day with 3 x food, drinks have end and snacks in between. Not counting the flight and transfer.  Nevertheless, I would have a few reviews: • in the spa area there was no price list, so I have to assume that the prices vary • it would be nice if you could pay by card at the reception, as at the beginning of the holiday a tourist tax is required, which you would like to pay by card

reviews.review_title: Panorama and calm at the rendezvous
reviews.review_text: Hotel is not at the level of a five-star due to poor catering (among other industrial pastry)  On the other hand room, decoration and top service. Private beach nearby (mattress booked in the morning for the day is problematic) and quality pool.

reviews.review_title: If the courts are ready tp play on, we will come back
reviews.review_text: Room: nice, good space and proper (we chose a Deluxe room) Food: very good, various, delicious meals, we appreciated the fresh juices at breakfast Servers: symphatic and they give you the feeling to care and to look after your needs, special thanks to the friendlyness and effectiv services of Jamle and Nasser in the main restaurant. Reception: emphaptic and ready to help - thanks Services: bar's, restaurants and coffe space nice, decorated with, all spaces are clean, little beach Sports: we came to play tennis, but the 4 courts are in a pitiable state. You cann't play on this ground ("potholes" and cavities)

A hotel offering a friendly setting. Highlights are the welcoming and smiling staff at the reception, in the restaurant, in the cafés or elsewhere. It is one of the few hotels in Djerba where the staff do not differentiate between guests according to their nationality, which I particularly appreciated. The restaurant is good, offering a varied choice for all tastes. The only negative point: the room, which has neither headboard nor bedside tables.

Very welcoming and clean.  The staff is at your disposal.  The rooms are spacious enough and the bedding is good.  I was on the ground floor, so I had an outdoor terrace that led to an open pool with a beautiful pool. Some rooms have direct access to the pool via a ladder on the terrace.  The meals are very varied and there is something for everyone.  The private beach is also very nice  Frankly everything is top

When I see some reviews, advising to avoid or flee the hotel, I think that guests are derogatory in their remarks to qualify this property. They claim that it’s not a 5-star, that’s probably true by some standards we have here, but I’m surprised, if not annoyed, that people who pay a little over a thousand euros a week for two, submit such negative reviews.  A “true 5 star” is 500€ a night without side.  If you want breakfast, lunch and dinner, you will have to pay extra.  Here, everything is included, 3 meals a day, real squeezed orange juice for breakfast, pastries etc.  The majority of staff are courteous, hardworking and dedicated.  The professional reception, the whole team of animators present, without being invasive, and with a rare sympathy. This hotel with its feet in the water and a beautiful beach is our happiness, we who come here for the 4th time, the welcome is always marked and friendly. The rooms are spacious, made every day. The food offers a variety of dishes that can satisfy everyone. For the rest, we  this establishment next June. What else! Didier G.

Superb hotel, clean and spacious rooms with exceptional staff and great entertainment team. The buffet is diverse and varied It is ideally located facing the sea and a few minutes by taxi from the city. Wide choice of activities on site.

In itself the hotel is quite correct very far from a 5 stars attention it is local standards so far below what you can imagine the maintenance is correct it is the staff that must change at the reception especially the maids on the other hand very correct and do their job well. But then the Thalasso especially the reception agent a disaster is very far from the standards of a SPA or a Thalasso the staff is poorly qualified lz equipment aging in short no interest except massages which overall are very well but similar everything depends on the person who will take care of you. A place that seems totally blocked in the 80’s in short if you are not too demanding ... or you like ruined holidays then this is the place for you otherwise run away and especially do not book with Ovoyage

Very clean and well maintained hotel, spacious room and very large firm bed (2m/2m) bathroom with towels changed daily and bed redone daily. Many staff in this hotel, they are adorable and very brave because they work a lot. The buffets (breakfast/lunch and dinner) are exceptional, quality and very varied bravo to all the teams in the kitchen we feasted every day. Thanks also to the teams of 2 bars and a cuckoo from France to Mohammed who will celebrate his birthday on Sunday. Very nice complex in general and beautiful swimming pools, secure hotel and guards at each corner with entrance control. The biggest part of this hotel is the entertainment: the animators are uninteresting and soft of the knee and I know what I'm talking about having done animation myself in campsites clubs and holiday villages for 8 years. Animations non-existent and uninteresting like the animators. Who also do their rehearsals around the pool and repeat the same music 5 times before they know how to chain 3 steps. In short, no interest in the animation division  Everything else was super thank you to him.

Bonjour! This was a nice, clean and well kept hotel with excellent, welcoming staff throughout. 99.99% of the tourists are French, and the wife and I was the other 0.01%. However, all the staff and most French spoke good English, so no problems at all. We even learnt a little French too. There's was a bit of renovation going on outside but nothing to spoil our stay.  A very good selection of international buffet food on offer for breakfast, lunch and evening meal, so no complaints there. As in most hotels you had to book the a-la-carte restaurant and it was pre-order traditional Tunisian dishes, which we enjoyed very much. The all-inclusive drinks selection was more than satisfactory too.  There is plenty of nice quite areas to sunbath, if you prefer, as the main pool has the usual boom-boom music playing most of the day.  The evening entertainment was a bit of a let down (as there wasn't much, if any at all) but that didn't bother us with only being there for 3 nights. However, I'm sure that will change in high season. Day and night, I believe young children would probably get very bored, very quickly here, although, again, this could change in high season.  Djerba centre/souks (only £4ew in taxi) was nice but as you'd expect, lots of bazaars selling the same stuff, every owner wanting you to look around their shop, we did buy a few things but didn't stay long . There was not much going on at the Marina either.   All-in-all a pleasant and enjoyable stay, but 3 nights/4 days was definitely enough for us as there's not much to do inside or outside of the hotel, apart from walk on the beach.

Superb arrival at the hotel, room with beautiful sea view, very welcoming staff. The buffet is good and varied. The animators are always at our disposal and invested so that we have a pleasant stay. Most interestingly, the thalasso area with a wide choice of very pleasant treatments. I recommend this hotel for a couple holiday!!

A very pleasant stay in Djerba. A very warm welcome to the hotel, the catering staff cared for, Thank you Jamel for the nicely laid table with flowers, A beautiful setting.  Memorable discoveries of Tunisia, Midoun, Tataouine, Cheninie... The hotel is very good. Between the indoor heated pool and the outdoor pool, everyone can find themselves there

We had a wonderful stay my wife enchanted with thalassotherapy very professional and personal kind,  Nice beach, everything rolls they make bcp effort, quality ratio price very well, there are grumpy tjrs I would like to see how they live at home!!!! Excellent promotions services tjrs responded to our requests good organization. The only downside the overpriced tourist tax is the state that sets the price but not the establishment. We recommend this property

we arrived at the end of the morning, for a provision of our room at 4pm, lamentable welcome, dirty corridors etc... however the thalasso is quite acceptable, the restaurant staff is very friendly, pity,!

I the best for the vacation  Food its very good  Animations its the best  I meet Marco its very good animator aquqgym,gimnastyka,darts ,pingpong,the pool is very good too,its one of the best hotele that i visit 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

Great hotel , clean and tidy , rooms big , good location for the beach and shops , staff very friendly, big shout out to Su Su and Nada from the entertainment team and barman for keeping our glasses full Plenty choice of food , good value  Wi-Fi bit poor in your rooms though needs some work on this

My first time in Tunisia, I had the best time here. The staff are amazing, the amination team are awesome, they are so lovely. Nada, souso, hamza they all amazing people. I will come back here, I will also keep contact with the animation team!!!

both the service and the food  was great  i loved the pool the room it was clean the stuff were very nice and welcoming.thank for entertaining team nada and soso chocolate i spent the last day on the beach and i was super clean . i’m considering coming back again.

Catering, bar, reception all ok, wi fi in some areas not so efficient, nice and helpful entertainment. We spent a wonderful week congratulations to all the staff. Large and comfortable rooms and breathtaking sea views

Very clean hotel, super staff! From entertainers to waiters to everyone! Great Hamza!😁 pool and beach within reach, a few steps, wifi takes you to the beach... all nice! I recommend it for families but also boys and girls in groups! All inclusive the icing on the cake, little spend very much yield! Very good food and plenty of choice!

Wonderful holiday! All top and sublime cuisine.  A real oasis to spend with the family.  Fun and relaxation assured  Large rooms equipped with all comforts. Wonderful beach and sea. The spa also deserves 5 stars. Professionalism and competence

reviews.review_title: Relaxation, fun and lots of sympathy!
reviews.review_text: I stayed at this hotel and had a great time! The rooms were clean, the staff friendly and always helpful. Special thanks go to the animator Hamza , who was simply fantastic: nice, engaging and always ready to entertain us. It made the holiday even more beautiful! I highly recommend this place to those looking for relaxation but also lots of fun

reviews.review_title: The hotel is very large and welcoming. All the staff are friendly and helpful. I highly recommend it. The animation
reviews.review_text: The hotel is very large and welcoming. All the staff are friendly and helpful. I highly recommend it. The animation and staff are very nice! The food is very good and diverse. The days are accompanied by animation that does a magnificent job

This hotel is really 5 star. Starting from welcoming you at arrival, via reception, room, restaurant, beach, spa center - everything is great. I stayed 2 weeks, all inclusive. Guest service is amazing 🤩. Food is delicious and there is a plenty of it. Waiters are very polite and helpful. Special thanks to Leyla the maid, who kept my room clean and always left beautiful flower arrangement. Also, big thank you to people in spa center. I highly recommend services in the spa. After hammam and massage you will be new person. Once again, thank you for everything and keep doing great job 💖

Hotel according to description. Enchanted quiet break. Spacious room with sea view: a treat. The Spa: a real unexpected happiness both by the quality of the welcome and the nature of the services, massages. Special dedication to Yaya and Kheri whose last California massage was simply sublime and professional!!! Thanks. Finally a thank you also for the animation team that is present as it should (attention you are not in club but a hotel) always positive, smiling and punchy: top!!

Bel hôtel. Nice stay, very friendly staff. Animation team at the top (especially Nada, very caring with the children, close to them, always ready to laugh and play with them, an engaging person)  Recommended.

Most comfortable bed I have slept in on holiday and great pillows in economy room everything you need  Clean fresh towels linen house keeping daily  Good selection of food and drinks all inclusive  Shops beach close by. Great animation team Nada and Alex especially made to feel welcome

reviews.review_title: Experience you won't want to miss!!!
reviews.review_text: The hotel was beautiful and clean, the food was wonderful,  the room was spotless, the location was perfect! But... what made this holiday amazing were the staff! Entertainment staff, Nada & Alex were incredible! They made us feel so welcome and every day they made sure we were OK,  they took the time to speak with us and best of all the laughter, thank you so much xxx The restaurant staff, what can I say, every day we were treated so walmly, we couldn't wait to go see them,  the service was impeccable,  the food was lovely and there was so much on offer, but the best bit was the desserts 🍰 lol 😂 it was sad when we had to say goodbye 👋 😔 we didn't want to leave!  Our housekeeper was such a lovely lady,  everyday we couldn't wait to come back to our room to see what masterpiece she had created🌾 🐦 ♥ 🌸 our linens were fresh, the room was spotless, but most of all we left feeling like we had made a new friend ♥  I have to add the Al la carte restaurant 🍴 was brilliant,  my friend celebrated her 60th birthday 🎂 while we were there and it was amazing,  the gentleman that waited on us was fantastic,  the table was beautifully decorated,  service was again impeccable,  the food was delicious and we even had birthday cake 🎂 thank you so much for making my friends special day so amazing! Reception staff were so welcoming and professional,  they welcomed us so warmly and nothing was too much trouble,  thank you ☺  Because of this we will be returning very soon, we cant wait to see everyone again,  THANK YOU XXX  Michelle P

Hi, I have to talk about my experiences in this hotel, it was great thanks to the animation. A big thank you to Alex, who made our holiday perfect with his work and smile. It was a good moment. Thanks to Alex and nada mille grazie for the chance to meet this lovely people

Very good hotel! Location very good too. Service and staff are tjr attentive and available with pro service Housekeepers you are a love thank you! (Dedication to the waiter of the restaurant Achref!) I highly recommend this place!

great hotel, excelent food (french pastry, tunisian traditional), nice wines, very nice people, excelent service. Daily cleaning innthe rooms,  Great DJ, delighted us every night with nice music & karaoke. I felt like in Casablanca movie, no stupid rules about smoking inside. We will come again
