Tour package with Fram. 2 adults (43 years) + 2 teenagers (12 & 16 years). Family very easy and grateful.  Pros: - Very nice entrance and very nice hall (clean, huge and bright).  - Feeling safe and pleasant staff. -Good general welcome.  - Spacious room.  - Lovely room staff (Walid was very caring all stay, a wonderful meeting).  - The California massage was really deep (thanks Nejma). - Excursions proposed as the Sahara, a unique experience to do. Admittedly it was long (1200km in 2 days) but some spots were worth the trip (oasis, 4x4, El Jem, salt lake, camel ride...). - Karaoke evenings (atmosphere thanks to us and some other travelers). -Spacious restaurant and good cuisine but little varied, it was good but every day the same, except a small buffet apart that we had not seen in the beginning. Great location! Hotel in front of the sea and right next to the Hammamet Medina 15-20 minutes walk from the Marina. - Room cleaned every day and towels changed. Bar open late.  Pros: -The smell of cigarettes!!! Travelers smoke at the bar and it spreads all over the lobby. This is really unpleasant! A vacationer next to our room smoked in hers and the smell spilled down the hall and into our room. Hotel refreshed but on old. It is clean but the details need to be reviewed. The furniture is old and the taps "eaten" by the products, it's neglected. -The animation is summary, the adorable Asma must lead workshops without materials.  - Activity equipment completely worn out by a 5* hotel (ping pong table, rackets, by the pool the arcade games scream "At the boarding!" every 45 seconds, we went to turn it off by the way).  - Very nice pool but the surroundings are neglected with slabs and lawn/land... maybe it was not the time to welcome tourists yet, but no matter when you arrive, you paid for your vacation. - Unpleasant restaurant when it is invaded by speakers (3 conferences "doctors, technology  and metrology" during our holidays). Endless lines at the buffet and when it was our turn there was nothing left despite the turn of the room managers so that nothing was missing. They seemed overwhelmed especially at the metrology conference. - Bug of phones in rooms; woken for 2 days, 3x at night by untimely ringtones. Even the neighbors' rooms rang during the night and at nap time. I must have complained 3x. - Very firm bedding (we like it softer, each one his tastes) - Soundproofing of windows (single glazing). We were above the pool, facing the sea.The first days there were not many people but when families with children arrived it became too noisy. - The spa right next to the indoor pool. When I was scrubbing and wrapping, we could hear the kids screaming next door. Horrible for a moment of serenity. - If you like blow-drying, take your hair dryer because the hotel's is dated (it looks like a phone with a big pipe)  Points + and - but we had a good stay in general. Compared to some other 5* hotels already done in Djerba, Tunisia or Marrakech, this one was satisfactory. Another huge thank you to the lovely Walid (server), a wise and unique man.

Our stay at the hotel Mehari was outstanding. We have been enjoying our stay with all the services. The hotel is beautiful with two outsite swiming pools as well as one indoor. All very clean and nice to spend a relaxing time. One drawback the time available for the swiming pool from 8 am to 6 pm. But im sure in the summer season this changes for sure. The beach is in front of the hotel. The water was very clean also. The buffet very satisfactory, very good from my point of view.  You have lots of different foods and the fish is very fresh and it is prepared in front of you as well as the omelettes, the pasta and many more things. The rooms are nice, clean and big, the beds comfortable. Mine had a balcony,  you could see the sea. I want to highlight also that the spa was really nice, the person in charge Yaya,  was so nice with us. He made everything a great experience. Also the enterteinment man Hamza was very fun and we had music and karaoke everyday. I love singing, 💕.  I hope to return back to this hotel.  Its highly recommended .

Hamza DJ was amazing! We had the best time—he was an incredible host, super welcoming, and the friendliest person ever. Made the whole experience unforgettable! make sure when you visit ask for him as he will make your experience at meheri 10000% better

I had a great time at this hotel! The animators were amazing – super friendly, energetic, and always full of ideas for fun activities. They really made the whole experience unforgettable. The room was okay – clean and comfortable, with everything we needed. I would definitely love to come back someday. It was a really nice stay overall! Location was also really great, next to the beach and the airport.

i had the most amazing time i loved the breakfast and the lunch and the dinner and i loved staying by the pool and i loved the weather and i loved the experience as a whole i would definitely recommend to anyone that would want to come to tunisia and this hotel.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, amazing and one more time amazing
reviews.review_text: I love this hotel, the personnel is so nice especially bartenders and waiters. The entertainment team 😍 like from dreams they do amazing job. Khalil, Sofien and of course dj Shams thank you for the best holidays !!!!  lov u all❤️❤️ you must come here for holidays !

I absolutely loved everything!from the grounds to the service! Everyone's friendly and always smiling! The food is delicious! The animators are great! The rooms are comfortable and always clean! The area is very beautiful, beautiful views) I recommend this hotel❤️

reviews.review_title: animation are nice but other people could be nicer and the food could be better
reviews.review_text: the animation here is good there very nice and fun to be around some people are very out there and will flirt with you and make u feel uncomfortable the food isn’t the best but it’s nice to try new foods and there isn’t any internet in the rooms i think it would be nice to have internet for people to interact more

The hotel was fantastic! Comfortable rooms,delicious food, and stunning views. The highlight was the super animators who provided amazing entertainment and unforgettable moments. Highly recommended!!❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Big up the animation team who are amazing and have made our experience even better getting us involved with the activities such as beach volleyball. Rooms are nice and spacious and are always clean. Hotel is perfect for families with young children.

reviews.review_title: i loved the animations team,o think there could’ve been more food options seen as i didn’t like most of the food.
reviews.review_text: i think there could be been more food options. and less flirty people staff. after all it is a nice hotel, the room is really big but there was no internet, i think internet in the family rooms will do some good. people would be much happier with internet!!!!

The hotel loved it. Nice rooms, delicious food, great animation! The hotel staff is friendly and friendly. Checked into a hotel early this morning, no extra charge. The room was cleaned every day, the towels were changed every day, the linen every three days. Animation every day, the child (3 years old) enjoyed spending time with the animators in the miniclub during the day and in the evening at the minidisco. The food is varied and delicious, there is beef, chicken, seafood, lots of sweets, vegetables, side dishes and fruits (strawberries, peaches, melon, oranges).

reviews.review_title: A place where the soul rests and the heart rests
reviews.review_text: After a long separation from Tunisia, she finally flew back to this hospitable country! She was resting in May 2025, when the season was just gaining momentum. Despite this, the hotel was fully prepared for the reception: everything is clean, well maintained, everything works like clockwork. The hotel is located near the airport, I had the shortest transfer in my life - 3 minutes. This is particularly true for families with children. I had an early run, had no problem solving it.  Rooms are clean, spacious. Towels and linen are new. The hotel's food is fine, thanks to the chef. Everything was delicious, the choice of dishes is sufficient. Desserts, fruit, wine - all fresh and beautiful quality. The grounds are not small, there is no feeling of pounding. The beach strip is quite wide, clean, with virtually no algae. The entrance to the sea is smooth, it is safe to drive with small children and those who are not confident on the water. The sunbeds, the umbrellas, they were all there. Internet is fast and stable throughout the hotel except the beach. It's possible to work remotely for whoever is relevant. I would like to pay special tribute to the work of all hotel staff. Everyone works quickly and smoothly, I'm left with the feeling of being in a big, friendly family. The hotel has a massage parlour with various programmes. Salon owner Mehdi (doctor and part-time polyglot) will help to tailor the course to everyone's needs. A professional massage just brought me back to life! Highly recommended! The location is excellent - near the metro station, you can quickly get to both Sousse and Monastir. You can walk around these cities, organize a shopping or excursion program yourself. In summary: the price/quality ratio of the hotel is excellent, I will recommend to my friends and acquaintances. The hotel wishes success and prosperity for many years! Thank you for your wonderful holiday!

reviews.review_title: Terrible big up to animation and waiters but the management needs looked at
reviews.review_text: Animation and waiting team are amazing so helpful. Absolute terrible customer service from main manager also the way he treats his staff is horrendous  , cleaners stealing out rooms nothing gets dine about it 3 separate family's who don't know each other's clothes being stolen I will not be back and will make sure to tell tourists not to stay at Bella vista ,

Choosing with a friend a country for a holiday and the tour operator offered Tunisia. Not long thinking, bought the vouchers because the hotel discounted. And I didn't regret spending my vacation in this country! First of all, the season had just opened and tourists were scarce, there was no poolside, beach, queue for food. And we Russians could count on our fingers. Secondly, of the pros - the hotel's proximity to the airport (first brought, last taken!), near the subway station, the white sand beach, the sea is relatively clean and not deep, there is no seaweed and jellyfish, delicious food in the restaurant (fish every day), wine of good quality, separately prepare pizza and pancakes, polite waiters and always interested in health chefs! Animators - respect 👍🏻 Especially remembered handsome Sophen, who did not obsessively suggest anything to do, such as yoga or stretching, which we were happy to do)) Russian is not spoken much, but one feels that we are missed and the locals are very much waiting for our camback 🤩 Also in the hotel opened a massage parlor, whose owner Dr. Osteopath Mehdi, who worked for a long time in St. Petersburg (!) and speaks fluent Russian. Separately I want to mention masseur Shams 👍🏻 Truly, a professional from God🙏🏻 and I have something to compare. I took a course of five sessions and I was absolutely delighted! My personal recommendation!!! From the downside - you can see that the hotel has not been renovated in a long time. But you can close your eyes and not pick on it too much. I think if the prices of tickets to Tunisia are not draped, the people will go)) I am right, right!

It's my first time in Bella Vista and I think all the staff are really nice. Information at the reception is very good and the food is also good and the noise in the restaurant. Animation is always there too, gymnastics.I find a good hotel for families and we'll be back in September. Thank you for all your cooperation from Bella Vista

Worst hotel I've ever been in! Arrived at the end of April, I thought I arrived in a ghost hotel... Everything was closed: the Spa, the indoor pool (empty), the gym, the discotheque, 1 only restaurant open and again, 4 dishes that fought for the few tourists present, no entertainment... a disaster!!! And I am not talking about the pitiful state of the hotel and especially the exteriors: everything is in a state of abandonment. If necessary, the tennis court could be used as a swimming pool... but as the outdoor pool is not heated, it is difficult to swim there! The only good thing about this hotel is the friendly waiters at the bars and restaurants. A big thank you to them because it is not possible to say that it is their managers who lead by example... The "high places" are arrogant and not kind at all.

Amazing hotel located next to the airport and metro was close as well what was really helpful as well all the attractions are great and the stuff is fantastic  White  ,Zoa ,Sagon and Sunny were always nice helpful and took great care of us !  Food at the restaurant had good quality, Definitely recommend to spend time with a family!  We would gladly come back !

reviews.review_title: Hard not to fall in love with Tunisia 💛
reviews.review_text: I'm in a hotel with a family with two kids. The Russians haven't visited Tunisia en masse in a long time and we are missed frankly (Arabs ask in Sousse and Monastir when we will return). Witnessed the start of the season.  The first thing that matters is that the staff really makes the rest better. I've been to Egypt many times, never seen that. To eat: the choice is small but everything is very, very delicious, satisfied, chef well done. Music: God forbid the animator who has such beautiful taste, we get high on this accompaniment. Beach: the best sand in the entire Mediterranean - I confirm. On the beach is safe for any age - very smooth entrance. Ten minutes from the hotel is not only the airport but also the ground subway: for 30 rubles you can drive to Sousse and Monastir, a beautiful plus Tunisia. Bar pile: wine from bottles is great, beer and spill and bottles - delicious. Pizza and pancakes are amazing. The children's slides have also come. The wi fi is chic like home in Russia: fast and stable, incredibly catching in the room and kids playing network games. The hotel is as old as anything in Tunisia, but beautiful, atmospheric. Although the Dessole chain has long since left Tunisia, the positive plume remains, we have nothing to pick on for the amount paid at the start of the season. Satisfied and would return again. The hotel easily changes dollars into dinars. Nouvelair is a great carrier, Grand is a great TO. Prosperity, love for Tunisia. I'll be there in a year, even in Bella Vista if I can. I recommend Tunisia, if the price is not excessive. Because the Turks and the Egyptians have already overstated it. Ah yes cons: beach towels for 10 bucks (inadmissible :)) and tourist tax, we charged 7,000p for two.  Thank you Bella Vista, thank you Tunisia!

We was extremely happy with all attraction. All meals were very tasty and every day you could eat something different. During the there was a group of special Animators who organized various attractions for guests and especially for children. Really very good, helpful and nice young people. Every evening they also organized discos in the rhythm of different music. There is also a man on the hotel premises who organizes various attractions outside the hotel, such as: a pirate ship cruise, camel riding and many others. The entire hotel team was very polite and helped us every time we had any questions.

reviews.review_title: The holiday was very good and enjoyable I would come again every one was friendly and nice it was so fun and pool was
reviews.review_text: The services is very good and the people are very kind and friendly anamation is very good and fun the pool is fun rooms are good activities are fun the food and drinks are good the hotel is very good clean and peaceful the music is good I really enjoyed it

Good holiday, the hotel is suitable for families with children, the rooms were clean and fragrant, do not expect luxury, it is a classic Tunisian hotel. The food was so average, my husband didn't like it much. It wasn't bad, but once was enough.

reviews.review_title: Good value for money facing both the beach, the airport and the metro within walking distance.
reviews.review_text: Very pleasant staff and little care. Room always clean with very nice and smiling household employees. Self correct with local and European dishes. The hotel is more than 30 years old ...so we see that the materials are starting to get tired ... air conditioning , tiles , carpet ... But overall for the price it is more than good. We had a great holiday.

Great holiday! The pools are big and very good. The rooms are very clean and are cleaned daily. The food is very good and has a lot of variety. The entertainment team are amazing, lots of different activities every day and are very friendly. The shows in the evening are very good and fun! Had a great time and will definitely recommend!

amazing holiday, great pool beach and entertainment, would 1000% recommend  very nice country and people, there is different shows every night. Rooms are cleaned everyday. food is very nice and the hotel is very sanitary. can’t get any better!!!!

Animation team is good, different shows at night, fantastic sports, amazing environment and entertainment. The beach is beautiful with a variety of activities to do. The maids are exceptional and always do a good job. Overall an amazing hotel with lots of entertainment and a great animation team that never disappoints.

The worsted hotel we went! The rooms are very dirty, no WiFi ( just at reception )  The tv are not working also!  The towels, sheets and blankets are very dirty!  In the toilet the water is leaking! The food is not fresh we had bug stomach! Don’t come here never!

The organization of the stay by Sunshine Voyage was great, travel, reservations, excursions, golf courses impeccable. The main downside is the hotel reception and some waiters who are not listening to guests. The hotel by itself is very well located and well equipped, spacious rooms, pool very well, restaurant decent. It would take little to improve the service.

reviews.review_title: Great stay and a great welcome!
reviews.review_text: Superb stay with an exceptional hotel and entertainment team (especially Chacha who has a lot of patience at KidsClub )!! It's been three times that we come back and we plan to come back again 👍  Ideal for families or people in couples and alone because there are many activities to do around like the Nabeul market or the Tunisian desert. Thank you to the whole El Mouradi team and good luck for the high season 🙏

What truly makes you want to come back is not the hotel itself—which still has a long way to go to be considered truly comfortable—but the people who work there. Karim, who was incredibly kind and helpful during every meal, made a real difference. And the amazing, energetic, positive, and creative animators Ahmed and Mo brought so much joy to each day. Thank you for a wonderful holiday

Hotel with all the facilities: outdoor pool and indoor pool but in sad condition at the level of the rooms: defective toilet (feces in the bowl on arrival! ) shelves in the closet that no longer hold, hair dryer not functional, carpet stained... Welcome to the bar deplorable by some waiters. Our complaints , noted by a manager , were never considered . To highlight the hotel hosts seminars that make the buffet inaccessible and the room becomes too noisy. No consideration towards the customer

reviews.review_title: Wonderful stay in Tunisia in May, I highly recommend this hotel!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ☀
reviews.review_text: pleasant stay, friendly staff, animation team at the top good atmosphere 👍👍👍 Very professional maid. Large room facing the sea at no extra charge.  Save Hammamet Yasmine Location  I recommend the spa with my eyes closed 😁

I recommend Hela in thalasso for a pleasant and relaxing massage with a warm welcome. And also the welcome on arrival with attentive listening very nice place with pool and excellent food. I recommend this hotel...

We had a great time. The meals are good, a buffet with lots of choices. There is diversity every day. The staff are very friendly, kind and helpful. The animators on top.  Little flat, the bathtub, too bad it's not a shower.

Rooms are to be improved.  The animation is great and makes the difference compared to other hotels on hamammet. Our stay would not have been the same without momo and Ahmed!  Even in a wheelchair they took care of me!  Archery Momo! Ahmed at the disco and pool!  We will come back for them because we laughed a lot!

I liked the food and the atmosphere. Our room was clean. The animator Ahmed from the animation team was the best. The talasso was good. The pool was clean. The city Hammamet is also very nice to see and its worth going outside the hotel for it. The night show was very good because you could do a lot of dancing.

The hotel is amazing for the price, the waiters are kind and hardworking, the food was good and i want to say special thanks to the animation team especially Ahmed soo funny and nice dancer have big energy and nice talasso i like this hotel the best ❤️

It was amazing and everyone there us very friendly and kind. The pool and beach are beutiful and the food is amazing. I would definitely recommend coming here. Lots of options and choices at the bar for drinks , cocktails and beer soft drink etc

I recommend the hotel because the attitude of the staff towards the customers was incredible. My hotel room was cleaned by a beautiful maid, I was amazed at how clean the room was and beautifully arranged with flowers. The maid's name was Nadia, I recommend her with both hands. At the reception, the staff and the manager were very kind. The food in the restaurant was delicious. If you want a vacation with an incredible view and nice pools, I recommend the El Mouradi Hammamet hotel.

Very nice experience. I had a very pleasant stay the only negative point is the bedding and seminar that took place the same week as us. I want to thank momo Ahmed and chacha. They accompanied us and gave us a smile throughout the stay. Thank you for their good humor. The staff is really top (thanks to our server Yassin). Security is at the height of the hotel they are very attentive

I spent 2 weeks in April 2025 with my family. The stay a was very pleasant. I would like to thank momo and Ahmed for their joy their animations and smile throughout the stay. And a big thank you to chacha for taking care of the kids at the mini club

Very good staff, warm welcome and very kind staff towards guests. Thank you very much Ahmed for these evenings full of movement and energy. Regarding the hotel itself it is very impressive with three gr'es of the pools including one heated, several great restaurants and activities in the hotel such as a gym, spa and jealousies to make us spend pleasant moments with family or friends

The food was terrible and only really cater for locals. Meaning if you want any decent food your better eating out. The rooms are all unclean especially the bathrooms on the first night even after complaining they showed us 3 other rooms that we're all the same standard. The animation team was great (Chaima & Ahmed) they were brilliant with kids i would only recommend this hotel for the animation team that's about it.

The animators are AMAZING! Special mention to smile he goes above and beyond for everyone. They interact with the kids really well. The food choices are good and rooms are cleaned everyday to a high standard. The beach is also very nice which is on the resort. Everything perfect.

This hotel is great for couples and family. Everyday there is different activities and variety of foods. All staff are very lovely. And the animation team make sure your having a good time. Smile is one of the animation staff and he will have a laugh with you. There is so much to do including out of hotel activities. If travelling to Tunisia I recommend this hotel

We had a great stay at the hotel.  Food was good with a lot of options for everyone and pizza in the snack bar every day.  Rooms are clean and regularly cleaned   Animation team was friendly and fun.  Nothing bad to say about the hotel would recommend

We had a very nice stay at the Hotel. The Food and Drinks have been very good and the people working here have also been very very nice. The Animation team does a great job and its always so much fun talking to them. The shows are very nice and you have many different ones to go to. The rooms are very clean and cozy and the cleaning staff does a great job. All in all the Holiday was much fun and er would think about coming back next year.

It was our first time in Tunisia and therefore also our first time at the Skanes Serial. The welcome was very warm and friendly. Our room was beautiful and modern and even had a sea view. The food at the buffet is varied, fresh, and delicious. We particularly liked the animation team; they were always in a good mood and kept us entertained. Whether it was dancing in the evening or water polo during the day, you could always have a lot of fun with the animation team. The people behind the bar were always smiling, too. We are very impressed with our first stay at the Skanes Serial and would gladly come back.

Hotel at first sight that puts full view, quite a lot of relaxation areas, very nice, bar, halls, poolside, quite a lot of terraces The finishes are not very neat, drippings and drops of paint all over the walls and floors, paint scales ready to fall to the ceiling of the indoor pool, painters who paint the cactus pots in the hall, next to us, with a very powerful smell (and we are painters in buildings!!)  The room, structurally, the beds are 2 singles side by side, not top but no big deal, we had a total of 4 rooms and discovered cockroaches of an inch in all the rooms, as well as odor problems with tap water. The housekeepers are impeccable, everything is well cleaned and they are very attentive to our well-being. Many thanks to them On the food side, quite repetitive, not enough local dishes for our taste, no tagine or couscous buffet, little or no local pastry... Doubtful hygiene in seafood (smells foul in the dishes concerned), Vegetable preparations and pasta from the outdoor cooking point taken out to heat at 10:45 and meat at 11:20 while cooking starts at 12:30,  The pizzas are great, the buffet in the morning, the omelets are wonderful. Coffee is of the soluble type and no juice, as chemical drinks type tang.  Dirty beach Few daytime and repetitive activities but evenings are fun The staff, you don't have to have any worries otherwise we are little helped (worries umbrella, problem of fight and nuisance of some unmanaged families, but nothing very serious, an annoyance also concerning some who openly flirt with young minors, quite uncomfortable... Otherwise, a large part is very helpful, special mentions to the young woman of the morning omelets and the outdoor hot spot, as well as Mohammed in the buffet room:  extremely helpful, smiling and friendly. The tall thin young man animator, super pleasant with all generations. The man in the black suit and long hair in the room, very nice and helpful. And so, what about Samah, alone, it brightens us the stay with a force, it is beautiful, full of heart, generosity, a lot of humor and the care of the residents constantly. We love him!!!  Finally, all-inclusive stay, at a low price, we get our money's worth, beautiful meetings, the Tunisians are great!

I went on the 16th may until the 23th may 2025. On arriving we wasn't given any complimentary drinks like other guests I noticed. They check us into our rooms. We booked Sea view and ended up with Slide view instead. Awful views . As the days got warmer, the AC wasn't working and got told it doesn't come on until the 15th of June. Something we didn't know about before. As it says AC available.  The gym was in renovations. Disappointed again.  They have a nightclub on site. From 11.30pm until 4am. Loud music and vibrations from the speakers. It was horrendous. When asked to move they said no as no rooms were available. Awful   Positive side most of the staff were nice accept the guy on reception. He wasn't helpful at all   The food wasn't for me. But maybe each to their own.  I would visit Tunisia again but not this hotel  Some parts of your it very run down.  I know it was a 4* but the picture lie.

Visited in May, wasn’t too busy which was nice for us. Friendly staff in the kids club:) weather was great too and the slides allowed children of all ages on them. Really do get what you pay for and is a nice standard holiday if you’d like somewhere to get away and just relax. Food okay.

One week family holiday with a 2-year-old baby.   The rooms are ok, we ended up in a room sea view pool side, no nuisance in the evening or even in the afternoon with poolside activities during my daughter's nap.  The food is varied, good point for Berber bread 👍 super good. Snacks all day. For cheese , you can't expect real cheese in French... But the rest very well, hot flat salad, dish made minute... Nothing wrong.  Animation side: we were able to do mini disco every night with my daughter. Top animators, bingo evening, fakir, cabaret, Arabic class, a course on Tunisian cuisine. An oriental dance class.  Good point for the mini club 👍, with an animator who takes care of the children to leave us a little quiet to enjoy a little: Lego activities, coloring and puzzles. My daughter had a good time  Excursion: we made an excursion to Sousse and an excursion with the camels and visit a Berber village 👍 although my daughter was scared, everything went well.
Great hotel, 2nd time I come , great meal, nice staff and entertainment team at the top! Nice and varied evenings.  Private restaurant 3 times a week. I'll go back. 👍❤🥰❤😊🥰❤😊❤😊🥰😊❤😊🥰😊❤😊🥰😊❤😊😊🥰😊😊😊😊

Superb animations at the top especially Hanin (tenderness) in French the very varied meals indoor heated pool and all the staff listened thank you skanes serail Thank you all the team 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍

Warm welcome   Staff listening smiling  Restaurant nothing to say  Cook servers at our service  5***** We will come back thank you very much seral skates thank you bié for the whole Animation team 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

The hotel is very clean, we had a great welcome, despite our arrival time. We are very very happy with the service and friendliness of the Hamdi and Samah servers, the best servers!  Cook Heidi is great. He does excellent cooking, every lunch we went to eat what he does, he is an incredible kindness. Myriam is one of the employees, who makes omelettes in the morning and pasta at lunch is our favorite of the week, a love, the sunshine of the day, always smiling! Mokhtar and Karim are the waiters of the indoor bar, they are very kind and helpful. Always the touch of humor that makes you happy! These 6 employees helped make our stay even better! Thanks to them

Clean hotel and with ideal facilities for a family stay (swimming pool, aquatic area, playground), the staff is generally friendly although some should try to smile more... A special mention to Samah the waiter who was always very attentive to us during our stay, to the small care and pleasant with the children really a brave and hardworking man and the only one who took the crease to come and ask us what we wanted to drink and if need anything, while with the others it was necessary to claim.  We stayed in a comfortable surface duplex family room but a refreshment would be expected (wallpaper unstuck, no shower wall). The sound insulation is poor and you can hear the noises of neighboring rooms as well as the nearby discotheque.  Beach accessible directly from the hotel with clear water despite the algae but cleaned regularly.  You will have to take the bus or taxi for each trip, no amenities are located nearby, taxis in front of the hotel charge exorbitant prices.

Very nice hotel, despite the distance from Tunis airport. Friendly hotel, nice, staff at the top, especially at the service Samah who is a very nice, helpful man. All the general staff is welcoming, smiling. A young, dynamic animation team. I had a great stay at the hotel, I will come without hesitation. Recommendation ++++

reviews.review_title: Thank you very much to the whole team.
reviews.review_text: Top quality, impeccable service. Very warm welcome, meets all our requests. The hotel is just beautiful nothing to say. Animations at the top, especially the animators entertain us throughout the day and in the evening. Always taking care of the guests. Various music, very good dj. An unforgettable vacation, we will come back.

Very good hotel, very clean and entertainment was fabulous, shout out to hanin she made the hotel extra special thank you verymuch, I'll be back in September but this time with my family! Thanks skanes serail 🇹🇳😍🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

Very good stay at Skanes Serail where I came to spend a week of vacation.  The hotel’s biggest plus is its staff (animation, reception, shop...).  I was able to attend several evenings and activities (mini disco, gymnastic activity). All are super friendly and welcoming. The mini club leader is close to the children and loves working with them and it shows. The kids are thrilled to go and are happy to be together and it’s great to see, especially for a former Mini Club manager like me. I congratulate all the teams who make this stay unforgettable in every way.  Personally, I was able to spend a week of vacation in a beautiful hotel with friendly teams for children and adults alike.  I see pull my hat and I'll see you soon with my little brother who will be delighted to make friends at the mini club.

reviews.review_title: Very nice hotel but null services
reviews.review_text: Pros: The hotel is beautiful, the outdoor pools are fresh but amazing, fortunately there was the heated pool (stay April/May). Very clean hotel. The buffet is very good but almost every day the same dishes. Kids slides are great!  Cons: I confirm the nuisance of the club until 4am. Animations are missing, darts and pétanque only. The facilitator of the children's club does not take care of the children, she remains frozen on her phone and does not watch! (child found by the pool alone). You don't let kids in swimsuits into the hotel, but women who are, that's okay. You must regularly tip if you want to have cutlery quickly at the table, otherwise it takes time! The garden view is actually a view of a vacant lot where they do work from 6am to put sand back on the beach. Don't think you're going home rested!  Evening themes are not respected, it is day to day because sometimes the room is reserved for occasions (wedding, birthday). Remember to take a book or card game because in case of rain no animation is offered. Really bad because the setting is really beautiful!

A humiliating and disappointing experience at the Hotel Skanes Sérail – Monastir I booked a double room at this hotel via an international platform for me and my French companion. From the moment we arrived, we faced a discriminatory attitude. I was informed that I could not share the room at the same rate because I do not have a French residence permit, and I was required to pay an extra amount equivalent to almost the total amount of the reservation. No official document was presented to us, and when asked about the rules, they replied that they were ‘oral rules’, which is totally contrary to Tunisian and international law. Legal clarification: In Tunisia, no law provides for the payment of additional fees not mentioned in the final booking. The tourist tax is fixed and does not depend on nationality or residence status. Racist behaviour of employees: Being multilingual and speaking the local Tunisian language, I heard several employees insult European tourists thinking they did not understand. It was repugnant. I had two altercations with employees because of these unacceptable comments and behaviours. Poor and shameful services: Rooms without soap, without efficient air conditioning in May, and without mini fridge. Cleaning is done after 2pm, but there is a knock on the door from 9am to remove the towels. Presence of flying insects, especially in the bathroom. Dirty pool, foul smell of the sea due to algae. Elevator down almost every day. Constant harassment by tour and massage vendors in the hotel. Catering and Staff Attitude: Poor quality food without variety. No polite words like "hello" or "good evening." Implicit pressure to tip to be treated well. Taxis in front of the hotel charge excessive amounts. The hotel shop sells in euros at inflated prices, which is illegal in Tunisia. Conclusion: This is the worst hotel experience I’ve ever had: discrimination, negligence, filth and total disrespect. I would not recommend this hotel to any foreign traveler.  English: A Humiliating and Disappointing Experience at Skanes Serail Hotel – Monastir I booked a double room at this hotel via an international platform for myself and my French partner. From the moment we arrived, we faced clear discrimination. I was told I couldn’t share the room at the same rate because I don’t hold a French residence permit, and I was asked to pay an extra fee almost equal to the original booking amount. When we requested written rules, we were told these are “oral policies,” which clearly violate both Tunisian and international law. Legal Note: Tunisian law does not allow extra fees not mentioned in the final booking invoice. The tourist tax is fixed and does not depend on nationality or residence status. Racist employee behavior: As I speak several languages including Tunisian Arabic, I overheard several employees insulting European tourists in the local language, assuming they wouldn’t understand. This was disgusting. I had two confrontations with staff over these racist and unacceptable actions. Poor and shameful service: Rooms without soap, no working air conditioning in May, and no mini-fridge. Housekeeping after 2 PM, yet towels are collected as early as 9 AM. Flying insects everywhere, especially in the bathroom. Dirty pool and foul smell from the sea due to algae. Elevator out of order almost daily. Constant harassment from excursion and massage sellers inside the hotel. Food and staff behavior:  Low-quality, repetitive food. No greetings like “good morning” or “good evening.” Strong pressure to tip in order to be treated respectfully. Taxi drivers outside overcharge tourists. The hotel shop sells in euros at double the local market prices, which is illegal. Conclusion: This was my worst hotel experience ever — discrimination, filth, neglect, and disrespect. I strongly advise against staying at this hotel, especially for foreign couples.  Deutsch: Demütigende und enttäuschende Erfahrung im Hotel Skanes Sérail – Monastir Ich habe über eine internationale Plattform ein Doppelzimmer für mich und meine französische Partnerin gebucht. Schon bei unserer Ankunft wurden wir mit offener Diskriminierung konfrontiert. Man sagte mir, dass ich das Zimmer nicht zum gleichen Preis teilen könne, weil ich keine französische Aufenthaltserlaubnis habe, und verlangte eine zusätzliche Gebühr, die fast dem ursprünglichen Buchungsbetrag entsprach. Auf Nachfrage nach einer schriftlichen Regelung hieß es lediglich, dies seien „mündliche Vorschriften“ – ein klarer Verstoß gegen das tunesische und internationale Recht. Rechtlicher Hinweis: Nach tunesischem Recht dürfen keine zusätzlichen Gebühren erhoben werden, die nicht in der Endrechnung der Buchung angegeben sind. Die Touristensteuer ist festgelegt und hängt weder von der Nat

Total lack of respect from staff at reception Outrageous conduct  I filed a complaint against them.  They have no sense of knowing how to live  It's unworthy to put people like that in the reception.  I tried to contact the hotel manager in vain I was blocked at the front desk

reviews.review_title: Regular arrivals of tourists by bus
reviews.review_text: Very clean, breakfast excellent. Access to the swimming pool is not convenient by the ladders, risk of slipping as access is by a step.  No wifi in the rooms, mattresses for deck chairs for a fee. the big problem is the mass access by regular buses of Algerian tourists, mainly men who throw themselves on the buffet in the evening, leave more than half on their tables and stick badly. I'm not going back to this hotel.

Nice hotel good breakfast correct for the rate and well placed nice staff just breakfast an unpleasant waiter I did not mind to report the manager did his job badly spoken to customers but apart from this disrespectful hotel very nice

I came in early September, I give the full Rating. Value for Award very respected. Breakfast varied. Very spacious room, magnificent view, on the Kantawa port and Hannibal park, close to all amenities. Welcoming and very polite staff, adding very attentive. I loved my experience at this Pension. I strongly recommend it for a very limited budget.

Had a lovely 2 week stay here.   Rooms were clean, spacious and modern.  Grounds were well kept and very scenic. Plenty of space in the hotel to sit and chill out on the wifi.   Pool area was clean and plenty of brollys and sun loungers.   Bar staff were exceptional, they made amazing cocktails, service was speedy and personalised and they were always smiling.  Reception were helpful and friendly.   Food was yummy. Served hot and always replenished when things were getting low.  Maids were happy to clean and replenish the room with fresh white towels daily.  I will 100% be returning to this hotel.  Thank you.   Tips: *fly spray *tipping staff goes a long way

We booked this hotel via love on the beach, I really wished I read these reviews. When we arrived the hotel looked ok from the outside, it has a fair opposite which my kids were really excited about. On arrival there were big gangs of men sat outside and prostitutes leaving. Reception staff were rude and not helpful at all. The rooms was disgusting. Our feet stuck to the carpet, stains on carpets and beds and hair in the bath. The next morning we went to breakfast it was dark and not a single English person in there. As a blonde woman I was stared at by all men and woman. I have never felt so scarred.  I called the travel agent and they were not helpful at all, just told us to call the police. So we got our bags and jumped in a taxi, 5 minutes down the road was an amazing hotel called Marhaba Palace. They couldn’t help us enough. Sad to say we lost our money on that hotel but the move was worth every penny. Please please do not try this hotel.

I am from Wales but spend most of my life in Tunisia I liked this hotel very much clean food great but I will advise holiday makers this is not like all hotels mostly other cultures not Tunisian. And  you would feel singled out in the restaurant. But I am a person who mingles and I found most people lovely but overall hotel clean beautiful. Rooms cleaned every day. TV and fridge in all rooms without charge which was great all channels I enjoyed my stay I took videos pics.

reviews.review_title: Hotel does not have the value of 4 stars
reviews.review_text: Loud noise until late at night due to the musical parties organized each night followed by noise and noise at night in the corridors at the end of each evening, at around 3:00 a.m. power cut in the rooms until to 7:00 a.m. to save energy. You have to offer a few dinars to the agent so that he authorizes access to the swimming pool with jacuzzi. The rapas have no taste of rotten fruit, especially the cheese, it looks like soap. The rooms are not cleaned every day and a towel is taken away from you so that you end the stay with just one towel.

We (my wife, son and I) booked 2 rooms. The rooms stank extremely badly, the carpets were just black with dirt. The rooms were really always dirty. The disgusting smell starts in the hallway where the room is located. I reported this problem to the staff twice. The first time it was simply ignored, the second time they said they would take care of it but nothing happened. The bed linen is not changed. So really catastrophic. I have already been to many 4 star hotels in Tunisia but I have never had anything like this. Also in the restaurant: many local people come in groups (on excursions from other Tunisian cities) and empty the buffet in 5 minutes! It takes a long time for the buffet to be refilled... In the room (again): the minibar is always warm. The cooling doesn't work.  All in all I would avoid this hotel! It was our last time here in the hotel.

The security guards are an absolute disaster at this hotel. They are rude, they speak badly to you. I was really disappointed on every level. To avoid. The entertainment isn't the best, but they do their best. Average food

reviews.review_title: Price is high and service is average
reviews.review_text: Lighting is poor and rooms have dated decor  The pool has so much chlorine it hurts my eyes.  TV channels are unclear and the number of channels is very limited    All rooms opening onto the kitchen suffer from very significant noise due to the boiler  Weak air conditioning  The bedding lacks comfort

reviews.review_title: This hotel is a disaster! horrible ! Run away!
reviews.review_text: the worst hotel I have visited, this hotel is unheard of on all levels, starting with its stars: it is a hotel saying 4 stars is not even worth one star, very old we would say an inn Staff and waiters of the restaurant incompetent rude and thugs they charged me for the fish without my request and aggressive who fight with residents and tourists to send them away and prevent them from returning to the restaurant; I'll explain to you: there is the server of the space and the lower block, a thug who makes a fuss with the clients to reject them and send them back to the upper space and reduce the workload after even the bald server to adopt the same strategy of fighting and insulting residents to prevent them from coming back for their dinner They behave towards customers as if they are bothering them At the pool level, half of the chairs and deckchairs are private and reserved for outsiders. Half of the beach has become private and paid television does not work. No wifi in the rooms  The food is not enough for everyone and a tail of tongue during dinner For lunch there is one and only fast football outside in front of the hotel and as a result you have to queue for 2 hours to buy a sandwich (the queue in the hotel and outside Also ) Salafists, veiled people, people of all kinds reside in this hotel  lots of fights, noise and problems at night in front of the hotel and the disco. It is better to close this hotel, it gives a very bad image to hotels in Tunisia; NEVER AGAIN will I come back to THIS HOTEL or to Sousse

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel, good security, polite and friendly staff
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews, I wasn’t expecting a good hotel. However I was pleasantly surprised when I arrived. Was allocated the best room, beautiful views from a huge double balcony. I was the only English person in the building as there were mainly Algerian, however, the Tunisian staff were great, friendly and polite, particularly reception staff who are amazing  . Security was the best I’ve seen in Tunisia!   Thank you, I love the hotel 🙏🏻

Love this hotel and location is perfect travelled with friend .. very few English which never really bothered me lot of Algerian young boys .. never bothered me also... very friendly .. rooms cleaned everyday and fresh towels food repetitive but always something to eat .. do have problem with buying water with meal which is not good can't even take own (water) in restaurant .. no night time entertainment again don't bother me ..staff and security have been friendly and helpful when needed .. can't wait to go back 😊

Not great. No English people in the hotel, full of rude Algerians.  Not very clean.  Staff don't speak much english. Internet only works in reception and is not very strong, doesn't always work. The pool and the beach well mainted.Have got pictures but can't upload them.

The worst hotel I have ever stayed in in tunisia night club by reception on until 4am every night lots of tunisian men in hotel and lots of prostitutes in hotel coming in taxis ,and going in bar in hotel,we went ti reception at 2am to use WiFi and the staff trying to get us to go inside hotel didn't want us to see what was going on,got charged for a mat for sun bed had no rest at all to much noise at night,towels dirty marks all over them,carpets dirty,room smelt,corridors dark never again dont take familys there its like a singles hotel

Unacceptable hotel. The rooms are very dirty. It's not even worth staying. They even charged for pillows and towels in the pool and then they want to call it a 4-star hotel. The only thing worth it was its location. Otherwise, unacceptable hotel. We stayed from 23 to 31 July 2022 and changed rooms 3 times because the rooms were very dirty.

This hotel is located in a great position for Kantaoui  marina. That’s the plus point. Bad points…arrived around 9.30pm and shown to our room. Three light bulbs missing, it was so dark it was like Hannibal Lectors cell. Reported to reception and maintenance man came up straight away. Looked at missing bulbs and came back within 10 minutes to replace them all. This hotel is so dark and dreary I honestly thought it was named after Hannibal Lector (it might be, I’m still unsure). Everywhere you go it’s dark. We never ate here at all and ate out everyday. On our short visit it was rammed with lusty Algerian single men which, for two women is intimidating. My daughter sought help from the pool attendant, he looked after her and kept her safe from all those said lusty men. He was brilliant, can’t fault him. Friendly, protective and he respected women. On the day before we left, two different reception staff said our transfer coach to Enfidah was 9am. Arrived at reception in good time and no coach. Further investigation at reception revealed the two reception staff didn’t have a clue and the coach arrived at 8am so we missed it. A fantastic reception member managed to call us a taxi and we made our flight home in time. We will never go back here. Absolutely awful stay. It was an urgent late booking and we took what we could get. I was not impressed at all. Nice room and bathroom. Can’t say much else in good terms about this place. Definitely not great for lone female travellers.

reviews.review_title: Good Location; Slow Wifi; Not for Families
reviews.review_text: I Stayed in this Hotel for 06 days During the period of July -August. First what to expect : - 3 Pools : One for Adults + One for kids + A covered one (not free) - Private beach; Gym; Free Parking; Wifi; Bar & Lounge; Night Club (free entree) - SPA (Sauna, Jacuzzi, Massage, Face treatment)(not free)  - The Rooms: Small TV, Balcony; Free toiletries, Air Conditoning, the floor is covered with Carpet The Good: - The best thing about this hotel is its location, it's really close to manny beaches, to Hannibal attraction park, Aqua Palace (Aquatic games); Port El Kantaoui and other attractions. - The food is good, its an open buffet. - The Pools are great, Large and there is one for kids. - The Rooms are clean and with good views; The Shower is Big with a Bath.  - Free entree to the Nightclub except for the weekends  The Bad: - The Wifi is really Slow, You have no Connection in the rooms. - The Rooms are a bit Small and Old, The TV is Small with 4 or 5 Channels. - The Beach is small and full of algae. - The Staff is not that great, some of them are really rude. - The Nightclub is verry loud so expect it to be noisy really late at night. - The Food is good but the restaurant is really crowded; somtimes you have to wait up to 30minutes to get a plate. - Most of the residents of the Hotel are Young Algerians/tunisians, so i don't recommend it to families, especially at night the Club attract a lot of people.

It’s a very nice hotel with superb rooms. They even have carpets in the rooms and stunning bathrooms and the food in the restaurant is superb and freshly cooked in front of you. It’s very close to the port and beach and plenty of things to do locally

Highly recommended, this is a review from someone that has done 4 TUI Blues previously.   We had a 7 month old baby and we stayed for 7 nights in May 2025.  All the staff were fantastic with the baby and made her laugh and smile throughout the entire stay. Thank you very much.  Maha is the general manager and you can tell she takes great pride in her hotel and ensuring all the guests are happy daily. You always see her walking around talking to guests daily. There is an onside TUI rep who is friendly and approachable and you can buy activities if required.   Room:  Room was very clean and spacious, modern style with balcony. The room had an open sink and shower(with a door) and the toilet was in a separate closed bathroom. The cleaner attended everyday and cleaned to a high standard with fresh towels, clean floor and nice made up bed, we tipped the cleaner 20 Dinar and she was very appreciative.   When we booked the hotel, we asked for a double bed specifically and we received 2 singles. The reception were quick at sorting this the next day and fufiled our request.  We asked for a shower room on the day of departure and we were allowed 30 mins free of charge l  Restaurant and Bars: There is a main Buffett restaurant, a A La Carte which we did not book and a pool bar cafe for lunch meals. There was also a restaurant on the beach front, however this was closed for repairs at the time of our visit.  There is also a coffee shop restaurant which has a selection of sandwich’s, Pastries and Cakes all day.  The main buffet restaurant had a wide selection of vegetarian, vegan and meat options, a wide source of options to meet all needs. I was impressed by the freshly baked croissants and pizzas daily. There was also a pasta bar for lunch and dinner. There was a wide range of vegetarian and vegan options, and as being a vegetarian for 25 years, I had no issues with choice. There is a wide range of salad options and fresh fruits.   We always ate inside behind the deserts counter and the restaurant staff were always attentive to the requirement of the high chair on each meal time and would support with this.  The restaurant staff were always interacting with our baby keeping her company whilst we ate our food.   Restaurant was clean and tidy.  There was a few occasions with the food labelling was incorrect. One of the food labels states Lamb was Vegetarian and there was a Chicken Dish in the Vegan section. However, when mention to staff, this was rectified quickly acknowledged the error. As we had the baby we never drank alcohol and I would recommend placing some more mocktails on the menu, there was only 4. I asked if they could do an alcoholic cocktails without alcohol e.g Pina Colada; but they stated they could not do this.  We arrived at 22:00 one evening so we missed the dinner. They provided sandwiches as a a good will gesture on arrival. However, the only sandwich’s they had was Ham Sandwich. I understand it was a late arrival and good will gesture, however, a cheese sandwich to be included would be my recommendation to cater for deity requirements. The member of staff said to take the ham out of the sandwich…..  Pool: This was one of the cleanest pools I have ever seen in any hotel. The pool is spotless. There are 4 pools, one large one and 1 small one outside in the main centre. There is 1 heated pool inside the Spa area. There is also a pool on the beach front; however was closed for repairs.  Entertainment: There was a wide range of entertainment. If you download the TUI Blue App, this gives you all the information and booking required.  The entertainment staff were fantastic, especially Rico, he was a great laugh and credit to the hotel. The activities included Darts, French Boccia, Golf, Water Polo/Volleyball/Basketball. There was a few activities I never did like the range of fitness classes and Sholjbeck.  OAB: There is 2 supermarkets outside the hotel, one on the left and one on the right. I recommend the one on the right. There is a spa which includes massages and treatments, there is a steam room which you have to pay for. You can exchange currency in the hotel UK Cash only. There is a camera man onsite, from who you can negotiate the prices of your printed pictures. For a guide, we paid £40 for 14 printed photos. The camera man is very friendly and approachable and you’re able to set a time in the evening with him for some evening beach photos.   Overall, highly recommended holiday and we will return!

reviews.review_title: Bob and Denise will be back.
reviews.review_text: Start with a negative, only booked one week instead of two, animation team made a good holiday great. Big thank you to Sam,and his boys and girls, to many names to mention, so I'll say ALL, it's quicker. Room, food, service, entertainment, all staff, in a word excellent. If your considering this hotel, go ahead and BOOK IT. I know we will be returning.

Just returned after an amazing week at this outstanding hotel. All staff are excellent cant do enough for you,food is beautiful.Big thankyou to Mondher and Mohammad in the coffee bar,Nino and Gophy from entertainment team, Maha experience manager and Samir housekeeper.We will be back many times . Thankyou all for a amazing holiday.

Just got back after a week at this hotel, from the moment we walked in we were greeted by the friendly reception staff, even the manageress gave us a lovely welcome, and it smelt absolutely gorgeous.  The rooms were lovely and clean that was down to the lovely  Sondes  nothing was to much trouble for her. The beach and pool area were clean and tidy lots of sunbeds and the guy in the beach bar was amazing and so were the life guards. The food was out of this world there was something there for everyone  the waiters were lovely  especially  Saida he couldn't do enough for you and always had a smile, and Ahmed always made sure we had a table. We had a lovely time and would definitely recommend this hotel

An exceptional stay  Thank you to all the staff and especially to Salma, our maid. I recommend without hesitation this club  Great location also with access to the beach. The buffet of the exceptional restaurant, a very large choice of dishes, varied food every day. The waiters and all the hotel staff are lovely

reviews.review_title: Had a great time in the hotel
reviews.review_text: Nice hotel with really friendly staff. The entertainment team are really friendly and get everyone involved in the activities. There's something for everyone to get involved with from hard fitness classes to french bowls, darts, archery, bean bag tossing.. its all good fun. The entertainment team are brilliant and keep everything fun. The waiters are really attentive too.. both in the restaurants and by the pool. Couldn't fault them.

best hotel ever staff especially entertainment team  absolutely amazing very clean hotel fantastic tunisian people and extremely very friendly 5 starts food overall holiday 6 starts full recommend excellent activities beautiful and clean rooms with amazing staff <3

reviews.review_title: Tui Blue Palm Beach - amazing hotel with great staff!
reviews.review_text: We had an amazing time , the staff were unbelievably good and so helpful. The entertainment team were brilliant, amazing and so friendly, they were easy to talk to, everything was very well planned and all the activities were great fun. The entertainment team had plenty organised and a wide variety so there was something different to do each day. Definitely a great hotel, with amazing staff! Well worth a visit!

So I am sitting on my balcony after a bit of changeable weather day. As my trip draws to an end I wanted to review this beautiful hotel. The building itself is lovely to look at and the reception area is clean and impressive.   The staff are all so friendly and genuinely look pleased to see you. They are attentive yet professional at all times. This would include front of house staff to cleaners and gardeners.  Cleanliness - the hotel is spotless you will see staff cleaning constantly the hotel smells amazing because of it. Our room kept pristine by Sonde our cleaner.  Pool area is large with one unheated pool and a smaller children's pool. The temperature is more than bearable with lots of people using it including myself. The infinity pool looks like there is improvement work being done so can't comment on use.  Food and drinks - I have been to many all inclusive hotels but I have to say this hotel offers choices many don't.  Fresh juice in the morning NOT from a carton also smoothie of the day. Again freshly made and included. The salads are amazing and to be offered steak and langoustines as part of buffet !!  A l a carte culinarium - one free meal within a week stay. Easy to book with Tui app.  4 course meal with lots of choice.   Spa - what can I say the highlight of my trip some of the best treatments I've had. Trust me I've had a lot. Hands down beats and cruise ship Spa and for a fraction of the price. Excellent packages offered you'd be mad not to take advantage of this.  All in all feel like I've had a wellness break and will definitely be back.  Well done TUI blue palm beach.!!

The entertainment team have looked after us very well. They want to get all guests involved in the activities but they are not pushy. The bar staff make sure the drinks are flowing at all times and there is plenty choice of food. The beach is lovely and the staff are excellent.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel with a fabulous team
reviews.review_text: I cannot fault this hotel. It’s spotlessly clean, the food is great, hot with lots of variety and great live food stations. The drink  which for  local spirits is better than other all inclusive I’ve been to. The entertainment is standard for a hotel but the team are absolutely great at making it the best they can BUT the best thing about this hotel is the staffing team who are absolutely fabulous. Everyone made our stay special and we enjoyed every minute.  The spa is definitely worth a visit as well and the little shop on site holds some absolute bargains,

Myself and my partner stayed at this hotel for 10 nights. The entertainment was great, there was never a day without checking we were ok and always different entertainment throughout the day. There was always a good variety of food to choose from. All hotel staff and bar staff were friendly and polite.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Stay at the Tui Blue Palm Beach
reviews.review_text: We have recently returned from a 10 day stay at the Tui Blue Palm Beach hotel in Hammamet, the staff were amazing with us and always polite.   We were greeted by friendly members of staff as soon as we arrived, who took our bags for us, and then seated us down for complimentary drinks as we filled in the paperwork for our stay at the hotel. We were then issued with our wrist bands, and informed that as we had arrived on an early flight, our room would be available after we had helped ourselves to some food and refreshments for lunch in the Main Restaurant.  The food, where do I start?  there was always a great selection of food on offer in the main restaurant, ranging from local foods, to a fully stocked salad bar 3 times a day , this included every morning freshly baked Croissants and pastries, and freshly made pizzas at lunch and evening meals. There are three Restaurant areas in the hotel, The Main Restaurant i have already described, The Snack Bar, Unfortunately we didn't get to try this, but i have read previous reviews that have said it is lovely, and then we have The Cullinarium, one word, WOW, the food here is another level, you can eat once here for free during your stay if you are All Inclusive, and any other time there is a charge, and it is best to book a table on the TUI Blue App when you are there. We visited the Cullinarium for my partners birthday during our trip and as i said, WOW, 4 courses, Drinks, breadsticks and dips on arrival, and the service was impeccable, they even sang Happy Birthday to my partner whilst putting a cake with a lit sparkler in front of her, its the little details that make such a difference.  The Accommodation was spacious with all the amenities that you would need ranging from a Mini Fridge, to coffee making facilities. the only thing missing was an iron and ironing board, but i am sure that the Reception would be able to assist with this. there is even a laundry service available for guests should they require this, which i think is a nice touch.  Entertainment was provided the entertainment team on a daily basis ranging from, Darts and French Boules, to Water Basket Ball and Water Polo. there is also a wide range of live entertainment in the evenings on a daily basis, all of which are very enjoyable.  A special shout out has to be made to Maha, Nothing was too much for her, anything from getting a fan for your room if it is too warm, helping you find the on site nurse, or helping you plan your next visit, should you wish to do so, and she was always willing to take the time to talk to the guests, and make them feel comfortable and happy during there stay.  Would highly recommend this hotel if planning a trip to Tunisia.

We visited last year and had a great time, the staff are all very friendly, attentive and have time to make you feel welcome. The hotel has made improvements since last year, including a lift from reception to the restaurant level, I think the management genuinely listen to their guests and want to improve their experience. The food is varied and is great, sunbeds are plentiful with towels provided and cushions of needed. Entertainment is provided throughout the day and evening. We will return again!! Thanks to all the team.

This is a very nice hotel with a gym, indoor pool, outdoor pool and an infinity pool. The entire staff are great and can't do enough for you and there's entertainment on the night with some fun activities in the day. The buffet restaurant always had a good selection of food on the go, they had mundane stuff like chips but also had local dishes with peppers, chillies, cuscus, rice and curries etc, they also did themed meals like Mexican where they made fresh tacos among other things and also had a great selection of puddings. So the bad points, which aren't so bad, the rooms were a little tired in places like the shower was a bit wobbly, just little bits and bobs really, our room had 2 single beds rather than a double, but this is nothing that would put me off or detract from the holiday experience.

This is a lovely hotel and the accommodation, the staff and the amenities are very good. It’s ideal for a holiday where you just want to stay in the resort and relax.  Food in buffet and in a la carts restaurant was excellent and diverse (unless you’re vegan as the choices there are very limited). Thankfully I’m not vegan so had a lot of lovely meals there. Waiting staff were very attentive and I’d like to mention one of the waiters (Faycel) who made amazing efforts to look after everyone in his area of the restaurant and made people feel special when dining. Only negative for me was that there’s not much to see near the hotel so a taxi (or a walk) to Hammamet Old Médina was a must. The new Médina at Yasmin was not so good. We took the offer of a Sahara excursion and that was definitely worthwhile

Have just returned from a week at this fabulous hotel. From the warm welcome on the first day to the last early morning breakfast on the last, this hotel does it all with style and a smile. Room-very modern design and perfect, spotlessly clean, Food- What can I say, there is something for everyone and plenty of it. The whole F&B team were just excellent. Big shout out to Ahmed who was there with a smile and a bottle of Rose or a beer at every glance. Animation team-excellent, really worked hard to involve everyone and all I'm going to say is "silent disco". If you know you know! Pool deck and beach were fabulous, but please provide sunbed mattresses for pool beds, beach and garden beds have them and my old creaking back would have sure benefited from one. The views from the lobby to the sea really does give you that wow sensation. This is one very good hotel with excellent staff!  Of course there can be some small improvements (hooks in the bathroom to hang towels please) and the aforementioned mattresses' for pool sunbeds, but these really are minor.

My husband and I, daughter and 5year old grandson stayed 2nd May 25 for a week and we instantly regretted not booking for longer. We had two garden rooms which were lovely and cleaned daily. We were a little disappointed that the mini bar wasn’t replenished or even had soft drinks upon arrival and only water provided.  However, everything else made up for that.  Upon arrival Mayha escorted us to the restaurant to have lunch and showed us around, until our rooms were ready. Straight away we could tell the people made this hotel. Our grandson has severe coeliac disease (not able to eat gluten).  GF bread, pasta etc is extremely expensive in Tunisia. However they tried their very best to accommodate and we always found something for him to eat. We did take our own  GF bread & cereal  & snacks with us etc.   But there was a lot of choice for him. The chefs were amazing and so was our lunch and evening waiter, forgive the spelling but our waiter  Chadll and Karim were outstanding from that first lunch visit they memorised our drinks which were waiting for us at meal times.  Our breakfast waiter Ahmed (I think his name was the exact same) he also assisted us and opened up for breakfast early the morning of our pick up to the airport, so we could eat something. This was very kind and helpful. Thank you.  From life guards, security, cleaners, waiters, management and animation team all so  hard working staff, again unable to name you all, I can only remember Nino & Gorfy and the lovely lunatic who does the aqua HIIT and gym, simply amazing - thank you.   We did enjoy  a catamaran trip which was bought through the hotel for  £37 each ( no charge for 5 yr old) for half a day was lovely and it was safe.  We’ve already booked for next May but for 11 nights this time  and not 7, but we’ve opted for 2 sea view rooms next time as this has the sun on the balcony in the mornings which we liked.   The sea views do overlook the entertainment at night so if you go to bed early I’d pick a garden view.  See you soon and take care x

I will come back to it without problem.the staff with little care all day.very friendly we feel to be part of the family so helpful.especially the waiter Mohamed who does not exist to inform me of places to visit.bravo to the housekeeper who was decorated free note room just out of kindness and free.the food is very varied and delicious.go without problem.the bartenders make you cocktails hell.they deserve its 4 stars.

Pleasant stay in this very clean hotel where the staff is really friendly smiling who is in the little care of the maid from the catering and reception.Nice spacious and clean room the little more the toilets are separated. We are delighted in all respects Nothing wrong

reviews.review_title: May half term family trip - will not come back!
reviews.review_text: Stated at the hotel during May half term.   On arrival we were greeted by nice receptionist who asked for a print out of our reservation. Wasn’t interested in name on the reservation just the actual print out with booking reference number ( make sure you have this handy before travelling) we received the key and originally our room was allocated on a ground floor. Concierge followed us in order to show us the room and assist with bags, eventho we didn’t ask for assistance.   Once the door opened OH MY GOD ! the room stunk! Dirt was visible straight away on really min amount of furnitures, the bed sheet felt damp and the bathroom was crying for help! Absolutely disgusting 🤮   Went straight back to reception and ask for immediate room change as there was no way we could stay in that room for the whole week.  We have been offered another room, again the concierge followed us to show us the new room, nothing wrong with great customer service, however he didn’t want to leave the room unless tip was given ! New room was spacious with huge terrace overlooking the street - much better !   If you leave a tip for housekeeping staff - your room will have flowers on the bed and lovely fresh towels - if you don’t leave any tip - you will get bear minimum. However all housekeeping ladies we came across were always smiling and polite to us.   Following morning we went to get some breakfast and we have never came across a Buffett area where food is portioned by staff onto your plate.   If I have paid for all inclusive option, why am I getting only 1 piece of this and that and when asked for more the judgment on staff faces who “served” the food its unreal! We felt extremely uncomfortable wanting 2 eggs not 1 🧐 Food Options for lunch are “recycled” from the night before dinner, again food isn’t too warm by the time you reach your table.   We have noticed that if you tip staff at the beginning of your stay you will be treated differently than if you tip them at the end.  Some staff also pay more attention to those who are either regular guests or the ones who can give them more tip.   Entertainment team tries their best to keep everyone busy but timing for kids activities are all written in French and announced in French so we had to keep asking what time anything is happening so our little one could join.   Swimming pool and the slides are ok, however cleaning standards are not always good.  All staff speaks French, English is not very popular and all the announcements are done in French so often times, we didn’t know what was going on.   We went onto 2 different trips offered by a rep at the hotel - we had a great time however if you do decide to go for any extortion make sure you have cash on you - yet again it’s all about tips.   Overall experience - not great, more like a budget hotel with a pool - thank goodness weather was lovely.  Would we recommend staying here - nope but we will return to Tunisia 🇹🇳

Perfect stay to rest by the pool with young and old  Various and correct catering. Perhaps ice creams are missing especially for the snack and yogurts for the little ones. Cleaning remains to be reviewed as well as cleaning of towels. A special mention for Dido being part of the animation team that embellished us our week!!!!!

The only time I felt so comfortable and welcomed was in Morpheus' arms once I wrapped myself in my blanket. Now I found a second time to this feeling, housed in the Zodiac hotel, thanks to the whole animation team, and all the staff ⭐

Great atmosphere and the team very invested in activities and encourages you!  Activities are diverse. In general the rooms are nice as well as the architecture.  The staff at the top.  I recommend it if you want to spend the best holiday in Hammamet!

Second time at the zodiac and always very pleasant stay. Various buffet, smiling team and available!  Special mention for the animation team really great, bella susie ach malek and the others without forgetting medhi! I recommend.  See you soon!

reviews.review_title: Very good experience at the zodiak family club in Bouficha
reviews.review_text: So from the arrival I was greeted as it should be, cocktail arrival, personal care. The hosts are super nice, very nice. Special mention for Malek, Bella and Suzi who welcomed me super well and made me feel like home. Lots of activities throughout the day. Very good restaurant and tasty cocktail.

I had a great time at the zodiak club. From the arrival I was quite impressed by the kindness of the staff! They are very helpful and attentive! The room is clean and cleaned every day! We don’t have time to be bored there are activities all day! The hosts are super funny and adorable, I will admit that I have a preference for Bella, Malek and Souzie! As soon as you arrive try to look for them they are adorable!

I had a great stay at this hotel, the staff is very kind , the restaurant is good. The staff is very helpful on arrival they take the suitcases so you don't have to carry them. They are all very polite and I have a preference for three hotel animators who are Malek, Belle and Souzi and all the team. They are adorable I recommend them as soon as you arrive.

reviews.review_title: A Great Family Holiday – Don’t Be Put Off by the Negative Reviews
reviews.review_text: We’ve just returned from a fantastic family holiday (2 adults, a 7-year-old, and a 15-year-old), and honestly, the hotel doesn't deserve the bad reviews it's been getting.  First of all, it’s important to be realistic. This is a developing country, and while it's rated 4 stars locally, that doesn’t mean it's the same as a 4-star hotel in the UK. But once you adjust your expectations and look at it logically, there’s a lot to appreciate here.  The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful throughout our stay. From reception to housekeeping and entertainment, everyone made a real effort to ensure we were happy.  Our room was cleaned daily, and fresh towels were always provided. The pools were clean and well-maintained, with plenty of space for the kids to enjoy themselves.  As for the food, there was a different theme each night, so we never felt bored with the options. Yes, the children’s food options were fairly similar most nights, but that’s quite common with all-inclusive packages. There was always something they could enjoy.  One of the real highlights for us was the entertainment team—they truly go above and beyond to get everyone involved and make the evenings fun.  Overall, we had a lovely time and felt well looked after. If you come with a bit of understanding and an open mind, you’ll have a great holiday too. Don’t let the negative reviews put you off.  Would you like me to tailor this for a specific platform like TripAdvisor or Google Reviews?

Highlights of the hotel l entertainment team at the top!!!!! meals are good, our room tjr very clean every day, just lack of towels with a little more thicknesses!! French speaking hotel that allowed us to get to know each other a lot c was very nice (if qq recognizes me c is pat 2 of the pétanque) Point weak no direct access to the beach it belongs more to the city and not at all maintained!! You also have to go far to say to do qq chose!! if you have the opportunity make the catamaran proposed by Mohamed who proposes the pirate ship to the hotel Staff and servers also very nice

I had a great stay at this hotel, the staff is welcoming and the food is good and the animators are too kind, dynamic and smiling  The room is beautiful  Quality services price and top!  I recommend this hotel

reviews.review_title: Super holiday with great entertainment team
reviews.review_text: Great hotel, we had a great stay, very welcoming. The hosts and staff are super friendly and friendly. The pools and slides are great. The rooms are spacious and clean.  Great hotel! I recommend you 👍🏾
