We had a great time, the animators were super top! My girlfriends and I were delighted we were treated like princesses again thank you to the whole team we will come back with pleasure!  (I highly recommend you do the quad it was a great experience)
Great stay as last year animation the restaurant the spa the quad parachute.  Great mohamed team at the restaurant 🥰 thanks to the animators zuzi and dido 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍

Welcoming hotel with good family space , the animation is on TOP thank you to Dido, the buffet and good quality, pleasant stay with the medina and coffee safsaf at the top for a good evening chicha , we will return next year to relax and enjoy Tunisian life in the back season (25-30 degrees)

A week of pure madness with friends in this hotel, and frankly... it was the fire! 🔥 We had fun from morning to night, and even beyond (thanks the evenings!).  The animation team? Good-humored machines! Always there to make us move, laugh, dance... Impossible to be bored, they assured serious 💯  Food level, nothing wrong: we ate well, it was varied and super good. And to recover after all that, the rooms were top: quiet, clean, and perfect for a good night's sleep (or a well deserved nap 😴).  And so... THE ZANZIBAR 😍! A crazy atmosphere, cocktails banging, good music, crazy laughs galore... we would have stayed there all night (actually, we did 😅).  In short, a week that we are not about to forget. We will definitely be back. And you, come as you are, but come quickly!

We just spent an unforgettable week at the hotel with friends, and everything was just perfect! The atmosphere was top from start to finish. Special mention to the animation team: amazing, funny, always full of energy and with little care so that everyone has a good time. Congratulations to them, you set fire 🔥!  As for catering, we feasted every day. Various meals, tasty, and for all tastes. Jean Zibar? An experience in itself! Awesome atmosphere, delicious cocktails, and evenings that we are not about to forget.  The rooms were comfortable, quiet, and we slept really well after busy days.  In short, a perfect week with friends, to do again without hesitation. Come as you are, you will leave with memories full of your head!

Hello, I enjoyed absolutely everything, thank you for having a nice time, absolutely no downside. Meals are super, watermelon and strawberries, every day, a variety of meals. Thank you!!!! Have a nice stay at this hotel. Room Spacious

A great stay in a very good hotel with great service and a great entertainment team! Dido at the mini club is great ❤️ The restaurant is very good, we eat very well and the waiters and cooks are all great. The service in the rooms is very good and the pools are great!

We went to this hotel from 10 to 17 May 2025 , very good wide choice service, very good meal and diversified simple and effective. Perfect welcome on all the staff, little crush on our maid room 211 ✨️ and a big thank you to Hamza at the bar super service, simply little catch on the noise in the rooms in the morning from 07:00 we all hear absolutely all... pity if not great hotel.

The hotel is amazing we was Here family we Will come back Here again the animation team is great always smiling activities the staf is Nice the pool is big the food is very delicious the sea is Amazyng the service are very friendly the bar man top is very Nice

Hotel and friendly 8/10 The animations and therefore the animators are friendly and very nice 9/10. The pool is large and enough deckchairs for everyone 9/10. Level catering we eat rather well 8/10. So I recommend this hotel  Total: 8/10

Good value for money. Great entertainment team. Complete buffet and healthy food. Beach easy access.serviceable. Interesting thalassotherapy treatment. Various activities.lots of dance. Several nationalities and good understanding. To do

Came with a friend for a week, great place! Very tasty food, convenient exit to the beach 🌴 The team of animators is friendly and unobtrusive, everywhere will help, all will prompt. Rooms are conveniently located. I'd love to be back here for two weeks.

We had amazing holiday it was great me and my mom the animation is very friendly the is staf is good the service are very nice the food is very delicious the pool is very big and clean we will come back here again it was very beautiful experiance !!!!

There are many activities: pétanque, aquagym, step, water polo, volleyball finally you will find something to satisfy and relax. The hotel is clean! The self wide choice! Tunisians are welcoming. Of course recommends

Perfect Italian animation, both in following the customer and in the activities, the restaurant is not one of the best in terms of food compared to last year but the staff was great, while the general cleanliness was poor, the Italian cook really good but unfortunately very limited in making Italian dishes.

Great stay at this club, I stayed with my sister for a week. Animation at the top, and great animator! The hotel is clean and maintained. The buffet is very good, we always ate well. Not to mention the kindness of Tunisians. I recommend. Go ahead with your eyes closed 🥰🥰🥰

We had great experience in this hotel me and my boy friend we will come here again it's lovely and sweet people the animation are so great and smile every day and lot of energy the pool is very big  The sea and sand are very very amazing the food is very delicious the rooms lady is very friendly too we will come back next year

Hotel top , fantastic organization and especially great animation and staff are real sunbeams . For my first holiday I recommend it to 10,000 percent 😊activities diversify and the best of having everything beach not even 200 meters away. Real happiness

Top hotel, amazing entertainment team and cleanliness.  Good catering  The rooms are decent and superb views of the pool and the sea Good atmosphere, very friendly and very family friendly.  I had a great time.  I recommend.

Very good staff is very friendly which offers quite a lot of activities from morning to evening. People are friendly, a beautiful beach with various activities also. Activities are offered for children also with a staff that looks after them very well we can trust them

I had very beautiful time this hotel is Amazing the animation team very friendly the staff is very good the pool and very clean and big the service is very good the food is very delicious is was great experiance in this hotel i will come back again

Hotel top, friendly staff and animators at your service. Spacious and clean room. Ideal location. Recommended. Price correct. And a great professionalism of Mahjoub the jeweler. Beach and swimming pool top. Catering very well.

reviews.review_title: A truly incredible week, we are delighted to have stayed at the Thalassa Mahdia!
reviews.review_text: We spent a great week in this very welcoming hotel!  We will not hesitate to recommend it and come back! A very pleasant staff and an entertainment team at the rendezvous. A special mention for the animators Sam and Bibo, the best!

This is my 3rd time in Tunisia and i have to say it is a way better experience than first 2 times. Food is delicious and drinks(even all.inclusive-local) are satisfatory. Hotel staff have all the info needed so do jot be afraid to ask.  All in all recomend!

Staff is great and helpful. Food is above average and way better than in previous experiences. Rooms are clean and Cool. Animation staff are very smiling and Also very friendly. Experiences is super and i approve it. Beach is Also very clean and Worth to visit.

Hotel very well animation very well beach very well the room and well the room also the pool and slides well the staff is very kind every day, there are very nice shows Panini and pancakes and At the pool in the afternoon!

Hotel and entertainment at the top animator at the top of the tops the animators are very nice come every day for us to play with them the room will very well persol very nice with us every day there are shows with the animators. Really good stay. Here we come back.

We had a great stay with my mother, the welcome is very warm and the animation is always very nice, the restaurant is very varied with lots of choices. The spa is very friendly also with many categories of massages we had a great time.

reviews.review_title: surprised by the quality of this hotel which was our "plan b"
reviews.review_text: renovated rooms.. I liked the sea view and the outdoor and indoor pool. the gardens are clean and well maintained.. Thank you to all the staff especially those at the reception. The buffet is not varied but at least delicious and that is the most important.

reviews.review_title: A must-do hotel that needs work to improve the conditions of their stay
reviews.review_text: I had a nice vacation despite the shortcomings,Please ask the management to work on improving a few points, first good reception, my receptionist was great, and the baggage carrier was a very good man, the staff of the restaurant was great, the food was sure we were hoping to be more diverse, the desserts are poor compared to the 4-star hotel, the bad thing about the restaurant is that there are no dishes and caps at the disposal of the residents and we have to stand long for a glass or a plate ... The worst point is standing in the long lines for a pedestrian, let's look at this point because it was so annoying for my family and also for other families we know of the hotel so many of them destroyed and promised not to come back again. Last pay les matelas and even the scratch is really catastrophic, I recommend the adjustment is bad and not working, we also hope to review the prices compared to the quality of their servants is reasonable, and congratulations to every staff working at this hotel, please when you return if these remarks are taken into account and thank you.

reviews.review_title: A hotel or gatekeeper makes the law ⚖️!!!
reviews.review_text: The guard of the entrance to the car park of the Itropika Tabarka hotel on 17/04/2025 at around 10:00 pm, we were two people came to visit the pretty city of tabarka as a tourist me of Algerian nationality and my friend of Russian nationality, we were advised the hotel of itropika to get drinks and possibly eat, but we were surprised by the guard at the entrance of the car park who refused us access because the hotel is full and the access to the restaurant bar is strictly reserved for tenants, we tried several times to let us access at least the reception to talk about it but his refusal was categorical and we came back empty-handed The next day On 18/04/2025 we try a second attempt, this time we show up at 6pm to see if there was a possibility to reserve a place at the restaurant for the evening, we were greeted by the receptionist who directs us to the caretaker (same from the evening before) to give him our names!!! Now I wonder how a guard at the entrance of the hotel has more prerogatives and decision-making power than the receptionist or the people of the hotel administration, I will leave you to answer me  For my part I do not hide my disappointment and frustration about this incident especially in the company of a foreign person of Russian nationality... I find this very serious!

reviews.review_title: A real second hotel in tabarka!!!!
reviews.review_text: Pleasant stay, very attentive reception, as well as the housekeeper of the rooms who put a fridge I needed in a very short time, very diversified catering, apart from the cakes not on top!! And TV not Astra!!! Beautiful internet in the rooms

The worst hotel in my life  It does not deserve mm 3 stars  Restaurant disaster Central heating not working It's not really clean  In addition they force you to buy water in the restaurant at 4 euros a bottle  In general it was a bad experience

I stayed one night in this hotel and it was horrible, it barely deserves a star. No mini bar in the rooms, a bad smell coming from the kitchens, a camping bed as a third bed in the room. Regarding food, insufficient quantity for all residents and the choice is quite limited. I do not recommend this hotel which does not even deserve the 3 stars.

food is disgusting do not choose the full dressing It's horrible... worst food ever!!!! The food is disgusting... bad exeperience Tabarka is too beautiful in several places to visit anyway but not to eat at this hotel it's a disaster

reviews.review_title: A hotel in urgent need of renovation
reviews.review_text: Advantages: ✔️ A beautiful view.  Disadvantages:  ❌ The hotel is outdated and requires urgent renovation.  ❌ Lack of mini-bar in the rooms.  ❌ Poor sound insulation in the rooms.  ❌ The animation is only for children.  ❌ Lack of professionalism: I was woken up in the middle of the night at 1am to report a leak in the hallway, apparently from my room. I had to pick up my things urgently and change rooms at 2:00 in the morning, which disturbed my sleep.  ❌ Full board, even bottled water is charged at an extra charge (4 dinars for a 1 litre bottle).  ❌ The quality of the food is poor, with little varied menus and almost identical every day.  I took some pictures when I left.

Disappointed room very small and without can lit dirty and unheated swimming pool and the lifeguard spends the afternoon sleeping while the children plunge catastrophic dishes and are served cold the staff not warm except with those who give tips

reviews.review_title: Hotel has small Award but with large and clean rooms
reviews.review_text: Clean hotel Spacious room large pool, greenery well 👏 👌 🙌  warm welcome to the reception  For breakfast no variety It is considered one of the best four-star hotels, but the quality of the food needs to be improved.

good location with sea view but I do not recommend booking with this hotel, no service, no respect, and everything is old and the manager with very low level ...........................................................................0000000000

An excellent stay, the animators soussou and micha were at the top. The buffet was super good except the pastry.  The rooms are clean and large. I thank the receptionists for changing the room. Coach is dynamic.

Pension I am currently in this Pension I do not regret the room 237 excellent the 2 elevators works the food at the restaurant fish grill and several varied dishes at will the waiters are always present with kindness I recommend this Pension in the evening with singers beautiful atmosphere I recommend this Pension

The positives are the pool, the animation and the proximity to the beach otherwise everything is really limited; the cleanliness of the room, apart some nice people from the staff the others are really to see, the mediocre buffet is the most catastophical point; very little variety, bland meal, you go 10 minutes after the beginning you find nothing a little drinkable without counting the hellish chain for standard food like pancakes, melon.. Short to advise against.

The staff at the lodge : Standard, excellent ethics and servants.  Services : Excellent Activation : Excellent and high-end.  Cleanliness : The rooms are clean. The lodge is clean. The pool is clean according to the only shape is the sands of the sea on the lodge level. Cleaning must be daily..

Hotel lahi ybark pisin la plag lmakla servise buen walah mliha les chembr lah ybark tani ndaf ist9bal mlih fiha animation llolad sghar walah haja mliha lah ybark nnsh bih ljmi3 wahd mn alg wla ay blad y3ni shrat mhlbin flil walah ahsen hootell❤️

Thank you 3la hosen el est9bel thank you for the rooms ndhaf b zaf w l air conditioner w for el pool ciest very perfect w el bhar zada b zaf ndhif and el mekla bnina w ndhifa ke am very happy for this holiday and entertainment t😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍oppppppp for children and evenings ♥️♥️

A great Pension, we stayed there as a family for a short stay and there were no regrets. Very welcoming and very professional staff, no problem on arrival. The rooms are quite spacious with comfortable bedding. The food is very good and varied. The Pension has a large swimming pool which is always clean and lively, access to the beach is immediate, with plenty of playgrounds.  Only downside, no fridge in the rooms. In short a Pension that I recommend without hesitation.

Today I make a stopover to return to Algeria I occupy room 239   No mini bars Towels have a passeeee color Beds not comfortable at all   Dinner poorly organized and besides without flavor nothing is good  Only positive the restaurant staff emable. We'll see breakfast tomorrow.  But serious c a 2 star no more

This is my 3rd time, tjrs also satisfied, animation at the Top of the top.. Reception: welcome and politeness, perfect room service (sea view room), diversified improved food (grills😍😍 fish, donuts) I give 5 without hesitation..

I have just returned from the Paradis Palace Hotel and can thoroughly recommend it.The food was excellent and all the staff were so friendly.I had a lovely room with clean towels and bedding on a regular basis,comfy bed and always lashings of hot water.Great hotel to have a relaxing holiday.

I have a very good stay in the hotel and will come back on holiday here next year  The rooms are impeccable very clean even the housekeepers without working well  The service is fine all the staff are kind  The food is very good all finds all the choices to eat  The hotel discotheque is even very nice employees  Made it outings with voyamar flawless, the walid guide is very interesting to customers even though the animators are all active thanks to bibo  Participate in activities  And the entertainment evenings are very good organized and thank you especially for pika  Really a good hotel with a warm welcome and a good sea view 🌊   Many thanks for all the personal

A big smell of diesel near the pool 🧐 In the indoor pool obligatory swimming caps for long hair while Muslim people this bath dressed man and woman brave hygiene 😡 Good rooms are very good and clean meals good and good 😋 the beach and well palm tree 🌴  The cold outdoor pool but I think the 🌞 missed

Hotel was great , animation team and waiters couldn't do enough for you , djambo was the highlight of the holiday , made everyone's day , rooms were spotless, all the bar staff were great, the hotels beach was spotless , everything about the hotel was great,  rooms were spotless,  cleaners round every morning with clean towels and cleaned the room , overall it was a great first time in tunisia.

I have done a lot of tour packages and your hotel is my best experience, top and varied food, impeccable cleanliness, respectful staff, beautiful beach pools, congratulations to all for the stay we are living, only flat beyond your control, camels that are insistent dirty (do not collect excrement) and totally abusive with their animals, hitting these poor animals in front of us is a torment especially for a photo. However, I have seen a member of your team repress them and I congratulate him on that.  Finally thank you all we have a great holiday

This hotel was excellent the food was nice the staff where amazing Mohammed in the dinning room was brilliant and the cleaner we had(didn't get her name) but she was lovely had an incredible smile and greated you everything she saw you with the smile and a good morning. The rooms are lovely and clean  beds are comfortable and if you need anything else just ask. The Animation team are great they try and get you involved as much as they can and also put on some great entertainment Djambo is brilliant Pika is great with the kids always shows enthusiasm Dali,Cam,Bilbo,David,Mimo and Rio are exceptional I cant praise them enough they maid our holiday. I do feel the hotel just need to add a couple of things to enhance a customer's experience I feel it would help customer's if all staff wore name badges as this would help to know who is serving you or even talking to you also a couple of pool tables and a dart board would be beneficial for just incase the weather isn't as perfect as all customer's want. Finally just a list visible on the bar of which cocktails are included in the All inclusive.  Finally the idea of being able to buy the t-shirts that the entertainment team wear is a great idea but feel that more colour availability for children would see sales rocket . Loved the whole holiday and looking at coming back next year .

It’s a beautiful hotel the staff are so lovey and helping the views are amazing I will definitely be coming back to this resort the food is brilliant everything about the place is amazing the activities are fun darts football dancing the place has the best vibes and the best people

reviews.review_title: Best holiday! Beautiful 😍 place will definitely be coming back next year!
reviews.review_text: the staff was very friendly! Good service! Rooms was beautiful very clean room! Nothing i would change! will definitely be coming back next year! food was brilliant!!! Beautiful pool and private beach! Good activities and good shows on a night time!

Absolutely amazing hotel. We arrived at midnight after a long day travelling we was given a packed away meal each with 2 big bottles of water. The security guard took the big suitcase up and showed us our room. We had a 2 bedroom family room with a closing door between them plenty of space for us and all our clothes for a family of 4. It was clean We just jumped into bed. We got up the next day and exploded the hotel. We was amazed how good it actually was so much better than we expected. The entertainer team. Were fantastic they worked early till late always had a smile on their faces and always interacted with every one there no matter age sex or nationality. All of them was amazing but want to give a big thank you to Dali, mimo, djambo and pica . The bar staff round the pool and in the bar once again amazing always smiling always making sure you got your drinks and took the empty glasses. Again a massive thank you to aan called houssem for making us feel like royalty, for finding us and making sure you came over greated us by our names and made sure we was ok, and continued to make sure throughout the day amazing customer service. At lunch and dinner we always went to the same man skundra he was polite greated us with a smile, he was happy wanted to talk to his guests when appropriate, so not while we was eating. We got into the restaurant and had drinks ready and waiting he realised we drank the same each meal again very good customer service. The hotel is very clean and cleaned daily throughout the day, there was a storm one night we was there operation clean up began in the morning by dinner time came it was clean once again people using the pool and sun beds.... To get such a big outside space cleaned so fast I was impressed. We booked day trips with the men sat outside the doors under the shade by the restaurant windows, again they was brilliant wasn't pushy we said no at first but then the next day we discussed going out on the quads and camels so we booked with them and paid them the coach arrived bang on times given and took us to our activities. Both activities were amazing and well worth the money paid (, which compared to UK was cheap) we even booked to go on the quads again and the quad man took us somewhere different to explore Tunisia and even stopped and got a coffee on the ways back.... Again amazing customer service from all involved with the days out. There is a massive shop with everything you could think of inside it. We normally have to leave a hotel to find what we need but this time everything was there. The ladies and the men in the shop again had brilliant customer service, always happy smiling and always helpful. Your part of the beach is cleaned very well and kept nice for your guests. There is security walking about all day and night making sure you are safe and not bothered by anyone. Again they tried to talk to us but there was a language barrier however even tho we didn't know what eachother was saying it was a happy conversation and could see he was really trying. Overall we have had an absolute amazing holiday at this hotel and we normally like to try new places every year but I think we need to return to this hotel next year as it's been that good. When we left I emailed the hotel directed to the manager letting him know how happy we were and to thank them personally, again not something I usually do but felt I had to, who surprisingly messaged me back thanking me for my email, again good customer service. We love you guys and we will hopefully see you next year. Thank you for a good holiday once again.

Very nice hotel, very welcoming staff, smiling all day. Animation at the top in the evening and day around the pool. The restaurant is also very good at lunch by the beach, in the evening at the hotel restaurant. The map changes every day with themes on different countries

Really amazing hotel, service is amazing throughout. Staff are friendly, and help you learn new things throughout the day. Very suppprtive team!  Activites are fun, lots to do.    We are comimg again next year and already looking forward to it.

The hotel is very clean and very beautiful  The staff is very friendly   The entertainment team is very engaging throughout the day and very professional always interact with the visitors every morning and afternoon after breaks never a dull moment   Booking next year as soon as we are back   One or two improvements like pool tables in the evening for visitors to play when it's raining or evenings

Staff are the friendliest and amazing with our two boys. Room as shown on pictures and as expected for price paid. Pools are great for children. All staff, entertainers, waiters, chefs, cleaners etc all fantastic and make the stay. Would definitely go again.

We had a wonderful stay in love. The buffet is very good and nothing to say about the cleanliness of the rooms. The staff is very kind. The only criticism I can make the cocktails are too sweet like many other establishments. We will return with pleasure, I think this autonomous with our children.

Bit aprehensive as visited a different hotel few years back. But i must say this hotel was fantastic, all staff were always friendly and nothing was to much trouble. Food is alway hit and miss at all inclusive at this hotel there is something for everyone, food was fresh and hot every day, i wasnt to keen on brekfast but thats my personal opinion. The rooms was spotless cleaners work very hard, i must say every part of this hotel was spotless, no fighting for  sun bed there was more than enough for everyone. Day entertainers amazing speak to everyone every day, didnt see the evening entertainment as kids show doesnt start until 8.30 so i would of left the bar by then. On site shop is good to pretty much all you need.

reviews.review_title: Great first impression to Tunisia and the hotel
reviews.review_text: My partner and I were always skeptical looking at Tunisia for a holiday but nevertheless we wanted to go and chose Paradis Palace for our hotel.   Straight off the bat when arriving at the hotel, we were welcomed like family by the reception staff, they told us our room is not ready yet which we imagined would be the case as it was 11:45am when we arrived but told us to leave our cases in the baggage area and go and relax with a drink. So we did just that.   This is when we met Assadene (apologies if I have spelt wrong) who came over, shook my hand and my partners, asked us what we would like to drink and went to fetch it. Straight away some great service me or my partner have not really experienced. Once those drinks were done he came back asked if we would like another, and another and this was the routine for the week to be fair, never having to leave the sun bed for a drink and waited on all week was amazing.  Moving on to dinner time where we also met Wassim and Rabia, two waiters who again, made everything special for us. It was my partners birthday on the friday so a cake was made and personally delivered to a table laid out with purple petals, swans made out of towels and candle in a glass. At no point did I ask for this to be set out and Wassim had done this to make the experience all the best.   The pool area was great, WiFi all around so I could listen to songs and my partner can download extra books on her kindle. Of course there was the animation team who were very enthusiastic to get you up and do stuff, my only advice is if someone has said no to archery 4 times in a row they probably arent going to do archery if you ask them again, I get it, it's their job but I just want to chill and if i want to join in I will.   The room was clean, brilliant as we had a free upgrade to the pool view room which was convenient next to the lift right at the front of the hotel. The cleaners would make little decorations out of the towels which was a nice touch.   Overall this is the first time in a while where I keep thinking that we should've booked 2 weeks and not 1 as I did not want to leave.   I would like to thank everyone at Paradis Palace for their amazing service and yes we definitely will be back in the future. Tunisia is up there as one of my go to places for holidays now and you are all the reason for it.

We spent two weeks in Paradise Palace. The main quality of this hotel is the welcome and professionalism of all staff.. animators, waiters, cleaning employees.   On the restaurant side, nothing to say about the dishes are varied. Everything is very good.  We will be happy to come back to that.

Everything is well animation super service well restaurant well  Bar well Sisha well  Chief well.  Beach ok Room ok Great service  Swimming pool  Beach  Security ok  Lifeguard  Animation team  Sjambo well the star  Dicotheaaue  Chef animation star  Great all nickel

Paradise palace is a lovely clean place right next to the beach. A waiter called Houssem took care of us all wk..it is very cheap loads to do good for couples or family..breakfast is not good for us brits but everything else is good quality food

Very large establishment a little old but all the staff puts all their energy to maintain it perfectly...beautiful lush gardens,the places are very clean,the beautiful beach planted with palm trees...the spacious bungalows it just lacks a little privacy with the open bathroom.The staff is remarkably friendly..the varied abundant food but after a few days the flavors and dishes are repetitive.A positive the accuracy of the flights to and from Tunisair...An excellent trip.thanks. To advise.

The hotel is very nice. We were greeted with a nice cocktail. The room is very nice bathroom also very comfortable bed. The animators are cheerful. Dedication to Amine, Yacine Baki, Hamza Raphael and all the others. They are very nice, the activities are very cool, table tennis, tennis archery swimming pool with slide that go very fast. Be careful you plan swimming pool glasses. Very welcoming staff very kind always smiling, the activities offered outside are very friendly to do. We had a great time.

Perfect hotel, super welcome and animators are on top (especially yassine and amine). The buffet is delicious and the service impeccable. Possibility to eat and drink all day. Room service is very efficient and the room is clean.

We had a great time.  A great setting, clean rooms. We would have liked to have a double bed, but hey.  Swimming pools, beach, gym, soccer field.... everything was perfect and very well maintained.  A varied and good restaurant and especially an animation team at the top. The best!!!! Special mention for Ali, Yassin and Ihem. You're champions. We will come back to this hotel partly for you. Thank you to all the staff.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful hotel located by the sea with great animators, I highly recommend!!
reviews.review_text: We had a wonderful stay at this wonderful hotel located by the sea. In terms of catering, the buffet is varied and excellent in flavour.  The rooms are clean and spacious RAS. Special thanks to the facilitators: Fatima, Mohammed Hama, Ihed, Yassine, Simo, Amine, Ali, Baki, Raphaël, Hamza. Thanks to them we had a holiday at the top, we laughed a lot thank you for everything. Some are just interns but very invested in their work which is remarkable. Many activities to choose from: archery, darts, zumba, pétanque... Excursions offered by the hotel very well managed. We will return with great pleasure!! Lyon room 3235 stay from 20 to 24 May 2025.

We spent a week with family in this hotel. We recommend it with closed eyes: hotel and common areas of extreme cleanliness, the rooms are spacious and very clean.  Various food and very good.  Indoor pool and beach at the foot of the hotel are very very appreciable. And to fill your stay: the animation team that is present without being insistent. Very good season to Bob, Raphael, Mohamed, yassin, hamza...

reviews.review_title: Good stay hotel khayam garden and SPA
reviews.review_text: Great stay, the Tunisian animation team of the hotel at the top (especially Ali, Amine and Yassin who are very present, friendly and full of energy), very well located beachfront hotel, quality restoration, good comfort and great cleanliness.

We had a good week: well received, hotel staff always listening, clean premises, smiling, nice location, interesting outings offered... We highly appreciated the presence of the animators Ali, Amine and Yassin of the hotel (friendly, very smiling, present all day and especially close to their tourists;) )

Superb stay from 17 to 24 May 2025, spacious and very clean hotel very well received.  The animation team at the top, yassine,bob,simo,ackir , ali, Raphael, Mohamed, The animation team is at all times present to occupy the holidaymakers.

Beautiful hotel.  The setting is very pleasant, beautiful spaces, swimming pools, beach on site....Spacious and clean rooms.  Catering at the top! Possibility to eat in 2 other restaurants, excellent food qualities. Great entertainment team. All the staff are smiling, caring. I had a great stay at this hotel that I recommend.

An effective animation team.  Yasmine and Amine know how to adapt to their audience. Motivate without being invasive. Their natural smile brightened our holidays! DJs, dancers, volleyball players, outstanding animators etc.  Thank you for making these holidays unforgettable

Thanks to the whole animation team for their dynamism, especially Yassin, Amine, Ali and Bob Thank you also to the entire restaurant team and the restaurant waiter who are at our care Thanks also to the bartenders Thanks to the housekeepers.  I highly recommend this hotel Club

Excellent stay with friends.  The animators are adorable as well as all the staff. Thanks to Bob, Yassine, Amine and Hamza who are highly motivated interns.  We ate like kings.  Any request is taken seriously and promptly. What a good memory in this hotel.  I highly recommend it.

Great and clean hotel. The staff is nice , smiling and available.  The animators are great we had great times especially with Simo, Bob and Yassin good laughs. I recommend this hotel and will definitely stay there again.

Couple holidays. We had a very pleasant stay. The hotel is very nice by the sea, very clean rooms and good bedding. Almost impeccable service. Special mention to Mohamed in the service catering, hospitality, warmth and smile always present. Thank you to Ibtisem for his smile and impeccable service in the room. The restaurant is varied, everyone finds his happiness. Hotel to recommend for its quiet (off season).

Week from 17 to 24 May 2025, beautiful stay spacious and very clean hotel. The animation team was great, Fatima, Simo, Bob, Ali, it's just a few names but really the whole team was on top smiling dynamic.

Very nice hotel by the sea Close to downtown Nabeul The excursions offered are good  Very welcoming staff, always ready to help  Cleanliness and perfect bedding The animation team at the top! With a special beep up for Simo and Bob!!! We won't forget you <3 (Chachou, Lulu, Cece, Alex) Small flat for the beach of the hotel (small, rocky, detritus and algae) Various and correct catering for a buffet, the snack is improved.

A very good welcome, a great hotel, great animators, smiling who set a good atmosphere. Always come to us to do the activities or talk in between. A really friendly staff at the bar always with a smile and waiters. A clean Hotel even in the rooms.   Can't wait to get back

Very nice hotel, the animators are very welcoming and friendly.  Nice hotel in front of the sea, very clean.  The waiters are very smiling. A week filled with emotions between landscapes, culture.  The animations are very good, especially archery with Baki.

The team was great!!!change nothing you are on top!!! And especially yassine and amine really the best in the world.the restaurant is perfect especially hichem .the bar is beautiful a good dedication for the bartender amir.en party pleasant stay ❤️❤️

reviews.review_title: An unforgettable stay thanks to top teams!
reviews.review_text: We had a great time at Khayam Garden.  A big congratulations to all the teams who contribute to making the holiday as pleasant as possible. The staff at the bar and restaurant are very attentive, always smiling and very professional. The cleaning team does an impeccable job: the rooms and common areas are always clean and well maintained. The pool and beach team is very vigilant about our needs: mattress and umbrella.  A big crush also for the whole animation team, always full of energy, good humor and who does not lack ideas to animate aperitifs and evenings. A special thank you to Yacine, who is really exceptional: friendly, welcoming and always ready to make the holidaymakers have a good time. Many thanks to Sabeur who is always available to answer any question and give us the best advice to have a good stay and who is always concerned about our well-being.  Thanks to the whole team for this great experience, we recommend this hotel without hesitation!

Just enjoying my last night at Aziza. This is my 3rd visit and will definitely return. When you see the same staff year in year this is a true testament to a good hotel. The barmen welcomed me back with open arms and remembered my choice of drink from last year. The food is great. The rooms are great. The whole experience for me, as a single woman travelling alone, is completely spot on. Aziza, see you next year (or I may even return in September this year).

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Views and Great Hospitality, but Let Down by Dated Facilities and Missing Amenities
reviews.review_text: Our stay at Hotel Aziza Thalasso Golf in Tunisia offered a mix of memorable moments and some frustrating inconveniences. The biggest highlight was undoubtedly the view from our high-floor room — the sea view was spectacular, and watching the sunrise over the bay at 5am was a truly magical experience worth waking early for. The beach area was pristine, peaceful, and far quieter than the poolside, where music plays throughout the day. It was reassuring to see a security guard on the beach, and although vendors occasionally approached us, a firm “no” was enough to turn them away.  We were always able to find available sun loungers both around the pool and on the beach, which made relaxing easy. The pool itself was a real treat, especially during the heat of the day, with a deep end of over 2 meters and a daily aqua fit class led by Jamal from the animation team — a popular and energetic session. The music at the pool added a vibrant ambiance, and parasols provided much-needed shade.  Dining at the hotel was a pleasant experience overall. The buffet offered a good rotation of different cuisines each day, and we never struggled to find something tasty to eat. The à la carte restaurant was fantastic — the food was delicious, and the menu changed daily, offering a welcome alternative to the buffet. Special mention must go to Cookie, James, and Shedley, who provided consistently excellent service and went out of their way to make every meal feel special. They are a credit to the hotel.  Our room was comfortable, well-equipped with amenities like a safe, hairdryer, and TV, and we consistently had good nights’ sleep. The pub on the lower level of the hotel added a homely touch, especially for guests wanting to watch live British football games — they even opened early to accommodate major matches. We also enjoyed Cafe Maure, a charming Tunisian-themed café where we had traditional mint tea and coffee, and tried a shisha pipe. The staff member there was very attentive and made the experience feel authentic and relaxing.  However, several aspects of our stay were disappointing. The most significant issue was the lack of air conditioning in the room — we were informed it wouldn't be turned on until mid-June, despite very warm weather. We were told to keep our balcony door open for ventilation, but this resulted in a room full of sand flies and mosquitoes. Although we were eventually provided with a fan, the lack of AC during hot weather is not made clear on the TUI or hotel website — it only appears in a small note within the booking terms and conditions. We are raising this separately with TUI.  Other maintenance and comfort issues also detracted from our stay. The WiFi in the room was patchy at best, although coverage improved near the lobby and pool. Power sockets were placed awkwardly around the room — none by the bedside — and the bathroom fixtures were in poor condition. The sink and toilet seat were cracked, and the sink plugs didn’t work, making it impossible to fill either the basin or bath. The shower screen did little to prevent water from flooding the bathroom floor, and the shower head was covered in limescale.  The bed was quite firm and may be uncomfortable for side sleepers. There were small but persistent oversights — no teaspoons provided with the in-room coffee facilities or in the restaurant, sunbed cushions that constantly slipped due to not being secured, and a noticeable lack of deep cleaning in the room, with dusty surfaces and tired furnishings.  The hotel overall is showing signs of wear and tear. The lower floors in particular look dated, with old, slow lifts and uninspiring décor (a dusty pinball machine tucked away in a corner sums it up). Hallway carpets are rucked in places, paint is in need of a refresh, and several lights in the buffet area were out, which gave a slightly neglected feel.  Lastly, it’s worth noting that the hotel charges 20 TND to hire towels — not a huge amount, but a detail that guests should be aware of in advance.  In summary, this hotel has a lot of potential: the location is excellent, the views are breath taking, and many of the staff go above and beyond. However, a lack of transparency around key amenities like air conditioning, combined with dated infrastructure and inconsistent room maintenance, took away from what could have been a five-star experience. With some updates and better communication, this could easily become a top-tier resort.

3rd visit to Aziza,  looking forward to the 4th visit which I'm looking into booking right now, so no time to write a review.  All I will say is we LOVE Tunisia and AZIZA     which has the best staff in Tunisia . See you all again soon ❤️ 🇹🇳 ❤️ 🇹🇳 ❤️ 🇹🇳

reviews.review_title: 35 degrees and no air conditioning. Hotel 4 shooting stars
reviews.review_text: 35 degrees outside and no air conditioning in the room and the hotel response: the air conditioning is started mid June. So they don't care how hot they get. So I spent 7 catastrophic nights because of the heat and mosquito invasion as the window was open. The cleanliness of the hotel is really limiting and everything is old. I don't know who gave them the 4 stars but the hotel really doesn't deserve them.  I would not recommend this hotel at all! is much better in hammamet. I'm not coming back!

reviews.review_title: fun in the sun in north africa
reviews.review_text: SCOTT E  I presume you were talking about the group of 6 - 8 adults who after riding the inflatables on the beach returned to the pool after 5pm once the pool bar had closed and most guests had returned to there rooms to prepare for there evening meal etc,  That the said group of adults decided to have some fun in an otherwise deserted area.  In case you had forgotten how to do so it is called having fun on your holiday - i would suggest you try it sometime - you never know you might just like it !!!!  NOW ON TO AN ACTUAL REVIEW OF THE HOTEL ITSELF   The staff are all amazing and nothing is to much hassle for them to ensure you are having a great holiday.  Rooms are a little dated as is some of the exterior but you need to remember you are in north Africa and money is not as free flowing as we have it back home.  Maintenance work was ongoing to the hotel as i witnessed first hand 2 employees scrapping and repainting the rear of the building to make it look welcoming to all future guests.  The food is also lovely with an A la carte restaurant  with different themed dishes served.  we will return to the hotel that is for sure as we enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend to anybody.

The hotel and facilities are lovely overall. As others have said, it needs a bit of tlc but that all comes at a cost inevitably passed on to the guest. It's not luxury but neither is the price. The food was all excellent. No pork products are served.   The highlight is the pool area. It's lovely and peaceful which the majority embrace. Sadly, one squad of overfed, sunburnt and drunk British goons decided to ruin everyone's peace and quiet by screaming and bombing the pool for an entire afternoon.  The hotel is adults only, but some children never grow up.   Nobody from the hotel stepped in, which would have been nice.   This was certainly the exception though and the majority of the time it was lovely and calm. Jamil and Daniel from the Animation team were very pleasant. Encouraging but not pushy and two really interesting guys, full of local tips.   The beach area immediately adjacent to the hotel is kept really pristine. Sadly though, anywhere on the beach not outside a hotel is filthy with rubbish, bottles, half rotten cans etc. It's really yucky and it would be nice if the hotels clubbed together to have it cleaned up.   Nabuel is worth a taxi ride (£5 e/w) is you like the full Tunisian Medina souke experience. It's wild with hassle and haggling. You need to have your wits about you, but it's a lot of fun. If you prefer your shopping a little more serene, there's a great shop outside right of the main gates, just past Marco Polo. The owner is a gem, and all the prices are fixed and great value. They sell everything you find at the market and more.   If you go left outside and walk around 30 minutes following the coast and cemetary, you'll find an old fort and Medina surrounded by o a lovely harbour and restaurant area.

This is a lovely hotel with incredible staff. Rooms are spacious and always kept clean. The pool is beautiful. The food is incredible. We loved the beach as it’s quiet with a breeze. Only a few respectful beach sellers.  I can’t rate the staff highly enough! Special mention to Ameur and Ossama in the restaurant, and James (007 1/2) and Ben at the BBQ. Would love to come back!

Stayed for 7 days in May with my partner. Hotel is ideal for an all inclusive relaxing poolside holiday in the sun. Whilst the facilities and the rooms at the hotel are somewhat dated and due a modern update/refurbishment (air conditioning in the room works but is mediocre at best), the staff were amazing and went above and beyond to ensure all guests were happy.   The pool is lovely and very well maintained - with a pool bar that serves beer, wine, cocktails and soft drinks.    The hotel is right on the edge of the sea, which is ideal if guests feel they need a change of scenery from the pool.   The food was really good and exceeded expectations. All diets are catered for. Me and my partner never left breakfast, lunch or dinner feeling hungry.   All guests were civilised and polite to staff.   FYI: Tipping is a BIG aspect of the culture in Tunisia due to low wages. Be prepared to bring cash to exchange to Tunisian Dinar on arrival (Dinar is a closed currency and cannot be purchased outside of Tunisia)   A brilliant stay. Would recommend.

The staff and management at the hotel are the friendliest and efficient you can find any where.They made my weeks stay one of the best experience at a hotel I have had. The hotel beach is brilliant golden sand and plenty of sun loungers with shade if needed. Resteraunt very good food fresh and good Barbecue restaurant good as well. The Tunisian language lesson in the pub was a good experience with some very useful phrases taught to me.

reviews.review_title: Decent hotel in a lovely area, friendly staff but two awful experiences that let it down
reviews.review_text: Me and my fiancé visited in May 2025. My main commendation immediately is that the vast majority of staff are so lovely and helpful and will always be happy to help. You do run into the occasional issue with the language barrier with most of the staff speaking primarily French, but they’re always willing to listen and will understand eventually if you’re patient. The hotel itself is nice but could possibly do with some refreshing in areas. The food in the buffet restaurant was really nothing to write home about, and the ‘barbecue’ as they call it by the pool isn’t even almost a barbecue (could be a language difference), as what they offer is sandwiches, pizzas and salads. We had one night in the al a carte restaurant which was a nice change and was lovely. We spent every night in bar downstairs as the entertainment in the lobby was a bit boring to us and felt more tailored to older people, but the barman at the pub was absolutely brilliant and so lovely and remembered us every night. The karaoke and bingo nights were the best we had there and really brought it to life.   The main gripes I had was with the treatment from two specific people at two separate times. The first was with what seemed to be the manager of the main restaurant. We showed up for lunch at 2pm, knowing that it shut at 2:30 because we just wanted to grab a little something and go and we knew it wouldn’t take us that long. As we walked in, the gentleman (older man with a long tie) came over to us and checked his watch, telling us ‘its 2pm’ and we explained we knew that but we wouldn’t take long and he said ‘okay you can have 10 minutes’. I then let my partner go up first so I didn’t have to leave my phone on the table and the man came up to me and said ‘you need to go and get your food’ and I said ‘I know sorry I’m just waiting for him’ and he ushered me up and told me ‘no you need to go now please go now’. Then when we were eating he kept circling back to us and checking his watch. Keep in mind we weren’t the only people there, and other people were mindlessly browsing the buffet for second servings and not being rushed at all. Every night we saw him going forward it seemed he was trying to dictate what we did, with us going for opening time for dinner (7pm) one night and him telling us ‘wait 5 minutes before you get up’ after we sat, which none of the other tables were told to do.   My second issue was with the older lady in the Thalasso spa. We went for the one day treatment which involved sauna, exfoliation, seaweed treatment, jacuzzi bath and a massage to finish. The jacuzzi and massage were both lovely, however the woman we dealt with for the exfoliation and seaweed was absolutely awful to me. I believe a part of it was language barrier which is completely understandable, but when I didn’t understand or do exactly what she wanted she got physical with me. I had a bikini top on that needs to be taken off over head, which she forcefully pulled off me and ripped over my head exposing my chest which was very embarrassing for me. I asked her to avoid where I had sunburn when exfoliating my chest and legs, which she only avoided my chest and really hurt my legs. When I leaned up to ask her to avoid them she pushed my head back down and stuck her finger in my mouth by accident. After the seaweed was applied she directed me back to the sauna (which was shared with other people as they arrived) and when I tried to grab my bikini top she refused to let me and pushed me toward the door. I had to sit in the sauna exposed completely. It was embarrassing and infuriating. I felt like I was being punished the whole time I was in her care and it was horrible. I absolutely wouldn’t recommend the spa purely for her involvement in it.   These two experiences were such a shame because otherwise we had a lot of lovely days there. All in all if you avoid the spa and just figure out what you do and don’t like to do, its a nice little holiday place.

This hotel has prohibited any modest swimwear; so if your chest and legs aren't on show regardless as to which gender you are - you won't be allowed to use the pools. There is an explicit ban on burkinis which is not stated on their website so it's not until you arrive that you find out.  Besides that, the hotel staff went above and beyond to accommodate us and make us feel welcome regardless - even upgrading us to a sea view room for free which was awesome. However, who wants to go on holiday and not enjoy the pools? So we had no choice but to check ourselves into another hotel.  The staff in all sectors are amazing. The food was nice but repetitive, the grounds are very nice too and clean.   If they'd just remove the ridiculous discriminatory ban on modest swimwear, I would happily stay there again

The hotel is showing its age and a little tired in places (rucks in the carpet, lift buttons don’t light up), but what it lacks in appearance more than makes up in character. This is credit to the fantastic team of hard working individuals that have gone out of their way to make our stay welcoming and enjoyable. We arrived around noon but were fed well before being shown to our room. The room was spacious and clean with a balcony overlooking the pool and beach. The food (bearing in mind that they are catering in mass) was full of variety with something for everyone and an opportunity to try something new, which we did. You might need to wait a few minutes for your omelette in the morning (cooked on the spot) but well worth the wait. The BBQ area was ‘sold’ as snacks when actually it was a sit down and served by self acclaimed best waiter in Tunisia nicknamed 007, with a choice of a baguette with a sliced burger or pizza which was a bit disappointing and we opted to have our meals in the main restaurant. Tipping is optional but recommended. We left 10 dinar for lunch and again at dinner. Coffee in the rooms is limited and will need to ask for more, cold milk is available from the bar. Nothing it too big an ask, and if not possible, explained softly with a kind smile. Really can’t fault the friendliness and welcoming hospitality. Despite reading reviews, overlooked taking enough papers for rolling tobacco. Reception booked us a taxi and we ventured to the local tobacco store. Luckily they had papers (at £1 a pack!) . There is a gift shop at the hotel and local trades people will call out along the beach in an effort to sell their stock. It would seem they are not allowed to approach, you need to approach them. I fell for that trap on our first day trying to be polite, so unless you’re ready to part with your cash, don’t!! Towels are available at a daily charge/deposit, we brought our own. There is a lovely gem of a shop near the hotel. Come out turn right, it’s just beyond the Marco Polo restaurant on the left and although only inflatables displayed outside, inside 3 floors of leather bags, sandals, pottery and clothes. If you didn’t bring mugs with you (the cups provided are tiny) then this is a good place to start! Prices are fixed and they will even accept £ if you don’t have enough dinar. They speak excellent English and are friendly but not pushy. We are looking to book again for the same time next year. So my top tips: bring a jar of coffee, mugs and teaspoons, rolling papers and if you can afford it, pay up for private transfers to and from the hotel, the VIP lounge at the airport which gives you comfy sofas while you wait, unlimited access to tea/coffee, soft drinks, snacks and sandwiches. You get red carpet (literally) check in and accompanied through passport control and security, right up to the gate. The airport only has one coffee shop which according to a review here, charges €12 for a coke! Hope you enjoy the hotel as much as we did

Great hotel for getting away,  zoning out and relaxing. Friendly, quiet and very clean. Pool area was relaxing and very well presented. All the staff are polite and helpful. The best bit: I would recommend the young lady, Manam,  for a full body, deep tissue massage,  with reflexology.  One of the best! I also had a facial with Houda, very relaxing.  Worst bit: The area. Dirty, unkept and too many locals wanting something.   Come here to relax and watch the world go by..... bring plenty of books too!

All the staff caring for the guests from the gardener to the director all are kind without being burdensome.The thalasso and its staff as charming as professional helped to make our stay just perfect.Finally we will not forget the quality of the dishes and the offer offered at each meal. We'll be back...

The safety man of the sea did not let us swim and enjoy our time. Every quarter of an hour, he disturbed us and spoke out loud and in a rude way, and that was because we were playing a song on the beach, even though we were alone on the beach.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful hamam and massage - not to be missed!!
reviews.review_text: First the hamam (spa)  Really excellent - we had 30 mins in thalasso pool/jacuzzi/water jets to ourselves which was great. Then on to (hot 🥵!) hamam where the lovely Houda did the honours, guiding us around, and scrubbing us down. Smiley, friendly, lovely lady. Then 10 mins and tea to cool off a bit, then on to WONDERFUL 50 mins massage, courtesy of the very talented Maram and Naziha. Both were truly excellent and provided exactly what we wanted, pressure wise etc. I have an injury to my arm, and Maram handled it beautifully- massaged, but carefully and thoroughly. The supporting team, Fatem and Awatef (spelling - not sure, sorry!) were helpful and friendly and the whole experience was marvellous thanks to their expertise. HIGHLY recommended. 🙏🙏. Than you all, ladies 💕🥰

We are currently staying at Aziza for 10 nights. This is our 2nd visit here. The first was back in Oct 2013. We were made to feel welcome from the moment we arrived. The food is very good and plentiful with a good selection and waiting staff are very friendly and just want you to enjoy your holiday. Although the building itself looks a bit tired now from last time, the room is clean, spacious, and comfortable. The hotel is a little out the way for some attractions but step out, and a taxi is always easily accessible. We just wanted a holiday to recharge our batteries with good food and pleasant staff, so we're happy. Evening entertainment is not to our taste in reception but there is a pub downstairs to use instead. Thank you to everyone here, including the pool staff, for our ongoing comfort and well-being needs being taken care of  for the rest of our stay.

Absolutely loved this hotel everything about it from the food and drink . The rooms was spotless clean everyday . Sleep quality was perfect every night left our patio open every night listening to the ocean waves  The spa is amazing very tranquil very relaxing you are well looked after in there make you feel at ease during your treatments  Entertainment at night was ok some nights was low key other nights was lively because obviously we went in April so still early in season but perfect time of year for me .  Will be going again

A real gem! Came for 5 nights with my dad, and was very impressed by the lovely hotel and pool area, great food and lovely staff. Great to have access to beach as well. Everyone we met was lovely (staff and hotel guests) and we enjoyed the chilled out atmosphere. The al a carte was great, and the pub was good fun with a great quiz and showing the football. Please disregard the negative reviews, you would have to be very fussy not to enjoy it here! I cant wait to return. Thanks to all of the staff for a great holiday.

I am currently staying at the hotel and it is 28 degrees in the shade but the hotel policy is not to enable AC in the rooms till June.  This is unacceptable and I would ask management to turn the AC on now please so we can get some sleep for our last few nights. Opening the window is not an option due to barking dogs and traffic noise

The animation team was absolutely amazing! They were young, communicative, cheerful, and funny people. We were definitely well taken care of when it came to entertainment. You don’t often come across such kind and helpful people as those at this hotel. A big thank you to everyone — we definitely recommend it!  P.S.: Sending greetings to Momo and everyone else!

We had a good stay at el mouradi djerba menzel c a great experience especially with the team of animation with good moods with multiple activities even in the evening with impeccable evening without forgetting the delicious food , service clean rooms and all. Thank you all staff

We had a great time. The animation team was at the top and the activities were all funnier and more original than the last. The rooms are clean and the restaurant service was efficient. Thank you to all the staff! I recommend:)

Very good hotel, there is everything you need, nice outdoor pools and an interior, the food is very good, the hotel is clean. The staff is friendly. We had the right to a restaurant to choose: Tunisian, fish or Italian, we had chosen Tunisian and it was perfect. We had a very good week.

Hello, I don't understand how anyone could give this hotel 100%. I no longer recommend it to my enemies... We were there 1 year ago and it was a disaster !!  I haven't had anything worse in 5 stars yet. After about 35 x Turkey and 25 x Egypts I can certainly make a judgement. Despite about 100 USD Bakshish a week, we were treated as unwanted persons.  The occupancy was about 90% local guests , who fought at the buffet like it was the last meal and then the 50% just left at the table.. There was only 1 pool where our women could swim in bikinis, otherwise everywhere screaming cheeky kids playing a football in the reception without anyone having any regard for the other guests..    I could write for a long time, but there's no point.  The locals are there in your country and should do what they want - they are there at home .  But please do NOT recommend this hotel with top marks to people from D, A, CH, PL, CZ, SK who are not used to this.

In to spend a week here in el mouradi djerba menzel the hotel and very clean we love it bcp and especially the animation team are very welcoming smiling we like it the steps courses and zumba with the animation team that we put our stay mieu. Not to mention the delicious food and the own rooms.

My stay will be pleasant, unforgettable and Special mention for the team of animation of your Good mood and your welcome without forgetting our Friends Abdel who put our stay mieu. All the staff will be nice. Everything is good food, service, rooms..  Felt like a family here at El mouradi djerba Menzel. I recommend for all to spend a Magnificent stay.

The hotel is very good the food is delicious without forgetting the animation throughout the day even on the evening of the perfect Animation we are Never to be chion here in paradise djerba thank you for all the staff for your good welcome and good mood. I recommend it for all that we seek the relaxing atmosphere and panoramic view even ..

Comfortable and pleasant rooms We regularly visit this hotel. The spa is fantastic we come out relaxed and the staff is really listening  Very attractive price , massages we love.  You should follow the advice ‘d Alex always good advice and good mood.  Our drop-off point for assured relaxation.

For several years we have been coming to this hotel and always as well received, we come here especially for its spa which is just perfect; very clean, quality with impeccable service and people always listening I highly recommend it!!

We were very well received on arrival at the hotel despite the late hour, helpful and kind personal, the very active entertainment team offers several activities and various evenings, comfortable room there is everything you need and the housekeeping does everyday the very nice personal cleaning, very good restaurants various varieties of dishes and sometimes Tunisian themed you will miss nothing in the morning as well as noon and evening. As for the activities you take in the hotel (spa quad ballad carriage etc...) they are beautiful and relaxing. Finally to tell you that we had a great holiday in the hotel.

Decent room restaurant good reception friendly animation team super friendly hotel I recommend access to the sea is accessible superb beach room cleaned every day staff at the top the exteriors are well maintained🌹😚🥳🎉👌❤️

very nice hotel, nice infrastructure but would need some small renovation work since it is a 50 year old hotel... All the staff is very kind, helpful ...from the front desk staff to the housekeepers and cleaners...all very polite...except the manager who does not say hello to anyone, yet it should be the first to greet the customers thanks to whom he has a job...maybe he is at the end of his career and no longer interested in his work...a good manager is nevertheless indispensable to stimulate troops and customers...

Nice and well located hotel with direct access to the beach. Very enthusiastic and dynamic animation team, especially Salim aka Momo, Abdel and Bashir. Meals could have more diversity but let’s say it’s not peak season yet probably. I will return with great pleasure

Very nice hotel, super friendly animator and great atmosphere very well received from the reception, correct food perfect room clean, very nice outside, Bar what you need  Very nice beach, maintenance service quickly available

We are two adults and a child, and our holiday was enjoyable and relaxing in every way. Reception: Very friendly, the staff welcomes you with a smile from the first moment. Room: Wonderful and clean, comfortable, and had everything we needed as a family.  animation Varied and professional, the teams put in a lot of effort to entertain both adults and children. Restaurant: More than excellent! The food was very, very diverse, and the flavors were amazing — something for every taste. The place: It has the authentic spirit of Djerba; you feel like you’re living in the heart of local culture and tradition. Bar: Good in terms of quality, but unfortunately, the staff were not friendly …  this was the only disappointing part.

The animators they are top, nothing to say always smiling and listening to the holidaymakers, the rooms are very clean. All the hotel employees always smiling. They are listening to our expectations, the animations All suits us very nice context pool

The new facilitators are young, but they're great. They do their best to make the stay as pleasant as possible. Many nationalities are represented here. The rooms are very clean Every night there is a different event.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel. The stay went very well.
reviews.review_text: I want to recommend the hotel, great atmosphere super holiday animator that I recommend . the rooms are very comfortable. Lots of animation everyone is listening I will come back very soon. I recommend it.😍

I am very happy with the stay This is a first for me in Tunisia and one thing and sure is that I will return  The hotel is very nice and super clean  The staff is very kind and kind  Evenings are well organized children as adults have fun  Thank you to all the animation team who allowed us to have a wonderful stay  Thank you again.

Absolutely loved this place best part was meeting mino. He made the holiday perfect for us even dressed up as Spider-Man for my sons 18th birthday he was so much fun always had an activity for us to do day and night we luv Mino can wait to see him again. Rooms were very clean maid service everyday and she was lovely too. Only thing I would change is a different selection of food it just was the same all the time. Was very tasty. Highly recommend this hotlel

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Hands down the best holiday I have ever been on! We will definitely be coming back to the Royal Jinene in Tunisia. We were smiling and laughing from the day we arrived to the day we left. We didn’t want to go home. All of the staff here are so friendly and helpful, the animation team were incredible and entertained our 2 little girls to make sure they could have the best holiday and us mums could relax too.  We are SO grateful for every single person in the animation team for making our holiday special, they are such an amazing team. The entertainment in the evening was so much fun, dancing, quiz’s, different games, karaoke and shows from outside the hotel.  There is different music by the pool all day so it’s good because you can listen to different types of music when sunbathing and not just the same thing. The food and drinks were great too, there is a different selection of Tunisia food and English food, something for everyone. There is plenty of bars in the hotel to get drinks from and the beach and sea is beautiful, there is a bar on the beach which walks straight out, it was nice and quiet here. We can’t wait to come back and would highly recommend coming here whether you are a family with children / solo or couples. There is something for everyone. A huge thank you to everyone at this wonderful hotel! 🥰

staff is so friendly. Children’s entertainment staff are the best Kouda  Syylou  panda sabwuy so good with keeping the kiddy’s entertained. I will definitely return the hotel staff is so friendly place is so clean food is excellent love it xx

The best part about our holiday has to be the entertainment staff - all of them was absolutely amazing they made it the best holiday we could ever wish for they made it fun and exciting and taught us so many games and dances…   Islem - is so sweet and kind and enthusiastic  Akauda - is funny and kind and always happy to be involved  Subway - always up for fun and is apparently brilliant at basketball seems he beat me in a game ;)  Aladdin always brought The music and the vibes and was so sweet to take us out into the town and kept us safe  Chef was amazing and sweet and always made time for us and made sure we were happy!!   Out of the whole holiday these are the staff members who made our holiday great!! So happy to have met them! Thank you to all of you for making it the best experience 🤍

I had a great stay at this great location. Great welcome! The animation team is on top, the PANDA animation manager is great! The whole team is smiling and available to make you have a good stay. The hotel is clean and well maintained, the buffet complete and tasty. The hotel offers direct access to the beach and a small paillote for a cocktail with sea views. I highly recommend!

I spent 7 wonderful days at the Royal Jinene Hotel. The food was really excellent and the room and pool clean. the animation was very great and entertaining.....a big thank you to all the animation team and a special thank you to kouda

reviews.review_title: Good resort staffed by lovely people.
reviews.review_text: My partner and I spent a week at the Royal Jinene Hotel in Late April/Early May 2025. Sousse is a fascinating town, the archaeological museum is not to be missed and the fort (Ribat) is also worth seeing. In the wider area, El Jem is also very much worth seeing. The hotel is fairly clean and there is a pretty broad range of food on offer. Beef is regularly served but (unsurprisingly) never pork. Egg is very widely used (even in pizzas). The beach is sandy and the hotel has both indoor and outdoor pools. The outdoor pool even has waterslides. The best aspect of the hotel is its staff who are friendly, helpful and kind. Some entertainments were provided at 21:00 in the evening. There was a quiz, karaoke, dancing etc.

reviews.review_title: Nice quiet hotel pleasant staff always helpful
reviews.review_text: Nice hotel we went in jan so not in season but staff are very helpful and hotel is clean, staff made my daughters birthday amazing big celebration we were very happy the manager helped with a cake for her and went out of there way to arrange it with me

Difficulty getting a double bed, reception to improve, the Hotel is mostly occupied by groups of gentlemen, smell of infective cleaning product, good location, 50 m from the beach, outdated decors, insufficient elevators we spend our time waiting for breakfast suitable for 2 nights after we are saturated,. Staff speak little French

I’m afraid this holiday was a disaster. The staff were lovely and very helpful but the hotel is very run down. Couldn’t sit in the bar area due to cigarette smoke so had to sit in the foyer. We were there for 7nights and 5 of those  ended in fights even to the extent that as new people arrived a fight broke out and they refused to stay at this hotel. Food was uninviting so although all inclusive we had to eat out every evening. Pool area never cleaned so sat on sun beds surrounded by fag butts and dirty tables. Don’t even get me started on the so called beauty & Spa. This was a joke. Will definitely go back to Tunisia as the people were lovely but I would recommend giving this hotel a wide birth until they sort the whole place out.

reviews.review_title: Cleanliness  and food were the downsides of this hotel
reviews.review_text: Cleanliness is not in the Tunisian vocabulary.. room ok at the beginning until we found last occupants clothes in wardrobe,what looked like bodily fluids of some description in the toilet walls and overall room clean was poor..The amount of staff wandering around you would think let's wash down sun loungers clean the pool area..nope.. food I understand will not be to everyone standard but again British tourists think a full English should be supplied at breakfast and burgers nuggets and chips for lunch and dinner..I found the food fine bar the fact it was all cold..even a pizza just out of the oven or whatever..all had to be nuked in microwave to gain some heat..staff are lovely and at night a good atmosphere although if you are out and about expect to be hounded with begging and on one occasion as I did not cough up I had stones lobbed at me from a distance of coursebut not what the Tunisian govt would want if they expect tourists but to be fair I wouldn't not stay here again it's just at least I'd know to bring my own bleach,hoover and cloths

reviews.review_title: I am not coming to this hotel again
reviews.review_text: The staff are friendly and that is the only thing  good about this hotel. I have never been to a hotel that the whole reception smells of cigarette smoke. My wife suffers from atsma and we could not enjoy an evening chill downstairs in the lounge. The food was cold and one day the rice tasted like left over from the day before. The sheets on the table were hardly changed and looking dirty. The bathroom shower cloth was full of mould and the AC was not working. The curtains in the room needs washing as we daw blood stain and the chairs and tables in the balcony needs cleaning in fact we had to request a room change and lost our sea view room which we paid for. The dining area needs an overhaul.  But as I said the staff are very friendly.

reviews.review_title: Another Great Stay at the Royal Jinene
reviews.review_text: We recently stayed at the Royal Jinene again, and as always, the staff made our trip special. A huge thank you to Rami, Rayda, and Mr. Manager for their kindness and hospitality. They always go above and beyond to make guests feel welcome, and it really makes a difference. Rayda even arranged a lovely birthday celebration for my mom, which was such a thoughtful touch and made her day extra special!  The food has always been a bit of a challenge for me personally, but I managed to find something to eat each day. I have noticed that the quality has improved over time, and I appreciate the effort the hotel puts into making things better with each visit. There was a decent variety, and while not everything was to my taste, I never went hungry.  The kids' outdoor pool was being retiled during our stay, but thankfully, there was an indoor pool available. To be honest, this was actually a better option since the weather was still too chilly for outdoor swimming. The indoor pool was clean, warm, and a great alternative, so it worked out well for us.  One thing to note is that the animation team changes seasonally, so the experience with entertainment and activities can vary depending on the time of year. We’ve noticed this on previous visits as well, but it’s something to keep in mind if you’re expecting a specific level of entertainment.  Overall, we had another lovely stay at the Royal Jinene and will definitely be back again. The improvements each time we visit don’t go unnoticed, and we always appreciate the welcoming atmosphere created by the wonderful staff!

Staff were amazing. Very helpful,  friendly and informative.  Nino, chief animation (entertainment) was great. Reception staff very helpful. Food was lovely.  Would definitely go again. Great value for money. Tunisian vodka is a must 😉🍸🍹

All round good for the money.  Friendly and welcoming staff.  Rooms are good. Beds are comfortable.  Food is okay and fresh.  Facilities are good. Especially the bar.  Team leader of animation (Nino) is an excellent host. Great events such as Karaoke, live music and created an entertaining atmosphere throughout our stay.

Ok where to start me and my wife have been going to this hotel for over a year. In that time we have seen alot of changes from food to facilities. Yes the hotel is still out dated in some areas but please remember that its not a big chain hotel its an independent hotel covid ,and other things have hit this hotel hard . This is the first year British have come here and all i see and hear is people moaning about the food and hotel you have to remember your not in Spain or turkey you are in Tunisia for is totally different you want British then go somewhere else . Another thing alot of trouble has been happening here lately you want to get drunk and start fights then stay home your behaviour is not welcome at the hotel the staff management and security do not deserve it they are such lovely people.

This hotel is run down and I can't think of a positive thing to write. Food always cold. Day snacks were very limited. Drinks selection was very limited as well. Local beer, and spirits were disgusting so I bought becks which was only 7 dinar, so about £1.75 a bottle. You can smoke inside the bar and reception area so of an evening they are extremely smokey. Rooms were tidied every day but the sheets were not changed and the AC in the room didn't work. We asked for a cot and were told we had to wait until the next day to get one, which we then had to chase up to get it. Stupidly loud flush on the toilet and the toilet roll holder was held together used a nail at each end to hold the toilet roll.
