The restaurant food was always cold, other than the pizza that you could have freshly made so was then hot. However if you picked a slice of already made pizza then that was also cold. I made a cup of tea and by the time I got up to my room on the second floor it was cold. Hot choclate had no choclate in it. Be vigilant as well. One day they served a pan of spaghetti and a separate pan of bolognese. The restaurant manager came to my table offering a bowl of spaghetti bolognese already mixed. I never saw it myself but I can only assume that it was left over food from other people's plates as he was pushing round the trolley to collect the dirty plates. The table clothes were always dirty and not replaced after someone left the table. The cutlery and napkins were also never replaced so you had to go and take them off other tables, and the salt shakers were all dirty and never cleaned.  The outside was not busy so we had our choice of sun beds. The kids pool was closed as they were retiling it. The main pool slides were only on for about 1 hour out of the day. The pool bar did not serve becks so I had to go to the hotel bar everytime I wanted a drink. Internet was very hit and miss and I struggled to get service around the pool. They had table tennis and darts as entertainment in the day but the tennis court, the basket ball court and crazy golf all needed work and the crazy golf needed that much work you could not play it. The beach did have a beach bar, however it was shut. I wanted to take a bucket of ice with becks down to the beach on my last day but was told there was hardly any ice so I couldn't do that.  I did leave the hotel to go for a walk and the outside was very run down and smelt. The nearest supermarket was a 10 minute walk but as it was Ramadan you could not buy alcohol and any cafes and restaurants near by were all shut until late evening.  I would not return to this hotel and I've been put off Tunisia all together now.

Some parts of the hotel look very nice, but there's a lot of room for improvement. There is a lot of fighting and people having sexual intercourse outside near the bins. This is a family hotel, and there are kids around, so I’m really disappointed. It is Ramadan, and there are really disrespectful people. I would never come back to this hotel, but I would return to the country. The food here was okay, and the staff are friendly.

reviews.review_title: Wasn’t terrible, actually had a great time. Clean, friendly staff and okay food. Good for the price
reviews.review_text: When I first booked and then I read the reviewed I dreaded this holiday I won’t lie. Me and my partner arrived and were pleasantly surprised. For what we paid we actually thought it was okay. Rooms were always clean and tidy, food was okay with some choice, breakfast we didn’t bother and a few had said it wasn’t great but I can’t comment. Staff couldn’t do enough for you, the evening entertainment was always a laugh. I have to say, there was never a dull day, it was a bit like an episode of eastenders with some of the guests, but everyone chats to everyone and it’s generally a friendly atmosphere. Don’t get me wrong, it’s not like the 4 and 5 stars were used too. But we would pay around £1200 each for that. We paid just under £400 total for 2 people and added on a case. I have to say for what we paid I really can’t complain.

Very good experience,amazing friendly staff in all sections, reception, restaurant, swimming pool bar, good food, lovely spa massage with reasonable price,cosy swimming pool and is by an amazing beach! Certainly a go back! Highly recommend!

Extremely limited in food choice  Found chicken raw in the centre on first and only night we had dinner in the hotel Breakfast very limited and poor - hard bread , hard cheese every morning Rooms average and dated Fridge Broken in our Room Television had poor reception No WiFi in the Room , fault with Access Point,  No Pool as advertised  On-The Plus Side;   The Staff were very friendly and helpful given the circumstances This could be a lovely hotel if some thought and proper management was put into its running

Solo travelers honestly don’t… I travel quite a bit and was excited as a female I stuck out like a sore thumb understandably due to the culture etc.  The restaurant and bar are limited, no cocktails, relaxing beside the pool or beach.  The advertisement photo is deceiving as it’s really the most beautiful wall to look at in comparison to the rest of the hotel.  Restaurant and bar area is like an old man’s club dim, fill of smoke and smelly. The room was standard, clean sheets, vanity table and a wardrobe but outdated. The hotel needs a face lift. Also, it doesn’t not a beach as stated except an extremely busy road so be careful! If you intend in booking keep in mind this is no a family friendly hotel it’s anything but.  Finishing on a good point is the location it’s between Yasmin and Hammamet but you’ll need a taxi.

I was pleasantly surprised by this hotel. I stayed there for one night only during a fast passage. Considering the attractive price, I find the property good value for money. The room was clean, with simple but sufficient comfort for a short time. Too bad there is no wifi, but it remains acceptable. The breakfast, although not varied, is quite correct and satisfying. The staff is very welcoming and friendly. It is an ideal choice for a stopover or a short stay. Thank you.

The hotel is located about a 30-minute walk from Hammamet's city center and 15 minutes from the train station, making it a convenient base for exploring the city and its surroundings.  The rooms are clean and well-maintained, though the Wifi did not work despite being advertised as available in all rooms. The staff are polite and speak decent English.  As for food, breakfast is good, although the selection is somewhat limited. Several restaurants offering both local and international cuisine are nearby. There’s also a restaurant within the hotel that serves good food, which is a great option for those who prefer to stay in at night. Beer, wine, and other spirits are available at reasonable prices.  The swimming pool is clean and well-maintained, and drinks are served poolside, although the service can be a bit slow. The clientele is a mix of Europeans, Tunisians living abroad, and locals.  Verdict: While not exactly a peaceful retreat, especially on weekends, this hotel is an excellent base for exploring Hammamet. The price-to-quality ratio is good, and it is relatively affordable by European standards.

Small Inn very nice and very nice..clean and green..typical Tunisian decoration..Heavy Breakfast and Very Affordable Awards..great restaurant..very well located near the sea and the city center..perfect for evenings or a weekend

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel, despite some areas for improvement
reviews.review_text: Nice and clean hotel, typical oriental decorations, spacious rooms, nice pool  Cons: far from the center, breakfast leaves much to be desired, no shower gel in the bathrooms, and inexpensive but low quality restaurant with very long service

reviews.review_title: Best after work spot in hammamet
reviews.review_text: Residence Mahmoud Bar & Restaurant is the ideal spot for unwinding after work. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff create a welcoming atmosphere. Their diverse menu offers delicious options, from appetizers to main courses. The signature cocktails are a must-try, perfectly crafted to suit any taste. Enjoy great company in a relaxed setting. Highly recommended for a delightful evening post-work! Special thanks to mohamed

Negative:  1) Very Noisy, I asked for a quiet room, I am put in a courtyard that is noisy all night with people who eat late at night and stay all night chatting 2) Wifi that does not work in the room even with an ORANGE prepaid package  3) the beach is small , crowded , you are on each other , no place and no privacy  4) the beach is filled with pebbles, it takes 100 meters in the water to get sand  5) flushing that does not work , no water in the toilet 6) Restaurant for Inn guests very small unlike the restaurant of outside guests who have a very large restaurant 7) At breakfast, the staff do not work , they always miss plates , they do not anticipate anything, they should always be asked to bring food , flagrant lack of space , instead of looking at the customers, the staff should work and see what is missing to restock the food 8) I asked for a tea, first it does not ask me what kind of tea I want, it brings me black tea , the one I hate , I prefer green tea to mint and the worst it is cold, it brings it to you without lid and to top it all off, the quantity is just a small glass . No mint tea in the morning. 9) Breakfast to be greatly improved whether at the level of staff or what is offered. 10) I arrive at 13:00 , the receptionist tells me 10 minutes for the housekeeper to make the room knowing that my room has already been booked , I waited 15:00 to have the room , these 10 minutes turned into 2 hours , he did not even offer me to leave the things and go to the beach especially since it was 40 degrees, I lost 2 hours instead of enjoying the beach, cleaning service far too long and inefficient and the worst on the day of my Check-out, the housekeeper arrives at noon to make the room , I would have wanted the day when I arrive that the housekeeper makes the room at noon and not at 15:00. Household too long  11) Too far from the center of Hammamet , 1 hour walk 12 ) Lack of staff smile , Impression of disturbing reception when requesting information 13) No information when we get there, hold the keys and manage   The positive:  1) Quite large room with a beautiful balcony 2) Breakfast with fruit and yogurt  3) Private beach with sunbed  4) Typically Oriental Pension with Maghreb Decorations , it looks like Marrakech Pension 5) A private swimming pool   Overall, it is quite mixed and average but it is a Pension that has potential if it is better managed.

Just come back from Residence Mahmoud Hammamet. Please don't book. This is not a good hotel. It is open to the public and the bar is open till early hours of the morning. Very noisy. We changed room 4 times for different reasons. My watch was taken on the 2nd day from our room. Some rooms do not have a safe and it was not explained that the safe is at reception. Food was awful we booked half board. We had to pay for water with our meals. Every evening you had an option of 3 choices and the same dessert every night water melon or honey melon. It says at the front of the hotel that there is security there isn't  wifi is difficult to get in most rooms. No entertainment as it states on the holiday advert. It also says there is a spa there is not. The pool was not very clean so keep your head above water. We all had stomach problems and had to buy medication. Please just book somewhere else.

A little gem. Cheap but surprisingly good value. A  quaint traditional feel in a good location. If you're looking for a great deal well this hotel offers just that. Breakfast was included although nothing special it was fine. Reception were friendly and although I had to change my room this was no problem. The manager was very helpful in changing my room. The food is reasonably priced and u can get service to the poolside which was great too. There's a friendly lifeguard and helpful restaurant staff there. The rooms are adequate some perhaps bigger and quieter than others so ask for a quiet room as some rooms overlook the restaurant/bar courtyard below which comes alive with young Tunisias at night. All in all a very good attractive hotel with an excellent price and great pool. 👍

reviews.review_title: Located in the tourist area with access to all services and close to shopping centers and supermarkets, etc.
reviews.review_text: The place is very nice and clean and close to all the destinations, the employees have excellent service, especially one who speaks Spanish, his name is Ahmed, the receptionist is very attentive and responsible in his advice, the food is very good, we will return, thank you 100/, recommended

reviews.review_title: Adorable hotel with even nicer employees!
reviews.review_text: Adorable hotel with even nicer employees! The hotel itself is really nice unfortunately theres not much around it. The breakfast is simple yet tasty and the dinner was delicious. The employees also know English and some even know German. It was a nice atmosphere.

Stay 10 days May 2024 Positive: you have everything nearby, store, cafe, restaurant, no need for transport, the residence is very clean, the mop is mopped 10 times a day, the staff is cordial, most of them helpful Except some who think they are I don't know who but...  Negative Limited breakfast no pastries just bread, tomatoes, cheese, jam, coffee luckily you have bakery and cafe next door... Far from the beach c the expedition to get there cross a road full of cars difficult to cross then take stairs then recross a road no pedestrian in short 10 minutes to get there c the weak point if you like the beach don't come here though if you like to party and drink this is the perfect place Bar for beer fans, lots of men, I don't recommend it for single women Or for 1 night or 2

The hotel is a 3-star hotel and the technical condition is satisfactory. However, they try very hard and it is very clean. On the plus side, despite arriving early, we got a room around 10 without having to wait for the day to start. There is an exchange office on site, you can exchange dollars, euros and also pounds, yen or francs and Danish crowns. They have their own piece of beach and 6-7 positions with sun loungers. There is a small swimming pool. There is a restaurant on the patio, good prices, pleasant and very large portions. Breakfast I read a lot of opinions that it was a roll with jam. Today, however, there was cold meat, eggs, white ricotta cheese. , jam, yogurts, baguette, cucumbers, tomatoes, plain and chocolate croissants, and sand cake. Coffee, tea, orange and peach juice, very nice service. The downside is that we have a room above the patio and it is very noisy at night until 2:00, there is music, voices, it is a lively restaurant. Considering the price - a very good choice

I been coming to Tunisia for 40 years and chanced on this hotel following a friends stay .The hotel is lovely rooms spotless food plenty and gorgeous . Can’t fault it good location very nice staff friendly welcoming don’t want to leave ...

We felt like at home. It's nice city Hotel with  great  hospitality. Stuff is really very friendly and helpful. We had nice room on the 3d floor with view on the green restaurant area, flags and sea. Food for dinner was delicious, breakfast food was boring. Rooms were cleaned every day, bed was decorated very nice way, but it was some dust on the furniture, there are put soap for us on the 4th day.  Hotel has excellent local, because it's on the main road and there is bus stop - buses to Tunisia, Yasmin Hammamet, Nubel and Medina are available. 2 roads needs to be crossed to go to the beach, it has sunbeds and sun umbrellas. Wather is  amazing  beautiful. I  recommend this hotel and definitely if I have a chance will visit again.

We've been to this hotel 15 days in September 2016. Im not first time in residence, and this is the place which I want to visit again and again! I'm staying there last two years, and I appreciate so much the development of the hotel. Many things are not changing and this is the positive side, many things changed in a good way and there is no negative side at all. For the people who just thinking to visit this hotel I wanna suggest you residence. The hotel is sittuated in a very good part of Hammamet, between the old center and not so far from Yasmine Hammamet. To get to the beach takes about 5 min by walk. Inside the hotel there is a small garden, pool and bar. Prices in the hotel not so big, I would notice that some things costs less then in other places. The food is really good, and tasty. The staff of the hotel is the best staff in the world! They are so kind, they can help you 24\7 and they made my stay really great!  Thanks to all the people who work in residence! We love you so much and hope to see you soon!

We are third time in this hotel, and each holiday here is amazing! Thanks to everyone who works here, who made our stay so great!  A few words about hotel this year. They made wi-fi in each room, reception bar and garden outside, the bar outside has place in the garden but now there is a new roof which can be open or closed (depends on weather). It made our stay more comfortbale, especially in the evening.  The food is as usual great, the rooms are very clean, outside is very clean. Everyone is so friendly and helped us everytime when we were need it.  Thank you so so so so so much! See you very soon! With love  Your Anna, Lisa and Alisa

We visited this Hotel ( My father and I ) a while ago , we made a reservation and agreed on the price .From the moment I walked in , the receptionist started picking fights with us for no reason , and we were on a 9 hours trip , I tried to explain to him the situation , that I am tired  and can I have my room please , he answered back by saying by saying that there's not any room and that I am being bossy , I explained to him  I am that  I am just tired , he then gave us a room that smells like garbage and was so dirty but we could not find any other place available so we stayed . Then he called us , screamed at us for forgetting to close the doors of our car ( my father is old and sometimes he forgets ) so I went down stairs and we argued about the whole situation . Thank God we were staying there for just one day . And by the way , they don't have enough food in the morning for everyone so must hurry or  you will end up with some bread from two nights before and expired butter .

reviews.review_title: One more amazing holiday in Hammamet
reviews.review_text: We were in Hammamet 2 weeks in August and just back. We are 2nd time in Residence Mahmoud and 17th times in Tunisia. I would like to say a big THANKS to the all staff and the owner of the hotel. Since 1st time there , we are like at home in residence. All stuff there work many years, so they make the atmosphere there.  In brief about residence: The hotel isn't new, but the owner repaired rooms, reception and bar inside the hotel, so the hotel looks very light, style and very clean. You can walk without shoes everywhere. The rooms aren't big but very comfortable, clean and light and there are no same rooms in the whole hotel.  About food: Food is great. they make food very tasty, and sometimes one portion is enough for 2 persons. You can have a lunch as in the hotel (the price is absolutely acceptable) as outside in the cafes. There are many cafes next to the hotel, so there is no problem to eat smth.  As I wrote before, the staff of the hotel is amazing, I love each of them, they were taking care about us and all guests, they are friendly and very cute. They made everything, that I wish going there back asap.  The beach is near the hotel, about 5-7 minutes by walk, there u can find chairs, plank beds or pillows as u like. By the way in the hotel there is a small pool, where u can also stay to have a sunbath if u are lazy to go to the sea.  In the end I would like to say thanks to Mahmoud and the all staff of the residence that they made our staying so great and see u soon, I hope.  Your faithfully Anna S.

We arrived to a very windy and wet Monastir,however, the sun came out on the day on  Sunday .we found the staff extremely attentive ,The animation team, especially Tony ,Amin, and Momo , worked very hard  at keeping all of us moving. The food has got better as the big boss has been in to upgrade the standards and the ambience. It has definitely worked. Our main waiter, Mongi, was simply amazing, and so were the rest of the team, to be honest. The bar staff were very friendly.  The only downside is the accommodation is very tired, sorry. But this is the only criticism. However, they are clean and tidy.   Thanks for a great break, Royal Thalassa

very nice stuff , lovely food and delicious, loved the vibes , but weird thing when we arrived to the hotel an animation guy called toni or roni something like that told us to not talk a lot to the bartenders and the workers in general . i was shocked why all of that hate . they work in the same place just why , i discovered that the bartenders are good ones . anyway our room is always clean also the service is good .we enjoyed

The drinks and service are amazing and especially the staff! There is a very nice animation team member named tony! He hosts things at 9pm in the conference every night and they are all fun. Ranging from dancers to quizes!!! The rooms are perfect aswell and clean. Overall a perfect hotel

I have to say this was a great week away, the hotel itself is brilliant, food is lovely with plenty of choice for breakfast/lunch and dinner and the best part about the hotel is the staff.  Everyone is so friendly and makes you feel very welcome. Adem and the pool bar team make for a wonderful atmosphere throughout the day. Brilliant, if you are thinking about coming here I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great place if you want to stay
reviews.review_text: Great entertainment team!!! Especially Tony who made us laugh and giggle and looked after us. He’s always full of energy and Krishma to go!!! Very bubbly !!! Momo was great too!!! Just like Tony he entertained us immensely!!great place to go for entertainment and food as well as the weather… recommend this hotel to everyone!!!

The tour operator Tony is the most beautiful person in this hostel. He always helps people and he always has strength and is always loved by all people. If you come to this hostel, go to Tony so he can help you. He is really beautiful. He has a strong and wonderful personality. I love this person and I will come again to see this person. And momo , amin yassin DJ nino

The beds are very comfortable, lots of delicious dishes, very nice people and staff, service is always happy to help you if you have a problem or need something. The atmosphere is great and everyone is happy here. They have a big beautiful spa and lots of offers, which makes everyone be able to pick something for themselves.

It was really special holiday. We really had fun, the animation team are very good especially MOMO the energetic one. Tony and amine are good also. They have so many activities different shows every night. Stuff were very lovely and nice…..

Staff were really helpful and friendly and the service was amazing!!!! I highly recommend for a week away with the family. They have multiple activities going on throughout the day so you are never bored. Menu could be updated but overall I enjoyed my experience.

Very nice hotel, friendly staff, clean rooms. Animation team are very friendly and get everyone involved and will go around and talk to everyone. The evening shows have been good to watch. We are slightly out of season coming in May and had one day of rain but still was an enjoyable day drinking and playing card games. Would definitely return.

Fabulous holiday! Fun & enjoyed the boys entertaining my 16 year who normally wouldn’t join in with anyone, but Tony completely brought him out of his shell & made him confident with the other children! Food ok & looking forward to trying a massage! Plenty of staff to accommodate your needs !

The animation teams are the best, so many sports to take part in. Water polo , volleyball , Bowles. All are very fun. I love that we can have 3 meals a day + extra snacks when hungry.   I will personally miss  Momo, Tony & Amin … just the best and definitely the best guy here   #Owow

20 minutes before getting our bus to the airport our bags were not where we left them ( in front of reception) where the receptionist said they would be safe. When we asked to see camera footage multiple times they declined and when we asked to have a written note that our bags were stolen or lost for insurance they said they can’t do that either. They just kept telling us to get on our bus and leave. All they did was time waste until we had to go unless we wanted to miss our flight. The picture is of the manager that didn’t help at all and actually hid in the back when he got caught with his lies and then proceeded to call my girlfriend a liar. I also have a 17 minute video on my phone of all the staff ignoring us and telling us to leave to the airport.

reviews.review_title: A bit dated however staff make up for any negatives and a little tip goes a long way . These people work tirelessly
reviews.review_text: On arrival we where made to wait the standard 3 hours for our rooms , this was a bit of a hassle , we where given a room on the Lower floor which I complained about and was moved the following day upstairs, the second room 269 was very good . It had been recently renovated and my holiday was great thereafter . The animation team work endlessly to make sure guests are happy and content . If you tell them no they accept it and move on , special mention to Tony what a man he is , also anime and mono are great :) doussa on guest relations is great fun and always stopped for a chat AYE  and yuseff in main buffet area was a fantastic waiter always had my table ready , anwar in the bar and the young boy on the beach bar where also great at topping up drinks. My only negative is I had to take my paperwork to the gym daily which was an absolute hassle . This should be free . I have stayed here twice now and with your staff being so good I would come back again . A little tip goes a long way in this hotel , anyone reading reviews it’s not five star you are absolutely correct but you don’t pay five star prices either .! Wouldn’t hesitate on using this hotel on my next visit tonight Tunisia which I hope to be soon

Hotel very close to the airport. Very welcoming staff. Very nice and clean place, nice room, beautiful spa. On the other hand, do not look at the finishes (paint, cleaning...) I think there are improvements to consider

reviews.review_title: Beautiful hotel that I highly recommend
reviews.review_text: First of all being a small group tour operator myself and having worked with many operators and travel agencies for 8 years; I was very surprised by the negative reviews that do not correspond in any way to the reality of the hotel. The criticisms are unfounded. I am currently with my partner at the Royal Thalasso Monastir Hotel. The hotel is beautiful with a beautiful modern decoration and very nice.all the staff is kind and attentive. The service is impeccable on all levels. The rooms are comfortable and the cleaning is well done every day (with a small tip. , , you have all the attention). The setting is very nice and the outdoor pool is great, plus an indoor heated pool. The food is varied and delicious. There's really a choice. Fresh and pressed orange juice is offered. In other hotels, it is paid. The hotel offers a very peaceful setting for a relaxing holiday. It deserves these 5 stars by Tunisian standard. Special thanks to Mr chokri Atiri for his very warm welcome and for room 518 . Thank you very much. I highly recommend the Royal Thalasso Monastir. Make your own experience and beware of negative or misleading reviews. Mme Camaret Camille

reviews.review_title: Happy for the price we paid, expect 3 star and you’ll be fine!
reviews.review_text: Hotel room was large and clean- bathroom a little dated. 2x 1.5L water bottles replenished daily in the room. Walls are very thin and often woken by neighbors. Location- nothing near by, some water sports on the beach and a hotel further down with a shop inside. Take cash to change for dinar- won’t do this with card.  Pool area was nice, pool kept clean. Always enough sunbed both at the pool and the beach.  Animation team are lovely, always trying to get you involved however if you’re not interested do soon get the picture and leave you alone. Pool/beach bars didn’t have the largest selection of alcohol but we don’t drink much so wasn’t an issue for us. Soft drinks were branded, latte was nice.  Food was repetitive like most all inclusive however we always found something to eat and didn’t go hungry. Drinks were waiter service at lunch and dinner, again staff really helpful and always keeping drinks topped up. Staff were all very attentive, polite and always happy to help. We visited the spa for access only which was relaxing which cost about £25 for two people.  We went as a couple and wasn’t much entertainment for kids however this may be different in the school holidays. Some reviews are very negative on here but for the price we paid we did not expect the 5 star luxury we’ve had before where we have paid a 5 star price. If you remember that you won’t go far wrong, we had hot sunny weather, relaxed by a pool and didn’t have to cook and clean for a week for a very low price! So I can’t complain! We would return for a cheap week in the sun!

Poor. Every day the lights are turned off for 2 hours. -the dining room has dirty tables and utensils -the service is very bad -the water in the shower smells of chlorine -they cook a lot of food in front of you and you have to wait -there is only water. no juices or soda -This hotel is not worth your attention -This is a very cheap hotel and it is not worth the money. -I will never come to this hotel in my life and I do not recommend it to anyone -we wanted to change our room and they told us the price was twice as high as what I bought this holiday -all we had to do was to climb into the room for 7 days and not go out so as not to get even more upset

reviews.review_title: Never a 5 star. More like two.
reviews.review_text: This hotel claims to be 5 star. It is not. Maybe many years ago it was good, but now it is run down and tired. So firstly I’ll praise the staff, the majority work hard, and are friendly, but like any large establishment there are exceptions.  Arrived about 12:00 lunch time tired and hot after 11 hours travelling. Hotel policy is they won’t book you in until 3pm. So you’re left sitting in reception for a further 3 hours.  Finally got room and paid extra for pool view. Not disappointed. Room however although cleanish is probably 20-30 years outdated. With bodge repairs (see bath photo as an example) next I take a shower, bath is filling with water and plug twist doesn’t work. I then have to unscrew bath plug and lift it. Water still doesn’t go so now I’m stamping trying to use my foot as a plunger over the hole and blockage clears. This is how we left it for the week. Every mornings around the toilet area puddles of clean water. Can’t suss where it’s coming from, but always cleaned by the very good room service.  Hotel location is isolated so it’s the hotel or nothing else unless taxi ride. You can walk to Monastir airport about 15 min for a shop at airport prices. Beach is disappointing, only just over one subbed wide, and that’s all the time. Tide doesn’t seem to make it bigger or smaller. Also not the best. Food is repetitive, and often just like warm, by the end of the week I was glad of chips and cakes. Drinks are super small, beer you can drink all day and night and it has no effect, it’s either super watered down or alcohol free. All other all inclusive stuff is local and equally tiny measures. I feel for the bar staff, there are some good people, but I was told by one member policy was not to serve all inclusive guests in larger glasses. Animation team work hard, but sometimes over the top. Public entrance and piano bar are ok, pool bar and beach bar poorly stocked and regular run out and run down.  Maybe a ploy to serve less, but just makes it look unprofessional and cheap. I stay in many hotels as part of my work, rooms are on a par with travelodge, functional but not much else, air conditioning blows but is ineffective, public areas maybe as good as premier inn. Entertainment although they try is to varying degrees. Karaoke standard to pub singers at best.

reviews.review_title: Hotel with outstanding crew working there.
reviews.review_text: It was my second stay in this hotel after one and a half year. And it was so good that we already planing to come back. People working there are absolutely outstanding 👏. Always smiling and ready to help with everything. For the first time I was travelling with wheelchair and was worried that we will not manage. It was no need to. There was always a kind soul ready to help. I would like to thank people working at the pool and sea bar for all the support everytime we came there. Also animation team and pool lifeguards. I would also love to thank waiters in restaurant for making us feel welcome and special all the time. Dear management you have fantastic people working there. Food was excellent and hit my taste buds directly. Wide selection of meat, pastas, and salads etc. Room was nice and clean. We kept finding hearts and swans made of towels which we found cute. I would give 6 stars with ease if trip advisor allow that.

Very nice and beautiful hotel in Djerba and animation program is very good. Very very large swimming pool, and very much drinks in the bar. Rooms are larges and very good service every day. Very good trips in the island by the way crocodille farm and Czech sweet shop Aisha in the Houmt Souk👍🏻

Great experience, we had a great time. Surely it is a dated hotel with something to fix, but everything works, but it is clean and nothing is missing. The food is great, lots of choice, maybe the only disservice is that in this period there was no bar near the beach but I think in high season there is .. The fantastic beach, a wonderful sea, immense and clean pool  We really liked it so much

A very relaxing holiday and hotel experience.  The animation team are great, they get everybody involved and aren't pushy about joining in.  If you're here to relax or get involved, you'll enjoy yourself either way.  The events and activities that they put on are also great, games in the pool and good music at night.

Sun, beach and swimming pool   Good stay , the animators are very welcoming and the activities offer are varied.  The highlight is the pool which is very large and always with music.  Animations are for all ages, Hocine, Tito, Joker, Cacouhete, Walid... are always there to set the mood.

Good atmosphere good food very large pool leS rooms are well maintained nothing we miss it was a great stay the beach it is clean is clear no papers no bottle everything is fine we will come back to this hotel we liked

Great stay, great dynamic animators, good organization, the welcome service is listening. Interesting excursions are offered. The rooms are clean and the sheets changed every day. Clean hotel, pool maintained. Drink service at the pool with some extras.

reviews.review_title: Superb experience at the Hotel Castille

animation on the TOP, they are very present , very nice , very smiling. Superb team we highly recommend!! super good food too.  a big thank you to you:) we will come back!!  animation on the TOP, they are very present , very nice , very smiling. Superb team we highly recommend!! super good food too.  a big thank you to you:) we will come back!!

Very good hotel animation really up to the ambiance availability activity very friendly team available bravo Many coix d activity evening diverse they involve everyone with a very good mood a big bravo especially to Houcine

Good hotel, close to all activities, sun goodbye, very good animations and animators, a great stay of 10 days, very large pool with animators close to us. Thanks to the team and special dedication to Joker and Imen and all the others...

reviews.review_title: Have a nice holiday at hotel Castille
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel, very good location, feet in the water, we spent a beautiful week very sunny. The animation team with little care for all tourists. The evenings were very nice, really only good memories.

Very nice hotel with a nice team of animators at the top, varied food, attentive staff, very nice week. To be repeated without hesitation. We met only beautiful people and will keep beautiful memories, it was a beautiful sunny week.

Great hotel very good stay we went from May 16th to May 22nd the services of the hotel super ticket distributor souvenir shop main product massage care very welcoming smiling and good work I did massages of the hammam seaweed care I itching and it also has a beautician hair and nail care... too cool more at good price and it also has indoor spa pool and outdoor pool it has access to the direct beach it also has the photographer too top we did shows Tim with my husband good experience he put us really at ease without forgetting the bar it his very serious and nice very good service and the restaurant super it with everything and it changes every day very good service very nice takes care of their client and of course I do not overlook the animation team it its at the top they do everything for us to have fun and have good times in sports games themed evenings I did not want to leave to actually clean rooms and it has the elevator 😃 😀 🙂 ☺️ I recommend you

We had the weirdest experience at this establishment,  We booked two nights with friends on Booking in all inclusive formula,  Arriving at the hotel we were downgraded for another formula , on the pretext that booking that downgraded us but checking, we confirm that the hotel establishment that makes a kind of segregation for people of Arab origin We intend to go far even to the tourist police complaining about this incident that marked us negatively.  Poor institution.

The hotel is clean and the food excellent. The hosts and staff very friendly. A big downside on the smoking allowed in the common areas c is very inconvenient especially as the wifi n connection is only present in these rooms. The beach is nice although the availability of deckchairs is a problem.a good 4 stars

The photographer is very serious very professional  On top  These photos are beautiful   I recommend this person  The animators are also very friendly  Very clean rooms  Don't hesitate he's very human  The beauty of the hotel   The view of the rooms  Nothing to say

Sympathy hotel. Beautiful room the animators very top, but the best is Wassim peanut 10 stars for him, it is Wassim, bibi I will renew my experience with our friends, friendly atmosphere, music in the evening nickel

reviews.review_title: Enchanted break in this small haven of peace.
reviews.review_text: Excellent stay at this property. Animators and all the lovely staff. Very clean room, nickel bedding, very decent meal. Beautiful beach and huge pool + indoor pool. Superb Excursions

Great stay, great time with my family. Thank you to Wassime for his kindness. The team of animators is super energetic and happy .humour. Great stay, great time with my family. Thank you to Wassime for his kindness. The team of animators is super energetic and happy .humour.

Have a great time in Djerba. A big thank you to Tito, Wasseme, Mario, Joker and Imene who animated our stay and were listening to us throughout our stay. Have a great time in Djerba. A big thank you to Tito, Wasseme, Mario, Joker and Imene who animated our stay and were listening to us throughout our stay.

If you don’t mind very clean but dated rooms or eating continental food then this is a true gem. Special shout out to egg chef Lofty who is a big softy, though you would not think it The staff are very friendly, the pool is excellent, might be a bit cold out of season. Prices for drinks both in and out of hotel is good.  Area on first appearance is run down but the New medina is 5 mins walk away and is vibrant with the added bonus of the Rovers Return, if you fancy a drink and chat with ex pats that run it. I’m told they do a good Sunday lunch if that’s your thing. Almost opposite the hotel is a local cafe, coffee, soft drink and excellent flat bread or panini’s £8 for 2. It’s not everyone’s choice but VFM it is excellent, we were HB not sure I would want AI.

I am a 74 year old solo traveller, and I had a terrible experience at the Florapark Hotel, this hotel is promoted as a 4 star hotel. I booked a full board + plus holiday! When booking the holiday the travel agent told me that the full board plus was soft drinks with my meals, this suited me just fine! On arrival none of the staff helped me with my luggage! I was slightly earlier arriving for 2pm check in and I was told that I could go and get lunch in the hotel restaurant.....I had to pay for my lunch and my soft drink, and this left me pretty baffled as I was there on a full board basis!  I decided to ask the hotel manager (who was extremely cold & unwelcoming) what the full board plus entailed..... He told me that includes the use of the pool area, the restaurant, the gym! and all the hotels immensities! When I explained to him that I was told that the full board plus was all meals including sort drinks he dismissed the matter and point blank said that I would have to pay for any soft drinks, tea and coffee in the hotel!  This hotel is promoted as a 4* star hotel but is more like a 2*star at a push!   My bedding got changed once after I requested it be changed, my bedroom had many faults eg. Drawer cupboard bottoms sliding out! Door knobs hanging off, the hotel is badly needing a revamp, my balcony looked onto a wall, it was a terrible experience all around.  The morning came to check out and the nightshift staff were prompting me to tip them, but they had done nothing for me, and when I said that I had no money left, they said well you go outside and wait, I felt again extremely disappointed, and once again I got dismissed from the staff...... My transfer arrived to take me to the airport and no one helped me with any of my luggage to the bus.  This was my twelve time visiting Tunisia, I have always had a warm reception from the hotel staff, I have loved my holidays to Tunisia but my experience at the Florapark hotel was so sickening and disappointing that I'm not sure if I'll return.

reviews.review_title: Disappointing Stay – Lovely Staff But That’s About It
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this hotel especially from the pictures, but sadly it didn’t meet expectations. The cleanliness was poor — rooms and common areas unkept. There was absolutely no entertainment on offer, and the location is quite remote with nothing of interest nearby.  The food was another major disappointment. It was the same every day, with very little variety or excitement in the meals. It quickly became boring and unappetizing.  The one saving grace of this hotel was the staff. They were truly lovely — always polite, helpful, and doing their best to make guests feel welcome. It’s just unfortunate that the rest of the experience didn’t match their efforts.

I wanted to share my opinion about my stay at the Hotel Flora park hammamet,   This is our second stay at this same hotel  We had already spent a week in April ,  Before coming the first time we read the negative comments,  But we tried to discover for ourselves what this hotel offers   Finally we were not disappointed,  It's true it's a small hotel But very nice  The exteriors are very clean and very well maintained , the outdoor pool is very clean ,  A quiet and classy hotel, People are friendly from the reception to the maid, The buffet and varied it is true that it is a bit the same menu every day but we find everything and for all tastes,. We can eat healthy, He always has a very nice background music,   Rooms are clean  The director is always present  Maintenance team is still active  The people at the reception are very welcoming and smiling The waiters at the restaurant are helpful too and very attentive  And work hard from morning till night and with a smile,  Host Rami is very smiling , and puts good music around the pool outside of nap time , it sets the mood ,   Djelloul The lifeguard is also very kind, very attentive,  And at the restaurant, we were very well served too  We had dinners with violinist, With saxophonist ,   A good atmosphere prevails in this hotel  Quiet for Adult only where people want to rest   Don't dwell on details such as small bugs or a rusty tap or a broken wrist, It happens, but the main thing is that on reporting it gets fixed.   For mice,.I don't think there are because there are plenty of cats spinning.  There's no trace of mice.  Beautiful hotel, good atmosphere, very nice location,  Very good serious team,   Friendly staff.  I encourage them again,  I hope we get back to that soon.   Raid and Ines.

reviews.review_title: It is 2 star hotel not 4. Wouldn't return or recommend.Had a terrible holiday.
reviews.review_text: I booked this resort as single person as it was adults only.On arrival at 11 a.m I been told to wait till 2 p.m as checking in time is 2 p.m.I sat at the hotel bar waiting.Lunch started at 12.30 as I paid for full board I made my way to the restaurant but been told that I have to pay for lunch as on the first day I only can have 1 meal free.No free water or any beverages has been offered on arrival.Actually there was nothing free there even though I paid for full board.All drinks,coffee,water,soft drinks are payable.Room was very rundown and dirty, bathrooms covered in limestone and very smelly.Water pressure is not existent and hot water only runs for 5 min.Bed was extremely uncomfortable, very hard mattress and lumpy old pillows.Gym equipment was broken and it was basically a pile of metal parts,could only use Treadmill , weights starts from 8kg.I did complaint about gym conditions but nothing had been fix.So,there are no gym center. On the second day my toilet got flooded but it hasn't been fixed or cleaned properly so I had a smelly pond for the rest of the holiday. Oh, air-conditioning is a joke,it's makes a very loud noise but no cool air coming out. There are no cattle or tea / coffee making facilities,no iron so if you need to iron you have to pay for each piece of clothes which needs to be ironed. Cleaning is terrible,my floor hasn't been mopped for 6 days and bathroom was absolutely minging. TV has no English channels and no remote control was in the room. I had to pay deposit for pool towels. Food is absolutely terrible pretty much same every day,no fresh fruit or ice-cream,or tea.  People allowed to smoke inside. There was absolutely no entertainment of any kind in the evening so if you want some nice food and music you would have to go out. Big square beds by the pool didn't have nice curtains or soft padded covers ( as per advertised pictures)and frankly dirty. Oh,the beach...It is about 15 min for walk from hotel.Very dirty, neglected with old sunbeds.Beach Bar looked like an old garden shed,not shower or changing facilities, couldn't see toilet. Giving tips to staff would make no difference so don't bother. Overall after 6 days I had a stomach ache because of poor food,back pain because of very uncomfortable bed and couldn't wash my hair properly because of poor water pressure.I was very close to leave early as I had very bad experience. On my last night I could sleep at all as some Arabic speaking couple had a mad domestic for hours upstairs but no hotel staff attended to find out what is going on. Please don't waste your time and money. Do not believe pictures,you will be very disappointed.

The room is gross, already there are 2 glued beds instead of a large double bed , at the reception they told us we had to offer this when booking! Knowing that we went on our honeymoon, the sheets were dirty , the pillows were padded with sponge , there was no duvet on the bed and the towels do not talk about it! We went to the reception to claim they told us to go to dinner first! And at the surprise restaurant... there was a mouse that was quietly walking around! The worst part is that when we told them we weren’t believed accusing us of wanting to cause trouble

First impressions were lovely but all was not as it seemed.    Cons: 1) Hotel rooms were run down: 1a) latch / handle on sliding balcony door was hanging off so couldn’t secure the room.  1b) air conditioning was ineffective and did not output cool / cold air, only circulated warm air from the room (it was colder outside and more effective to open the balcony door for cool air).  1c) room cleaning was poor / non-existent. It seems the cleaner only made the bed and partially replaced dirty bath towels I.e. two dirty towels taken away but only replaced with one clean. Empty toilet roll not replaced so left with none.   1d) bedding wasn’t changed during a 5 night stay.   1e) telephone in room did not work to call reception with issues.  Communal areas: 2) suffocating toxic smell for 1 day in all corridors, lobby, stairwell and lift - possibly white spirit or similar. Staff were unable to explain what it was other than someone decorating (although there were no signs of workman decorating or freshly painted areas). This was exceptionally unpleasant and if it was from decorating this should not have been completed whilst guests were staying.  3) Pool music was obnoxiously loud to the point where even putting in head phones and listening to music at maximum volume couldn’t even drown out the pool side music. We were forced to listen to it whether we wanted to or not!  4) the hotel rule of ‘no food or drink from outside the hotel to be brought into the grounds’ was not communicated to us at check in. This rule applied even for us on a half board package and we only discovered this after visiting a nearby shop and on return our purchases were confiscated at the gate. We were told to speak to reception who did not apologise for not informing us and made no effort to resolve the issue.   During our stay we also heard other guests discussing their same negative experience.  5) very little variation in evening meals, it always contained the same dishes with perhaps one or two variations from evening to evening. All dishes lacked flavour and very bland.  6) return transfer collection was absurdly early. The hotel is 35 minutes from the airport, we were the final pick up and our pick up time was 5:55am (but had to be outside 15 minutes early). The bus arrived at 5:40am and we arrived at the airport at 6:15am (4 hours before our flight and 1 hour before check in opened). This was hugely unnecessary.   Pros: 1) Entrance lobby and pool looked were lovely and well kept.

We have just returned from a 4 day break at the TMK Flora park and have no negative points it was a very good stay in a very clean hotel where the staff could not do any more ,the food was excellent we had breakfast and dinner and had no complaints,the hotel is a short walk to the beach which admittedly could do with a good clean each morning ,the area is quiet and enjoyable to walk around  it is very touristy but you shoul know this already  ,we stayed in room 300 which was superb as was the housekeeper and all the staff overall an excellent experience .

Lets start with the good - flights and transfer were fine. First impressions of the hotel was good. Staff were friendly and loungers by the pool were comfy. Breakfast was nice too - The chef had great humour and I had a omelette most days. If you don't like eggs, you were pretty stuffed though.   Hotel room - Broken balcony door (how this has not been fixed I do not know) - we could have asked to change but we had unpacked by the time we realised. Air con worked but wasn't cold, just blew out room temperature air, even though it was on the coldest setting. We went in May so I can only imagine how hot the room would get any other time of the year. Then the shower, if you can call it that. Hot then cold whenever it felt like it and next to no pressure at all. It was laughable.   Food - we were half board. As mentioned breakfast was ok! Dinner though, very bland. Same type of food every night. I lived off rice! We decided to go out one night but found the same - very very bland. Cocktails also not good.  Pool - nice pool but what really let it down was the volume of the music. The hotel has a member of staff just to sit and do the music all day. Mixture of music but so loud, unnecessarily loud. If you wanted peace - yeah, good luck!  Area - As a whole I was not impressed. Very dirty, beaches also had litter everywhere. Because of this we decided not to have a beach day.   With the rules on their currency it meant we had to get money out there. I would really recommend taking cash out with you and exchanging it. Unfortunately we didn't do this and had to find a ATM. If we had the cash originally the hotel would have exchanged it there and then on check in.   Everywhere you go people are always trying to get your attention. Friendly, yes but its always to con you into buying something. I really felt the pressure from everyone and in the end, we ended up being a bit rude telling everyone no thank you and not stopping to chat.   We made the best out of the holiday but overall, I would not return not only to the hotel, how its a 4 star I will never know but to Tunisia. Shame. I hope writing this will help others as I would have loved to have known this beforehand.

The hotel does not deserve 4 stars!!!! Luckily we had a great time with Dorsaf the masseuse , SPA area, who is very professional, competent and very nice!!! Thank you to Ayoub at the reception for his commercial gesture! The restaurant chef very cold, looks like the security person at the door of his restaurant!The rest of the staff very decent.

May I address this complaint to you following my arrival today at your establishment. From the moment I arrived, I was disappointed by the reception and the condition of the room. Indeed, many essentials were missing, and the room lacked life and comfort. In addition, I had to search my room alone after the receptionist simply pointed me in the direction, without any assistance. The road was long, and outside my bedroom door there were mattresses stored, which gave the impression of neglect. Regarding my full board reservation, it is clearly stated that I should benefit from three meals per day. Having arrived at noon, it would have been logical for me to start with lunch, and for my stay to end with breakfast on the day of my departure. However, the receptionist informed me that I had to start with dinner, which does not meet the conditions. Finally, I would like to point out that the internet connection (wifi) in my room is of very poor quality, which is particularly embarrassing.  Thank you for taking my complaint into consideration and making the necessary corrections. As you await your return, please accept, Madam, Sir, the expression of my distinguished greetings.

reviews.review_title: Nice holiday, good location, fresh food, great staff - completely satisfied!
reviews.review_text: We had a great time at the hotel. The staff is extremely courteous, very polite and for everyone to have fun. The breakfast buffet was delicious and fresh, Lotfi, ca va? Thanks for the delicious omelet every day! Even the buffet in the evening offers many, but very meaty, dishes. Nevertheless, there is something for everyone. The rooms are cleaned every day, all great. Particularly noteworthy are Rami and Jalloul, two particularly dear employees who provided good music and great entertainment. We will come back. Merci beaucoup!

We stayed 10 nights, very disappointed,  in need of refurbishment,  public areas are clean, rooms not so much, reported several complaints to reception, all dealt with quickly. All fittings need replacing,  taps very difficult to operate,  shower tap broke off in my hand.all drains blocked.  Water leaks from shower. Several lights not working . No tea/coffee making  facilities in the room. Provided after several requests,  two cups ,a few tea bags, no coffee ,sugar ,milk or spoons. Purchased from local shop. Hotel discourages guests from bringing in food and drinks also water. Good selection of food,  buffet style.most of it was barely warm, mostly cold. Good selection of fried eggs and fresh omelette made to order.  Coffee provided for breakfast was served from out dated machines Luke warm and tasted terrible Microwave is provided in the restaurant to heat the cold food, but was not functional  All Inclusive is a joke, one bottle of water provided with evening meal. All other beverages must be paid for at all times Bar man under served spirits, when queried ,denied it aggressively.  We ate out several times at various restaurants , all very poor quality. Over all very cheap holiday if that is your only requisite  ideal if you want to spend every day by the pool and tan. No real activities in the area, not even descent walks The entire area is just Hotels. Shopping is shocking experience. All shopkeepers try to rip off tourists, we witnessed several horrendous transactions Benidorm is a million times better, not that we would return there. We will never return. We are seasoned travelers.  This was our worst experience. Go at your peril

reviews.review_title: A 7 day holiday… 2 days in we went home
reviews.review_text: We arrived on Wednesday to stay for a week full board and changed our flight home to Friday staying just 2 nights.  I booked this trip with my 20 year old daughter with an open mind, having visited Tunisia twice before but many, many years ago so we weren’t expecting Benidorm or Greece!  The hotel is nice, not fantastic, it’s fairly old and the rooms and facilities are tired, albeit spotless.  The staff were in the main friendly, bar a couple of extremely miserable ones!  This hotel however is clearly mainly for Tunisians and definitely not for Westerners, even though it was an EasyJet package holiday, we felt quite intimidated by this and felt very out of place and uncomfortable especially at meal times.  We had got dressed for a nice meal only to end up sitting in a jacket at the dinner table to avoid the stares. The restaurant was more like a canteen and ambiance non existent.  The bar sadly allowed smoking and Tunisians smoke a lot.   The food wasn’t great although looked the part with lovely looking salads etc it was all very tasteless and the hot buffet was only just warm, cold in some cases.   The other guests took huge plates full of food to their tables, especially the desserts, and proceeded to pick over this and leave what they didn’t want, which quite frankly the waste was incredible but never questioned, despite the management having signs requesting “you can take what you like but eat what you take!” The buffet was not replenished so if you didn’t get there early then you got what scraps were left. We didn’t go to dinner on the 2nd day nor breakfast, we bought crisps & biscuits from the shop to avoid putting ourselves through that again.   On the first night, at midnight our hotel room door was tried several times, it could have been mistaken room identity (although the numbers are clearly marked) but it frightened the living daylights out of me and I’ll be honest we really didn’t feel safe.   We are completely gutted that our Mother/Daughter week away was cut short, no complaints were made because what were we to complain about, it just wasn’t what we expected, if you are looking to spend your holiday with the locals then go for it.  As the currency is closed we exchanged money at reception when we arrived but as no receipt was given (make sure you ask for one) they wouldn’t change our money back so we had to try and spend it all at the airport, before going through passport control.  Not something I generally have a problem with but it’s just tat and crap souvenirs!!  Be prepared to tip everyone, they will wait or ask for a tip in whatever you do even the bus driver who wouldn’t load or unload our suitcases.

Very nice hotel, ideal location, close to the sea, shops and Yasmine Medina. Staff at your disposal. The cuisine is quite varied.  Well equipped room, balcony terrace.  Just lacks enough to dry the towels and suit after bathing.

reviews.review_title: Very good time in a lovely hotel well worth a visit
reviews.review_text: Hotel was lovely very clean staff were exceptional specially beganda the waiter main bar manager  maids  in cleaning the rooms and chef working breakfasts. Little quiet .but exceptional . A little cool bit again it was december and just a lovely country . Good location and the people are so friendly .

Quiet hotel: 100% family friendly  Service: 7/10 Food: 0/10 nul  Heated swimming pool: 0 (unheated 👎👎) Hygiene: 5/10 Chamber: 5/10 Team: 7/10 Not recommended  The receptionist has already been told to improve the service   🙏🙏

The hotel was very well maintained and clean. Common areas such as the entrance hall, corridors and relaxation areas were spotless. In the room, everything was perfectly cleaned, from freshly changed sheets to sparkling bathrooms. It was felt that the staff attached great importance to the maintenance and hygiene of the establishment.    Kitchen:  The service of the staff, especially the waiters, was impeccable with remarkable attention to every detail and constant concern for the well-being of the guests.  Food is a shame because cooking is an important part of my hotel experience. I hope the property will be able to review its culinary offerings in the future to offer more diversity to its guests. This would greatly improve the overall quality of the stay.  the host of the Rami Hotel:  was one of the highlights of my stay. With his overflowing energy and communicative enthusiasm, he has created a friendly and entertaining atmosphere within the hotel. Its varied activities and activities allowed all guests, young and old, to spend pleasant moments and relax fully.   His organizational skills, creativity and ability to put people at ease were particularly appreciated. Thanks to him, the hotel was not just a place to stay, but became a real place to live and share.   I will have an excellent memory of this outstanding host, who contributed greatly to the success of my stay. His professionalism and good humor were a real plus for the overall hotel experience.

Very relaxing and very quiet hotel, employees and quality services on this point is 5/5 nothing wrong.  3/5 for the food because very good but lack of variety at the end of the 3rd day we quickly go around the buffet unfortunately.  Dedication to Rami the animator who welcomed me and my wife very well and with whom I was able to make a very pleasant game of pool , thank you!

I recently had the chance to stay at the *Flora Park* hotel in Hammamet, and it was a truly unforgettable experience. Upon arrival, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism by the staff, who knew how to make my stay even more enjoyable. The hotel offers an idyllic setting, between glittering pool, lush gardens and direct access to a sandy beach. My room was spacious, comfortable and decorated with care, which ensured a perfect rest after a busy day. The activities offered were varied, ranging from water sports to evening entertainment, allowing you to fully enjoy every moment. The cuisine was exquisite, with a generous buffet offering local and international dishes that delighted my taste buds. *Flora Park* is undoubtedly an ideal address for a relaxing stay, with family or friends, where comfort and conviviality meet perfectly.

This is the first time in barcelo concorde very good place the weather so good i start describing the hotel the beginning with reception staff friendly helpful everything is good the room clean the pool and the sea very good animation team is great

reviews.review_title: Lovely holiday in Green Park Palace
reviews.review_text: Our stay in Sousse was fantastic, thanks to the incredible animation team! They brought energy, laughter, and fun from morning to night with games, music, shows, and activities for all ages. So friendly, talented, and dedicated—every day felt like a celebration. Can’t wait to come back!

This is the first time in Tunisie im so happy to be her nice weather every thing is fine i live so much this place reception Staff very good resto good service delicious food the room clean animation team the Best work all the day top energii i hope to comeback again

This iš the second Time in Tunisą and first Time in barcelo Concord wonderful place weather absolutly į start describing the hotel the room very good clean reception staff good people resto good service delicious good animation team the best ever

This is the first time in Tunisia in barcelo concorde everything is good weather I start with reception staff very good the room so clean the resto also green and everything delicious good service I can't forget animation team the best in the hotel

reviews.review_title: The animation team is so friendly and perfect and i love this guys, this guys have me fun on m
reviews.review_text: During my recent vacation, I stayed at the Bagcelo Concorde green park and overall, the experience was pleasant with a few areas for improvement. The hotel’s location was unbeatable—right by the beach with stunning ocean views from the balcony. The staff were courteous and welcoming, always ready to help with a smile. Check-in was smooth, and the lobby had a relaxing, upscale vibe.  The room was clean and well-maintained, though slightly smaller than expected. The bed was comfortable, and the housekeeping staff did an excellent job daily. I especially appreciated the complimentary breakfast, which offered a good variety of hot and cold items, including fresh fruit and pastries.  However, the Wi-Fi connection was spotty, which was frustrating when trying to plan our daily outings. Also, the pool area, while attractive, got quite crowded in the afternoons, making it less relaxing than hoped.

This is the second time in tunisia but the first time in barcelo concorde good weather everything is good staff reception friendly helpful care the resto very clean and nice service the room very nice the pool and sea great animation team the best her

I would like to thank all the hotel teams all the staff without exception nothing to say they are really professional and very vigilant. The only thing improved would be the wifi we had not in the rooms but only in the large lobby of the reception. Congratulations to all of you without forgetting of course the great animator. Malika 👏👏👏👏👏

This hotel is so good, good rooms, good animations, i love outdoor pool, every time is my room clean, reception stav is good always can help with everything, beach is so beautiful and clean, sea too, i love people here everyone is so kind. I love this hotel and everything about this.

having a great stay, rooms great, can’t fault the staff. the animation team - Pedro & crew were very friendly and welcoming there are lots of different activities to get involved in aswell. the bar staff and restaurant staff are also great. The pool and rooms are very clean, the food is lovely and there is lots of choice.

This is the first time in Tunisia nice place here the weather is always good i start describing reception with the staff good helpful care and smiling resto very good clean and good service delicious food the room very good I cant forget the best animation team

reviews.review_title: I really recommend this place to travellers coming to tunisia
reviews.review_text: Honestly where can. I start This hotel is just an incredible place the reception staff is really nice and friendly also the rooms are very clean the room service workers are really nice and do a great job.  The restaurant is also really clean and the food is just so good and we also cant forget about the animation team special mention to Pikachu, Pedro and Prince and Zizou they just bring so much energy to the hotel their very friendly and cool and the bar workers are so nice and friendly and one more special shoutout to bobo he is really friendly and a cool person.

SPA with quality services worthy of a 5* own professional know-how exceptional I highly recommend the manager Abdel and are equipped are honest welcoming friendly bravo to you all and good continuation I would return it is certain THANK YOU  Samia & Malika

Me and my family went from the 13th untill the 20 May 2025. We had the best time ever.... My daughter loved the children's Disco.... PEDRO fantastic he goes that extra mile and makes all the children happy thank you Pedro... And also PIKA very good for sport my sons and partner loved all the sports PIKA was brilliant thank you. Everyday there are lots of things to do. The staff go that extra mile for you... Everyone is friendly and kind... One of the best holidays we have been on so far. Moving on to food... Food was very nice and fresh I am fussy with what I eat but there is so much and for the children aswell Mohamd  the waiter is so lovely he is just the sweetest man everyday he waited for us and gave us a table and on the last day he decorated our table best service ever. The staff are lovely. Rooms are clean and the cleaners come everyday with fresh towels and bedding smells lovely and they work so hard. All in all beautiful hotel we hope to return soon. Thank you for making our holiday lovely from us all.

Had a fantastic holiday. The hotel is lovely and spotless. The staff can't do enough for you, very helpful. The animation team were amazing, so friendly and welcoming. Encouraging you to try different activities. Prince, Pikacho and Pedro especially. Food and drink was amazing. Great holiday will be back.😍

Had the most amazing time hotel was clean staff could not do enough for you, Entertainment team were fantastic very talented ..shout out for Prince and Rosa and kept us entertained every day. Lifeguards were also very good at looking after us making sure we had comfortable sun-beds and parasols. Food was good and plenty of it …restaurant staff really looked after you too. Defo booking to come back

reviews.review_title: A great hotel for the family with fun activities for all.
reviews.review_text: It was a very enjoyable experience with my family, the staff couldn’t be any more helpful, especially the entertainment staff special mention for Rosa for her yoga and Prince for aquagym and volleyball which kept us entertained all day with activities for everyone every day and shows at night that were great.   The rooms are lovely as well which are very specious and it’s near the madina which have various shops that can do souvenirs for everyone.

Booked last minute and can honestly say this hotel didn’t disappoint , the animation team are organising activities for the whole day , they don’t pressurise you into participating and the games are fun not overly serious . I played darts , French boules and did the Pilates and water aerobics my husband joined in with the archery . I cannot single out any particular animation member they all did a great job morning through till midnight .  The rooms were nice and big with a bath and shower within bath . The hotel exterior was being painted and carpets in hallways being replaced whilst we stayed disruption was minimal . The food was  excellent always something new to try ( did mention to staff the labels needed to be better as fish described as fish not which type of fish - we ate a lovely one but have no idea what it’s called . They said they would be making labels better )  the location of this hotel to port area 7 minutes walk and beach at hotel soft sand with plenty of sunbeds . I would definitely recommend this hotel and shall return . And forgot to mention bar staff they were excellent too ,lovely friendly and waiter service to sunbeds perfect

Fantastic location right by the beach with a huge indoor and outdoor pool. Big comfortable rooms, great food.   The animation staff were lovely and accommodating, particularly Pikatcho and Pedro.   We took our baby and they couldn't have been more accommodating. Loved it.

We went on 10th May.1 week.Had a great time at green park Palace.  1st I will say room very spacious and cleaned every day.The maids work very hard and are very friendly.  Everyone in hotel from reception to restaurant to waiters at pool are amazing friendly people.  Food in restaurant was brilliant with great variety every day Lovely beach and pool(Olympic size.) Animation team work so hard and put on really good shows.  Big shout out to Montasar and Majed pool waiters for looking after us all week. Also thanks to Rami and Najah in reception.  I would highly recommend this hotel   Only negative would be poor WiFi. But you can buy 30gb Tunisian sim card nearby for £12  which works brilliant.

Didn't expect a place to be a worse home than this  Very nice rooms there’s no place to charge your phone  Dirty Covers  What’s more, the sound of the rainbow goes off with a sleeping hour in the camel and six a.m.  Very bad food than having to dine out It’s an unspoiled vacation there and even the top for work

Hi Everybody It's me again Amir Palace Hotel is located in Monastir Tunis nice, I had a Double Room for a night in 30/10/ 2024 , room were nice, comfortable , Clean,Nice breakfast & Nice diner The bathroom was nice, Staff was friendly,free WI-FI ,close to the Sea,Very good value I recommend… Salah

We had the worst stay of our lives. Everything is dilapidated, left abandoned, badly maintained, the furniture is degraded, the walls cracked, the mattresses in an unusable state, the carpets were very dirty, the food was worthy of a boarding school than a 4 Star Pension, very little varied menu, besides nothing was eatable that we had to order food from the outside so as not to starve, the "all inclusive soft" included only coffee or water, the pool space was so catastrophic that we could not stay there, the staff was rude to the point that a maid allowed herself to enter our room while we sleep without any respect for our privacy, the towels were dirty, and icing on the cake, we were there at the same time as a seminar for Salafists or whatever, making our stay a horror.

dissatisfied due to: horrible food: some dishes are repeated between meals and dinners - endless queues at the restaurant - slow service at reception on arrival - indoor swimming pool closed - no entertainment except some games at the outdoor swimming pool - sheets /champoing/toilet papers /soap /towel non-existent except after complaint / gym for a fee --- conclusion I would not go back there again
