reviews.review_text: It was really entertaining, the food was excellent with many vereations, there were many activities so you're not bored and the children have entertainments aswell. Drinks and food were presented beautifully. Workers were very nice and helpful

reviews.review_title: Hotel Sidi Mansour is an ideal destination for an unforgettable holiday. Located in Djerba, it offers a
reviews.review_text: Hotel Sidi Mansour is an ideal destination for an unforgettable holiday. Located in Djerba, it offers a pleasant and relaxing setting, perfect for relaxing with family or friends. The atmosphere is warm, the staff is welcoming and always attentive to the needs of the guests.  The rooms are comfortable and well maintained, with everything you need for a pleasant stay. The hotel also has a large swimming pool, a spa and easy access to the beach, allowing you to enjoy the sun and the sea.

I had a great time at the Hotel Sidi Mansour. The animation team was on top from start to finish: dynamic, smiling and always to entertain us. Thank you for the atmosphere and the good memories! I highly recommend it. 10/10

reviews.review_title: It's just great happiness to be here
reviews.review_text: Superb atmosphere with the animators at the top the petsonnel super nice with us listening to the care to us to start again very well meals very good very diverse clean in addition very beautiful picine and garden really beautiful setting I would come back

The animation team very well Nice show in the evening Except the room no air conditioning The window door very difficult to open Very nice staff Good and varied restaurant  Pleasant stay  Good photographers  The staff is at your disposal Game of pétanque gymn

L, animation team at the top of the sun in hearts than happiness a little problem arriving in our room a short circuit more electricity l,home super cleaning ok only one inconvenience to get in the bathtub you have to have big legs hihi apart from that everything is fine

The hotel is in need of some refurbishment but the rooms were clean and serviceable. On the whole the food was acceptable but not very varied however there was always something acceptable to eat. On the subject of the animation team !................ loud, intrusive and seemingly unable to take no for an answer, repetitive loud music around the pool area, constant harassment to join in the "fun", impossible to enjoy a quiet drink in the bar at night. On the subject of the beach - it is reached by walking down a road alongside a wall topped with broken glass, little strewn with thousands of empty plastic bottle scattered around along with other indescribable bags of stinking rubbish! Not forgetting the homeless encampments along the way. The area around the beach can only be described as a "bombsite" devoid of vegetation and appeared to have been used as a dumping ground for unwanted rubbish. On my visit I encountered a discarded settee, two microwaves and various items of broken furniture, The bar at the Beach is NOT all inclusive and only soft drinks are provided - alcohol is payable. Overall I understand you get what you pay for but the surrounds of the hotel do not inspire. Very few British people in the hotel and all feeling somewhat disillusioned. On a more positive note the bartenders in the Hotel provided excellent customer service and could not be faulted. If you want a holiday where you remain within the hotel around the pool and like to participate in repetative activities and the same in the bar in the evenings then this is the hotel for you if on a budget - otherwise STAY WELL CLEAR.

reviews.review_title: Almost perfect holiday from older persons perspective
reviews.review_text: I have just returned from this hotel with my Daughter (who has already posted her review) I liked the fact that there were different nationalities there. I don’t go on holiday to spend all my time with English people and they were all very pleasant and friendly.  I found the food very tasty and it was really nice to taste Tunisian food, which is something new for me.  I would have liked a little more drinks choice at mealtimes too, maybe the option of some wine with dinner. I thought the room was really nice and the cleaner did a good job keeping it clean. It had a lovely view over the pool and out to sea.  I also found the animation team brilliant. I always look at the way I am treated as an older person, who can sometimes feel left out of things. This certainly wasn’t the case. I love the loud music and dancing around the pool to the club dances. It what makes my holiday.  I enjoyed the stretching, water gymnastics, step aerobics and Zumba, boules and crazy golf. In the evening the team included everyone in the dancing and they even put on their own little show.  They all work so hard from early morning to late at night to ensure everyone is having fun. Always with smiling faces. I would definitely return to this hotel without a doubt.

My mum and I stayed at this hotel for a week in May and, despite being a bit rough around the edges, we had a great time and would definitely return.  Depending on when you go, there are not many English people in the hotel. This wasn't an issue for us at all and was something we were aware of because we had researched the hotel before booking. Every guest we met was lovely and we had no problems. If you want a hotel that is full of English people then this probably isn't the one for you.   We originally booked this hotel based on the reviews of the animation team, and they didn't disappoint. The whole team work incredibly hard both day and night to make sure everyone has fun, I didn't find them to be too pushy. They are an absolute credit to the hotel and were the highlight of our holiday.  The food was great while we were there. Although there is a small selection at each meal and sometimes it can feel repetitive, the actual quality of the food that was there was great and I never had a single meal that I didn't enjoy. There was always some form of rice and potato on offer so I think even fussy eaters would be fine. The drinks are ok, although there is limited choice in the main restaurant which is a shame.  There were a few small things that weren't perfect, we experienced water outages twice in the week we there, we had a tile fall off of our bath and often our 'clean' bath towels were stained and discoloured. You also have to pay a deposit to get towels for the pool and for a safe in the room, but this is not a massive issue. The beach wasn't the best, but we spent most of our time around the pool anyway. We weren't given any information when we checked in which is an area I think needs to be improved.   Overall, for the price paid, it was more than worth it. Good rooms, good service, great entertainment.

Not the best to be honest,  cheap and not particularly cheerful,  not recommend for people from the UK, The entertainment  was  not good ,the music was so loud when people just want to relax , I saw a couple of the animation teams shows which consisted of dancing!!! They tried,   shibo was not at all  friendly ,miserable he Did not mingle with the guests  he couldn't even say hello, The hotel was full of different nationals and  very little English people and it's of my opinion we was not made welcome like others, the animation team are certainly obsessed with been loud and dancing. They ruined my experience.  The hotel is in need of some updating inside and out, food ok, rooms good pool clean sunbeds need replacing , most are broken and uncomfortable.  Nothing to do in the area very quite.

Lovely hotel lovely staff clean rooms pool entertainment was great nutella emma and the 3 boys not sure the names absolutely fantastic they work so hard to make people happy. Would come back just for the hotel the food and staff. Not much to do around that location prety boring but very happy with hotel and staff and food and drinks. All the best sidi mansour

reviews.review_title: Not suitable for people from united Kingdom, Entertainment Awful
reviews.review_text: The hotel was  dated the rooms dated, food  was ok , Drinks was good, Beach poor , toilets not too nice, Our main problem was there was only three English people in the whole of the hotel the first week we was there, mostly French people, with two coach loads of people from Libyans . the second week a few more arrived. Two members of  Animation team were just awful, The assistant manager Shibo , he was so rude no costumers skills what so ever. when I asked him why only two English songs were played all evening He shouted and me in front of guests and other Animation team employers AND SAID SO WHAT!!!when I said your attitude is not acceptable he said go and report me. I told his Manager but is behaviour did not improve, in fact when the manager was not there he did not play any English music. I saw  him been horrible to other animation team members.   For the whole of our two weeks stay the evening  entertainment consisted of Dancing and more dancing, we had a hour karaoke, two fakir shows ,30 mins bingo/tombola and quiz, we were badgered into buying tombola/ bingo tickets by the animation partially  Nutella when I said we didn't want  to buy some tickets we don't play bingo she said don't you like the Animation team!!!! and would not speak to us again.  The Arabic music played around the pool and  on the Evening was that loud you couldn't hear your self think, we was been hassled constantly to dance and  join in activities we found that a bit difficult when we was not familiar with the music , sorry the two English songs played every night was free from desire, And the twist!!! They think been loud is important!!! Bar staff/ other staff reception staff were nice. Manager of the hotel was nice . would I return Never.

Never again this hotel..... a crappy service a room that leaves something to be desired And the pompom I booked a stay flight hotel and transfer  No sound or image of the agency  The hotel says book the shuttle and finally it is a private taxi at my expense and I learn it at the airport THANK YOU SARAH RECEPTION 😡🤬 I am very disappointed  It tarnished my stay

Stayed at this property with Gate 1/Discovery Tours.  Each room is a free standing villa.  Room 1 is the closest one to the main building.  There are golf carts that take you to and from your villa.  Rooms very large with great A/C repairs d a fan.  Bathroom is large with a double sink and with a separate WC.  Bathroom has a free standing tub.  Mini bar with soft drinks included. Bed was very comfortable, pillows were not.  Lots of outlets and ubs ports.    Budget dinner was ok;  hot & cold salads with a lot of tuna.  Breakfast buffet had good choices and an egg station.  Staff very good.

Comfortable, clean, great customer service. Unique location and set up.  In the middle of the Sahara you can rest, unwind and enjoy some peace of mind. The beds were very comfortable. The bathroom is big and has all the toiletries. Dinner was excellent.

I had the pleasure to overnight in this great establishment I was delighted with the professional staff in the reception and during dinner with the restaurant manager mr Khalifa and his crew presenting a real show with the lamb cooked in a pottery jar  really recommend this establishment for any one seeking an incredible experience in this enjoyable environment

reviews.review_title: Beautiful luxury hotel with warm welcome
reviews.review_text: Very nice warm welcome, attentive staff, smiling.  A spacious and luxurious room! Beautiful soothing place! Excellent breakfast, big thank you to Mr Khalifa for the welcome and availability! Passing with friends, I will return with family;)

Services top ..... Thank you for all the hotel s teams....  About very clean rooms ....  100% Tunisian restaurant excellent.....  Discover tunis ♥️ ... Discover douz ♥️ ..... 💞 Discover the residence douz ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

Exceptional stay at The Residence Douz. Thank you to Mr. Khalifa for his warm welcome and professionalism. Top service, sublime setting, real immersion in the heart of the desert. An address not to be missed to discover the Sahara.

Very professional, warm and welcoming place. Perfect for relaxing. Many thanks to all the very attentive staff. A big thank you to Mr. Khlifa for his welcome and kindness, we were spoiled. One of the best hotels in Tunisia

This hotel is perfect in so many ways.  All rooms are bungalows which makes for a very private experience. You are taken back and forth from your bungalow via golf cart.  The rooms are very spacious and beautifully appointed. The lobby is comfortable and inviting. The restaurant serves great food along with great service.

An unforgettable stay at The Residence Douz, enhanced by exceptional service!  A huge thank you to Mrs. Samira at the reception, for her warm welcome, her constant smile and her great professionalism.  On the catering side, Mr. Khalifa and his team: Mr Banneni, Raoua and Rawdha were simply remarkable: thoughtful, discreet, always with care. Each meal was an experience, enhanced by their kindness and efficiency.  Thank you to the whole team for making our stay so pleasant. An exceptional address that I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: The Residence Hotel Douz is waiting for you!
reviews.review_text: You want a quiet and beautiful place of leisure! And well, The Residence Hotel , a five-star luxury hotel in Douz is for you!. You guys are at the Desert Gate or Douz! Here you meet Mr. Khalifa, head restaurateur with a group of guys to meet your every need, with various dishes of local cuisine, nos to even international! You have to try to believe it, I tried, so I believe it... Try it yourself...

reviews.review_title: Douz, the gateway to the Desset
reviews.review_text: Guys, the Residence Hotel in Douz, a corner in the middle of the South of Tunisia, Douz, the gateway to the 🏜 Desert!  The Residence Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel!  The Head of Catering Mr. Khalifa, with a group of boys and girls of the highest qualification, as well as a great level of service! This structure is also equipped with an IT service with Mrs. Dhekra who reigns to the IT interests of this Five Star xhe is waiting for you with open arms as soon as you step foot in Douz!

reviews.review_title: The Residence Douz a haven of peace to recharge
reviews.review_text: The Residence Douz, a haven of peace to recharge: the location of the establishment at the gates of the desert, accommodation in very spacious villas with sober and refined luxury, exceptional bedding and above all a very professional, warm staff and always there to meet any wish or requirement make it an establishment worthy of a five star. I also appreciated the quality, freshness and taste of the products in the restaurant.  Many thanks to Mr. Khalifa and his entire team. The Résidence Douz will become a must-see as soon as I come to Tunisia

reviews.review_title: Mesmerizing resort in Sahara oozes tranquility
reviews.review_text: The resort set on a 30 acres of land with a mesmerizing palm trees lined oasis oozes tranquility, beauty in the Sahara desert. The rooms are individually built and apart for quietness and privacy are very clean, immaculately arranged and large suites. It is a must stay resort in Douz. Breakfast is great and caters to all diet. Lunch and dinner menu is tastefully served. Spa is amazing and large complex and clean.

Spacious, comfortable and well equipped villa. Delicious breakfast admittedly without much choice but largely sufficient. Attentive staff, a big thank you to JAAFER. The talis restaurant serves tasty local cuisine. Spa and indoor pool to do. we will come back

Amazing experience. They take great care of the details and are very hospitable. Clean and wonderful facilities. If we go back to Tunisia we will repeat for sure. Possibly the best hotel I've ever been to. I can't say anything bad about him.

The residence hotel its a hole experience  !  that take you to a Sahara vibes surrounding by palms and olives trees, unique architecture enhances the tunisian history… Very welcoming stuff , a strong management skills by mr khalifa who take care of all guests .. The food is delicious the service on point !  This hotel must be on your check list  👌🏼

Very satisfied with my pleasant and beautiful setting I passed for training to be done I visited the rooms it was a real crush the calm and conviviality the food was on top a big thank you to Mr Khalifa for the break and Mr Anis for the care. I highly recommend this hotel in the desert

I highly recommend ❤️♥️don't hesitate I went to attend an event everything was perfect the break was varied, a real moment of delight the staff with little care cleanliness to report everything was on top ❤️♥️ bravo 💗💗💗🥰

A simply exceptional stay at The Residence Douz! The hotel deserves its 5 stars. Everything was perfect: the warm welcome, the attentive staff, the elegant and impeccable rooms, not to mention the beautiful setting. The service is impeccable and every detail is designed to offer comfort and serenity. A haven of peace in the heart of the desert. I highly recommend and will come back to it without hesitation!

The setting is just beautiful, I loved the tranquility and quiet, everything was perfect, the welcome staff and food. Mr khalifa welcomed us, the room was a favorite cleanliness especially, here a special mention to me Anis for his professionalism and listen. I'll be back soon

reviews.review_title: Never again in this hotel and never again in Djerba
reviews.review_text: Djerba is already a very dirty island. The hotel is clean in appearance, hygiene etc but not at all. At first the food seems correct. There were five of us, and two out of five sick! One of the two on infusion!!! Produced to make the fruits fat, it seems or tourista. 30% of the hotel was sick but the doctor said there was no sick. Bizarre.. Do not take ice cubes, apricots, melon, watermelons. Eat only cooked and dry products. Make sure your water bottles are closed. Rinse it with bottle water.  Poor cleaning.  On the other hand infirmary and doctor at the top on site and fortunately! But then take out the blue card... any plan to make money? Getting people sick? Well, I'm not speculating either.  The shop is expensive, thieves. Do not buy at this location.  Excursions took place on the beach.  I advise the Saharan very well. The pirate ship is fine.   Animation-wise, the Djerbians are very strong and kind but it’s only trade! Watch out for your daughters or even your wives because Arna-COEUR! I offer you a gift, I charm you and arrived in France my Big Daughter was receiving messages and she almost got fooled and even my wife who had left her whatsapp.   The animations are good but its young people are exploited no wonder they manipulate. On the spot he doesn't know anything about my daughter and luckily, I think so. In short, appearance and if one does not get seriously ill ok. Otherwise choose a better destination and plan antidiuretics!   On the other hand a positive for the massages, and the staff there, except for the many grazers.  Long live the visa.  BGG, a family man.

We left with 20 people as a family, everyone was delighted with the hotel great pool, we eat very well the animators at the top, we had a great week if I had to give a negative, it would be for the air conditioning  We'll go back.

Great hotel! With a good animation team especially with momo second stay for us with momo we do not have to complain. Cleaning to review in the air conditioning rooms which does not work very hot but overall we had a great week.

Great hotel with a great entertainment team! We loved our week in the company of the animator Momo who is really great he made us have a great week!!! We will come back for a third time hoping that the momo animator is still present!

Very good but in May very hot and no air conditioning in the rooms despite what is announced..... Pool cushion always wet. Catering very well. Rooms quite old but well redone. Entertainment all day. Very random Wi-Fi

The Holiday Beach Hotel is very nice (great lobby reception and swimming pool, green interior gardens) and very well located, a few steps from an idyllic beach. The staff (waitresses, maids, reception) are adorable and very professional. The restaurant is of good quality and varied. Breakfast top.  We had a very good stay.  A few downsides:  - The sound level (animation, music) far too loud by the pool.  - a background noise (due to the VMC?) at night forcing to put balls Wharves.

Very clean hotel, spacious room , attentive staff, always smiling, superb atmosphere, we spent 10 great days for our honeymoon. Thanks to the animators in particular Momo, Hazem, Diego and Karim, who put a crazy atmosphere. We’re going back next year hoping to see the four of them again.

I give this rating for the hotel and its quality restaurant. This is the 2nd time that we go and still as well even under Framissima. We knew him under Jumbo. It is clean, nice we have nothing to say. Thanks to our Nabil server always very professional and welcoming. It is with pleasure that we will return

Bravo!!! You put the package The FRAM Animator Team IS INCREDIBLE GREAT RESPECT!!!  Nothing to say about food have been able to travel every day.  Bravo I have nothing to say except thank you for his vacation that I could offer to my son!!!!!

I loved my trip especially the bartenders are amazing. They are new but I hope they stay there because they are at the top. I will come back especially for them because their state of mind and mentality are admirable. There are two. Their name is Dhia and mohamed.

Thanks to momo the best animator I could meet really it sets the mood it is nice funny and to dancer talants!!! Thanks also to Diego and Francis perrin he will recognize himself Thank you to the whole team and to t e the person of the restaurant who gives a crazy trouble for meals always at the top I really recommend with family or friends the Best hotel

We had a pleasant stay. The restaurant offers a wide choice and snacks are offered at any time of the day. The facilities and rooms are clean and maintained. The hotel has a large swimming pool, two paddling pools, and a swimming pool with slides. The highlight of the hotel is its entertainment team! Always smiling and offering various activities. Their work deserves recognition and recognition! Thanks for everything.

Great stay at this hotel. Various food with themed meals, clean rooms, large swimming pools, perfect location, close to the beach and big positive, the entertainment team, always present smiling and caring. Many thanks to everyone for this stay. We'll be right back.

Very good stay  Top animation team with always smiling, it offers a wide choice of activities and shows  They're great dancers. The restaurant offers a wide choice of dishes  The pool is large with a wide choice at the pool bar   Thank you!

Very pleasant stay of a few days.  Animation team at the top, the animators are respectful and friendly, great atmosphere. Large outdoor pool, the food is varied. The spa is also nice. Value for money impeccable, I would return without hesitation!

We had a great time with friends at Holiday Beach. The hotel is very well maintained , we will eat very well , and the staff is kind.  A note ++ for our waiter Jamel at the restaurant , Jamel who works at the spa , and the best Mohamed at the beach bar , very nice and always welcomes us with a smile .  Enjoy your stay

Great family holiday in this hotel! Team of animations at the top! Special mention to zouma and Karim😉😄( Berber wedding , apero games , darts games, dance initiation , etc ...)  The restaurant is frankly very good and it varies every day!you really have to be difficult not to find something to eat.... And special mention for the Tunisian meal with oriental pastries and couscous which were delicious! 😁 Hotel very clean and room also , the ladies who clean are very smiling , swimming pool not heated outside but given the temperature (30 °) it is very nice! We were able to swim at the beach!  Small recommendations for excursions that were great: go see momo on the beach with his camels.  You will not be disappointed!  We will return to this hotel with pleasure!

First of all I would like to thank deeply all the staff of the hotel (reception, bartender, cleaning lady, waiter restaurant...) for an incredible kindness. Spacious restaurant and varied choice, various entertainment! pleasant room  A very special mention for Karim, JO, Chocolate, Momo who have been great with us. Funny, cheerful, not insistent! We do not regret our stay

Really happy with our family stay! An entertainment team at the top, the kids loved the mini club. All the team is smiling and welcoming and full of little attention. Lots of outdoor activity space: little extra for the pool. Thank you for this stay!!!!

We expected a lot of fram considering the reputation...  3rd time in Djerba, and 1st time in this hotel.  Cons: Very aging rooms. A slight lack of general maintenance. Repetitive food, but not bad.  Pros: Animations on top. Very friendly and friendly staff (congratulations and thanks for your kindness)! Hotel well located, between midoun and Houmt Souk.  In itself, this hotel has a lot of potential, too bad it is not exploited.  We are disappointed with Fram, we are not going back to Djerba or anywhere else (With Fram). The reputation is gone.  But thank you anyway for this sunny week ☀️

This place is just beautiful.  Paradise on earth. The view is amazing, it looks like a boat. I fell in love with the charm of this family home, with its architecture and decoration. It combines modernity and tradition. Great finesse and taste in the rooms, lounge and restaurant I really liked the food and service, personal with little care. Thank you for the comfort of the beds and the impeccable cleanliness of the rooms. I recommend this Hotel to all lovers of Sidi bou said and the authenticity of the place. Congratulations to the entire Villa Bleue team

This hotel lacks a lot, the infrastructure in the area is horrible with old cobblestones making it extremely dangerous in the dark, the hotel doesn't have a luggage service, buses can't get there, you have to walk and they don't have any porters, many stairs making it very hard for people with reduced mobility or the elderly ones, breakfast is very basic and you have to pay extra for an omelette and you can't order food after 9pm.

A very pleasant welcome, a splendid villa, a beautiful tasteful decoration, furniture, objects, works hanging on the walls, bouquets of flowers , you feel very good in this house. Superb views. The icing on the cake, the room la Tourelle with its view and terrace at 180 * .

First the view is really great and also the staff very nice. However, the ladies and the elderly gentleman at the reception very unfriendly. The hotel is said to have 5 stars, which we find absolutely exaggerated. You had to balance your bags yourself from the car to the hotel and from the room up the stairs back to the reception. Sorry, but you can't do that. Breakfast is a joke for a 5 star hotel. A cappuccino or a few scrambled eggs, omelette or similar costs everything extra here. We didn't try the dinner. Hence no statement on that. The rooms are nice in themselves but so noisy that you could hear doors slamming especially in the morning as people ran up and down the stairs or the staff swept the pool area in the morning. Unfortunately, it has come of age. After one of the rooms was converted into a construction site one afternoon, my collar burst. But so be it! Conclusion a hotel that really and honestly did not deserve the 5 stars at all. Great location doesn't give me 5 stars yet, there is more to it. There are 4 star hotels in Sidi that are better and I mean no harm. Ah so the reception manager was super nice and extremely helpful, but even he can't change anything if the owners let it slide like that. What a shame!

We did not stay there, but had some drinks at their terrace which had a great view of the sea. It was the best service we had in Tunis. Fast, friendly and efficient. Excellent variety of drinks, both alcoholic and  non alcoholic. Serenity with a view.

reviews.review_title: Amazing location, needs some brushing up
reviews.review_text: The hotel commands amazing sea views and is well located close to the buzzing centre of Sidi Bou Said. We were there for two nights and overall the experience was good. There are however some issues which ought to be addressed given that the establishment presents itself as a 5 star hotel to an international clientele:  1. Price Haggling - arriving in the hotel was like trying to buy a souvenir from the Medina of Tunis in 1999. The hotel prices are high even by European standards and then you haggle and they give you somewhat better rates (which are still expensive).   2. Cleanliness - the hotel is generally clean however there is little attention to detail. The telephone in the room was filthy. I took it off and gave it to the housekeeper to sanitize it (it needed a dip in an alcohol bath). After some time they returned with the thing somewhat wiped. I asked them to clean it thoroughly and refused to take it back. So the receptionist came back with it saying “all telephones in Tunisia are like this!”.   3. Breakfast - we had amazing breakfasts in other hotels in Tunisia and had high expectations for this hotel. Breakfast is served in a small terrace, not in the restaurant. It comes ready on a tray and consists of tea or coffee, water, some bread and cake served with butter and jam, a cold boiled egg and a tiny bowl of sliced fruit. They also serve the usual Tunisian lemon and strawberry juices in fluorescent yellow and radioactive pink which shout artificial. I asked whether they have some fresh juices but the waiter insisted that these were fresh lol. We asked for cooked breakfast (shakshuka) and the server said they don’t do that. So we went to reception to see whether they could recommend a decent breakfast place. She looked flabbergasted and asked “why??!!??!!” I replied that we wanted a cooked breakfast so she took out a menu and said that they can do it (we still went ahead and had an amazing breakfast at Blu Blu Sidi Bou instead).   4. Recommendations - We asked for restaurant recommendations and they proposed a restaurant which, when we walked in front of, seemed rather brusque. When we got back to the hotel we asked the guy who had made the recommendation whether he was sure of that and he replied smiling “I never been there! I wouldn’t go there! Go to xxx”. Likewise we asked for a taxi to the airport. They said it cost 60dinar (a metered taxi costs 20dinar). We accepted because the hotel is in a pedestrian zone so we didn’t feel like having issues. Before getting into the taxi, I asked the receptionist to confirm the rate, which she did. Once at the airport, I gave the guy his 60dinars (3x his worth) and he started yelling that he wanted 80dinar because we had luggage. I know that the driver is independent of the hotel but they should know which idiots they are calling.   5. Decor - they made a huge effort to decorate the hotel to the extent that the rooms are kitschy. Less is more.  Apart from the above, the Villa Bleue is a good compromise but they should roll up their sleeves and get their house in order if they are after a discerning clientele. One is to bear in mind that their rates are higher and their rooms and services are much inferior to places like Dar el Jeld which exceeds all expectations.

reviews.review_title: AVOID!! Not real 5 star. AC broken, electric problems, not hot water
reviews.review_text: I’m not usually one to leave reviews but do yourself a favor and book any other hotel nearby. This hotel came recommended from a local friend for the location. We stayed 4 nights - excited for the location and upgraded to their top suite. Unfortunately, we ran into problems almost every day. 2 of the 4 nights our AC did not blow cold air - in 40C weather. Woke up completely drenched in the middle of the night. They kept sending someone to “fix” it but nothing changed. Several arguments, 5 calls to the front desk, and 3 days later, they finally believed us and sent a real HVAC tech to fix the problem. The last day/night an electric problem caused all of our outlets to stop working in the room. The towel warmer shocked us. On top of it all, the hot water stopped working. We’re usually easy travelers and aren’t phased by minor discomforts. But for the amount of money paid ($400USD/night) and this being a 5 star hotel - it was totally unacceptable. The hotel manager spoke to us at check-out and proceeded to give us a lecture on how the AC works (even though there was clearly an issue and they sent an HVAC tech from the nearby town to fix it and admitted there was an issue). She grudgingly ended up giving us 10% off our bill and promised us a discount at our next stay. Sorry, this will be the first and LAST time we stay here!

We dined at Villa Bleu in Sidi Bou Said on Thursday, August 29, 2024 and were delighted by our experience. The setting is exceptional, with breathtaking views. The service was neat and attentive, and the food was just superb. We highly recommend this place for a memorable evening.

Poor customer service. I wouldn’t recommend them when there are many other hotels with better service in the area. Poor customer service. I wouldn’t recommend them when there are many other hotels with better service in the area. Have stayed in a few places in Sidi Bou Said with a more pleasant experience.

We spent an exceptional evening at Villa Bleu restaurant. Many thanks to Chef Moez for his delicious and refined cuisine. Every dish was a real treat for the taste buds. A perfect place for a romantic dinner. Highly recommended!

We booked the family suite at La Villa Bleue, but our experience fell far short of the expectations of a Five Star Pension.   Cleanliness and condition of the room: When we arrived, the sheets and towels were dirty. We asked that they be changed, but those provided to us were also stained. The bathroom was dilapidated and a strong smell of pipework persisted. The shower and sink were clogged, and the water stagnated at the ankles when we showered. Despite our complaints, the maintenance failed to resolve the problem, informing us that it would not be repaired until after our Check-out. No other rooms have been offered   Service: The behaviour of the female manager was unacceptable. When I wanted to borrow a book from the living room library to read in the bedroom, she ripped it out of my daughter’s hands saying that books should only be consulted in the living room. I have never seen this in my life after years of traveling. A vulgar and haughty behavior, this person has nothing to do in the hotel industry and has no sense of customer service. I remain shocked by this lack of professionalism and respect.   In contrast, the rest of the staff, especially at breakfast, were friendly and helpful   In short, the establishment relies on its location and the view, but forgets that a Five Star Pension must offer a standard that lives up to its claims. The performance is far from the Award paid. I will never return and do not recommend this property

reviews.review_title: Typical Tunisian Architectural Charm Facing The Mediterranean
reviews.review_text: Location: almost at the edge of Sufi Bou Saeed’s cliff, right by a viewpoint with stunning views. You cannot beat the views on their terraces (the breakfast area and the pool area)..  The breakfast area terrace has an unobstructed view of the Mediterranean.   Access to cars: Even if it’s in the pedestrian area, cars have access to pick you up or drop you off at the hotel entrance. However, expect to pay a higher fare, given that you’d have to ask the hotel to call a taxi for you, or, that most Bolt, InDrive transfer app drivers try to avoid driving through the pedestrian area. You can walk through the pedestrian area yourself (a 10min stroll), but not with suitcases (streets in the pedestrian zone are cobbled and can be slippery).   Rooms: There are a few rundown rooms and a few that are not sea view. My advice is to aim for a sea view room that’s been renovated/well-maintained (if you’re staying there, might as well pay extra and enjoy the sea view off your windows, balcony or terrace). Do not count on getting good Wi-Fi inside some of the rooms (depending on the location of your room). But the rooms have safes, are spacious and are clean.   Staff: Wonderful staff! They carry a positive attitude and are more than ready to help with any question or request you have.   Lubna and Reem (at the reception) excel at providing the best service possible. Kareema and Hamza (breakfast area) carry a cheerful attitude while providing a great service at breakfast. Mariam and Afaf (house-keeping) work nonstop at making sure everything is spick-and-span. The whole crew take their work seriously and always carry a smile on their faces and a can-do attitude.

reviews.review_title: A great location, with an exceptional hotel
reviews.review_text: Despite being in the chic-est town in Tunisia, this luxurious, glamorous hotel still acts as a safe haven from the hot, sticky, tourist-ridden streets on the outside. My abiding memory is returning from a trip to Tunis on the TGM (a real relic from the past and a must for any adventuring tourist) which we had pursued in the midday furnace, with temperatures exceeding 40C. I sprinted through the busy town centre, with the sun still beating down on me, my body dripping with sweat. As soon as I was through the hotel door, I jumped into the beautiful, empty pool, and felt the soothing yet refreshing water washing away all the dust and dirt of our adventure. I stayed there for an hour or so, soaking in the beautiful surrounding views of the Mediterranean.  Location: The hotel is situated away from the tourist-ridden buzz of the town centre, and is instead nestled on a cliff, looking out towards the vast expanses of blue sea.  Food: A good non-buffet breakfast is hard to pull off, but this place does so in style. You can have it brought to you in any location of the hotel, so naturally we opted to have it looking out onto the Mediterranean. All the food is extremely high quality. The restaurant is rather expensive, and food in Tunisia is very well priced, so I'd recommend looking elsewhere. There's plenty of choice either in Sidi Bou Said or in the neighbouring towns, such as Al Marsa, La Goulette or Tunis itself.

reviews.review_title: Very happy we stayed at the Villa Bleue
reviews.review_text: This place is gorgeous.  It's on a hill overlooking the Gulf of Tunis.  Just an amazing place.  Rooms are nice, people are terrific.  The food is also very good.  We were here three nights and it was lovely.  It is walking distance from many other restaurants and shops.  Just a stunner.

- Incredible view of the sea from the heights and rooms, the latter spacious and decorated with great taste…. - Top quality for cooking, for breakfasts, lunches and dinners. Our thanks really go to the kitchen team for the quality and freshness of the ingredients, refined cuisine, it was simply delicious. Professional staff, pleasant, discreet and always attentive, thanks particularly to Karima and Lobna. We strongly recommend

A manager beyond the ordinary, he pays close attention to every detail. We experienced this restaurant during a dinner reservation for a sizable group, and it was truly remarkable. The service was flawless, with attentive individuals ensuring everything went smoothly. A team that goes above and beyond, I highly recommend it.

La Villa Bleue is the best place you can stay at in Sidi Bou Said. You feel you are right in the middle of this wonderful little town that a jewel of North Africa. They also have a great restaurant and in the morning you can enjoy breakfast overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. There are art and architecture details all over the property that make you feel you are in a novel.

The hotel is very beautiful, the customer service is professional, the location is very beautiful overlooking the sea, and the food is delicious. It is the best. I recommend this hotel to all my friends. Thank you to all the customers in the hotel. They were very beautiful days.

Magnificent traditional villa which immerses us in the history of Sidi bou said. Very warm and attentive staff. Atmospheric decor and exceptional view. Quality breakfast. Thank you to the entire Villa Bleue team who were available and welcoming.

Beautiful tourist hotel on the beach with a magnificent swimming pool and fun activities to move young, old and not sports too. The rooms "old" but functional, except TV, light at least, and shower that "leaks" (it's old, and electricity and maintenance is expensive).  Everywhere is clean. If you can take the sea view it is much better.  The staff, a big good point, they and they are very friendly to our dedicated little care 👍 Thanks for everything. And happy holidays to others.

reviews.review_text: Pleasant stays ( the 4th ) Very good value for money stay 2 weeks  Professional staff and care The sea is at the foot of the hotel Airport/hotel transfer 15 minutes  No widebody so no aircraft noise  Of course paid chest as everywhere in the world

name: The Ksar Djerba Charming Hotel & Spa

reviews.review_text: We went with family to the hotel Ksar Djerba 10 nights, the hotel is very clean well maintained whether it is the outside restaurant rooms. All staff are friendly, polite courteous. Congratulations to the staff of the restaurant housekeepers, as well as the bar mans and receptionists. A shuttle is available to take us to the beach. Massage rates are really affordable. Massages are great; The only negative point is missing drinks in the restaurant , the deckchairs of the pool are disingenuous but you should put mattresses there. Go ahead, you won't be disappointed.

No beach is worth leaving the hotel is do three hundred meters to go crossing a major road the miserable beach supposedly is fake open to all the beach very room worm broken plastic bottle everywhere waste all kinds hotel well aged since the pictures Sliding not walking the staff of the reception misses the uncomfortable deckchair smile the restaurant a little just when of the world no water bottle has provision just a water fountain at the pool bar and restaurant when it is open you want water in your room you have to fill your bottle with water food five days like vegetables must be expensive here two other bars paying so a pub bar or people outside the hotel come to drink that mixes with hotel guests the snack its the leftovers of breakfast and lunch at lunch undrinkable coffee the hyper sweet drinks of the work done jackhammer in broad day it passes through customers wheelbarrow of materials in the evening so rain no activity ever Seen a hotel like this for four stars

All the staff is very nice.club jumbo with animator very nice and pleasant at the top I recommend.as well as the waiters and all the team. very attentive and can be trusted ,the activities are very well the animators always smiling and animations very well

Very nice typical hotel, super friendly animators, top animations that changes ts days there catering and good little flat no fries for children too bad when they are difficult!!!!!spacious hotel room for 4 person.....nice experience

I already sent my opinion earlier about the Ksar Jumbo Djerba but I forgot to write two important things about our stay in favor of this place, I have no grievance for the staff, very friendly and to note also the wifi throughout the hotel, is to be the case in many places.

This hotel ,Ksar Jumbo Djerba, is far from worth 4 stars as presented, the black dot , the repetitive catering at will no fruit (except oranges) never ice cream for example, at the pt. lunch no fruit ,if we wanted an orange juice worthy of the name it was paying, the all inclusive this limit to three unfortunate bland cocktails of white or rosé wine low-end and beer , the rest was paying , of our 33 stays a little everywhere I do not remember such poor services, to mention also the room not soundproofed .Other thing we had not been warned about,is the exorbitant tourist tax ex: for a family of 4 people for a week you will be asked as soon as arriving 116 euros , it is better to know anyway .Finally I'm sorry to say it ,but this island 'is an open air dump really shame , moreover the weather was average, personally would not set foot there again...
The hosts are great and very welcoming, we had a great time in the day and evening. The waiters and employees are smiling and pleasant. Dishes are a bit recurrent. I recommend massages, it's cheap.

Access to the beach quite remote... The food is varied and good. Good 200 characters asked so I will continue. The water slides stopped, it's a shame for the children. The animation team does the job. The hotel is clean despite a lot of bad things.

Shop of the hotel to flee we bought a sunscreen index 50 it was a bad cream (no clue) We had a big sunburn no one did anything or reimburse the cream or the products bought in pharmacy for the burns  It’s a shame it touches health  Everyone passed the ball to each other no communication despite our claims we were insulted Poor staff

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel, well maintained, relaxing stay.
reviews.review_text: In second place to the beautiful Midoun beach, the hotel keeps the promises of its site. Spacious enough rooms, elegant common areas, large swimming pools and flower gardens, good quality cuisine and very helpful and competent staff make it a very pleasant place for a relaxing holiday, or a more lively family stay. A special mention for maintenance staff, who spend their days cleaning and tidying up the premises. The weak point is undoubtedly the small thalasso center, where massages, otherwise correct, are not always as long as advertised, and the linen of the cabins obviously reused several times in a row! It’s probably better to go and get a massage outside, where there are many wellness centers. To be sure to be quiet, ask for a room in the rear wing, away from the pools.

reviews.review_title: Great location.  Two more indoor pools at the spa. Staff very nice light animation they just put of
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel located in the tourist area.  Buffet quite provided but repetitive staff nice and friendly I recommend mimi at the reception the animation is almost non-existent the practical spa of cheap rates. I liked the decor of the pub the feeling of being in English pub

We had a good holiday , warmth and good excursions, as far as the hotel is concerned, the decoration is not related to the country , it is more Greek, Roman, very dark the bar surrounded by smoker , attention for non-smokers , it is very unpleasant, cocktails are very limited, local alcohol the boukha, everything else is paid ,example whisky coca 14 dt, the restaurant is repetitive , always the same dishes, we are used to traveling , hotel on a human scale , photo not contractual, invaded with cat including 1 very sick who comes to claim food with lots of flies around him sick, pleasant staff and cleaning done quickly
We had a great stay (18 days)  Reception: very competent staff. Kitchen: very varied and friendly waiters. The rooms:very well maintained by our maid(Fatima).good reception wifi (except restaurant)

reviews.review_title: A big disappointment for a 4 star hotel
reviews.review_text: Our stay at Hotel Le Ksar was very disappointing, despite a pleasant setting. Several points have greatly displeased us, to the point of questioning the 4 star rating of the property.  Catastrophic animation  Animation is non-existent and soulless. The animation team, apart from one or two people, is totally lacking in motivation and enthusiasm. The activities of the day are almost nil, except for a game of pétanque, and the evenings are of absolute sadness. The facilitators themselves seem to be uninterested, which makes no one want to participate at all. For a hotel in this category, this is unacceptable.  Very limited cleanliness despite a dedicated employee  As soon as we arrived, we were shocked by the state of the room, far from the expected standard. The cleanliness was poor, and this problem did not get better during the stay. However, we found that the maid was doing her best. She was overworked and had too little time to ensure effective cleaning. It is therefore not a lack of professionalism on his part, but a big problem of organization and resources.  A very average, even misleading All-Inclusive  The All-Inclusive service is very disappointing, especially in terms of drinks.  Alcoholic beverages appear to be cut with water, making them tasteless.  Difficulty finding glasses and cutlery repeatedly, which forces you to search or wait.  Low quality and choice for a hotel in this category.  Lack of general organisation  Recurrent problem with pool towels: often broken, forcing holidaymakers to wait or do without.  Often outdated staff: Some employees are helpful and do their best, but they are clearly understaffed.  Conclusion: a hotel to avoid  We already stayed in 3 star hotels in Djerba that were much better than Le Ksar. Between non-existent animation, insufficient cleanliness, very average All-Inclusive and a glaring lack of organization, we definitely do not recommend this property. It is far from the level expected for a 4 star.

The most... The exteriors are very nice, beautiful palm grove, nice pool. The spa massagers are very friendly and offer very pleasant massages  Correct restoration.  The least... Service at the shabby restaurant. It is up to us to find the cutlery and glasses, the tables are never laid. No bottle of water in the restaurant or in the rooms, we have to fill a decanter with water and find an empty bottle and fill it If you wish to have some in the room. The staff is not very welcoming, complicated to have a smile, except the housekeeping staff, it really feels like others are suffering their day. The cleaning of the rooms is very succinct, claim toilet paper, shower gel is not accessible. All inclusive is very limited to soft drinks, and beer. Coke whisky pays as does gin. The animation team is totally non-existent, no animation during the day, except to come to you to ask you when you arrived and when you leave, that's all! We have been coming to Djerba for ten years twice a year. This is the first and last time we will stay in this hotel which is far from deserving of these four stars.  We don't know if there are any officials in this structure, but if they exist it's time to set the bar straight, you're definitely not up to the other establishments.

reviews.review_title: Hotel on top!  Very varied dishes, with choice.  Coke and Fanta drinks are served in bottles.
reviews.review_text: Hotel on top!  Very varied dishes, with choice.  Coke and Fanta drinks are served in bottles. A thank you for the smiling and friendly chef.   the employees really caring for the guests whether it be the waiters, the welcome, the housekeepers.   The rooms are comfortable. They are equipped with Wi-Fi.   The animation team at the top too.  I recommend.

Very nice hotel, beautiful architecture, well received.  Clean hotel , pool and very well maintained inner courtyard, of course I am not checked tile joints or humor cyphons. Everything is clean. Impeccable food, for those who say it is not diversified, do not travel to a country with little means because even at home, I do not think you eat between dessert dish. Chef, clerks and waiters nothing to say. Perfect room.  Very polite staff. There is a paid bar between cocktails at the top and for cheap. Thank you for this stay  At the exit of the hotel of beautiful shop and at the end of the street a nice cafe.
We had a great time with friends. Quiet and clean hotel.   The hotel staff is very nice and a special mention for the animators Nino & Manon for their kindness and welcome.🫶🏼🫶🏼  We recommend👍🏼

Great hotel that deserves 5 stars , the staff is top and very welcoming, the rooms are clean and spacious and in the evening there are evenings offered at the bar which allows us to finish our day well. At the level of activities, Manssour came directly to us as soon as we arrived to offer us full of activities, the price remains reasonable and negotiable , always with a smile. For our part, we did the carriage ride from 9am until 1.30pm, very nice it was great we saw lots of things, we also did quad biking and really it was top!! And we also cameled by the sea and in Berber villages for 2 hours. The + in all this is that Manssour always made sure that we were okay during the activities and especially after , to make sure that we had a good time which was the case. At the catering level, it was excellent, the kitchen staff was really friendly, the only small flaw is that there were often the same things to eat. I recommend this hotel for your holidays you will be extremely happy with your stay!!!

A very nice hotel with a fantastic stretch of beach. The staff was always very at pains, the animation not at all intrusive and the food was very delicious and varied. We booked the excursions through Get you Gide. Dinar Are very much to the advantage on site.

very nice hotel in a beautiful park very well maintained, gardeners constantly. The beach cleaned every morning. . The cave restaurant is original. The food is excellent with a very wide variety. The staff was always kind to the restaurant. A very popular thermal pool. The rooms could use a refreshment. The shower curtain would have to be changed. But very clean. Distribution of mineral water in the rooms without having to ask. Outside nothing to see. Come to this hotel for lazing but you will not be disappointed.

Perfect hotel , a team of animators always present from morning to night, shows in the evening very well done and organized. Thanks to Zizou, Rio, James, Mimi, Nino (choreographer), Madi and Jonni (FRAM team) . As for the restaurant nothing to say , diversity of food, cleanliness , staff listening and At the small care, pool and beach clean and well arranged. For the excursions we went through the FRAM team ( Ali and Malek) very well organized and secure unlike the beach folders, admittedly a little more expensive, but organization and safety are paramount. We are ready to return in the future, I advise this hotel. Only downside isolated hotel, nothing to do once out, but do not hesitate to make Half day trips To the island of Djerba that will fill this void.

Everything was on top. Hotel among palm trees greenery and flowers. Various food and good very good buffet. Welcoming and friendly staff. Clean rooms. Very professional facilitators. Dream frame and sea turquoise color. Beach cleaned every day. I'll come back to it without any problem the complete change of scenery

reviews.review_title: Very Pleasant and Warm place possible visit of Southern Tunisian Sahara
reviews.review_text: Hotel type Acienda  Spacious and well equipped rooms  Excellent location direct access Beach  Very smiling staff  Food All inclusive  Sce Spa serious and professional EXCELLENT value for money!   We recommend!!!

Very disappointing  Staff not so friendly at all on the contrary  Had actually experienced this in the past, but apparently forgotten. If you come here as a woman alone, in my case as a woman with a son, you are truly despised here. The first experience in the restaurant, I ask the waiter very kindly if I can order something, he turns aggressively around 'I'm not a machine, you're going to wait!" In commanding tones. I thought, first experience with the hotel, could be better. I ask for a glass of wine, and put a half full bottle of lukewarm white wine in front of me.... The pictures don't really reflect the actual atmosphere (rather marginally), the food is very limited (not very healthy) and wine is offered in cardboard espresso cups. Had asked in advance to be able to reserve massages or early or later in the day it was all possible, but now arrived everything is full outside in the middle of the afternoon or afternoon.... Fitness is very limited and then paying for this. The drinks menu is very limited. I don't recommend it

Very pleasant stay feet in the water ... a turquoise sea ... very nice typical hotel clean of varied buffets smiling and cheerful animators and the most for your stay call Habib 0021654431228 he's picking you up in front I hotel by taxi and will make you discover so many wonders of unforgettable moments with all its kindness and sharing of its culture... at the top...

Holidays on top!!!! Beautiful hotel nothing to say  Top staff, very good food  Many thanks to the animators (rio zizou johny james nino and the others ) we had great times , quality shows nothing to say!!!!!     Beautiful meetings!!!!! I really recommend this hotel!!!!

Great stay with exceptional animators a crazy atmosphere, bartenders and adorable waiter. The activities were varied with choice (quad, carriage...) Very clean hotel pleasant stay. Thank you to the whole team. See you soon.

Great hotel with lots of varied activities offered by animators at the top!  Very good food  Cocktails are good.  The room is well equipped, the bed is comfortable. Every night a show is offered and we spend a great time there.

reviews.review_title: It's not without reason that holidaymakers come back several times!!
reviews.review_text: The entertainment and animators are at the top, the mini club is great. The flowery setting and the numerous palm trees give a special charm. The service and staff won me over again. I met several people there who are not on their first stay. My 11-year-old granddaughter and I are on our second trip, and we plan to go back.

reviews.review_title: Holiday hotel odyssée report in zarzis
reviews.review_text: Nice hotel, very clean room, varied buffet I would like to thank Hassan main restaurant waiter for his seriousness, sympathy and professionalism, nice animation and encourage  See you next Anne Hassan and thank you all again

Very good hotel, and very good service at the restaurant, especially with the waiter Hassan , a very nice person swimming pool at the top also , the entertainment and animators are very good too. Nothing wrong, I will definitely go back. Yop

We had an amazing stay at the Odyssey Resort & Thalasso. The location is beautiful, the hotel is impressively beautiful and the atmosphere is both calm and elegant. It is a real haven of peace.  Regarding the restaurant, we were pleasantly surprised. For a hotel in Tunisia, the quality of the meals is truly exceptional. Each dish was delicious and tasty, well beyond our expectations. It is a real pleasure to eat here!  We also want to thank Hassen, an adorable waiter who made every meal even more special. His kindness, attention and the way he took care of us really made the difference. A big bravo to him for his professionalism and friendliness.  We highly recommend this hotel and will be back with great pleasure!

I just spent a week on the odyssey with my girlfriend... Nice hotel and super nice entertainment team...especially James and his water aerobics class and his sympathy... Well-listened staff Beautiful beach... Really great holidays Recommended...

We stayed 10 minutes. Cause error hotel transfer.  Receptionist a horror. Two single women at 2:00 in the morning. Manage, for the welcome, kindness and helpfulness towards 2 lost tourists, thank you. Respect tourists to see urgently for this gentleman.

Great hotel , great food and great entertainer especially ( Rio) , we left for a week in early May , the weather was great , the rooms nickel and do every day , as well as cleaning . A week was too short, we will go back

Very welcome animation at the top;)  Very nice host  Very nice seaweed pool  Thanks especially to mimi for her kindness her laugh  Meals good nice waiter  We just need a little more variety in food.  We will gladly return;)

Very good super nice animation team, very funny I had a great time with them there are lots of water aerobic activities every morning with a great atmosphere, volleyball, dance classes, shows every night, it is very family friendly. Mini club very well there are many activities for the children and they are well supervised and have fun. I would come back several times because it is really a great hotel. Incredible photographer the best he takes his time, made very beautiful photo and is very attentive, he is very nice he is a very good person I was delighted to make this acquaintance.

Great stay at the Odyssey Hotel. The food was excellent, the staff really adorable and the hotel very clean. A big bravo to the animators (Rio, Max, Mady,..) who set a great atmosphere throughout the stay! Hate to go back.

Super stay , super staff always smiling and helpful especially karim with his walk every morning and camel on the beach and super clean rooms and diverse choice at meal level , and great entertainment we recommend ++

reviews.review_title: Animations at the top and varied,Animators super nice, they do not hesitate to encourage us to participate,very good stay,
reviews.review_text: The hotel was recommended by friends.We do not regret listening to them. With .With the all-inclusive formula the best. Multiple and varied choices for meals Time ranges for very large meals Rooms and hotel generally well maintained

Thank you to the whole team for this incredible stay  Everyone's on top especially lucky, thirsty and zizou  I highly recommend this hotel to two aces from the beach  The staff is great, all smiling, pleasant and attentive  We will return without hesitation

Very good stay at Welcome meridiana  All the animators are on top , all smiling, especially zizou, thirsty and Mamadou  All the staff is nice  I recommend this place without hesitation  The setting is beautiful, the beach nearby  Lots of atmosphere and animation. We'll be back...

I stayed at the Welcome Meridiana Hotel in Djerba and overall my experience was pleasant. The location is ideal: the hotel is located by the sea with direct access to a beautiful sandy beach. The setting is really relaxing, perfect for a relaxing holiday.  The rooms are clean and well maintained, although the furniture is starting to date a little. The staff is welcoming and always available to respond to requests, which is a real plus.  The buffets are varied, with local and international dishes. Some meals lack a bit of flavor, but there is always something good to eat. Special mention for Tunisian pastries!  Day and evening entertainment are friendly, without being invasive. The animation team is dynamic and sets a good atmosphere.  Overall, it is a good value for money for a stay in Djerba. I recommend for families and couples looking for sun and relaxation.

This is the second time I've stayed at this hotel. We were completely satisfied. The food and service in the restaurant has changed positively. The animation team is sooooo great, they try so hard. Always laughing even though they have such a long day. Childcare from the hotel is just fantastic. Ama and the other two are just worth gold. We will definitely come back and are already looking forward. The beach is a dream, like in the Caribbean. This time we stayed in the main house, the rooms could have been a tick cleaner. But that's just as a side note.  Also positive to mention is the German guest care of Sadok, mega friendly.  On the beach there are excursions, jet skis, camel rides etc., you can accept this really easily. All very friendly and non-intrusive. Moreover, cheaper than the German travel providers. I have done 2 trips and parasailing so far. All top of the line and really cheap. Price performance top. Distance from the airport 45 to 50 minutes.

Great hotel, welcome and atmosphere at the top! The animators are friendly, available and set the mood! The rooms are clean and modern. The staff is lovely, helpful and smiling. Nothing wrong, I will go back without hesitation! 😊😊😊😊😊

Superb hotel, clean (thanks to the people for the maintenance). Animation every day ( thanks to the animators / animators, Dj...) - pleasant waiters, with little care: Thank you! Idyllic setting, turquoise sea, swimming pool, palm trees... Thanks to the massages of the spa ( Anissa with fairy hands and very affordable treatments, the hairdresser on top, my braids are tjs in place), meal lots of choices.... in short PERFECT, I recommend the Meridiana with closed eyes and I would like to go back. THANK YOU ALL.

Great hotel very lively. An animation team at the top.restaurant very good with nice .thanks to the maintenance people and the welcome which is very nice always serving customers .I recommend it. Beautiful room. Thank you very much.

Very good Hotel, all the staff is very welcoming professional, well kept rooms clean and very comfortable.  The beach is beautiful. Perfect stay at all levels. I come back to it every time with great pleasure  Thank you very much.

Hotel very good, animator at the top, we had a very good stay. Respectful and friendly staff with everyone, varied activities according to everyone's tastes for adults and children alike. I recommend this hotel

Great hotel 😜😜😉animation at the top and the animators excellent 🥰🥰🥰🤪🤪😉joyful 🤪😉😜😍🤩 and they all have a smile and thank you to our waiter and bartender for their kindness 🤣😜😜😘😘😘😘😘😘😍 thank you to the housekeeper for taking care of all the rooms

Very nice hotel with a nice decoration, large pool and beautiful beach. The atmosphere is friendly. We eat well, there are plenty of small shops, a spa and a hairdresser. All employees are pleasant and the animation team at the top: special signing to Ramos and all the others 💕
After several times in this hotel, tjs at the top, atmosphere, entertainment, rooms. Catering, top top staff!! At Meridiana we go we come back 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍🥰🥰😍🤩😋😘😘😘😘😘�😍😘�😘�😘�🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎋🎄

reviews.review_title: Super hotel equipped with animation at the top
reviews.review_text: Beautiful hotel with friendly employees welcoming and available for vacationers. Especially the animation team is adorable and dynamic at the service of old va with smile and activities throughout the day! Many thanks to Ramos and Ashraf and all the others are adorable. We have an amazing stay thanks to them

Amazing food, amazing hotel, amazing location, amazing staff! Knowing a bit of French helps but not essential  as most of the staff spoke English.  There was always a wide variety of food which was great as my wife is gluten intolerant and there was always a choice of things that she could eat.  The hotel is right on the beach and the pool is a great place to relax. The room was clean and comfortable.

Great hotel, animations and animators on top! ☀️  Personnel competent in all fields, services.  Lots of entertainment for all ages, they pay attention to everything so that you are at the small care. for the first time here in Djerba, it makes you want to come back!!! 🤪 Thanks to aux for this great experience!

Great hotel , entertainment at the top. The food is very good and the beach is nearby, nice evening. Beautiful setting and atmosphere at the rendezvous. All to have a great time. I recommend this hotel without hesitation 🤩🤩

Spacious and tastefully decorated hotel. The food is varied and very good. The staff is very kind. Special mention to Tarik the host. An adorable and dedicated person. I'll be right back. Thank you for this holiday that will remain unforgettable

reviews.review_title: relaxation in the sun of Djerba
reviews.review_text: Great stay in Djerba! Clean hotel, friendly staff, beautiful pool and direct access to the beach. Various cuisine. Perfect for relaxing in the sun. I highly recommend! The sea is beautiful, turquoise water and sandy beach right next to the hotel. A real paradise to relax and swim every day.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, staff and animation team
reviews.review_text: Just back from a weeks stay with a friend, hotel was lovely, peaceful and quiet. Rooms where clean and cleaned everyday. Pools where great and also kept very clean. Jimmy and his animation team where great, approachable and very good keeping the entertainment going. Bar staff and pool staff where very accommodating and friendly. Would recommend this hotel for a quiet, relaxing holiday.

Excellent hotel. Animation team very entertaining. People very friendly and kind. Rooms nice and clean. Close to beach and shops. Beautiful marina ❤️👌bar staff friendly. All staff approachable and always happy to help 😁 great swimming pools and sea swim pool which is unreal. Sunshine is fantastic.

Fabulous holiday .. The animation team were brilliant .. especially Amine , Mario and Ghana and Jimmy xx will be back xxxx The restaraunt staff were attentive and the food was fresh and delicious . The hotel was relaxing and we will definitely be back xxx

reviews.review_title: It was a very good experience at the hotel with the host Amin Ben maouia and I will be blind in August. The hotel
reviews.review_text: I really liked the hotel and a special thank you to the tourist animator Mohamed Amin Ben Mouia for his interest in me and the welcome. The animation was really excellent. Everything was fine The room and food were good and people were respectful in customer service and had good behavior.

Amine, Mario & Ghada from the animation team are lovely! Lots of fun and make all visitors feel welcome! water aerobics was always fun in the morning and a great way to start the day! Khaled is the best lifeguard. He always went above and beyond to look after us. Thank you for being so lovely!!

I had a lovely time at the hotel thanks to the animation team especially Ghada Amin and Mario. They put on great entertainment each night. Food was nice with a good variation of dishes and desserts. The hotel and bar staff are always friendly and happy to help.

Had the best experience with my friends, the animation team were the best, shout out to Mario & Amine & Ghada who made our experience amazing. Will be back soon! Food was great, and rooms were very clean. The staff were all friendly and helpful

Amazing service all week. Staff were outstanding. In particular Anmine, he was fantastic each day at the poolside. Great conversation & super accommodating. 5 star.   nabil at the bar was also fantastic. Great conversationist & runs the bar unbelievably.   Will be back.

Animators very nice and always ready to set the mood. A big thank you to Amine for her dynamism and kindness Decoration and furniture classes. When there's a problem, it's settled immediately. The restaurant is excellent, the dishes are varied and regularly renewed.

The hotel was special. I really liked the hotel in terms of services and system. It is a clean hotel and the room was great and well. We enjoyed it. Playing with activation teams all day was a great activation

Mario, Amine and Ghada are all adorable. Thanks to them, we had fun, thanks to them!!! The hotel is nice and the staff too. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. The restaurant does the job. Good value for money

Amine the team were so good throughout our stay made it enjoyable and would definitely recommend a stay. Kamel at the bar also made our experience 5 star. We stayed for 4 nights and the trip was our first in Tunisia we will definitely be coming back in the near future

I  came here with a bit of apprehension having heard mixed reviews. I loved it, great value for money and the staff were truly amazing. Professional and courteous, always greeting everyone with a smile. Particular thumbs up for Meriam on the front desk, Jimmy in the bar and Amine of the hospitality team.

Very good stay, very good atmosphere, beautiful setting, the food was varied  Very nice and friendly bar staff  The animation at the top, Ghada animator very kind and with little care with children know her work well, the other animators are also very nice 😊

This was my first solo holiday so just booked 10 day's I loved it so much with the hospitality from the bar staff, the entertainment Mario and ghada was fantastic they entertained us with various activities including water gym , darts , ping-pong and eveningng entertainment

Catering for vegetarians, there is only hard veal and fish.  Breakfast is not varied. the rooms: there is no double bed for couples, it's a shame... Good for the welcome was warm and the people are nice.

False advertising! RUN AWAY! This is not a 5 star hotel at all! No hygiene whatsoever in the room, kitchen, pool, spa. A real scam! Don't go there!  Positive reviews are written by the staff! It's a shame for the hotel industry

I was just greeted with arrogance by the manager at reception who was yelling in at me in a horrible way. Following a cancellation with another agency and I paid with another agency (it seems that the other agency did not confirm my cancellation) the gentleman did not hesitate to shout at me!!! I showed him voucher and still dosent accept and put me wait for 2 hours and half   I was just greeted with arrogance by the manager at the reception and screaming in a horrible way. Following a cancellation with another agency and I paid with another agency (it seems that the other agency did not confirm my cancellation) the gentleman did not hesitate to shout on top despite the voucher is clear and the agency called it he delivered the keys to me after 2.5 hours

reviews.review_title: Very old hotel with terrible management.
reviews.review_text: Everything needs repair and replacement, rooms, furniture, infrastructure, inventory. Twice I asked to fix problems with non-working plumbing (spoiler they didn’t) Privet beach simply does not exist. swimming in the sea is impossible because of the dirt (I never saw water like this…almost black) Food is not bad The entertainment saves only because guys-workers. Inventory, programs, music, dance- everything is too old and not working   So the staff here is so nice, friendly and really care about you  Management needs to change

reviews.review_title: Animation by Rady and Mohammed. I wish they both succeed a whatever they do in life. Loved every thing what they do life
reviews.review_text: Excellent service by Rady and Mohammed. Them to were the best and very good at their job. Amazing work and always making us smile. Rady is now my adopted son ❤️❤️❤️😁😁😁❤️❤️ I Wish them two the best.  Friendly and very helpful. Would come and say hi always in the morning.

Very good family stay at the ibn khaldoun hotel! Clean and comfortable room, welcoming and helpful staff. The hotel is well located, close to the city center and a short distance from the airport, which is very convenient.Good value for money , ideal for a family stay. We recommend:)

Great stay for our business trip to Tunis! Well-located hôtel, confortable rooms,and friendly staff . The food service was excellent.Perfect for combining work and comfort. A great place to focus ,relax ,and meet with friends. We’ll definitely come back !

Warm welcome, clean room, quiet and comfortable. Breakfast varied and delicious. Ideal location to visit the city. Many thanks to the team for their attention. We will be back with pleasure! 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

Hotel well located near the center of Tunis.Clean and comfortable room, welcoming staff.Good value for money also I greatly appreciated the paintings decorating the hotel they bring a nice artistic touch and make the atmosphere warmer, I recommend ⭐⭐⭐‐

I was extremely impressed with the food at the restaurant and the waiter / waitress service at Hotel Ibn Khaldoun. In particular the head waiter, Adel, went out of his way to cater for my needs by providing delicious vegetarian food. I highly recommend.

A pleasant stay, surrounded by a very committed professional staff, I highly recommend the hotel, strategic and convenient for your needs, the food is at the top , the welcome is great listening and in constant assistance. Thank you so much.

Very good experience for booking a seminar room.Thanks to the agent for his professionalism and management for its careful management.the room was well equipped , bright and clean... Quality and efficient service

Excellent quality meals at the hotel ibn khaldoun.Thanks to the team and the hotel owner for their warm welcome and professionalism, making the experience even more agreeable.Bravo a Tous 👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏

reviews.review_title: I was well surrounded by employees
reviews.review_text: Welcome  Excellent location  With a very intimate place on the second floor with greenery  You can have a coffee in absolute calm. Leaving the hotel shops part everything.there was the mall nearby.I advise you to try the experience
Outstanding service at the hotel , the staff ensured every guest felt welcomed and cared for creating a memorable and pleasant experience during the entire stay😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄

reviews.review_title: Did you not think that I  was/am Serious?!?
reviews.review_text: How can you-Hotel ibn khaldoun allow your own staff or persons connected to Harass and Disturb guest(just as myself) because some government officials(fbi, tunisian officials) have told you to bother and surveill me?  You had your staff use an unoccupied room(s) below my room and Blast the television to the max volume all through the night for over 10 hours!!   I addressed this issue with the reception desk person-Methlouithini and some other of their "colleagues" and they lied and stated that the targeted, blatant noise disturbance from rooms 714, 716 would be resolved and it wasn't.  Obviously, I will Never stay at this establishment and implore everybody else never to patronize this hell hole Ever!
I thank all the staff for the welcome and professional commitment, a completely renovated hotel, we had an excellent stay, the food varied, the rooms are well cleaned. THANKS

reviews.review_title: The worst times pass in this hotel
reviews.review_text: A horrible hotel dirty old towels all worn out very badly behaved staff in collusion with Tunis air these crooks we missed our departure on djerba because of Tunis air 3 hours late they told us total support we arrived at 9:10 p.m. not of catering not even a bottle of water there were 2 of us in the room we had a bath towel and a face towel I had to make a scandal to bring us back other towels at midnight and the receptionist told me say I'm not that you as a customer I don't have the time and first of all it's not you who pays for the room I was beside myself Tunis air gave us a voucher for 3 taxis because we were 6 people transiting Mr. receptionist who looks down on us who spoke to us very badly told us no night rate this is another price I will give you a taxi I concluded that he was in cahoots with the Tunis air agent the hotel charges the meal and breakfast although we neither ate nor had breakfast the rooms smell musty the carpet very dirty we had to open the windows because we couldn't breathe the bathroom very dirty one star and again he does not deserve it 0 star so Mr. manager your receptionist from September 1 speaks very badly to customers poorly mannered no respect for customers I do not recommend this Tunis air hotel and this hotel these crooks

The appreciation of my stay is quite mixed. Because I have to recognize and appreciate the modern decoration and the state of the room which seems to have been recently renovated.
