The entertainer team is very nice and always ensures a good atmosphere. Many opportunities for activities in and outside the hotel are offered. We are very satisfied!!

Very nice hotel beautiful amenities superb room in front of the beach.  Nice service. The buffet is super good and lots of choices and will vary the days.  From our room we were next to the beach and the view from our terrace from our room the stunning view, I recommend.  Sylvie.

I put 5 stars everywhere except for the room (continued): A family suite with 3 adult beds is not so that a bed is actually just the very hard sofa on which we add a sheet and a duvet! This is very sad compared to the super bed 2m wide located a few meters away. Of course it was necessary to claim for this "bed" to be put in place. Always on the room, being forced to claim every other day for bathroom towels is painful. The large glass door did not close (8103) on a security plan is not great but in winter it passes. Leakage of water on the ground when using the shower.  I specify that this suite was otherwise perfect with a nice view of the sea. This hotel is fantastic, I don't know if there is another this quality in Hammamet. Very nice staff, quality restaurant, unlimited drink even at the bar.  Summary: almost perfect!

I had a pleasant stay at this hotel. There were good activities, we were not bored. I had the opportunity to celebrate the new year here, I had a good evening with my family, the improved meal was very good. Thank you very much!’

reviews.review_title: Les Orangers Garden Villas & Bungalows 5 stars: A promise of unfulfilled luxury.
reviews.review_text: I have just returned from a stay at the hotel "Les Orangers Garden Villas & Bungalows", an establishment that boasts 5 stars, but unfortunately does not deserve them. Here is a detailed look back to help you make an informed choice.  Pros: Infrastructure: The hotel is visually pleasant, with well-kept gardens that bring a beautiful atmosphere. Service (in part): Special mention to Mouna at the reception, to the bartender by the indoor pool, and to the young woman who prepares pizzas. Their dedication and professionalism deserve to be recognized.  Cons: Rooms and facilities:  I opted for a deluxe room, but it did not meet my expectations at all. The elevator was dirty, which is unacceptable for a hotel of this standing. To access the indoor pool, you have to leave the room block, which is impractical, especially in winter.  Bar and choice of drinks:  The bar is a real disappointment: very few choices (only one wine available!), no basic cocktails like mojito, and the quality of drinks on offer is poor.  Restaurant:  Hygiene: This is the most shocking point. Mosquitoes invade the dishes, and I even found a dead fly on a cake. Unacceptable! Meal quality: The dishes are bland, very small in quantity, and of undignified quality. Breakfast is a disaster and dinner is even worse. I had to eat out to get a decent meal. Understaffing: One chef for a whole restaurant, which leads to endless wait times.  Lack of activities:  If you are looking to enjoy entertainment or activities, pass your way. This hotel does not offer anything interesting at this level.  Management and Customer Service:  Following numerous complaints regarding hygiene, meal quality, and service, the butler showed no responsiveness or commercial gesture. Yet we were there to celebrate a birthday, and he was perfectly aware of our discontent. The butler eventually acknowledged our criticisms but, instead of acting, he simply asked us how he could help. Managing customer satisfaction is his job.  I am a connoisseur of luxury hotels in Tunisia, and this is the first time I have seen such a gap between expectations and reality. I strongly advise you to look for other options if you want a real luxury stay with good products and service to match.  Final note: 2/5 (for infrastructure and some staff only).

As many reviews indicate, the hotel is good. Worthy of a reality show in the style of staging and decoration. We eat very well. The staff is lovely. Comfort is there... with just one downside for me. I was just coming to cool off. I had asked for a room with balcony or terrace (= garden level). I had my garden but perpendicular to the reception car park.  So from 6am (or much earlier for departures excursions or airport) we hear the staff arrive, deliveries, buses arriving or leaving, taxis. It's not a big deal, but for a non-city girl who's come to seek calm, it's a pain. Especially since above I have young people whose heels walk (I asked nicely if they could be careful, but hey, we don't do it again)  So if you want absolute calm, I don't know which rooms to ask for. I was in the 1006.  And for people with reduced mobility it is not very well thought out either (noticed and confirmed by a holidaymaker that it bothered)  However, remember that the hotel is worth its price.

Very good buffet hotel of very high quality and very varied. There are plenty of time slots for everyone to eat, which simplifies the service. The drinks are excellent and international Cleanliness is very well present The hotel was complete during our stay. No problem finding a deckchair or room around the pools as well as at the beach. The staff is very helpful, it just takes a little smile from time to time Or just thank you with a little tip and the turn is played to have a pleasant holiday A little nod to our waiter Ahmed at the bar which is very professional, smiling and fun

As always, my honest review:  Good: The hotel is top and leaves little to be desired, you really thought of a great concept and the location is absolutely reflected, really very tastefully decorated, the food was mega good and varied there is for everyone what there is, I would even say the best we had so far.  Drinks were also super all original imported drinks also the cocktails were mega.  Room was clean and top modern.  If you are looking for peace and quiet you will find here as hardly any music or animation is played.  Super service on the beach and at the night bar ( Skander) is the best and friendliest waiter who is looking for him will find him:-)  All in all the staff are very friendly and always eager.   Less good: Too bad we found that with this class of hotel unfortunately there were no welcome drinks what we knew so far from many other 5 star hotels and there you can really follow something.  Since we arrived earlier, the hotel was not attuned to us and we had to wait longer than even normal.   Unfortunately no hotel management or briefing on site (where, what is and when etc.... ) but only when you have asked.  Service is super just unfortunately too few staff for what is offered.  In the restaurant, the coffee or teaspoons were used up very quickly ( small amount ) and most often you won't find any.   All in all, a sweetly meant 8 out of 10 points.  Would we come again? I think so:-)   Thank you very much

Hotel at the price of a campsite. For a summer season (July) we paid 120€ per week per person in all inclusive (drink included). So those who criticize him think of the price paid. Cheap, you can't expect luxury.  Certainly it is rated 4 stars but it was at the time of Ben Ali, now it is the state that took it back and therefore made with the means of the board. Meals are good, entertainment every night (karaoke, mousse evening, fakir...) You have to bring your bath towels back, do not expect to have them. The beach is very well maintained but unfortunately it is 1km from the hotel.  This is the third time I have returned because at the price paid it allows me to spend a week in this hotel and a week in a luxury hotel.

Arrived at the hotel which looked closed after check in we went to our so called room the toilet wasn't even fixed to the floor no plug sockets as they was all cracked the air con dial was smashed in ...went to the bar and it was filthy you had to return your empty glass to get a refill as only had 5 glasses in the whole place ...the coffee machine which was on display was dirty with dried on milk on steam arm and just left the pool was empty and the out door furniture was very sparse only 4 tables and same for sunbeds stay away the public toilets in the hotel was a disgrace no toilet paper no soap or paper towels as for the food don't even go in the restaurant

This hotel no longer deserves its 4 stars. The rooms are old. We asked to change rooms because the bathtub was rusty, the tiles cracked.  By changing rooms it was a little better but no socket near the bed and no housing for the socket. There is no telephone in the rooms to contact the reception.  You have to get off when the elevators want to work well. We remained stuck in the elevator which could no longer open. We had taken the all inclusive but difficult to have cocktails and impossible to have ice cubes for 3 days. C was reserved for the bar d next door that paid him. The waiter served us drip and I had the impression that the rum was cut with water. Alcohol is not served in front of you so no way to check. In terms of food it is correct but quite spicy and quite repetitive.

For a budget break this was great, and at less than £20 a night, very good value. Yes it's not modern , but my room was recently decorated, clean, of a good size with a balcony. Nice helpful staff, and I enjoyed every meal.  It's a ten minute walk from the Marina, and beach, and a 10 dirham taxi ride into Sousse which is a cool place to look around. I really appreciated the indoor pool daily exercise. For the price no complaints only praise , great value

Sorry but not a 4 star worthy hotel. The staff is friendly and nice .But it is an old noisy hotel. Until night a lot of loud music while there are hardly any guests. The food Sorry but we didn't eat there. Even breakfast was at 9 o'clock barely found there. Really have seen a lot in the world and you should never compare it to our standard. But have been from 2 to 5 stars this is really rather a 2 star hotel. Not recommended unfortunately

Stayed at houria palace twice now, me my husband and kids really enjoy it. The staff are all lovely and made us feel very welcome 🤗 the cleaners were great, if we were still in the room when they came round they’d just pop back in later. The bar staff always remembered what drinks we wanted and had no problem helping making our babies bottles. The animation team was great and kept my boys entertained with games and music. We will be back again 100%

We arrived at the hotel with my wife and daughter at 8:10 pm. The restaurant had finished service at 8:00. They wouldn’t serve us food with a three-year-old when we had taken All exclusive even make us a sandwich or something and told us, I just had to go to town and eat the only grocery store open, he sold bread and sardines. Great meal😡Horrible hotel, mold on the rust carpet in the bathroom on the shower head, and even on the siphon the bathtub, everything is curdled the state of the ceiling, let’s not talk about the hard bed like wood and mattresses covered with pee stains and a smell of pee mixed with moisture throughout the hotel,We had to stay 21 days. We had stayed the night and we left in the morning welcome of 💩 , very dirty, no activity no animator, the bartenders make no smile on their phone h24 the bar, it is plastic chairs half broken with a bomb shot in black marked. Bar it's like nothing the beer machines are all oxidized and fruit juice like that my taps would stick to the floor when I moved a shame. I had never seen that in my life. The kitchen doors were black, filled with filth a shame only. Bar and the only thing that is drinkable is the one at the front desk that where we sat and asked for a drink and told us it is paid even with the exclusive lobby even a tent canvas campsite, it is better comfortable than this hotel in 💩 , I do not recommend at all, I was really disappointed where are the hygiene standards where are the controllers to close this establishment did not go except if you want to catch mushroom cholera 🍄 the gall and I pass 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡score on 10 -20 ah yes and the pool don’t talk about it, it’s all broken, there are pieces of scrap metal and pieces of wood branches it looks like nothing, it looked like there was a bomb the golf, there was 40 cm of grass. Finally here is big hotel of 💩 .😡😡😡😡😡 all the photos that there are, they are 50 years old on their website there is nothing that looks like

WELL WELL WELL Thos is by far the worst hotel I have ever been to the standards are deplorable from top to bottom of the place. Start with room, so old fashioned there's knowhere to plug phone near bed. Bed is an heap of concrete underneath with a heavy concrete surround underneath to. The mattress is Rock hard, obviously done for cheapness as will last longer being like a solid brick. Our backs where done in. The balcony slippery in rain be careful if over 6ft tall as rail low. The Bathroom oh my word Bath painted with massive cracks in it. Stained badly,  taps from like the soviet union 50yrs ago. Shower head had bits hanging of it like slime, I had to take of and clean under hot water was disgusting.  Walls in Bathroom filthy , I had to do top mirror dust test OH MY.  Toilet rolls and holder probably from the 50p shop rubbish. As for tv if you didn't get an old box one. Waste of time one English channel called 2, with constant Arabic adverts. AS FOR FOOD if you want the world's worst breakfast try it. Boiled fried or omlete best they do. Bring you own tea bags, and I am NOT joking.  Hallways etc upstairs filthy red carpet and old style net curtains. Filthy and hanging of their rails.BETTER THEY TOOK THEM DOWN.place needs a major overall. Pillows where flat as pancake. Had to ask for New ones. I would never come to this hotel again. Not even for £100 a week seriously.  And it can be very cheap, as lady there was there for £200 for the month, with flights. Dont pay over the odds for this place, as be regretting it...

This hotel is the worst hotel I've ever set foot in. Every area had an odour of urine. Bathroom had chipped tiles and was probably last decorated in the 1970's.  The beds were on a concrete base( I'm not joking) The staff were rude & begrudgingly handed out bottled water as if it was being deducted from their wages. Furniture in the bedroom was stained & only fit for a bonfire. Believe me, I'm far from being a princess but cleanliness is paramount. Do not book this hotel, there was a cockroach on the lunchtime serving area, I discreetly pointed it out to a waiter who plainly saw it but did absolutely nothing. I also had to practically beg for a toilet roll for the communal bathroom which was also smelly & filthy

reviews.review_title: It's not Versailles here, but it's really nice
reviews.review_text: Sincerely compared to the price paid, compared to the kindness of the staff, compared to the quick reaction in case of problems, given the size of the room and the terrace, I have nothing to complain about, it's impeccable it's not the Carlton, it's not the 5 star hotel, it's a hotel where you just feel good, it's true that we can improve a few things, but sincerely it seems quite useless for this hotel to continue like this, I will continue to visit it with pleasure

A very bad hotel......not to visit...without comment all is bad....to close...bad memories...restaurant zero...absence of animation...too old...weird behavior. And above all it is a two star hotel not four pay attention In short.

This is the by far the worst hotel I have ever stayed in in Tunisia the hot water doesn't work the WiFi doesn't work the food is terrible didn't get anything fresh still the room is even worse had bugs and cockroaches non stop didn't even have a TV remote the staff are rude the air-conditioning is not up to date one but it's looks like it's from 1980

Knocking shop for the old dears and young Tunisia boys ,if you want to hand over some of ya pension 👍 staff are miserable only willing to help if u give them £10 dinar then back to miserable selfs ,, have to share salt&pepper as not every table has some ,,they have staff Serving you minimal meat like back at school , feels like their  watching you when you get back up for more ,like your going to steal food , barmen go around the corner out of sight to pour your alcohol 🤦‍♂️

Fleeing this old hotel... I don't understand why it's still open. It is barely 1 star. The food leaves much to be desired and very few choices but the worst is the SPA!!   I paid for a massage of 1 hour but the masseuse did not touch my feet once, if it disgusts your feet you have to change profession! Eyebrow hair removal she depilated me with a razor, blow-drying she botched me and left me to finish alone at the straightener so much it was swollen, they laugh at you!  Don't waste your money!

reviews.review_title: The porter with a red jacket is a thief
reviews.review_text: This is a good hotel for the price, and in a good location, but unfortunately, the man with red jacket who his the porter is a thief, and the manger knows this but keeps employing him, he knows when you goes on trips and goes in your room and steal, the local know him has sneaked down not trust him, he his a bad man

It was a very last minute decision to book my holiday, and I couldn't be happier with how it turned out. Even though the flight was delayed by several hours our transit was still waiting for us. They kept the dining room open so we could have our dinner. I had read some dreadful reviews (after I booked, haha) but seriously?  At these prices, why are you spending your holiday taking photos of broken tiles in the bathroom when you could be enjoying the sunshine and drinking a pretty nice rose by the pool? 100% will be back. Thank you to everyone who made it so special xx

All the photos the travel agency displayed on the internet are either fake or from 30 years ago.Dirty ,rubbish strewn everywhere,the table cloths were stained,not enough of salt and pepper containers,the lifts worked when they wanted to,wifi regularly out of service,the animation continued until 23.00 sometimes untill midnight.The disco next door continued until 04.00 am.Fitness studio a mess,two machines worked,not enough of weights.Food was relatively good,drinks served in paper cups.There is no way this hotel can be classed as a 4 star even on google maps they have it as 2.5 star.

The Inn would need a new one .. but the meals were correct and diverse and the entertainment was superb: sports activities, board games and entertainment every night (karaoke, games, dance ..). Many thanks to the animators / DJ for the atmosphere throughout the stay.

The Inn needs a good renovation   On the other hand the animation is really top Houssem DJ the head of animation manga excellent and sleep 👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽 Pension is close to plenty of leisure and the beach

Horror Palace! I stayed here a day and was pretty disgusted at the scruffiness of the place..all the windows were dirty, hadn't been cleaned in god knows how long, the carpets had huge black stains on them like they had been burned ..don't go !!!
For Willy willy 20/10 it’s the best animator the atmosphere is great the food is great I highly recommend,😌😌😌😌😌😌😌😌😌😌😌🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣👌❤️👌❤️👌❤️❤️👌❤️❤️😘😘😘😘���☠️☠️☺️☠️🥶🤭🤭🤭🤭🤭🤭🤭🤭

Various and excellent food, the dessert buffet is just amazing  Kindness and friendliness of all staff  Animation team at the top  Water aerobics class very well.... The beach is good. The hotel environment a little less.

reviews.review_title: I recommend you nothing wrong we return in September 😁👍🥰 for the third time
reviews.review_text: Very very nice hotel with garden ♥️♥️ Staff with small care clean room 👍 🥰 Very good and varied restaurant for all tastes 👍 Mabrouk very attentive and adorable 🥰 And an animation team at the top 🥰🥰 from morning to night ❤️❤️

Work from 8am in the morning until 8pm in the evening see more. When we go to the reception to ask to stop the noise of the jackhammer we are told "there are problems in the rooms". As well as the services as the Thalasso written in the title of the hotel everything is extra. The rooms are not great, it is not isolating so we hear the discussions of the neighbors.

best one and clean rooms animation team is very good and so tasty food and beatiful beach i like it so much. so good ping pomg players. i will come back soon to this geogous place and nice water in pool, good quality of persons who work there, so nice atmosphere.

I came with my best friend to spend a week relaxing as a girl and we are delighted with our stay!   The hotel is very nice and spacious. We made excursions like Sidi bou Said, camel, a visit to the souk and we were safe from start to finish.   Within the hotel, we participated in activities (water aerobics, sport, games...), spa, massage (at the top of the range)...  We had a great stay, I recommend!

I went with a girlfriend on vacation 1 week, it was a beautiful week, we had a very nice welcome.  It is a beautiful hotel, accompanied by its beautiful pools and direct access to the beach!   The animation team is at the top, always smiling, and we were able to do lots of activities such as: aquagym, batchata, salsa .. too top 👍   Thank you all for your welcome  Julie and Marion

Amazing experience. Couldn't fault it at all. The Animation Team go all out to make you feel included and enhance your experience . Chef Animation Manou, Willy Willy, Aziz Kaloutcha, Zahra, Nadal, DJ Moustique. Food and drink excellent, nothing bad to say at all...

Can not fault our stay. The hotel is spotless, the food is superb and the amount of dishes per sitting is mind blowing. As for the staff they work so hard! The bar staff and waiters go above and beyond and never let you sit with an empty drink. As for the animation team I feel we have made friends for life! It was my Birthday while we were here and they made so much fuss of me! Particularly Willy! Also Aziz and Kalou. These guys seriously work so so hard all day and all night to keep you entertained and check on you constantly. I honestly can not recommend this enough!

Bulgaria. thé beat anianimation.mátor   Is willyy Willy  .thank fór beatiful  animátor.good.good.the sea Its so nice nice good drink servis Its perfect we Will come bake next time so sonn,🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️🎄🎄🎄🎀🎀🎀♥️♥️♥️♥️

The hotel is true to its description. The animators are at the top and the food is very good. The activities are also very nice. The rooms are clean and the cleaning is done every day. Anyway, everything was perfect!

reviews.review_title: Very very good hotel and animation team
reviews.review_text: Inmation very good with willy willy and team very easy people ataractif hotel with good food and music and enjoyed times happy happy holiday pool beach dj room service hotel and thinks easy respesion we will back soner with good fun and happy thanks gus for evething see you soon

Returning for an umpteenth time to Mediterranean thalasso golf for a stay of 05 nights from May 19 to 24, a hotel I frequent since 2010, but this time I was shocked and surprised by unworthy and discriminatory behavior on the part of the reception for refusing me the all inclusive formula (all inclusive) that I booked as mentioned black and white on my booking voucher 1110805679 made on the stayforlong booking site under the pretext that I hold an Algerian passport. With this opinion I call on the management of Mediterranean thalasso golf in this case Mrs. FATEN MANKAI KSONTINI to take the necessary measures and directives so that this kind of behavior will not recur for a good image of the establishment and tourism Tunisian as well as the hospitality of the brother Tunisian people. Regarding the hotel ,like my previous opinions nothing but nice things to say: Hotel very clean to the last detail. Clean room redone every day. Delicious and varied catering  Two clean outdoor swimming pools  Green garden and dance  Not to mention the kindness and politeness of the staff especially those of the restaurant and bar Yasmine. I hope at my next stay in early October 2025 that this kind of behavior will not be repeated for a quieter vacation than this one. Semani kamel room 10038. Attached is the booking voucher.

Very good hotel we stayed in short stay (5days)  The buffet is quite varied and all the dishes were tasty. The rooms were ok. Access to the beach and very direct the staff is smiling and the animation team was at the top (especially kaloucha 😁)  We had a very good stay, to do again.

Perfect holidays, great entertainment, good activities, very smiling and happy people. 10/10.  Everything at hand, a warm welcome and good teams.  Nothing to blame, for a relaxing or activity-filled holiday, it is the perfect place.

It was amzing experience. Lovely people, lot of fun with activities…good food.  The rooms are very nice and comfortable.   For me, i really appreciate the activities here and energy of the animators. I recommend this place.   For sure coming back again

Great food, good services, good animation team, amazing vacation   It was our first time in Hammamet and we are exited to come back again. Weather is perfect in May, water is warm and not too hot outside, and the hotel was truly amazing with the best food.

reviews.review_title: Thank you for all your efforts and help in making your children happy.
reviews.review_text: 5/5  Dear Director, Mediterranee Thalasso Golf,  Greetings,  I hope this message arrives and you're all well. The purpose of this letter is to express my thanks and gratitude for the great hospitality during my stay at your hotel.  I would like to thank you in particular for several points that had a great positive impact on my stay:  1. The overall service at your hotel was of a very high standard. The management crew was so attentive that I felt like their friendship. The service and reception were excellent.  2. The food and drinks at the three meals were excellent and tasty. The variety of dishes and quality gave me a special treat.  3. The cleanliness of the hotel in all its sections, especially the rooms, was gorgeous for view. This situation is a sign of your professionalism and constant attention to keeping high standards.  4. The activities and games in the pool and the beach were fun and diverse. This section really helped to have fun and enjoy my vacation.  My stay at Mediterranee Thalasso Golf was undoubtedly one of my best experiences and I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family. I also hope I can stay at your hotel again in the future.  Thank you for all your efforts and dedication to delighting your guests.  With respect and appreciation,  [Dian from Kurdistan]

We had a great stay, the hotel is even better than in photo! The quality/price is definitely worth it.  The staff/facilitators are all at the top, the activities are numerous and really varied!  The buffets are also varied and quality!  There is a spa too good too!!  We recommend! <3

Very good stay, super top staff, varied and numerous entertainment, food and drink quantity and excellent quality. Very clean, neat and basically beautiful. The pools are nice and the beach is even better than in the picture. We had a great relaxing holiday! 🤩

Hotel Very good friendly staff LA food Very good Service desk chamber it is impeccable Restaurant service Very good animation too and the guest relationship always smiling Thank you very much for everyone We'll be back

the food is so good, animation team is really friendly, and they try to comunicate as much as they can, but i loved them, beach way is good too i was with my friends in this hotel 5x times and always comes back, climatisation works we had room close to pool so okay.

Great vacation, very nice service, clean. Close to the beach. Animators great. And the waiters Wassim and Hichem the best. They made delicious drinks.The food is very good, everyone will find something for themselves. Varied, lots of sweets.

Very good hotel, clean. Really great animators always close and kind , at the service of the customer , (thank you Lucas for the animation at the kids club) . And thank you to Wassim for these very good cocktails at the pool bar and his sympathy:-) see you soon

We had a very good week mid April with family. On the plus side: -A great animation team, always a little word, smile to propose their activities especially Dali, Amir, Mario and our sunbeam Smurf. -Various meals and in quantity, we enjoyed the local dishes. -The beautiful private beach. Very nice bartenders with a nice choice of cocktails.  On the negative side:  -The rooms in the main building are very noisy, you could hear the noise in the hotel as well as in the street, forced to sleep with balls quies. -The hotel providers (spa, photographers, quad bike) very insistent to sell their services. -The outdoor swimming pools are cool because not heated and the indoor swimming pool inaccessible because under construction...

A really top stay at this hotel, a super cool atmosphere with lots of different activities for every taste not to mention the really nice evening shows with awesome dancers. In short a team of animators always smiling and kind (like strumph that made us laugh)  The hotel is well located with its private beach, one can also be quiet with the reserved pool.  All the hotel staff is very friendly and attentive.

The most beautiful hotel in Tunisia, with the largest swimming pool. It also serves the most delicious food…………………………….. …………………………….. …………………………….. …………………………….. …………………………….. …………………………….. …………………………….. …………………………….. ……………………………..🏝️🇹🇳

reviews.review_title: The quality of a team we had already enjoyed in another hotel.
reviews.review_text: Relax pool for adults, a great plus for the hotel. Very suitable entertainment. Director very present and attentive as well as the governess and some people at the reception. Many thanks to Ayoub for his availability and kindness. Bravo and gratitude and Hossni for being faithful to himself and making us the best mint tea from Djerba and a lot of exoticism for chicha lovers. The only downside last summer was the quality of the meals. Local wines à la carte overpriced for all inclusive.

Housekeeping makes every day impeccable excellent food, but lacks real sharp knives and with teeth. Excellent welcome, very nice hotel , very welcoming and smiling staff, gardeners the cleaning staff and guest Khouloud

reviews.review_title: Excellent review always very happy to return to the sun beach
reviews.review_text: Very friendly welcome very warm food very nice and with theme every day   Very active and good quality entertainment with beautiful evenings.  A big THANK YOU to Madame khouloud guest relation.  Very good hotel

Friendly staff, quiet with plenty on sunbeds. Food changes each night with different themes. Animation (entertainment team) are good with the kids. Clean rooms. Would be nice to have more variety at the bar with drinks and snacks. Beach is soft and just over a quiet road.

Very nice hotel with a top animation team. Various buffet. Lots of activities to do. The weather is almost always tops.  The hotel is well located and very clean. A big thank you to the housekeepers.  A special mention to Wassim the bartender who is super friendly!!!

Very nice hotel, lots of activity  in free access, great animation team who know how to take care of d3 us, a superserviece at the pool bar with its wassim server!!! I will be back with pleasure! Plus time was with us, a treat

Very good reception of staff: Wassim 👍 serves us superb coktail. Always smiling, he makes us want to come back. Just like Jamel at the central bar and the Mediterranean waiters.  Not to mention the animators.👏👌  Thank you.  The Bretons. 😉

We had a great stay at the sun club hotel. The staff were excellent all round but Wassim behind the pool side bar was excellent with a lively attitude. The entrainment staff(malik, lucas all the other boys and girls) really made the holiday for us. Always chatty and smiling.

Pleasant stay in the Menzel part formerly called Residence Karim. From the entrance of the hotel which begins with the security barrier then by the reception staff and all tradesmen present in this Hotel no negative remarks are to be made. The more I have been granted a small privilege that I keep hidden but of great emotional value. Thank you, Mr MOUNIR. I greatly appreciate Mademoiselle NOUR always smiling for the communication between the guest and the hotel. I don't count anymore but my stays in this hotel for 20 years. As some Directors said: You're at home here. Well, I think so. Our stay on 2 plus a 4 legs was only happiness. Good continuation in all these improvements.

reviews.review_title: Starting cocktail prepared by Wassim the best 👍🤩😍
reviews.review_text: Super Barmann Wassim very professional, nice ,he prepares sumptuous cocktails Thank you very much 🙏🌴🌞🍹🍹🍹😋🤪👍all in a nice setting. I would be happy to come back to taste other cocktails prepared with care by Wassim.I don t know all the names but I want to say that the whole team is great.Thank you.I had a very nice week.🤩🤩😍👍

Very large hotel with beautiful gardens very well maintained 2 large swimming pool of which a reserve for adults I had booked an isolated superior room is quiet very well placed in the gardens food and good buffet the staff are very nice the only negative is the lybians invading the whole restaurant (respectful mess of unpolished food nothing to do with the staff they are the kings) it's a shame

Best cocktails, served by Monsieur WASSIM!!!!!  THANK YOU FOR YOUR WELCOME 👍👍  SEE YOU SOON //  Many thanks to PRINCESSE EMNA, from the Mexicana Bar 🙏🙏👍👍. A UFO😉😉. A Unique and Rare Personality.  And finally, thank you to AMINE VITAMIN 😁😁👍👍.  NICE TO MEET YOU AND SEE YOU SOON!!😎😎🧸🧸

Very large tourist complex with animators listening to customers and always there to offer us activities the rooms are large and very clean and the best for the end yasimme at the pool bars to offer us his cocktails and a little attention each time very beautiful person the restaurant is very nice thank you very much for this small stay

Very good hotel and very nice animation staff he always do very good shows and very good activities especially mention for pikachu is very nice man, and the room is clean and good the beach is very nice and the bar the restaurant…… ❤️❤️😁❤️❤️❤️

Felt the need to review after reading some negative ones! Just returned from 10 days here with EasyJet holidays. Lovely hotel. We had a refurbished room, one of the ground floor bungalows. Very nice room. Only issue was the hairdryer is one of those old fashioned ones in the bathroom. Not very good. I recommend you take your own if you want a good blow dry! Lots of work going on to update the hotel and gardens. Quiet pool lovely in beautiful gardens. No issues with getting sun beds. This is not an adults only hotel although not many children.Staff were lovely and no problems with us being English as some reviews have suggested. Waiting staff in restaurant particularly friendly. Shame they have no names on their uniforms. The food is what you would expect in an all inclusive hotel. Fruit, cereal, cheese and meats with bread and pastries at breakfast and eggs any way you want. Some interesting local dishes. However if you want a full English breakfast you will be disappointed. Lunch and dinner similar. A couple of stations with freshly cooked meat, usually Turkey escalopes but sometimes steak and king prawns. Always pizza and pasta as well as local dishes. Lots of lovely salads. Best desserts we have ever had! Well done pastry chef! And lovely ice cream. Wine very acceptable, I liked the rose and my husband the red. Spirits came with Schweppes mixers. We ate once in the a la carte. Set menu and no choice but lovely food. Nice to be waited on. Good entertainment in the bar in the evening and hotel next door if you want something livelier! Four pools including one indoors. We visited the Crocodile park which was interesting and taxi ride cheap! Some shops selling designer copies -bags, T shirts etc. just outside the hotel. All in all a lovely holiday.

The Animation team make this hotel, khalido and Jamaica worked especially hard to make our trip fun. The food is good and we had a nice room which was kept beautifully clean. This is my second trip here and I have enjoyed it so much.  Thank you for everything

Emma the animatisse is a beautiful person at the top .belle hotel a very nice atmosphere. The food is satisfactory, the staff is at the top a very nice pool. The rooms are to be reviewed a little veillo. I'll be back in September.

The vaccance is too good people who work here they are too sampa welcome, the rooms are clean, the restaurant was very good.Thanks for this holiday and a thank you for all the entertainment teams and a special for Maya😘💋💗

Very good stay very good food and excellent pool the children loved. Ideal for family stays. I thank all the teams and services offered by the hotel and restaurant. The animation is top Thank you ( massinga , momo , khalido , Emma , fifi , Jamaica , pikacho , Aziz , Malek , Aziz , casper ) and a special thank you for maya 💓

reviews.review_title: Great stay at the aqua resort
reviews.review_text: We had a great time! The hotel is very good. Reception at the top, always listening. The service and waiters always smiling and at our service. And finally, in terms of animation, always smiling, a big thank you to jamaica, maya, zambala, fifi, emma, tiga, omar, zico, massinga, momo, pikacho, khalido. We had a great time thanks to you!

I would like to extend a huge thank you to all the hotel staff for a wonderful stay in Djerba. Upon arrival, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism by the reception, always available and smiling. The service was impeccable, whether in the restaurant, in the rooms or in the common areas – everything is done to make you feel good. But above all I would like to salute the animation team, who were simply exceptional! Thanks to their energy, constant good humor and creativity, every moment spent with them was unforgettable. They have created a friendly and dynamic atmosphere, and their involvement really makes a difference.  Thank you all for this great experience. I hope to have the pleasure of coming back very soon!

It's very nice here, there's a pool, a big aqua park, lots of entertainment and lots of happy people, there are quite hospitable people, people who smile always a lot of energy thank you very much for the best vacation a special thanks for the dynamic entertainers ( Maya , Emma , Momo , massinga , jamaica , helmy ,Aziz ,Omar ,pikacho , khalido , Tiga , fifi )  Thank you all ❤️

The location is superbe, the rooms are spacious and very clean, the general atmosphere is awesome, the animation teams is so nice and helpful, I really enjoyed my time with them, including with the company of Zambala and his colleagues. The all inclusive service is a must here, the food is so delicious and so variant, for everyone taste and liking. You have several swimming pools, a private beach, no one to be bothered from.  I rate this stay 5/5 and I recommend everyone to come visit it to enjoy a quality time.

reviews.review_title: Holidays in Djerba under the sun at the top,
reviews.review_text: Good hotel, very friendly animation team, excellent restaurant, very nice private beach, lots of choices in terms of activities, shisha bar at the top, idyllic setting of the hotel, I recommend this hotel for a pleasant holiday under the sun

Clean room with a restaurant with a wide choice, a nice and well maintained swimming pool and a top entertainment team with many activities and shows planned to entertain guests.  I recommend this stay at Caesar Thalaso.  Many thanks to ( Maya , Emma , jamaica , massinga , momo , Aziz, Omar , helmy , tiga , fifi , Malek , Casper , pikatcho )

reviews.review_title: A very nice experience, with services that meet our expectations at appreciated all inclusive prices.
reviews.review_text: A warm welcome upon arrival.  Very nice location of our room facing the pool accessible on one level.  Room service correct.Clean and well maintained  Bar available ,with outdoor table .Indoor bar, very nice with professional service at the top. Kindness and friendliness of all.  The buffet at our disposal with varied excellent dishes, also local cuisine, allowed us to taste plenty of flavors.

We were at the Caesar thalasso with friends used to this establishment and here is my opinion in all objectivity:  Location: Great location by the sea, with direct access to the beach. 15 minutes from Houmt Souk by car Quiet and pleasant environment.  Welcome and service: Perfect nothing to say warm staff with quick check-in, quick response to our request.  Cleanliness and maintenance: Clean room impeccable linen and towels.  Clean common areas.  Well maintained garden and swimming pool.  Comfort of rooms: Comfortable bedding , standard size room, wifi present in the rooms.  Hotel facilities   The hotel has several swimming pools including a setback saltwater pool that I personally prefer. The hotel also has several bars and restaurants with a livelier side to the Djerba Aqua resort hotel and a quieter side to the Caesar thalasso, I find it interesting, we are not bored!!  Catering: Frankly varied and good catering it's hard to say the opposite. Snacks available between meals.  Internet connection: Stable connection but medium speed, enough to browse and send emails.   Value for money: Very good value for money for location and services   Overall experience: Very pleasant stay in an idyllic setting. Ideal for relaxing in the sun special mention to the bartenders of Caesar Thalaso (men and women),   Only the receptionist at night called Fatah who almost ruined our stay, this gas should not work in contact with people , it is not courteous to say even mean, but except that we made very warm encounters that made our stay very pleasant.   We will be back with pleasure.

Great hotel, I love the animation! Helmi and Emma especially are great, thanks for your beautiful energy ♥️✨... The hotel is a bit old, but overall very good value for money.  The restaurant is varied, we always find something good to eat. The staff is really adorable! I think I'll be back...

Very welcome, nice hotel  Wide choice at local product buffet, lots of entertainment The host Helmi welcomed me very well he knew how to introduce me to the hotel and advise me on activities I recommend this hotel and Helmi to accompany you and recommended during your stay.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel do not hesitate to come!!!!
reviews.review_text: Animation at the top they give to the full they are super nice on all pikachu and jamaica and they are listening they were doing good shows and they offer a lot of activities I like this hotel I will recommend soon 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰❤️

Great hospitality, staff here are all wonderful…………………………………………. Good experience, Helmi and Kasper were very helpful and tons of activities to do…………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………..

reviews.review_title: The animation team is on top! Congratulations for their investments! Helmi number one in animation!
reviews.review_text: Very good hotel with attentive staff!  Congratulations to helmi for his animation at the top!!!!  The restaurant is very good and the rooms are very clean!  The center of thalasso is superb nothing to complain about the welcome.  Access to the beach and easy and very well maintained.

Very pleasant welcome. Dynamic facilitators very attentive, close to customers, attentive. Top activities (water aerobics, darts , golf , pétanque etc. Evening every evening with various activities.  The food is diversified is very good and the waiters take care of the guests, thanks to all the room crew.  Very smiling room staff, very clean rooms and the hotel park.  I advise you to come and spend your holidays at this hotel (Venice Beach 3*) , you will not regret it.  A huge thank you to all the animation team Zizou kimo madi Jean-Mouloud maya, Issam , thank you to everyone of the hotel!!   Beautiful vacation, I'll be back

It is a hotel club on a human scale with a good atmosphere and an animation team at the top. they are all adorable and allowed us to have a very nice week. The waiters and the lifeguard are also super friendly. The cleaning team is very efficient. Bravo to the cooks everything is delicious and varied. The beach is a 2-minute walk with private access. There are shops nearby and the town of Midoun is 5min by taxi. There is also the Giant store 5min by taxi (convenient to find all the baby stuff, diapers, small pot ..) Thank you again for this beautiful week, we will come back!! Anaïs Aysha Arya

Very good stay and very good personal hotel very friendly! Go to this family hotel which is very attractive and the team is great  Top nights  Very clean and nice hotel to walk around  Large swimming pool and entertainment at the top  Thanks a lot for this week

Club on top, despite the wind, our stay is successful, the animation team on top, friendly and well looking after, all the staff is adorable, the rooms are clean, the catering is varied. I recommend this club we feel good very quickly.  Michèle, Sophie and Marina.

reviews.review_title: a wonderful time, very good surprise, I am a fan of Djerba, this hotel does not have to blush 4 or 5 stars
reviews.review_text: I will try to be as clear as possible, I go to Djerba several times a year, and I have already done many hotels on the island. The Venice is a man-made hotel, where you feel right at home, it is friendly and the staff is caring for you. The on-site massage center is cheap and the masseuses really professional (I have tested about thirty centers for several years)  Maye, Jean Mouloud, Tigana and Zizou are really super nice! The rooms are spacious, and the wifi works very well. The bathrooms are a bit old, but very clean and we still have hot water. The buffet and smaller than in very large hotels, but it changes with each meal lunch, evening and the next day. You can go there with your eyes closed, as a couple, with friends or alone, you will not be disappointed. Like what, 5 stars or 3 stars, in Tunisia, this is not always a criterion to look at. Look especially at the reviews and especially the most recent ones. Have a good trip to you and enjoy on this little paradise island. Bruno

Very family structure. Everyone finds his own way either rest or activity with a formidable team supervised by Jean Mouloud quinedt perfect.  The food is varied. The hotel is aging but very clean as well as the rooms made every day. All the staff are really attentive to their holidaymakers.  May be a small effort in kindness to the care center and coordination for departure time that is not posted.  I'm going back in October.

Superb animation team: Zizou and his sidekicks are raging to create atmosphere even in the season when there are not enough people yet. Kind and attentive staff. The human side is great, I recommend. Good and diversified meal. Family side very appreciated.

reviews.review_title: I have been there 3 times, I will come back!
reviews.review_text: This is my 3rd stay in this authentic, welcoming, human-sized Hotel. At the restaurant fresh, varied products. Waiters are attentive.   And the animation is at the top, with Jean-Mouloud, who is also the DJ.  The daytime entertainment is friendly and joyful. The evenings are varied and the music adapted to the atmosphere of the moment.  In short: it feels good. I'll be back.

We knew neither this hotel nor the island of djerba and we have beautiful memories:  Plus: varied meals. Hotel well located in the tourist area with souvenir shops nearby. Beach very close. 5km from Midoun and the crocodile farm. 10 km from Houmt souk.  Nearby activities: quad . Buggy. Horseback riding and many more ... The excursions offered are excellent. Especially the 2 days in the  Desert....we dream all awake! Animations every night have great animators. Receptionists 1 Listening and really very friendly and who gives very juicy advice on your to future purchases. The least: no fridge in the room, water is paid despite the all inclusive package. Breakfast without fresh juice squeezed, drinks of all inclusive served in cardboard cups. Burning neighbors but it's not the hotel's fault! We keep a beautiful memory and I recommend.

reviews.review_title: Great holiday at Jumbo venice beach.... Sylvie and Johanna
reviews.review_text: We had a great time. Nice room, good restaurant. The staff is very friendly and caring. A different entertainment every night. Animators set fire to it and never leave you in the corner. Many thanks to them for making our stay so pleasant. Hairdresser, masseuses, shop, nothing is missing... Congratulations

A great week I recommend, it is a 3 star at the competitive price but we spent a very pleasant week as a couple. The food is quite varied even if it is quite spicy, the morning coffee is not crazy the cappuccino is good. We made the excursion over 2 days in dessert it is amazing. We enjoyed every other day the massages and hairdresser on the last day. The beach is great and the street vendors stay away. There are shops nearby to buy souvenirs for those like us who don't know how to trade at the souk.

Very nice hotel, enjoying its private beach despite its second line.  Nice host and not too insistent.  The most of our trip the SPA.  We left as a couple without children, we made this trip a moment of great relaxation. And to do so we had the pleasure of being perfectly welcomed by the hotel spa team. Mint tea is the best.  Reasonable price and relaxing time assured.  2 day desert tour just amazing ❤️

Thank you to the animators (Caramel, Jean Mouloud and Zizou) for this stay. Very welcome and always present!  Incredible good humor  I recommend closed eyes  We also made amazing excursions (Thank you Murad for the help)

We spent a wonderful week at the Pension venice beach in Djerba.  The rooms were clean, the linen was changed every day, the maids very nice and professional. The restaurant staff is very friendly and welcoming ( adorable Nassim). The animation team at the top, Caramel and his good humor, Zizou, Tigana and especially Jean Mouloud who with his little touches make him unforgettable. The pools are clean and maintained.  Little downside the shop manager insists (or even heavy) and the person for the Inn's tour purchase becomes unpleasant in case of refusal.  We will gladly return to this property.
Pension, Animation, Staff, Landscape, Things to do and Excursions everything was perfect 👌 We planned to come back quickly and to the same Pension because it was a great experience thank you

Not very kind staff old breakfast it was not fresh (cucumber etc) and the more we are accused of renting a towel and not returning it after it was a towel of the room we wanted to show them our luggage of course they found nothing we were allowed to enter the door unsparingly like thieves this is how he treats tourists in this Pension

Inn very nice the staff always attentive at the level of the rooms the sheets were changed every day as well as the towels it's a plus the housekeepers are very nice good bedding the little downside in the rooms it would be to refresh the bathroom paint apart from that the rooms were very decent  In terms of catering there is something for everyone  At the level of animation they are at the top thank you to caramel for his energy in Zizou for his joie de vivre and tigana for his kindness and thank you to Jean Mouloud for his good humor  The positive thing about this Pension is that the manager is there very very regularly and he even lends a hand when necessary he is close to his team

Pension very good, the staff is very professional and very kind and attentive, the quality of the restaurant excellent, the animators are at the top.  In a few words a really excellent Award Value...we had an incredible and unforgettable week...Again a very big thank you 🥰❤️🤠💙🇨🇵🇹🇷

Very good stay, Pension well located a few minutes walk from the beach, correct and varied meals. At the level of animation a lot of choices and very good evenings a team of animators at the top listening, always motivated to set the mood, CARAMEL, ZIZOU, JMEAN MOULOUDE, TIGALA, thank you for your energy and motivation that allowed me to spend excellent holidays and make new meetings. My week would not have been the same without the whole team. Thanks to MOURAD for Things to do (PIRATE BOAT) thank you for your kindness and advice. I'll be back soon...

Not 4 star 3 at push needs complete refurb food ok staff good no air con in may even tho over 25 outside  stuff coming away from walls sewage smell on off cracked basin pool lovely beach lovely (when clean) would we go back - NO! Old needs upgrade!!

Very welcome, you will not be disappointed, quiet , entertainment and animators at the top, very good destination setting very pleasant staff very smiling and warm always there to help you😉 the beach and restaurant are at the top even the rooms

Very pleasant stay the rooms are good and the restaurant to the top even the beach and very smiling staff and very warm setting very clean and very nice travel and destination to advise and entertainment and animators to the top 😘 😍😍🥰🥰🥰🥰

Hotel staff very friendly and helpful. Especially the photograph staff very good houba ,tchitchou and mouri  Shower in room very bad.                                                       Food could be better .. Some parts of the beach need a good clean glass and tin cans in the sand.............

We went for a short break to Hari beach club and i wasnt expecting much due to prior reviews but in all honesty it wasnt that bad. At the end of the day you get what you pay for and at £400 all inclusive for a week this place was worth it.   The rooms were clean and air conditioning worked perfectly. Food was a bit the same each day nothing amazing but nothing too bad.   I must say during my time here the staff were excellent especially Dali who worked the tables bringing drinks out each night and Walid the waiter during meal times - they went above and beyond what i expected.   one tip i would give is use the indoor pool we used it everyday when we was there and we were literally the only people in there!    outside of the hotel there isnt much to do so we decide to do the 4x4 berber village tour on offer by easyjet - it was a long day and the tour was given in French so you couldnt really undertand much of what was going on but one of the other guides in a different car on the tour spoke english so he could inform us ( i would just note this when booking tours as it wasnt explained to us by the rep that it was the case so we had no idea at all in the berber village when another guide took us around what was going on - and at £320 for 4 of you its a bit disappointing and then you get a meal when you are there and the manager there started to shout at one of our group because we wanted to sit together not have 4 people split between other tables )    We then decide to do the Pirate ship tour ... if you have every done one of these abroad before its nothing like them ... it was so bad it was good ... honestly go book it and find out for yourself   all in all it was a good holiday just to get away and switch off ... would i visit again maybe the staff and entertainment were great ... the rooms and food were good.   p.s tip the staff 10 dinar here 20 dinar there its not a lot of money but its makes a big difference to them

Hari Club has professionals Animations Team specially their chef - Joe. He’s just perfection Animator also amazing dancer and singer. He is very hopefully, take care about children and events single tourist in hostel. I will come back to Hari for summer for sure😁

To flee!!!!!! Deplorable and obsolete room , towels all yellow , no animation, abandoned and dirty beach. A manager who doesn't care about customer feedback... In short run away!!!! . The buffet not very developed but fortunately. Oh, and the only positive is Mr. Tea. In short, the worst week of our lives...

reviews.review_title: Cheap and cheerful holiday but definitely not a 4 star Hotel!
reviews.review_text: Last minute getaway before our main holiday in September.  The Hotel is more a 3 star rather than a 4 star.   Positives:  Rooms need freshening up but were always cleaned every day.  Towels changed daily.  Good choice of food at all 3 sittings and snacks available in the main bar during the day.  The pool area was tidy and also the beach was raked and cleaned every morning (we knew there was a problem with seaweed before we arrived).  Kharim did an excellent job of ensuring everyone got a sunbed where they wanted.  We paid extra for a partial sea view - my daughter had a fantastic room directly overlooking the beach and sea.  Negatives:  Smoking!! Previous Hotels in different parts of the world we have been to have designated areas for smokers away from people who do not smoke.  Not at this Hotel.  There were signs in the main bar saying no smoking but people just sat and smoked and vaped, even when there were children around and even babies.  Our clothes smelt of smoke even sitting outside.  The main culprits were staff members sitting at the bar smoking and they remained unchallenged.  Air con was not working in any part of the Hotel or rooms, so some nights were unbearably hot and stuffy.  The internal phone system did not work either so we were unable to contact our daughter in another room because the WiFi did not work outside the reception area. *WARNING* for anyone taking young girls with them to this Hotel.  A member of staff asked to see my daughter's phone (it's one of the new iphones) .  After looking at it he asked her to open up Whatsapp and proceeded to put his number in the contacts.  We did think anything untoward at this point, so when he asked her to send him a test message she did.  Little did we know, he was then going to send her inappropriate messages over the next couple of days.  This spoilt our last 4 days as she wanted to avoid going anywhere near where he was.  It's ironic because there are posters everywhere warning about child exploitation.  My daughter is actually late  20's but she does look a lot younger than this.  She has blocked his number now but should he try other means to contact her, we will have no choice but to take this matter further.  I am hoping management takes note of my comments and filters this to their staff, hopefully making this person think twice about doing it again.

Great quad bike ride and buggy with jawhar. We had a feast I advise all people to go see him to organize your outings. Pleasant person, kind and always there to find a solution for customers. Super met

We have booked a half day quad bike ride with Jawhar directly at the hotel, you will tour the island and enjoy the sunset with breaks in beautiful scenery. Great experience, quality quads. Merci beaucoup Jawhar

The hotel stay has desired compared to the photos but the staff is very welcoming and helpful. We had the chance to meet Jawhar who is a guide of the hotel who organized all our activities (jetski, quad, buggy, nice places...) at unbeatable prices and who made sure we had a wonderful stay!  Contact him absolutely if you are visiting djerba!

The hotel is not a 4*, more 3* in my opinion. The hotel is dated and does need so.e refurbishment and painted areas to be refreshed. I appreciate that this is a costly and a huge job. All of the hotel is very clean. Our room, which was in the main building, again was clean and was adequate in size and bright. But the bathroom was dark with poor electric lighting and rather small. Marble around the sink was cracked, and the bath had an overhead shower. Always hot hot water and a good flow of water. The balcony was quite small with a table and 2 chairs. We paid extra for a sea view, but the view was blocked by a building and overgrown plants hanging into the balcony area. Food was always good and tasty and a good variety of choices at every meal time. The bar was a lovely area, of which half of the room smoking was allowed. Small bar area, but we found the choice of drinks to be small with only 4 spirits on the AI menu, and they, in my opinion, were undrinkable. The pool area is lovely with plenty of parasols to go round. The beach we found unpleasant and untidy. Needs a dramatic clean up across the sand. Entertainment around the pool - the music is way too loud. At times me and my husband could not talk in normal voices to each other, due to the loudness. The entertainment team seemed to please & interact with  some people but completely ignored others. They welcomed us to the hotel the day before we left. Staff are OK, but not the friendliest we have encountered in our several visits to all areas of Tunisia. Accept for the lovely lady who works in the hair and beauty salon. I had my nails re done whilst there and she was just such a delight and a breath of fresh air. Sadly for us on our final evening, they moved to evening entertainment to the outdoor area, but sadly too, the nightclub/disco too. As this area was less than 50 yards from our room at 2am I tried to call reception, but the phone did not work and I had to go down to ask for the volume to be turned down, as we had to be up in 3.5 hours for our departure home. The music was so loud we could feel the beat of the music through our pillows. The balcony doors were not the best fitting doors and made no difference to the volume if they were open or closed.  We enjoyed our stay but would definitely not return

I had a wonderful stay at this hotel! The room was clean and comfortable, and the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. A special shout-out to Joe, who went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. He's doing a great job! I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a pleasant and relaxing experience.

Cannot fault this hotel from the house keepers, bar staff, restaurant staff, Joe & the animation team. All friendly & helpful. So clean. My husband is vegetarian & never struggled once for something to eat. Don’t like going to the same place twice but will definitely go back

The hotel and restaurant were great, and the food was delicious. The animation team was very friendly. I especially want to praise an animator named Joe – he was very professional and made sure everyone had a great time. The animation team was excellent.

The stay at this hotel was fantastic. The complex was very beautiful and everything was very well maintained. The hotel rooms were always very clean. The entertainment was fantastic. A big thank you to the animation team, especially Joe. He was fantastic. He was very warm, friendly, and always laughing. He took great care of the guests and took care of everything. Thank you so much, Joe. Thanks to you, our vacation was unforgettable.

reviews.review_title: Amazing stay booked to go back already !!!
reviews.review_text: Loved hari beach club that much we booked to go back next year soon as we landed back home! All staff were amazing very welcoming especially blacky zizo dhali and superstar Joe!  Joe even helped us get personalised T-shirts made! All staff were brilliant just can’t remember all names! Food wasn’t great but always something to put on ur plate I’m fussy ! Excited to go back again wish it was sooner! Thank you hari beach club untill next time

This was our first trip to hari beach club, a bit of stab in the dark because non of us had never heard of djerba...was a girls trip of all ages 25 to 68 . We had such a good time we have already booked to go bk next year....all staff where very professional that's  from desk staff , restaurant,  bar and animation team....they made us all feel really welcome.  Supper star joe even arranged some funny t shirts for us all to wear 😄  Hotel isn't a 4* may just about 3* but for the price you can't go wrong...food was just ok some days better than others.  Thanks hari beach club till next time .

Hari Beach Club is an amazing place to go on holiday. I’ve visited twice already and booked for another 2 weeks in October. There’s games on all throughout the day such as yoga, water polo, darts, aqua aerobics, crazy tennis etc which Animation provide, they are very friendly and interactive, Superstar boss Joe, Omar, Rico, Blackie, Dana, Zizu and Aladdin. Lifeguard is very professional at his job, helpful with local knowledge and very friendly. Bar staff are fantastic always smiling happy to help, fast at serving. Thank you to Dali (bar staff) for helping my disabled mum all week. Reception staff are very helpful and welcoming. Restaurant staff are very hard working and are happy to help with anything you need. Cleaners and maintenance keep the place clean and tidy. I’ve had the time of my life and not once did i ever feel threatened or unsafe, there was no inappropriate behaviour towards me as a young lady, like i have experienced in other countries. We were here at the same time as a serious accusation was made towards a member of staff THIS IS UNTRUE. As a family we witnessed what happened and came forward with our statement of what we believed to be true. You do not have to worry about anything.

I stayed her for the last 10 days as a solo traveller. My Room is right on the beach and lovely to sit on the patio reading a book with a coffee with the view (pic added) staff are very welcoming and friend and nothing is to much bother for them. Food is very varied and there is always something different and new on the menu every day. Ice cream bar at lunchtime is a nice touch you don’t see in a lot of hotels, always 3 or 4 different flavours to choose from and it’s proper tasty not cheep rubbish. Room are real nice with TV shower fridge freezer. Local shop about 4 mins walk is great for snacks to keep in there. Shop on site is a bit over priced and was warned by others before I went in there so didn’t bother.  Read a bad review below about a woman getting dragged to the beach by staff. Believe me IT NOT TRUE. The guy was a bullsh&tter. The woman in question was actually being helped by 4 members if staff taking her to the front entrance to wait for the ambulance after she fell and broke/fractured her leg while drunk like she had been for most of her stay. DO NOT let this review put you off. It’s a lovely place and i will most definitely be coming again later in the year. I sincerely hope this puts your minds at easy about whether to choose this lovely place right on the beach.

name: Cap Bon Kelibia Beach Hotel & Spa

reviews.review_text: It was my first visit to Kélibia. I was really amazed by the view, the hotel, the cleanliness, as well as the attention of the animators, Momo and Dido, who did everything to please my grandchild and make our stay pleasant. Special thanks to the maids for their kindness and professionalism.

Great service and very pleasant animation. I will probably come back to that.  I strongly advise. The view was just beautiful and we had the opportunity to contemplate dawn and sunset one of the best.  A little attention to MoMo who was super cute and very kind. I recommend ++.

I had the pleasure of staying at this lovely hotel with my family in May, and we had a truly wonderful time. The atmosphere was calm and relaxing, and the location offered stunning views of the sea right from our room. The rooms were beautifully decorated, spotlessly clean, and very comfortable – it felt like a home away from home.  The staff were absolutely fantastic. A special thanks to DiDo. Momo, staff of animation and Wajih in the bar  for their warm welcome and exceptional service.   They were always friendly, helpful, and went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable.  One thing that made this place stand out for us was that pets are allowed. My mother was so happy to be able to bring her cat along – it’s a rare and much-appreciated advantage that really made a difference for our family.  All in all, it was a perfect stay in a beautiful setting with outstanding service. We would definitely love to come back!

A real favorite! Hotel Kélibia Beach offers an idyllic setting with a sandy beach. The staff is friendly, the rooms are clean and comfortable, and the food is varied and delicious. Perfect for a relaxing holiday by the sea. Big favorite for the evenings at the Momo Hotel, Dido and Aziz put a crazy atmosphere every night. They are adorable, full of energy and really know how to move everyone. Thank you for all the laughter and good times!

We had a great stay in one of the nice hotels in tunsie rated cleanliness and service and welcome a big thank you to the animation team DiDo and MoMo who made our stay wonderful... Thank you very much... See you soon

Review: I was on holiday with friends in the period of May, the village is beautiful, top animation with two great girls, Elena and Giulia. Spacious room, nice and clean and with a spatial sea view.  Council to all!

reviews.review_title: To avoid out of summer season
reviews.review_text: Hotel to avoid in off season  Party following the recommendation of a friend who comes every year in summer season ... We'll say there's kelibia beach in summer and another one out of season  So summer customers ..and winter customers who do not receive the same service  A big disappointment apart from the paradise beach and the kindness of the staff  Tiny quadruple room (two children and two adults) a single closet no places for our things stayed in suitcase.. looks like in summer camp ...I made a claim Suites not available cause hotel half not exploited due to lack of guests 🤔😀 Buffet what to say... Not worthy of a 4 star... Not good not varied ... Big disappointment  No entertainment for children ..reason the season has not yet started...🤔😀 You are warned ... in off-season you are guests like no other summer ....

reviews.review_title: A journey from the capital V
reviews.review_text: I stayed at this hotel for 4 days and it was a more than satisfactory experience, exceeding my initial expectations. Staff engaging, kind and polite. Very clean and fragrant environment Very funny and engaging animation The food was great and plentiful and even the proposed excursions are very good and with super qualified and reliable people You must definitely come!!

reviews.review_title: A superb hotel facing the sea
reviews.review_text: We stayed at this hotel from 8 to 13 April. Absolutely unbeatable price, excellent value for money! The low season plays a lot of part there I think. The hotel is huge, superb, the staff is adorable, professional, responsive and caring for its guests. We arrived at 3:15 am after a long journey, a fruit basket and a mixed board were waiting for us in the room. We enjoyed it very much! Many thanks to all the staff, and if we ever come back to Kélibia, we know where to stay!

We stayed for a seventh in August and we had a very very good time. Cleanliness impeccable even if rooms a bit 'dated.All the staff really friendly and kind always ready to meet the demands of holidaymakers. A special thanks to Youseff wonderful and really professional person who pampered us for breakfast and dinner. The only flaw you had to get up at 5.30 in the morning to take the beachfront sunbeds. This aspect definitely needs to be reviewed otherwise we would have given 5 stars.  Top quality food and very varied. Also pay attention to the problem of celiac disease.

Wonderful sea Clean and tidy structure Staff always attentive to tourist requests Thanks to all the staff and especially to the kind Youssef who always took care of the table service impeccably. Also great place for various excursions.

reviews.review_title: Exceptional stay very welcoming staff attentive to the needs of the guests. Brief 5 stars deserves
reviews.review_text: Kelibia being the tip of Cap Bon with a beach of dreams with a translucent sea in short everything to spend happy days both with family and solo. The perfect place to get a new health. Gourmet cuisine 🇹🇳🇮🇹♥️♥️♥️♥️🇫🇷🦆🪿🐦‍⬛🐔🐬🐳🐋🌴🌲��️

I stayed at the Kelibia Beach Hotel during the week of August. Sea of a wonderful turquoise color. Clean and tidy structure. Director (Fabrizio) always present and attentive. Varied and tasty food (good Italian chef). Unforgettable the evening of August by the pool. SPA to try! The room was large, bright, clean and tidy. Thanks to all the staff and in particular to the kind Youssef, who has always taken care of the table service in an impeccable way, very professional, attentive and helpful for our every request and need.

sea just wonderful; one of the most 'beautiful ever seen. clear clear clear warm water calm... to stay soaked for hours. the structure is typical North African with a huge lobby and sofas profusion. average restaurants with super abundant breakfast and lots of choice and dinner served on request in the outdoor area. for lunch it would have been nice to be able to eat at the beach with a quick lunch but it is not provided / possible. clean rooms, with linen change even several times a day. veratour staff super helpful (made room change on our request). animation to review; the village head gave the feeling of being a little fed up... shame... because I think it had great potential. the shows in the evening decent but the big limit is the indoor theater !!! unacceptable in a summer structure. not very engaging in trying to entice customers.

Dear KELIBIA BEACH SPA Inn team,  I wanted to express my sincere thanks for the exceptional service and warm welcome I received during my stay with you. Every moment spent in your establishment was a real source of relaxation and pleasure thanks to the kindness and professionalism of all the staff.  I will have an excellent memory of this experience and will not fail to recommend your Pension to my family and friends. Again, thank you for everything, and I am already looking forward to coming back during my next stay in Kélibia.  Very cordially, Yassine Chebbi  Flight officer & voiceover

Deception total j'ai passée cette weekend avec ma famille c'était une déception honnêtement.  Before I visited this lodge many times and I was disappointed first in terms of reception we booked 2 chambers 2 people et une chambre triple We took note that they are not Salmon Lana 2 chambers triple trop far je suis enceinte arrival very tired I went to replace the room told me that they don't have rooms and that I have to wait an hour know that I paid a room for two people and not for 3 people Second thing there is no animation and no lodge sleeping in the meaning of the word.   ⁇ third, the food is cold and there is no special diversity in   Breakfast  Unfortunately it was one of the best hotels in the world

The week at Kelibia was magnificent! Crystal clear sea and white beach, spacious and clean rooms with magnificent views. Rich and varied buffet for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The staff is prepared and attentive. We will be back soon to Kelibia!

We stayed from 16 to 23 September and I must say that we enjoyed it very much. Very spacious and clean room, clean and tidy common areas.  Food in my opinion very good, the dinner buffet much more varied and higher level than that of lunch, very rich breakfast for all tastes.  Small beach compared to the capacity of the hotel, given the low season we have always found a place on the beach without problems but I think that in high season it is a real struggle to grab the gazebo with sunbeds and this could negatively affect the stay. Same for dinner out, in theory the table should be booked but being in low season there was always room for everyone which I do not think is possible in August, this is a great shame!  The animation guys very good and easygoing, engaging but never intrusive.  ONLY negative note mattresses and pillows, very hard mattress and pillows of very low quality, I highly recommend the property to provide because they are really bad. Very nice sea.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST HOLIDAY MADE WITH VERATOUR ❤️🇹🇳
reviews.review_text: We are regular customers of Veratour and after Egypt , Palma de Mallorca , Sardinia , we decided to try Kelibia in Tunisia .   We stayed from September 9 to September 23, we start from the wonderful sea with a white beach and comfortable sunbeds with gazebo. VOTE 10  During the day you never run the risk of getting bored, given the various activities carried out by the animation team, we personally enjoyed the Beach Volleyball and Beach Tennis tournaments organized by Diego, but during the day you can also choose to play games on the beach. Water fitness, bowls tournaments and more  Thanks for the chat Andrea and Camilla.  VOTE 8  On the excursions organized by Veratour , we recommend the very beautiful Carthage one with a super-trained local Guide , while with Faid and Ciro you can choose an excursion from the hotel with camels , horses and buggy to visit the fortress .  VOTE 8  Inside the structure if you want to relax there are a spectacular massage center, we have done 8 total at a super honest price 20 € per massage  VOTE 10  Holiday just to remember for all these exceptional things, the only drawback that could improve to get to perfection, the kitchen quite repetitive in fourteen days with a few dishes to my taste good, you saved the first of the Italian chef made at the time and little else.  VOTE 5

Beautiful structure and very well maintained; beautiful gardens and very kind staff. The language spoken is mainly Italian and therefore very recommended for families.  Delicious breakfasts and assorted buffets.  VERATOUR entertainment service always ready to propose games and activities both on the beach and in the swimming pool. Mythical YURI and the animation guys.

Common are is beautiful and staff is very friendly.   Great rates.   A few issues.   Room is nice size and clean snd comfortable but no door on toilet area. Room was warm and temp controlled by horel and they would not lower.   Limited food options but OK.   No business center.

The hotel is superb, the reception is great, especially the sister is very crowded, the food is great and clean and their service is outstanding, and the people who served us greatly sister is polite and honest.  His baby's sister at the room service and brother Nizar at the diabetic were very nice.  Check out the hotel where it was a great experience

Hello, We had a great stay, attentive staff , warm and helpful , varied and delicious food , great hotel , perfect room , excellent cleanliness , we had good times , thank you for everyone to the next!

On 26-03-2025 An absolutely perfect experience ❤️. The food was tender and tasty, cooked to perfection, and the cakes were very, very delicious. The service was impeccable, with an attentive and smiling team that made us feel at home. The warm welcome and friendly atmosphere make this place even more special. I highly recommend this restaurant to all lovers of good food and quality service.  Thank you ♥️

reviews.review_title: Modern hotel with excellent service and ameninities
reviews.review_text: We stayed here as a couple for one night in January 2025. When you walk in the hotel, you truly get a sense that this is a modern and clean hotel. This hotel truly feels on brand with other Marriott hotels around the world. It is tastefully decorated. We were warmly greeted by the front service desk staff. I had let the hotel know in advance that it was my husband's birthday, and they went above and beyond to surprise us with a room that was fully decorated with balloons and a delicious cake.
